Summary: We checked in late on December 30th as we arrived for a Disneyland New Years Celebration.   Check in was fast and easy.  The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful.   We went to our 6th floor double queen room.  The room was very clean and well appointed.  The bed was comfortable.   This Hilton is a short drive from Disneyland and most Uber / Lyft trips ran about 12 to 14 with a tip.  This place has a great little store and they serve breakfast.   We did not eat breakfast as we were always rushing out to get to the parks as fast as we could.  This Hilton Garden Inn is doing things right!  We will be back!!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable and a terrific price
Summary: Lovely place! The lobby is so nice, the pool area also nice and clean. I love the bar. The rooms were clean and comfy. It's not a fancy place but very clean and comfortable and the staff is amazing. Bryan at check in was particularly stellar - what a great guy and he makes you feel so well taken care of. But everyone I encountered was terrific.
Manager Response: Dear Tom P,  Thank you for the terrific review!  We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit to Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove.  We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,

Summary: First, hotel is further away from Disneyland than the map suggest. Probably not recommended if you are thinking of walking to Disneyland from there. Uber ride is around $7-9 during peak hours which is quite reasonable. There’s also regional bus shuttle which requires pre-paid tickets and is quite confusing to use the app. Hotel is going through renovation, some facilities are not completed yet. Those that are were spanking new. My room is on the high floor, newly renovated, very clean and spacious. There’s breakfast provided by the hotel but it is not free. Car parking overnight is also $20/night (expensive!). There’s a few nice restaurants within walking distance. It’s a busy area so feel kinda of secure. Overall a good stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Subpar for what you pay for
Summary: Booked as a good neighbor and should not be. Although it’s getting remodeled might make it better was not impressed. Arrived to zero toilet paper in bathroom and no toilet paper holder. 3 towels for 4 people. Loud parties by the pool— continental breakfast is basically bread and fruit. Not great or worth it. Also wasn’t told that we had it included in our package for three days.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was ok.  Going through renovation and only the top three floors finished. Got the top floor. So that was good. Room was not remodelled but refreshed. Paint and maybe flooring were done.  There was rust on the baseboard in the bathroom making me think they did nothing in there.  Bed was comfortable enough.  They moved the credenza with the coffee maker/ microwave in front of a picture on the wall?!?  Housekeeping was supposed to be upon request but they came in anyway on our second day.  There are no DND signs for the door. Called the desk and they noted we didn’t want anyone in the room.  Upon check out I saw a sign stating if you don’t want housekeeping you get bonus HH points.  I asked for the points to be added to my account as I didn’t request housekeeping. They did
Manager Response: none

Summary: Looked nice online, not impressed in person. Faint smell of marijuana in the room. Cleanliness not amazing, rooms old and smaller than standard, and toilet was clogged before we got in. Will not stay here again or recommend. Beds were decent though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I like this hotel for the location. Close to Disneyland and other locations.  The hotel was in renovation and I didn’t have the chance to experience the bar and restaurant.  It is clean and the staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Dear MercedesC3,  Thank you for the terrific review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit to Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards

Summary: First time staying at a Hilton Garden Inn. We chose this hotel because of its price. The lobby is nice but the hallways and rooms are dated. That being said the service was good, it has good security and the ART bus to Disneyland comes right to the hotel. Since we didn't spend much time in the room it was good.
Manager Response: Dear Smilytech, Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We pride ourselves in our service and very nice and motivating we met and exceeded your expectations. It was a pleasure meeting you and cant wait for your next visit. Regards,

Summary: Hotel is very poor, receiption is poor Air condition is inside room is too old and noisy , carpet is too old across all hotel area   People who work there are doing their job ok Generally you don’t feel you are in Hilton
Manager Response: Hi Hossam2911,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your last stay.  I'm terribly sorry that we failed to provide you with an experience consistent with what you ought to expect from Hilton Garden Inn.  I appreciate the detailed feedback you provided. Your comments assist us in identifying areas for improvement.  I hope that you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate the level of service I know we are capable for providing. We appreciate your business.  Sincerely,

Summary: Staying here was the best stay ever! The front desk Bryan is truly amazing! The rooms were great and clean! When I need things the brought them up to my room! The walk to Disneyland was about a 30 mi. Walk! I wish I did breakfast but we were always gone when breakfast happen! But my kids enjoyed the pool!
Manager Response: Dear kristree24,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. It is our pleasure to have guests that enjoy the property as much as you did. On your next visit stop by say hello.  Bryan is a valued team member, he will be very excited to see positive results for the service he provides  Thank you again

Summary Heading: It could had been very good
Summary: At the strong recommendation of the H Honors program I had applied and received the keyless check in. The room away from the very noise Harbor Blvd. On arrival did they not honor the keyless check in and I had to physically check in. They gave me a room just facing Harbor Blvd. The shower/bath tub had blood looking stains but I was told that it was Ok as it was only RUST. “The tub is rusted.” When I brought up both the noise and the rust I was not offered a room similar to the one I had reserved.  A self served beer costs $8.00 and a small ice cream cone $4.00. This is not the Astoria in New York or the Eiffel Tower in Paris or Disneyland. The fro t desk people are very pleasant and kind. I believe the management needs some “repairing.”
Manager Response: Thank you for feedback. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn.  I apologize. We failed to meet your expectations and our own standards.  Your comments have certainly highlighted opportunities within our operation and I thank you for your feedback.  We know you have a choice when you travel. I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you so rightly expect from a Hilton Garden Inn  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Worst Experience for 10 year Diamond Member
Summary: This hotel was our annual go to hotel for the past 10 years. Unfortunately, this stay will be our last. The front receptionists were all rude. I later found out that there is a new manager for the front desk who seems to run the place to the ground. The hallways smelled like mold. The bathroom sink in our room drained very slow. The bathtub stopper was broken. Bar was closed the entire 5 nights of our stay. The bathroom in the lobby was filthy. No soap in the dispensers, no tissue or paper towel and the sinks were also dirty. Everyone at the front desk seemed angry when they were working. And more than half the time there was no one at the front desk to greet us or help us. They seemed to all be hiding in the back office. One night as my family was returning back to the hotel, I
Manager Response: Thank you for candor. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn.  I apologize. We failed to meet your expectations and our own standards.  Your comments have certainly highlighted opportunities within our operation and I thank you for your feedback.  We know you have a choice when you travel. I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you so rightly expect from a Hilton Garden Inn.  Sincerely,

Summary: Hotel is located near to Disneyland and cost about US$7 one way via Lyft. There are also numerous restaurants and a Target located within walking distance.   We found hotel staff to be helpful and the rooms clean. They have a good breakfast and our server Carlos was friendly and welcoming.   I would have given 5 stars if not for being overcharged at check-out by almost US$300. The staff managed to resolve the issue quickly when I pointed it out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check your bedspread before you unpack your bags. We found mold on the covers and when we asked to switch rooms, experienced mold in several other rooms as we tried to find a suitable one.  Eventually, we switched to the Hampton Inn across the parking lot
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your last stay.  I'm terribly sorry that we failed to provide you with an experience consistent with what you ought to expect from Hilton Garden Inn.  I appreciate the detailed feedback you provided. Your comments assist us in identifying areas for improvement.  I hope that you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate the level of service I know we are capable for providing. We appreciate your business.  Sincerely,

Summary: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE! Assistant manager Wilson checked us in, he was very rude! That should've been our 1st red flag, hotel is outdated and room was not clean. Asked for a quiet room, got one by the elevator very loud as if he did it on purpose, he seemed very annoyed at the request. Bathtub drain was clogged (really bad), paid for breakfast but nothing was noted. Ok, no communication in the hotel. 3 ppl tried to get in to our room, when I asked what's going on, they just said we are checking... Called the front desk and they said they would investigate...ok. a little later a fire alarm went off, called the front desk to check what's going on and they said it was just the alarm they are checking. A little heads up would've been nice. To what the manager responded: all you do is
Manager Response: Hi saraic74,  Thank you for candor. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn.  I apologize. We failed to meet your expectations and our own standards.  Your comments have certainly highlighted opportunities within our operation and I thank you for your feedback.  We know you have a choice when you travel. I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you so rightly expect from a Hilton Garden Inn.  Sincerely,

Summary: Just a 1 night stay after a late arrival into LAX.  Helpful front desk staff.  Rooms very tired and upgrade required. Bedroom/bathroom furnishings very worn. Microwave & pod coffee machine provided together with refrigerator.  Parking $20 per night, car park very busy with narrow spaces.  Very close to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn I apologize. We failed to meet your expectations and our own standards. Your comments have certainly highlighted opportunities within our operation and I thank you for your feedback. We know you have a choice when you travel. I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you so rightly expect from a Hilton Garden Inn.  Best regards,

Summary: My wife and I checked in on 1/9/22 at around 9pm. We were greeted by Brian. Brian provided excellent customer service and we felt he genuinely cared. Everyone at this hotel is very nice and a special acknowledgment to the housekeeping staffs and Erica. She made sure our room is up to standards and well stocks. We would definitely book here again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is more like a Howard Johnson hotel instead of a Hilton. The rooms are very basic, hallway wallpaper is falling off and our refrigerator had mold in it. These rooms are not worth their price at all. Stay away and spend your money at other places. The man at the front counter was going to make me cancel my reservations because they don’t accept PayPal cards due to “Fraud”. I’ve never heard or had this brought up until this place. Then he said he would make an exception for me. Next time I’ll just stay on Disney property.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel.  Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every stay. I greatly appreciate your comments about aspects of the room and hotel that need updating. In taking great care of our charming hotel, our main priority is to be able to offer a very well-maintained and comfortable atmosphere. I hope that I can convince you to change your mind about another visit to our property, and hopefully you will be willing to give us a chance to turn your experience around. It would be such a pleasure to personally welcome you back to our hotel!  Sincerely,

Summary: My sister and I stayed at this property during a two day trip to Disneyland. Although it was not within walking distance of the park, Ubers were easy to get and got us to the park in five minutes usually. The property is well-maintained and has a nice selection for breakfast. I like that the front door stays locked and you can only access the hotel with your key. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was a good price for a nice selection of food included. The hours are only until 0900 on weekdays so you can’t start your day late if you want to eat here. The rooms were clean but a little run down. Beds were comfortable and clean. Great value for the price we paid and we had connecting rooms with our family members, very convenient. Easy to open doors with your phone as the key.   My only complaint about the room was that the AC units in the rooms could use upgrading. While I appreciated the cold air, they were extremely loud and did not stay on constantly despite trying all settings on them. Even after pressing “constant air” it would go off and restart again with loud enough noises to wake you from your
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are plenty of other renovated/newer hotels in the area. This hotel is a dump. Rooms smell, carpets are filthy and the staff couldn’t care less that anyone is staying there. On our four night stay we encountered exactly ONE nice lady who worked there. Save your money for the theme parks and stay at one of the motels nearby, you’ll probably have a better experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The goal is to have a place to sleep - and this meets that goal. The rooms are clean enough but man is everything dated and worn. Our bathroom had water damaged cabinetry, rusted doorways and a funky tub.   Really the highlight was the included breakfast. Great value and good service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Because I felt that rooms were not cleaned to a level for the current situation. Even if we weren’t in a COVID time the rooms were dirty. Long black hairs still on shower walls and even the back side of the bathroom doors had old hairs. The level of cleaning just felt has if your staff didn’t care!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everybody there was great, polite, and friendly. Very quite Area. The room was very clean except the shower needed a little bit more cleaning. I like how they had a breakfast and they have a little bit of everything for everybody.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beds are hard pillows are nit comfortable at all you only get 3 per bed for a couple
Summary: Breakfast is not included and there is a $20.00 parking charge per vehicle plus tax, beds and rooms are not comfortable. Some the rooms I entered weren’t cleaned right. Broken phone, lamps.. I was surprised that at the Hilton I had to change rooms 3 times one them had a horrible smell and ac did not work it was humid In there. I can keep going but it was exhausting and a bad stay nice lobby but beware not exactly the best place to stay for these prices
Manager Response: none

Summary: The person at check in/check out was incredible, I feel bad I can’t remember her name! But the rooms are a little dated. The lobby was nice and new but they need to do that with the rooms too. Great stay
Manager Response: none

Summary: Two nights was almost $499. Then they charge for breakfast and for parking. This is California and why I hate being sent to California for business. And I can only reimburse $100 a night in hotel fees.
Manager Response: Dear dps11011,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this valuable feedback. We appreciate all of the wonderful comments we have received from our guests and we also appreciate hearing about how we can improve the overall experience in our hotel.  We are sorry we did not meet your expectations, We are committed to you, our valued guests, and are taking immediate corrective steps to regain your confidence in us.  Nothing is more important than regaining your trust and all of us here at Hilton Garden Inn and hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you again soon and provide you the positive Hilton Experience you have come to expect from us.  Sincerely

Summary: Tried to check in a couple hours early, they had not one room with a king available so we settled for a room with two queens. Beds were EXTREMELY hard and uncomfortable. Room was dirty and smudged. Bathroom was dirty and so was bath tub/shower. There was an old bag of food behind the night stand that my 2 year old daughter found, we were disgusted and that was probably the reason behind the room smelling. It was also very hot in the room, hotels really should cool the rooms down before people go into them. Everything, and I mean everything was scratched up, paint chipping, and old and outdated. Even the lobby was the same way. Definitely need some upgrades and to work on their rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for candor. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn.  I apologize. We failed to meet your expectations and our own standards.  Your comments have certainly highlighted opportunities within our operation and I thank you for your feedback.  We know you have a choice when you travel. I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you so rightly expect from a Hilton Garden Inn.  Sincerely,

Summary: the hotel is in a good area near Disneyland and restaurant the reception was incredible everything is clean and organized, the staff very friendly and very helpful and of course I would stay at this hotel again for my next trip
Manager Response: Dear ecoronado06,  Thank you for taking the time to share the details about your recent experience at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove.  Feedback from our guests is so valuable! Thank you for giving us an opportunity to be of service to you.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Don’t get fool the Hilton experience, the rooms are old, they are short in staff so rooms will not be clean, they won’t charge the towels or trash.  Also if you are going to get in late and need to check out expect to wait outside 15-20 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear angeldelamoraovies,  Thank you for candor. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn.  I apologize. Summary: One of the more affordable hotels in the area; it’s showing it’s age though as i’ve stayed multiple times over the past 20 years and not much has changed.  It’s a good value, nothing spectacular, but if you need a decent place to stay, at a good price, Hilton Garden Inn does the job.
Manager Response: Dear wickedhahd,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write us a pleasant review.   It is always refreshing to have a guest take the time to write something positive.  We value your time and your thoughts about our staff and property, and are so glad that we made your stay with us comfortable!  We look forward to having you back soon, and exceeding your expectations!  Sincerely,

Summary: Super friendly staff. It stops right there. Nasty hallways filled with dirty towels diapers and nasty carpet.   Don’t be fooled by the nice lobby.    The rooms need a serious makeover and really dissatisfied with Hilton management allowing their franchise be run like this place.
Manager Response: Dear MauiFlying,  Thank you for candor. I am disappointed that we failed to provide you with an experience that is consistent with Hilton Garden Inn.  I apologize. Summary: We are 20, so we checked the age requirement on website and phone multiple times, and every employee stated 18. When we arrived, employees refused to check us in stating it was 21 minimum. The staff and management were rude and disrespectful. Hotel was overall under par, would not recommend. But, nice distance to Disney is willing to deal with issues.
Manager Response: Dear mckennalebeau,  Thank you very much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel. Summary: Had 2 rooms. A/c wasn’t working properly  Refrigerator didn’t work. No housekeeping for two days even though we called twice First night hadto use dirty towels second night had to physically go down to the front desk and get towels to shower.  No food service  Very limited food/snack items

Summary: Beds weren’t cleaned underneath. Only one elevator was working. Parking is pretty hard to find after around 10 that is close to the lobby. Reservations are needed for amenities. But, location is perfect to be in the center, especially close to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear vasquezjazy01,  Thank you very much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel. Summary Heading: Terrible Service & Dirty. Stay Anywhere Else.
Summary: Stayed here for 4 days for my sons 5th birthday and trip to Disneyland. The room was dirty. Had not been vacuumed. Surfaces were not wiped down. The bathroom had other guests pubes still there. So of course I complained. Was not offered another room. Was assured that the room would be cleaned and maintained and the manager would be notified. The beds were made and the towels changed but nothing else. No cleaning the bathroom, no vacuuming. Do yourself a favor stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Non Smoking Hotel that allows Smoking
Summary: My Family and I booked three nights at the Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim. The First Night we arrived we noticed a strong odor of Marijuana in the hallway leading to our room. once we were in the room, we kept smelling it from time to time because someone was smoking it in the fire escape stairwell. At around 12am the fire alarm goes off. and we all exit the building. There was no staff present to show us where we should gather outside, or to relay any information to us. we stood outside in the cold for 40 minutes while the fire department did its job. then the fire department loaded up and left. no staff came out and told us it was safe to re-enter the building or to let us know it was safe. The fire alarm continued to sound periodically until about 2:30 AM. The Next night Again
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have seen better Hilton locations. Cleanliness of room was not up to standards carpets had stains, not sure if they had elevators  cleaned or not. Would help having sanitizer every floor or in elevator.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came to Disneyland by myself after being fully vaccinated and the hotel was perfect. Clean rooms. Friendly staff. I cannot wait to come there again once it’s fully opened after the pandemic is fully over. The location is great even though the walk is a little bit long. Only complaint is there was no shuttle service to Disneyland so I had to either walk or take Uber. Great place would stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel on multiple occasions and have never experienced such horrible service.  The electricity was out when we arrived so we had to walk up 5 flights of stairs to our room.  We stayed for an entire week and only had our room made up once and they didn't even empty the trash or replace coffee cups, cream, or bath products.  As Hilton Gold members we expect more.  The only person who actual gives a fig is a young woman named Sam.  Every other person we spoke with was extremely rude.  Bennie was the most rude person I've ever encountered at a Hilton.  As other posters have stated, this hotel does not notify guests prior to their arrival that the services are ZERO yet they charge the full rate.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I think it’s very important that in-house cleaning is communicated before the stay. It was nowhere on the website. Apparently the website has been under construction that’s what the lady in the complaint department said. I had to go downstairs to get my towels and toilet paper. I would’ve went to another hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This property should not be open
Summary: We have stayed at this property previously and it has always been a "safe bet" when visiting the area. Not now.  We checked in and were told there is no food service, the pool is open by reservation only, and quite frankly all of that is understandable given the pandemic. However, after two days of not having our room serviced we called the front desk only to be told that for guests staying three days or more we need to specifically request to have our rooms cleaned. I have never experienced this before: ever.  What I am annoyed about is that they were allowed to accept the reservation and not tell us about the limitations prior to our arrival. Quite frankly had we known we would have canceled and booked another property. It seems like a failing on the part of Hilton to enforce
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is excellent.  The staff was professional as well as friendly.  The facility was clean and secure.  I was early arriving and the front desk person helped get me into a room so I could complete work I needed to do.  They also had excellent coffee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nothing was open bar, food and room had dirt on window seal look like window had been open and plastic bag over smoke alarm all front desk said sorry blamed the housekeepers but nothing else done about it not even a offer of points or another room
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Trip to Anaheim for a Bellydancing competition
Summary: Awesome hotel very clean,staff is friendly, and rooms were nice and clean. Awesome food choices within walking distance. The only thing that is new to me is paying to park in Anaheim. Where I live paying to park doesn’t exist unless it’s at a concert or big sporting event at the arena.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love this hotel. Great atmosphere, friendly staff and clean rooms!! This hotel is close to a lot of good restaurants. Close enough to Disneyland. Next to Joe’s Italian Ice!!!!! Definitely my home away from home!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The close proximity to Disneyland is great. Their buffet-style breakfast options are perfect. There’s cereal, yogurt, and fresh fruit which is great for the little ones. The rooms have a mini fridge and microwave which is awesome if you’re bringing kids and their snacks. For the price, this was a great option.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is a little older but clean. It does not have the safety security box in room but you do have access to a lock box through the front desk. The hotel does not have a lot of extra amenities but this is all made up by the excellent care from the staff. My experience was through my 70 year old mother. I was attending a convention and during the day she remained at hotel due to her wheelchair mobility. She had breakfast each day in the hotel lobby restaurant (serves breakfast and dinner) There is also a small bar if interested with weekly specials. (beer $5/cocktail $6). I have to give a shout out for Wincess her breakfast server. On the first day she asked if she could have a smaller portion and have the child serving instead of the adult and the server was more than happy
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel, like all the Hilton Garden Inns that we stay at is consistently clean. They have connecting rooms, which makes it much easier for our family to stay together while still having not too many people over load one bathroom. It is very convenient to Disneyland, so we were able to drop off our teenage daughters at Disneyland, and my wife and I were able to finally have some alone time for some nice meals and relaxation. The rooms have refrigerator, microwave, coffee makers, and irons. This makes the whole experience very user-friendly. There were plenty of towels in the bathroom , so I did not have to secretly raid the chambermaids supply cart.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were absolutely blown away with the incredible experience we had with Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim. Stewart Arevalo took excellent care of us! We arrived about 10am assuming we would leave our bags until the 3:00 check in. Stewart was able to get us our room early and were able to rest in our room before going to Disneyland. We also were celebrating 3 bdays on this trip and there was an amazing gift basket with balloons, candy and mickey ear headbands for each birthday kid. Our kids were thrilled!! Breakfast was included in our Disney vacation package and the breakfast staff were very accommodating. They had our food ready quickly and even offered to go containers on the mornings we were in a hurry to get to the parks. We were even given a drink carrying case to carry our
Manager Response: none

Summary: The check in was super easy, and my whole family loves our room. It was clean and comfortable and relaxing. Wi if was easy to get to, husband used the bar for a night cap, AC worked great..all in all it was a very good stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very pleasant stay at the Hilton Garden Inn - Anaheim. Very close to Disneyland, even though we were there for a tournament and didn't go to Disney.  Staff was warm and friendly and really go above and beyond to make sure your stay is amazing.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Appreciate the professionalism of your staff
Summary: Well done on services, front desk, restaurant, and cleanliness.  The front desk staff welcomed me, the breakfast was very high quality and wait staff very professional.  the quality of food was excellent and price was very reasonable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a conference and had the pleasure of staying at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove. Upon arrival (very late in the evening after a long flight from east coast to west coast), I was greeted by a very friendly and helpful front desk agent (his name has left me). I was having some difficulties with my digital key and he immediately fixed the problem and I was able to check into my room quickly. From then on, I knew my stay would be great. I had breakfast every morning at the hotel and was greeted by Vindy, the breakfast attendant that remembered what I drank every morning before I even had to tell her. I had a problem with my shower draining on night one and the staff fixed the issue within 30 minutes. The General Manger even came out to say hello and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was at the Hilton in Garden Grove with my company and the time sheets I had out while I was eating breakfast was misplaced . One of your employees named (Raymond O.) offered to look in not one but all the trash cans and I was able to get the time sheets I needed . Saved me hours of paper work . Thank you Raymond .
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a wonderful hotel to stay at for both business and pleasure. Our room was clean and comfortable.  The dining area for both breakfast and dinner was relaxing.  The entire staff went out of their way make sure our visit was the best! From check in to check out, we highly recommend this hotel. Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn is one of my favorite brands of all the Hilton properties.  This one however needs a lot of improvement in the food and beverage area.  I came in my first night relatively late and had not eaten all day so I decided to eat in the hotel restaurant. Mind you I spared no expense and I ordered the ribeye steak medium.  When it arrive it came chargrilled and with absolutely no pink it was the consistency of a hockey puck.   I was so hungry that I suffered through it and just asked for additional salad because the salad was better than the rest of the meal.  They did this take the steak off of my meal as it was not cooked correctly and the manager did try everything they could to rectify the situation.  In addition I ordered the wine that they were out of on the menu

Summary Heading: Best Birthday weekend at the Hilton!

Extra blankets, pillows, and towels were available, even during the busy Christmas holiday. Definitely will stay here again!

There is a charge for parking and the hotel will issue you a parking pass. They do offer a digital key as well.  As a Hilton Honors member, I try and remain loyal to the brand. This was not a large charge but it was about the principle of being charged for something I did not use, then seemingly not believing my. Overall this is a great place to stay, check your bill on leaving.

I found the room cold but the staff helped me find the thermostat.  I enjoyed the hot tub and dinner and a drink in the bar/restaurant.  Although I did not purchase anything, I liked that the hotel has a small store with food and toiletry items that is open 24 hours a day.  Check-in and check-out were smooth and easy.  I would stay here again.

Summary: I had a room booked for the night of July 4th that was confirmed through Expedia. I arrived late at night after being at the Disney Parks all night. He did not offer too look elsewhere for us or offer us a rate at the same price.. His tone and manner was condescending and mocking. He didn't even bother to ask me my confirmation number or anything while I was there.   Due to his attitude I just requested my money back and called Hilton Anaheim to see their
Manager Response: Dear jesus2486,  Thank you for reaching out and informing us of the issue you had our hotel. This matter is very important to us and we have been investigating to find out as to what exactly happened. After speaking to representatives from Expedia we have found out that they made a mistake on your reservation. The representative stated that this was an internal error and they addressed this with you. They will be escalating this issue so that this doesn't happen again in the future. We apologize for the inconvenience you went through and can reassure you this wasn't based off ethnicity or appearance. Summary Heading: Great customer service, building could use a little work
Summary: From the minute we checked in to the final day, we were extremely impressed with the friendliness of the staff. We were in Anaheim as part of a dance competition and had a block of rooms. The staff arranged a private conference room for our team for a private breakfast and meetings without a request. There were welcome signs and friendly faces at every turn. While the staff was friendly and welcoming, the facility itself could use some updating. The tiny fitness room is also the only access to the pool, so there were always swamp monster footprints through the tiny little room (more of a hallway, really). It contained 2 treadmills, an elliptical machine, and a single bench with a rack of dumbells with roughly 2 feet of space to walk behind the equipment to the pool. The rooms
Manager Response: Dear Pam R,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with great feedback about you recent stay, we know how valuable your time is  I know anytime we receive a 4 star rating our team had a great role in this as we always strive to deliver exceptional “Bright Hearted” service. I apologize about the inconvenience our pool access caused, and the problem you had with the mini fridge in the room. I will pass your comments on to our staff as we always strive to enhance our guest experience.  I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and please contact me directly should you need anything prior to your arrival as I want to make sure your next visit is a 5 star event.

Summary Heading: Service and attention to detail is lacking
Summary: Bed and pillow were very comfortable.  Cleaning service somehow missed the previous guests bra and underwear that was left in our room.  They also replaced the lotion with a "new" bottom full of gross pieces of stuff stuck to the side.  Service at breakfast was also slow and lacking.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle N,  Thank you for taking time our of your day to write a review about you recent stay. I sincerely apologize for the condition you found your room in and the service you received in our restaurant. We strive to provide our guest with clean rooms and high quality service. I apologize we were not able to provide this on your stay. I will be discussing your review with our Housekeeping and Food & Beverage managers so we can ensure cleaner and comfortable stays in the future.   Please let me know if I can be of further assistance and I hope you will give us another opportunity in the future to provide a better quality stay. Have a great day!

Summary: Great staff in all areas of service. We had 5 rooms to accommodate all family members for a Disneyland visit. Enjoyed the breakfasts and the service. Dining staff accommodated us at pool side whether we ate in the restaurant or brought food. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Vacationer282918,   Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay and for choosing our hotel for your families vacation.   I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, our restaurant, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",  Sincerely

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay while visiting Disney!
Summary: Our family always stays at Hilton properties and while visiting Disney the Hilton Garden Inn is our go to hotel. It is refreshing to walk through the doors while traveling and feel so welcomed. The staff consistently treats us like we are personal friends. The rooms are always clean and ready upon arrival. The dining is great with plenty of options and willingness to make us speciality items upon request. The staff has consistently, for years gone above and beyond. Thank you Mitchelle, Lorena, Celine, Hassan, Jim, Duce, Alfredo, Khalid, Bryan, Maryann, Ashley, Lourdes and Elvia.
Manager Response: Dear lmschwenn,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to give us feedback about your recent stay and for yet again choosing our hotel for your vacation. We appreciate the constant Hilton loyalty and I am glad to you were able to meet/interact with our "Brighthearted" staff. All the names you mentioned are some of our top leaders when it comes to customer service! I will share your kind words with all of our staff to celebrate another great guest stay.   We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future to provide an even better stay. Have a great day!  Sincerely,

Summary: Great hotel staff, should reevaluate the housekeeping service. Breakfast is good, just ask waiter for what you want if they don't have it out. When dealing with hotel staff, other than housekeeping, everything was perfect. Housekeeping has room for improvement.
Manager Response: Dear Culture54008298233,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to give us feedback about your recent stay and for choosing our hotel for your vacation. I am glad to you were able to meet and interact with our "Brighthearted" staff. We strive to provide our guest with the best customer service in the area and I am thrilled we were able to succeed. I will address the issue you encountered with our Housekeeping staff to ensure we can provide our guest with clean rooms everyday.   We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future to provide an even better stay. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Excellent service and great location and great price.
Summary: Excellent service and great location and great price. Thanks for your professionalism and keep up your awesome job. We love this place because of the great support and staff. We will definitely recommend our friend s and family.
Manager Response: Dear Steven L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with great feedback about you recent stay I know how valuable your time is. I am glad to see our hotel's location made your stay a comfortable and effortless stay. I know anytime we receive a 5 star rating our team had a great role in this as we always strive to deliver exceptional  “Bright Hearted” service.  I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and please contact me direct should you need anything prior to your arrival as I want to make sure your next visit is a 5 star event.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Excellent Customer service!! Nice place to stay. Has all the amebities for a comfortable stay. Quite close to disney Park. Also check out the awesome 3D Wall decor at a small ice cream shop near the hotel! Totally worth it!
Manager Response: Dear Paradise45822848880,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with great feedback about you recent stay. I am glad we are able to offer amenities to make your stay as comfortable as possible. I know anytime we receive a 5 star rating our team had a great role in this as we always strive to deliver exceptional  “Bright Hearted” service.  I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and please contact me direct should you need anything prior to your arrival as I want to make sure your next visit is a 5 star event.  Sincerely,

Summary: We felt as though they were expecting us. Benny made us feel so welcome, and Bryan helped us solve a travel problem. They were just amazingly friendly and professional. We also noticed a nice camaraderie amongst the staff.
Manager Response: Dear BirdI-Mom,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to give us feedback about your recent stay. As always we are extremely excited our front desk staff  was able to deliver a great welcome and also help you resolve your travel problem. It is always our goal to deliver the best customer service we can and it brings a smile to our faces when we succeed. I will pass on your kind words onto our staff, specifically Bryan and Benny.   We hope your travels bring you back our way as we would love to provide you and your family another great stay. Hope you have a great day!  Sincerely,

Summary: The hotel never seemed to miss a beat. The service was excellent. The staff were very friendly and courteous. The rooms were clean and ready for us when we arrived for our stay. The location is great and getting the shuttle to Disneyland were steps away from the hotel. We have stayed in this hotel before and would come back again.
Manager Response: Odyssey36532095182,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback about your recent stay! I am happy to hear we were able to offer you a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Delivering great customer service is our daily goal and I am glad you were able to experience it. I hope you and your family also had a great time at Disneyland with all the new attractions they have.   I hope we are able to provide you another great stay in the near future. Please let me know as I would like to welcome you back.  Sincerely,

Summary: Management and staff would be better serve if they check the room prior to the guest arriving.  If the employee refuse to stay, why would I. Management should be on the same page on assisting the customer.
Manager Response: Exploration270849,  I am sorry you found your room in an unacceptable condition.  Our team works very hard to keep every room and bathroom clean; we strive to exceed expectations every day.  Please accept my sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations and know I will address your feedback directly with our Housekeeping team. If there is anything else I can do for you please let me know.  I hope you will consider staying with us in the future and give us a chance to ensure a better stay. Happy 4th!

Summary: Saline, Fernando, Marianne & Ashley.....shout out to you all!!! Such amazing service, you always go above and beyond every time we stay with you all.  I can’t say enough about the breakfast...amazing, always make us feel like family. Thank you Kali, you are a true asset to Hilton Garden Inn. My family and I have been staying there for years and you never let us down. Amazing hospitality. I appreciate you all.
Manager Response: Mr, Eckenboy,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay, we know how valuable your time is. We sincerely appreciate your comments, and I have made sure that we have thoroughly shared you kind words with our team.  As one of our returning family members, you know our goal is to always provide you with 100% guest satisfaction and I am thrilled to know we always succeed on doing so when you visit. I know our staff loves having you here every week as you are a delight to have conversations with.   We will see you very soon and hope you have a great day!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Best hotel in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area
Summary: I stay in LOTS of hotels and I like this one the best.  The staff is great, the rooms are always clean with good beds, parking is close and convenient, there are restaurants within walking distance from fast food to 4 star.  There is a Walgreens and Target close by (the Target has great Disney stuff), I feel safe there and it lives up to the Hilton standards.  I come for business and pleasure. Always check dates for best deals.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay, we know how valuable your time is. We sincerely appreciate your comments, and I have made sure that we have thoroughly shared your kind words with our team.  Our goal is to always provide you with 100% guest satisfaction and by the looks of it we succeeded. I am so happy to hear our hotel was conveniently located for your stay. Having a Target and Walgreens less than a mile away always helps out tremendously with last minute stuff we might have forgotten.   I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and please contact me direct should you need anything prior to your arrival as I want to make sure your next visit is a 5 star visit. Have a great day!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn was not my favorite brand as this was my first time.
Summary: This was my first Hilton Garden Inn experience. The staff was very friendly and helpful. No complaints there. The ceilings were popcorn ceilings in my room and the description states that this hotel was newly renovated. They need to do better in order for us to return. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Monique R:  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay we know how valuable your time is. We sincerely appreciate your comments, and I have made sure that we have thoroughly reviewed your comments with our team.  Our goal is to always provide you with 100% guest satisfaction and I am deeply sorry that we failed to do so.  I have address issues you encountered with my Maintenance chief and resolved the problem as well as the additional items as mentioned.  I have reviewed your concerns about our product, and I do hope that you found our hotel to be extremely clean and our staff to be enjoyable as we hear that often from our customers, as well as our team’s exceptional  “Bright Hearted” service.   I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and please contact me direct should you need anything prior to your arrival as I want to make sure your next visit is a 5 star event. Have a great day!  Sincerely,

Summary: Excellent stay. The room was extremely clean. The beds were comfortable. Great food at the restaurant. Staff was the friendliest and most well informed staff i have experienced. Will recommend this hotel to all my friends and colleagues.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, our restaurant, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Very nice place in old Town
Summary: Basic room, not all the normal settings of four stars. No toilet setting, no hair cup, etc. Only shampoo, gel, cream and soap. Confortable bed not so good pillows. Breakfast nice but no fresh juice or lactose free milk. The employees very nice, but very basic for a 4 stars Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay, I know how valuable your time is.   We apologize our hotel wasn't equipped with the proper tools you needed for your stay to be a great one. I will be discussing you review with our management staff so we can ensure better stays for our guest in the future.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will give us an another opportunity in the future. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary: The hotel is pretty good, but is in need of refurbishment.  I have stayed here many times over the last 15+ years and it is getting run down. A small, but weird issue:  At breakfast the bacon is not out on the "serve yourself" part of the buffet.  When you ask for bacon (which is required) you get a couple of strips.  If you want more then you need to ask, wait, and then you get a couple more strips.  I was making a breakfast sandwich, so this was a pain in the butt.
Manager Response: Cruiser18706179521,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry to hear you were disappointed with our breakfast options. We will be working with our team to provide better and more effecient options during breakfast that our guest will love.  We will be entering a renovation in early 2020 and we would love for you to experience the new look for yourself. I hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to provide a better stay. Pleasea let me know if I can be of further assistance. Have a great day!    Sincerely,

Summary: Hotel needs updated, smell coming from bathroom sink, and mold on ceilings, no continental breakfast was included. Comfortable clean beds. And service was great. Shuttle was nice came every 30 minutes.
Manager Response: Sunshine58547822392,  Thank you for taking time our of your day to write a review about you recent stay. I sincerely apologize for the condition you found your room in. We strive to have a clean and functioning rooms for our guest and by the looks of it we let you down. I will be  discussing your review with our Chief engineer so this doesn't happen again in the future.   We will be renovating our hotel in early 2020 and we would love for you to experience the new look for yourself. I hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to provide a better stay. Pleasea let me know if I can be of further assistance. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Will not be staying here again
Summary: We stayed here for two nights and it was not cheap due to booking it last minute.  It's about a 30 minute walk to Disneyland so after a long day we got back to our hotel. We had been at Disney since early in the morning and head out to our room to rest. It was 4PM and all we wanted was to take a shower and lay down.  When we entered our room, housekeeping had not been there. We had no more clean towels or shampoo in the bathroom so we were pretty annoyed.  I called the front desk to ask if they had forgotton and the lady at the front desk was pretty rude.  She said they had not forgotten but check ins were the priority and not us since we were there they day before.  She said she could call housekeeping unless we didnt want it cleaned.  Of course I wanted it cleaned!! We wanted
Manager Response: F M,  Thank you for the feedback about your recent stay, I know how valuable your time is.    I am very sorry your experience did not offer you the quality of service you deserve.  We strive to give exceptional service every day, for every guest; I am very sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. Responses like the one you received are unacceptable and I will be discussing your review with our team to prevent it from happening again.   I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you and please let me know the next time you are in our city as I would love to have you stay with us again, and I would to meet with you in person. Thank you again,

Summary Heading: Will stay here again every time
Summary: After a long trip coming from Tucson, my wife and I were greeted by the amazing Jessica Cruz. She went out of her way to make sure we felt comfortable and taken care of during our time. She then remembered us later during our stay, I would come back based off of her alone.   Breakfast was great, everything we needed to go into the park and not have to worry about food.  The shuttle is through a third party, nothing special and got us there without issue.
Manager Response: Slagles42,  Thank you for taking time out of your valuable day to give us feedback about your stay. We sincerely appreciate your comments, and I have made sure that we share your kind words with our team.    I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and please contact me directly should you need anything prior to your arrival as I want to make sure your next visit is a 5 star event. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: GREAT Night Manager- BUT Property NEEDS A Face Lift!
Summary: Greetings All! HGI is ALWAYS our go-to hotel whenever we stay within the U.S.A. We continue to return to Hilton Properties because of their impeccable hospitality and immaculate rooms. UNFORTUNATELY, THIS property in Garden Grove is in GREAT need of  renovation. The rooms have old furnishings, and signs of neglect throughout the rooms we were shown (3 different rooms-all in need of face-lifts). We settled on one that was the least dismal. Thankfully the manager was accommodating took care of one night stay.  The next morning however, we sadly experienced another disappointment.. the dining area chairs were covered in splattered paint (we were informed it was due to a monthly painting class)-THIS should of been cleaned before allowing the use of the dining room again to visiting
Manager Response: Tari K  Thank you for the feedback about your recent stay.  We are very sorry your experience did not offer you the quality of service you deserve.  We strive to give exceptional service every day and we let you down in more than one aspects. I am glad our great night manager, Jim, was able to assist you in this whole matter. Jim is one of our great assets we have here at the property. Jim was able to pass on all the information he discussed with you and you can be rest asssured all aspects were looked into and corrected.    I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you and please let me know the next time you are in our city as I would love to have you stay with us again, and I would to meet with you in person. Thank you again,

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove for two nights. The hotel itself is dated but the rooms are clean and comfortable. The room rates were decent. The best thing about the Inn is the staff. Staff members are very welcoming and friendly.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Vacationkrazy,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. I apologize you found our rooms to be dated and I am happy to share with you that we will be having a renovation done at our hotel in early months of 2020. This renovation will give out hotel and rooms a new look that hopefully our guest will love and appreciate. I would like to invite you to stay with us again after the renovation for you to experience our new look.   I know that whenever we receive a 4 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",   Stewart Arevalo

Summary: First time in this hotel in Anaheim, but like others I have stayed in around the area, still within walking distance of the main gate, although there are shuttles. We were at a conference, so the walk down to the Disneyland Hotel was very welcome.  The hotel is a typical Garden Inn, clean and well-presented run by a friendly team. It has a nice secluded pool too. Evening menu in the restaurant is fine if you lack the energy to go out looking for food! My plea to HGI’s is please put out a cereal WITHOUT sugar added.
Manager Response: David W,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a great review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary: Every month me and my family make a Disney trip and like to try new hotel every time . I had a good experience at this location . The rooms were always serviced when we asked . Hotel lobby has a very nice look which made for great pictures . Maryann was very friendly and always helped with whatever we needed . The evening supervisor was a bit rude which was strange since everyone else we encountered was super nice ( maybe he was having a bad day) . The dinner was quiet which was nice coming back from Disney . The breakfast was amazing , food was perfect and Vindy was very attentive . Thank you for a great trip Hilton Garden Inn.
Manager Response: Aborroel,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. I will be addressing your concern with our night staff so they deliver the same type of great service as our morning staff.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary Heading: “Great already”-from someone rarely posting a review
Summary: Writing this after checking in. I’m with my wife and mother in law. My daughter is staying at another hotel with their school choir for a competition.  Just want to say Hassan is “The Bomb”. Saying this now before I forget to post a review. I think he was the one who checked us in summer of last year. We had a great experience then and I feel like this weekend will be another great one.  Hassan is very accommodating. Courteous, smiling, and seems to be a very nice person. The other person (a female) behind the counter was very nice, too. Check in was short and sweet (I like that!). No fanfare. No fake talk.  Hotel is always clean. Very easy to find. Area is quiet. Not too far from Disney main gate. Lots of restaurants nearby. Convention Center within walking distance Will
Manager Response: natdongputik,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay we know how valuable your time is. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. I will share this great review with our Guest Services Supervisor, Hasssan, I know he will be thrilled that he made a difference on your stay.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary: Good option to stay near Disneyland. Extremely friendly Staff. Clean and spacious rooms. Good location and Great food during your stay!!!  What else you need when you are on vacation with family !!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Tourist38755605062,  Thank you so much for taking a moment to share your experience with us. We are happy to hear that you found our amenities, location and staff to your liking! We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the not too distant future. Safe travels.

Summary: Our family was in the area for a hockey tournament. We appreciated the close proximity to Disneyland and the included group reservation benefits: free parking and breakfast. That said, so much went wrong with this trip that it’s hard to come up with more pros than cons.  Pro: distance to Disney, pool, and standard continental breakfast fare.  Cons: gross guest rooms - our first room had a huge dark brown stain on the seat of the upholstered chair. The room they moved us too (after our request) had dark brown stains on the comforter. Housekeeping hours are strange. When we requested the housekeeper come back when we would be gone (1:00pm), she told us “If I don’t clean your room now then I’m going home.” Uhm, what? My son was still asleep (it was 9:30 AM) so we had to go with no
Manager Response: OnAir38795856432,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to fill out a review about your recent stay with us. I am sorry you found your room in an unacceptable condition and for the type of response you received from our staff. It is our goal to deliver the best customer service we can and it looks like we failed you on that aspect. I will be discussing this matter with our front desk and housekeeping staff. I will ensure our lost and found system gets better and also delivering more efficient housekeeping service.  Please accept my sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations and let me know If I can be of further assistance.

Summary: Location was great. House keeper didn’t clean my room when I told the front desk I needed it to be cleaned but no rush. 12 hours later I can back at 2am and it still wasn’t cleaned. I had to change my room at 2am
Manager Response: Dear FarAway01492362615,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We’re very sorry you experienced an undesirable stay and level of customer service with us. The problems you mentioned with the housekeeping service have been addressed. We appreciate you alerting us to this issue and we hope you will give us a second chance if you return to the area.

Summary: Came here for a second time with my cousin for a girls Disney trip... What an awesome and clean environment. Very bright and welcome both the staff and place. Will come back years to come! Thank you to the whole staff!
Manager Response: Companion44245686375,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary Heading: Very comfortable business or pleasure hotel
Summary: This is a really nice, welcoming hotel. Friendly, hardworking staff (domestic, reception and catering) who sustain a great service even when very busy. It's clean, bright and comfortable with strong wifi.   The Garden Inn has good easy proximity to Disney via the reliable bus shuttle. At many times, you can in fact get to Disney more cheaply, and to lots of other places, on local OCTA buses, which go past the hotel. Lots of good places to visit, and facilities like a bank over the road, restaurants and a Target, nearby. Taxis and Uber are good too. If you want to go to LA, the Metrolink train service is good at ($17 day return). This fare includes the OCTA bus to Fullerton station (which is the easiest) and all public transport in LA.   The hotel breakfast is good and plentiful.
Manager Response: Robo009,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   We will have renovation in early 2020 and would love to invite you back to get a first look at our newly remodeled hotel. Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary: From the moment we walked in we were greeted with a sense of humor the was a nice addition and a sense of urgency as well the front desk clerk got us checked in to our room so fast knowing we were all so tired I think his last name was Conner
Manager Response: Flyer56490310104,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, our humorous staff, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   We will have renovation in early 2020 and would love to invite you back to get a first look at our newly remodeled hotel. Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon. Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",

Summary: The staff was extremely helpful.  Any issues we had were dealt with promptly and to our full satisfaction.  Breakfast was wonderful -- lots of yummy choices. We were going to Honda Center and Disneyland, both of which were within very short Uber rides from this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff here is very friendly and accommodating. No Problems at all. Great place to stay with family and friends. Very clean hotel. We were visiting Disneyland for a week. I was very happy with this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just finished our stay of 1 week and the hotel exceeded expectations and was ALMOST perfect. The room was clean, the front desk staff were awesome and the shuttle ran flawlessly to and from the parks. The only complaint we have is on our last night we went to use the hot tub and in it was a lady and her small child, fully clothed including socks and they had pulled all the life saving rings off the pool wall - she was smoking in the hot tub and didn’t care when we asked her to stop. When it was mentioned to the front desk, he couldn’t have cared less and wasn’t one bit sorry. I was pretty put off by that for many reasons but if it had no been for this situation the stay would have been perfect!  Good location, quiet, affordable and perfect if your intention is Disneyland or
Manager Response: none

Summary: Will definitely stay here again as everything in this place just exceeds expectations. From the time we arrive, the check in process was painless and the staff was helpful. The breakfast selection is not that much but for the price paid, this is above excellent. Overall, this place is awesome!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Only about 1.25 miles from Disney and has a well priced shuttle service to and from the parks that runs every half hour. Great value hotel and very friendly and attentative staff. Recommended for family trips to Disney
Manager Response: none

Summary: The most recent stay at the Hilton Gardens Inn, Anaheim felt more like a stay at a nice Days Inn  or Comfort Inn.    It was clean and tidy,  but Beds were NOt quality nor comfortable at all.  Daily parking rate should have been for the week, if you have to charge Guests at all,  and the cheapest meal of the day was kinda pricey,  for breakfast. Staff was very friendly and nice.   Just expected a bit better since this was a Hilton Brand Hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We went to Disneyland and stayed here.  The Place is doing some work but the rooms are a good size and clean.  The hotel is quite and the café is good for breakfast or dinner. There is also a little deli for after a day at the parks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel many times. I have never had dinner at their little restaurant. The tuna steak was outstanding. Their tomato soup was just as good. Good food from when I’m away from home.  The staff is very friendly, and eager to make recommendations. The bar staff was just as nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lobby is nicely decorated, free lollipops for kids and a bar for the adults.  Rooms and hallways are tight.  Room was clean and a major plus was we couldn’t hear neighboring guests.  We didn’t opt for the $13.95 breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There were some problems with the room that staff addressed however it took two days. Coffee maker Broken 2 days TV not working  1 day WiFi from neighboring hotel was stronger, opens wrong login page,  tough to figure out.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: March 2019 stay at Hilton Garden Inn
Summary: Our Group had a good stay while we had to visit Anaheim to attend the Natural Products Expo show.  It was ideally located and gave us all a short walk to the convention center.  Maybe you could organize a shuttle to the convention center.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A very nice hotel.  Very friendly staff and very clean hotel.   The restaurant was very good and I enjoyed my stay.   I saw some restaurants in the area but chose to eat at the hotel.  Rooms were nice and quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Elevator Issues, otherwise it would be a three.  Average
Summary: First the ok.  Cant call it good, because it is just ok.   The facility and room are clean, which I would not only expect but require.  The rooms are snug.  I had a double queen and there is just enough room for the two beds.  Small bath, and small closet.  Again, adequate for a short stay.  I you are staying longer than just a day or two  I can see how the room could become claustrophobic.  You can purchase tickets to Disney right at the hotel, which a great so you can save time at the Disney box office.  I was not at the facility to go to Disney, so i can not fully advise if this rates are the same.  I would bet they are.  The breakfast buffet is sort of a over statement.  Ya it5 is a buffet, however the choice are very limited.  It does have a cook to order for eggs and a few
Manager Response: none

Summary: Convenient to have access to breakfast at the hotel and reasonably priced buffet. Lots of options for dinner at the hotel restaurant. Room was clean. Staff was friendly and caring.  Convenient to public transportation. Lots of options for other restaurants close by if you choose to eat elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of my favorite OC hotels!
Summary: I often stay at this hotel for its excellent service in proximity to the companies I call on for business in Orange County. Parking is convenient and it is quiet despite being Freeway Close.  The staff is always friendly and if I am lucky enough to be there in the summer when Disneyland is getting families in droves the breakfast experience is made more fun by lots of happy kids and a small army of young girls dressed as a princess. What a nice way to start the day!
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time at this location and had a great experience. Service was great.  Location was perfect, close to everything.  Staff all around was great, very nice, especially Stephanie at the front desk and Ameriza at the restaurant.  Stephanie was courteous and friendly and made us feel welcomed our entire stay and was very helpful with information around the area.  She was awesome for helping us out in the business center.   Ameniza helped us in the restaurant with our food and both times she was great.  Customer service is a big deal to us and this place really made it that much better for our weekend. Overall, room, location, staff, and customer service was great and would recommend.  Looking forward to our next getaway back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very clean for the price. The staff was less than friendly. The distance to the parks was convenient. The breakfast was expensive for what would have been free at a Holiday Inn Express. The staff seemed uninterested in guest interaction. it felt like you were interrupting them.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location is perfectly close to Disney, overall good hotel but wouldn’t recommend Resturant and be careful dealing with the staff as they have very bad attitude. I wouldn’t recommend as there are many other hotel chains near by that are about the same price but better quality of service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay at and friendly staff working there. Rooms are good and in nice condition. A great spot to stay at to be able to reach other areas in LA. Good breakfast, which was included in our stay.
Manager Response: Hello Asa U,   Thank you for taking your time to share your experience with us.  We cannot express our gratitude to know how much you enjoyed your time with us.  We hope your family vacation was as wonderful as it sounds.  Please allow us to host you and your family the next time you are in town once more!   Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right. Guaranteed.

Summary: Bunch of stuff was stolen from my room  and the hotel has currently done nothing about it. This occurred on my last evening. I got back from a conference, and noticed some items missing from my room. After scouring the entire room, I told the manager what was missing. He said someone would call me. I've call them and nothing has been done
Manager Response: Hello GrandTour27100459452 - Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay.   First let me apologize for us not finding the missing item. We have a very strong Lost and Found procedure in our hotel, and managed by a very dedicated and experienced Executive Housekeeper as we take lost and found very seriously,   Our Housekeepers turn in items of incredible value all of the time, and in most cases when we do receive calls such as this, when we find the item, we contact the client right away and have the item shipped to them if they have already left the city.  It is disappointing that we did not locate the item, and I can assure you we always do our due diligence should these matters ever arise and make every attempt to contact the customer.   Again, Please accept my apology for this inconvenience, and I will make sure that your comments are reviewed by our General Manager.   Best regards, Mitchell

Summary Heading: A bit of a hike to the convention center
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in conjunction with attending the Winter NAMM show, a major music industry trade show. It pretty much tales over all local hotels in the disneyland area. This show has been going on for decades, so there should be no surprises.one morning, the restaurant ran out of potatoes. granted it was near 10am when the restaurant stopped serving breakfast.really, though, the hotel should have been better prepared for a trade show of this magnitude.My major complaint is just that the hotel is about 1.5 miles from the convention center, and there is no shuttle to there. There is a shuttle to Disneyland, and it is ‘t expensive, but the place that it stops is as far from ACC as the hotel is. The hotel staff wasn’t too clued in on this. I did not ask the
Manager Response: Dear audiogeek; Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I appreciate the insight in the convention center walk, as the weather was not the best during your visit, and the Disney shuttle is not set up to unload their passengers closer to the center.  Hopefully next year during NAMM there will be shuttle service from our area, to eliminate some of your concerns.    Thank you s much for staying with us and I am very glad you enjoyed our hotel overall.  It was a pleasure to have you and all of our friends with NAMM staying with us and I hope you will be back again next year.  Best regards,  Mitchell
