Summary: If you travel enough, it's bound to happen to you eventually: you get stuck (unknowingly) reserving a room at the "lemon" property because all the preferred hotels are booked. Well it finally happened to us. This Garden Inn was truly the pit: the restaurant was closed because they didn't have a cook; the room was loud, the shades wouldn't block out any neighboring-hotel lights; the street noise was horrendous; the in-room heater was broken, clanky, and wouldn't stick to the setting...and worst of all: the staff said "they're hands were tied" about every concern we raised.  Granted these are 'minor' issues compared to pestilence or safety concerns...but with the Hilton Garden Inn "Promise" there were numerous easy customer-relationship saving measures the staff could have but,
Manager Response: Hello Mobile16775122908 - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.    I want to first thank you for spending such quality phone time with me this morning to talk about your recent experience.  It was obvious to me from our excellent discussion that we failed not only to meet our guest’s high standards, but our own high standards as well.     It is unusual for us to have failed in a number of areas, and I find no excuse for not communicating with you and your family while you were here as to how your experience was, make positive corrections to your visit, and above all apologize and do something for you and your family to both make it right, and to thank you for your business.  We always claim that our associates are empowered, so there is no "Devil in their integrity" as we discussed when moments like this happen, and we expect all members of our staff to perform exceptionally, at all times of the day and provide Hilton’s Bright Hearted service.  Although our restaurant was not available at the time, we should have offered you something as an alternative as you were tired, and your family just made a long trip.  He other issued as discussed should have all been immediately addressed and properly remedied as well.  I expect our team to be creative and find solutions at all hours of the day as mentored.  That is normally our culture and again we did not show the proper empathy that we should have.   I appreciated all of the time we shared on the phone and I do hope you will be back to allow us another opportunity to make it right.  I will also keep in touch with you as well and touch base on your future visits to our city, as I will always be at your service.  Please extend my sincere apology to your family and I do hope I get to meet them in person during a future visit.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman Assistant Area Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Gem of a hotel near Disneyland - Must stay!!
Summary: What can I say about this hotel, only wonderful things.  For me and my friends it's always the perfect spot.  Yes it's a few blocks from Disneyland but the walk is nice and I will always stay here apposed to another hotel in the area because of the rooms, the service and the staff!!  Everything is always perfect and I must admit I can be picky. :)All the staff are great.  Hassain, Brian and Jim are the best!!  I am so glad they have never left the hotel.  They are some of the best assets you have there.  Along with many other things.Go to this hotel and enjoy your stay!
Manager Response: Dear sffilm; Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  I am glad to read that  you enjoy your stay and especially glad to see that you recognized Hassan, Bryan and Jim as they are truly "Bright Hearted" which is what our Hilton Garden Inn Culture I all about.  I hope you will b returning to visit with us again soon, and because of your mentioning our team members, I will make sure they receive a gift card in your name for providing you with memorable customer service.  Have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary: I was there with my Husband & new infant over Thanksgiving & of course she starts crying, so I take her to the lobby in the middle of the night & Jim is so sweet to set me up with some hot coffee & even held her and fed her for a bit.  He went out of his way to make myself & my baby comfortable & felt like family before I went back up & tried to get more sleep.
Manager Response: Hello R L - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your stay.  I usually write a lot when it comes to responses........but honestly what Jim did deserves one word from me - OUTSTANDING!  I am so proud of Jim as he truly understands what customer service is all about.  Going beyond I what we should all do, and we are all proud of him.   I will make sure he is acknowledge for your review and given a gift card in your name!  We hope you will be back again soon.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: The rooms and beds were nice, however the location is a far walk from the parks. They offer a shuttle, however, it can get pretty pricey. The hotel also requires a parking fee, which can also get hefty with the room fees.
Manager Response: Hello Nomad62646470477 - Thank you for taking the tme out of yourbusy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so sorry about the some of the incremental costs that you incurred.  We always try to price ourselves either below or at market value for parking, and the shuttle service tends to be a great value and convenience for our customers, verses the resort parking fees. Our shuttle includes the dally back and forth privileges, which is also a big plus.    I am very glad that you found our hotel to be nice and I cannot thank you enough for giving us the opportunity to serve you and your family.  I do hope you will contact me direct the next time you are coming into our city, as I would like to meet you and your family in person.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: The hotel was very good, clean, staff was very good at helping with our being over bearing. The only reason I didn't give full stars is there were no black out curtains, and I like dark. The light from the other hotel shining in my room bothered me. The hotel was clean, everything worked, and the staff was wonderful. I even appreciated the text the day of arrival verifying my arrival time.
Manager Response: Hello Sherpa08415277190  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent visit.    I am so sorry about the missing black-out draperies.  I cannot find any excuse for that as our rooms are inspected prior to releasing back into service and this should have been caught by us.  As we always discuss with out team....it is the details that make the difference between having a good or a great experience and this was an important detail.  I want to thank your for the very kind words for your overall stay and next time I promise you we will make sure your visit is perfect in the details!  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: The front desk staff at this property is the best . Every one i encountered was polite,professional,and efficient. Stephanie was so helpful when we checked in. The breakfast staff also as very engaged with all the people in the restaurant. I will definitely stay here when we come back to Disney
Manager Response: Hello AngieMartinez1106 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the greeting you received, to your room, to our fabulous breakfast staff and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Stephanie is an absolute gem of ours and she provided our guests with outstanding service, so thank you for personally recognizing her.  I will make sure that she receives a gift card in your name for receiving your personal comment on TripAdvisor!   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary Heading: Great experience, great hotel at the Happiest Place on Earth.
Summary: Our recent stay at the Hilton Garden Inn was excellent. There evening manager Hassan Torres took wonderful care of us. We had a great room for the four of us, their breakfast was simply the best. Great service from the entire hotel staff. Look no further when booking your stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Brian N - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am so glad your enjoyed your stay and I am especially happy to read your comments about our staff and for your acknowledgement of Hassan. Our culture at HGI is call "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and I am very happy that he exceeded your explanations.   Having an "Excellent staff" are two very strong words that we strive for at our hotel, and we will continue to make sure that we provide that type of service to you and all of our guests. we appreciate the recommendation and the stellar "5 Star review".  It only makes us want to work harder.   Thank you again and I hope we will see you again very soon.   Best regards, Mitchell

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn January 8-12 2019 for a mini getaway for a honeymoon. We only have good things to say about this hotel and their staff! From the first night when Delta lost our luggage, the amazing night shift worker brought it up to us around 1 am when it was dropped off at the front desk! The men who checked us ensured that we were set up with toiletries since our bags were lost.  The hotel didn’t have a bottle opener handy, but the second night, the same night shift worker helped us find a bottle opener and brought it up to our room for us.  The rooms were absolutely spotless every day on our return to the rooms- thank you to the housekeeping staff!  Maybe the best part was the waiter and waitress in the restaurant during breakfast every
Manager Response: Hello StephanieVMalcolm - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay  Thank you so much  for your 5 star review. I am so glad to read that you enjoyed the breakfast service that our breakfast team provides, and especially the wonderful omelets made by Victor.  Next time you have to try his Salsa - It is the best in the city!!. He really is fantastic and I receive so many compliments on his breakfast cooking.    We will make sure he receives a Gift Card on your behalf, and I am sure he will be happy to have earned it. Honestly he is very proud of his cooking (and so are we) and performs this way consistently and we are proud to have him on our team.   Losing luggage is also absolutely no fun for any guest, and being an experienced traveler myself, it will always be one of my fears, so I am thrilled  to read that everyone did all the right things to make you feel comfortable under the circumstances as if you were 'almost" at home.  Have a wonderful day and we all hope you will both be returning to us again soon.   All my very best, Mitchell

Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn was wonderful. We stayed a few days w family and I must say that the staff was very helpful and friendly. The room was excellent very clean. I would recommend it and I would definitely be staying there again. Also the Young Lady Stephanie was very sweet and helpful. My children took a liking to her. She’s a great peeps  and I think all hotels can take notes from these folks. Thank you Hilton Garden Inn Staff. Keep up the great hospitality
Manager Response: Hello lizzard2674 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   All I can say is WOW!! I am glad you found everything at the hotel to be wonderful as that is exactly what we strive for with each and every guest stay! I know that whenever we receive a "5 star review", our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team and especially the guest service you experienced from Stephanie.   Stephanie is a gem of ours and she provides our guests with outstanding service, so thank you for personally recognizing her. I will make sure she receives a gift card in your name for being mentioned in your TripAdvisor review.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for the holidays with my family . The hotel was always clean and the staff was friendly. Stephanie was always helpful! Thank you for a great experience. Will definitely return again!
Manager Response: Hello DannyAvina07 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent  stay.   As I always stay -  WOW!!   I am glad you found everything at the hotel to be wonderful as that is exactly what we strive for with each and every guest stay!  I know that whenever we receive a "5 star review", our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team and especially the guest service you experienced from Stephanie.   Stephanie is a gem of ours and she provides our guests with outstanding guest service, so thank you for personally recognizing her. I will make sure she receives a gift card in your name for being mentioned in your TripAdvisor review or I should really say - another review!! I am also very glad to read that you found our hotel clean, as our housekeeping team works very hard to maintain it that way.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: Every person i encountered here was always so polite . Stephanie checked us in and let us know about all the restaurants near the area which was super helpful. Jose during breakfast time was always making sure we had what we needed . Hotel rooms were always clean and lobby looked really nice . I would bring my family again for the holidays.
Manager Response: Hello MoonKnight94 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   As I always stay - WOW!!  I am glad you found everything at the hotel to be wonderful as that is exactly what we strive for with each and every guest stay! I know that whenever we receive a "5 star review", our staff was also highly involved with your experience. I am very happy you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team and especially the guest service you experienced from both Stephanie and Jose.  They are exceptional associates of ours and we are very proud to have them on our team.  They both emulate our hotels culture of "Bright Hearted Hospitality".    I will make sure they both receive a gift card in your name for being mentioned in your TripAdvisor review or I should really say - in another review!!  I am also very glad to read that you found our hotel clean, as our housekeeping team works very hard to maintain it that way.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary Heading: Very small rooms and inedible breakfast
Summary: Negatives:  The Queen/Queen rooms are very small and a family of 3 or 4 will trip over each other.  The breakfast buffet was inedible each day, except for the packaged cereal.  Breakfast staff was very rude.  Positives:  The room and bathroom were very clean and the housekeeping staff was very professional and helpful.  The front desk was polite and helpful with housekeeping requests, but did not seem to truly care about or take action on any issues reported.  Parking was very difficult if you returned to the hotel in the evening.
Manager Response: Hello MClark_0  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.    First let me apologize for the breakfast experience that you had, as it is unacceptable to have anything less than the perfect stay and our breakfast is meant to compliment your stay and not make your stay an unpleasant memory.  I will discuss your comments with our Food and Beverage Manager as product quality is very important, and there is never any excuse for rudeness anywhere in our facility.  If you have a free moment, I would love to discuss this with you at your convenience.   I do hope you will allow us another chance in the very near future, and I would like for you to call me direct to make your reservation and again please call me to discuss your recent stay. I will always be at your service.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: I love staying at Hilton because I’m Hilton Honors member. With this particular hotel (Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim), I love that it’s near Disneyland. Since, it’s one of the neighborhood hotel I would think that it needs renovation. The hotel is really old - there are a lot of people that stays here s it needs to be more attractive to guests. The room and the hallways are very narrow and small. There’s no free parking nor breakfast. Like, taking advantage of people who are going to Disneyland. That if you want to be closer to Disneyland pay extra more. Also, the pool is out of order. The pillows aren’t comfortable. We have to request new pillows, beddings, and towels.
Manager Response: Hello Quest742633 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    First I want to apologize for your experience and thank you so much for being a Hilton Honors member. we value your loyalty greatly and your are the foundation of the Hilton Brand.  I do understand your point, and I want to apologize to you and your family, I realize there is no free parking and free breakfast, and it did not help to have our pool out of order for construction reasons, especially if you were with your family. We don't skim on buying new linens, and keeping our rooms fresh at all times, so we should have caught this during the room inspection phase and release to our clients.  If you would not mind can you call me as I would like to discuss your recent stay with you. I will always be at your service, and I do hope that you will allow us another opportunity to service you and your family again in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Location and service was great. They made two adults and four kids work out with additional blankets and pillows. Also had no problems getting more towels if needed. I would definitely stay again or look to stay when I make my next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Hello Paradise - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction.  I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",   Mitchell

Summary Heading: I couldn't be happier with my stay.
Summary: Helped us with the bags upon arrival was a big plus. Entertainment for the girlfriend's kids which was excellent as well. But the roses and chocolates on the bed made it very special for me and my husband. Great place!
Manager Response: Hello Mindy - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. I am glad you found everything to be more than your initial expectations would have been, and I hope you will be back to celebrate another occasion in the very near future.    I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. Again; we all hope that you will be returning back to your "2nd Home" soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",   Mitchell

Summary: Overall it’s a good hotel close by the Disneyland area , lots of eatery’s around. Breakfast is continental in the hotel and it’s not free not worth money. Clean rooms, confortable beds. And they have a shuttle for the parks .I would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Hello Travel - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   I do hope our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.  Guests mention our location often in reviews and I am glad you found our location convenient for you.  Breakfast I will review with the team, as it is not really a continental as you have hot items plus a cooked to order item as well, and I want to make sure that we offered that to you in the dining room.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. Again; we all hope that you will be returning back to us soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",   Mitchell

Summary: I will not stay here again. I am a Diamond Member and have stayed here a few time in the past two months. The last time I told them at checkout about the unclean room (bath/shower area). I got the same room last week and still the same disgusting bathroom.
Manager Response: Hello Explore22689522936 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.    First let me apologize for the room experience that you had, as it is unacceptable to have anything less than the perfect room.  Cleanliness is a critical area for any hotel brand, and normally we are very proud of our hotel, but we obviously failed to make sure that nothing slips through the cracks when it comes to room cleanliness, and we failed.  All of our guests are important to us, and as a Diamond Member, the respect and care for you and your family while staying at any Hilton branded hotel should be second to none and that I how we feel at our hotel.  I do hope you will allow us another chance in the very near future, and I would like for you to call me direct to make your reservation or please call me to discuss your recent stays. I will always be at your service.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Parking lot was under repair during our stay room was good some paint bubbleing near the air conditioner. Room is a little dated toilet was slow to flow as was sink. Was surprised that the hotel didn’t have coffee and hot water for cocoa only lemon water.
Manager Response: Hello leemI813FI - - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   I cannot tell you enough as to how much we all appreciated your review, and I am very sorry that during your stay, you found a few items in disrepair and not having the parking lot completed made it at time uncomfortable as well.    I discussed your review with our Chief of Maintenance and we will make sure that you will not have the same issues on your next visit, and I would like for you to call me direct to make your reservations. As I tend to say often, out team emulates the Hilton Garden Inn culture of being what we call "Bright Hearted", which is a critical part of our service focus.   Again; Please let me personally know if you ever need anything, and I hope you will be returning to visit with us again very soon as I would like to met with you in person and personally thank you for your business.   Have a wonderful day, Mitchell

Summary: We had a good stay at the Garden Inn in Garden Grove. Four nights, room well-cleaned each day and complimentary coffee and tea in the room and lobby each morning. The hotel offered breakfast and dinner at their restaurant but with the other options close by, I would skip that. Breakfast was much like the complimentary breakfast offered in most hotels in other cities. But this is Anaheim so it’s not free. It cost about $17 for one adult.   Parking was a challenge because they had just repaved the parking lot. Any inconvenience was more than made up for by the shuttle to Disneyland. Not free but worth it.
Manager Response: Hello  h_e_tompkins  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.    First let me apologize for the breakfast experience that you had, as it is unacceptable to have anything less than the perfect stay and our breakfast is meant to compliment your stay and not make your stay an unpleasant memory.  I will look into the cost for your breakfast to see if there were possible add-ons to your expense.  The daily cost is $13.95 for an adult and it includes one cooked to order item as well as the buffet and with tax it ii an even $15.00.  I will discuss your comments with our Food and Beverage Manager as this is a very important comment as we feel that it is a good overall value. If you have a free moment, I would love to discuss this with you at your convenience.     Please accept my apology for the Parking Lot being re-paved as well. There never seems to be a good time to do this and I am sorry for any inconvenience that we caused you.  I do hope you will allow us another chance in the very near future, and I would like for you to call me direct to make your reservation and again please call me to discuss your recent stay. I will always be at your service and thank you again for the 4 star review, we will shoot for the 5th star when you come back!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: This location always comes through for me.  Offers breakfast, clean and friendly. Check-in process was quick. parking was a bit tight but the front desk asked if I needed any help.  That was very nice. I like the fact that it has a Refrigerator/Freezer combo and a microwave.  Helps when you are in a hurry.
Manager Response: Hello TraveltipKIT- Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. It is great to have a complimentary refrigerator in the room when you travel. I always look for a hotel with it included.  I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove Review
Summary: The hotel was very nice, as well as their in house facilities. We had a great stay. The staff was all very knowledgeable and helpful. We had a very smooth check in and departure as well as shuttle service from hotel to convention center.
Manager Response: Hello Roving  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay and you have a very cool TripAdvisor name.   I cannot tell you enough as to how much we all appreciated your stellar 5 star review, and I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. As I tend to say often, out team emulates the Hilton Garden Inn culture of being what we call "Bright Hearted", which is a critical part of our service focus.   Everyone at our hotel enjoys going the extra mile for customers, and to also not allow them to feel any less special when we have groups in-house that also demand our attention. I especially appreciated you noting “the staff never seemed too busy to help us”, which tells me that not only did we listen to the customer, but also had good follow-up as well - so thanks again!   Please let me personally know if you ever need anything, and I hope you will be returning to visit with us again very soon!   Have a wonderful day,   Mitchell

Summary: I have stayed here many times.They really need to improve the rooms. Mold in showers.  Tired bedding. They need to take it up a notch. The breakfast is good. Coffee is good. I recommend asking for floor 5 or 6. They seem slightly better.
Manager Response: Hello sillygoose2018 - First let me thank you for your loyalty to our hotel and the Hilton brand.    I don't know if I do know you, but I would like the opportunity to meet with you during your next visit and discuss your recent stay.  As you know we do take our guests' comments seriously and always try to make improvements to each and every guest stay.  Our maintenance team and our housekeeping team works hard to keep our hotel in excellent shape, and it is  critical that we always pay attention to the details as you have pointed out.    On behalf of our team, I want to thank you for staying with us, and I can assure you that your next visit will be perfect.  Please call me direct to make your next reservation, and if you have time for that cup of coffee, please let me know.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Always try to stay here when in the area.
Summary: This is my fav hotel in the Anaheim area. Not too crowded.  Great prices when not a convention in town.  EXCELLENT staff always accomodating.  Small town feeling in big city.  Hiltons are always clean. Best chain of hotels in my opinion and I travel a lot!  You can order any type breakfast you want!
Manager Response: Hello Christy L - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. I am so glad your enjoyed your stay and I am especially happy to read your comments about our staff.   Our culture at HGI is call "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and I am very happy that we exceeded your explanations. Having an "Excellent staff" are very strong words that we strive for at our hotel, and we will continue to make sure that we provide that type of service to you and all of our guests.   Thank you again and I hope we will see you again very soon.   Best regards,   Mitchell

Summary: Hotel is good but price or charge for parking is ridiculous . 18 day . I stayed 3 days and spent 60 usd . There are other options that does not charge you and similar quality . Don’t go . Or choose another one . All rest is fine but does not worth it
Manager Response: Hello 269marcusa -Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.    Would you mind sending me an email as to why you found the hotel to be Good but not for work? I would like to discuss this with you further as we value our business travelers greatly.  Please send it to Mitchell.hirschman@hilton.com  Thank you so much,  Mitchell

Summary: My family stayed here for my mother's 60th birthday at Disneyland. My mother uses an electric mobility scooter, and the hotel staff were gracious enough to let us charge it in the lobby overnight, as the room was a tight fit with 4 adults already in it. The breakfast was delicious, my only wish was for a few more gluten free bakery options, as I am gluten intolerant. The room was clean, and although the bathroom was a little small for 4 adults, it was always made up beautifully by housekeeping. The shuttle that picks up from the hotel and brings you to Disneyland was top notch too, with it coming right on time, and always remembering to bring the ADA accessible bus when we called ahead (for my mother's scooter.) All in all, this was a fantastic hotel to stay at, and since I am a
Manager Response: Hello Relax05678672976  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   Wow! - Thank you for the 5 star review! I am very glad to read that you found our service to be excellent, as we  really do try to get better and better with each and every guest visit, and the team does work hard on our overall guest focus and product quality and thank you for mentioning our breakfast.  We call our culture "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and it sounds like we achieved that with your stay. We hear a lot about our location, but it makes us feel especially proud when we can make sure that our guests with a disability feel just as comfortable as those without.  When I read this review it made me very proud of our team!!    We all look forward to your return and I especially look forward to seeing you and your family in person the next time you visit. Please give me a direct call should you need reservations.   Best regards, Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: My husband & I, with our 2 small kiddos, have stayed here 3 different times. It's reliably clean, cost effective, modern & up to date - very attractive décor throughout.  We will continue to use it anytime we do Disney parks or other all-day Buena Park attractions. Why would I take a chance on another hotel when this one delivers every time?
Manager Response: Hello Naomi G - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   Wow!! - We all really appreciate the 5 star review as our team really does work hard to emulate Hilton Garden Inn's "Bright Hearted" service culture. Guest Satisfaction is always our main focus, and we are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay.  What I am really excited about in your review is that you have stayed with us three different times!  Honestly;  being consistent in any organization is one of the most important things and to have repeat customers is fantastic!  We love the fact that you are traveling with your family as Hilton Garden Inns tend to be the best of both worlds for the both the leisure and business travelers.    Please come visit with us again soon (Star Wars is coming soon) and call me if you need anything in all of your travels.  Have wonderful day and Best regards to your family -   Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: Extreamly good and clean hotel; located close to Disneyland and with numerous restaurants in walking distance. Staff very friendly; Breakfast and food-/drink-service are very good. Pool & Gym available. Check it out ...
Manager Response: Hello Stefan K - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room, breakfast  and more to be to your satisfaction. Cleanliness is always a focus of ours, as our housekeeping team works very hard to make sure that our hotel shines. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: I am not disappointed for the price that I paid. I am all about cleanliness of hotel rooms and this Hilton did not disappoint. The employees were pleasant and accommodating. Considering we came on a busy weekend, the staff was kind and courteous.
Manager Response: Hello Sheryl - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay!   I cannot tell you enough as to how much we all appreciated your stellar 5 star review, and I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. As I tend to say often, out team emulates the Hilton Garden Inn culture of being what we call "Bright Hearted", which is a critical part of our service focus. Everyone at our hotel enjoys going the extra mile for customers, and to also not allow them to feel any less special when we have groups in-house that also demand our attention. I especially appreciated you noting “ The employees were pleasant and accommodating ”, which tells me that not only did we listen to the customer, but also had good follow-up as well - so thanks again!   Please let me personally know if you ever need anything, and I hope you will be returning to visit with us again very soon!   Have a wonderful day, Mitchell

Summary Heading: Best Margarita Ever at the inhouse bar.
Summary: Ask for Ruben at the bar.  Best margarita ever. Room was very clean and nicely furnished.   Bed was very comfortable.  The people at checkin were very courteous.  I would definatly stay here again on business or vacation.
Manager Response: Hello  Dream48156863594 - I hope that you are doing wonderfully well.  I hope you will be visiting with us again soon.  I wanted to thank you for the 5 star review, as it means the world to us and I was especially glad that felt our Bright Hearted hospitality at our desk as well.  Our Housekeepers all work very hard and I made sure they new about your acknowledgement on cleanliness as well. Rubin received his gift card for your wonderful comment in your name as promised and again I hope you will be returning to stay with us again soon.  Take care and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary: Uncomfortable beds, LOUD air conditioning, odd hallway smell.  Room was clean, breakfast not a great value.  Night staff inexperienced in customer service.  More Motel 6 than Hilton.  Good location, not too far away from most attractions.
Manager Response: Dear John F,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered with our front desk staff and the comfort of your room, and we are working with our entire team to correct the problems and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: Perfect Service at front desk, restaurant and breakfast. Clean, quite very comfortable. Located in a great location for business or pleasure. Lot of nice restaurants in walking distance. No complaint, good place to stay
Manager Response: Hello maurizi01957 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay..... What can I say....one of my favorite words is "Perfect" and to read about us in the same light makes us all smile as we try to live up to the Hilton "Bright Hearted" service.   I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and it sounds like you experienced all areas of the hotel too!   We better make sure that we keep your room perfect for your future return visit, and I can assure you that our housekeeping department will make sure it is.   Thank you again, and we all look forward to seeing you again!  Have a wonderful day, Mitchell

Summary: The Hotel was as clean as anyone would want.  The food was great and the people welcomed us and kept interacting every time we were in their presence.  It was lovely to be there. Value, Location and easy bus connections.
Manager Response: Hello Tourist66537915223 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am so glad your enjoyed your stay and I am especially happy to read your comments about our staff. Our culture at HGI is call "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and I am very happy that we exceeded your explanations.   Having an "Excellent staff" are two very strong words that we strive for at our hotel, and we will continue to make sure that we provide that type of service to you and all of our guests.   Thank you again and I hope we will see you again very soon at your new 2nd Home.   Best regards, Mitchell

Summary: The inside of the shower curtain was disgusting, it looked like there was vomit on the inside. I asked to get my room cleaned bc my room was skipped earlier in the day, so I asked the front desk attendant. She wrote down my room number and said it would get serviced; however, when I came back my room was not serviced. Very disappointed with the service or lack thereof.
Manager Response: Hello  bhayano  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent visit.    I am so sorry about the shower curtain in your bathroom.  I cannot find any excuse for that as our rooms are inspected prior to releasing back into service and this should have been caught by us.  As we always discuss with out team....it is the details that make the difference between having a good or a great experience and this was an important detail, and most important was the lack of follow-up.  I want to thank your for allowing us the opportunity to serve you and your family and next time I promise you we will make sure your visit is perfect in the details!  Have a wonderful day,

Summary: This hotel is so nice . The entire staff always makes us feel welcomed . Stephanie is always a helping hand . Thank you for an amazing stay ! Will be back next time we are in Anaheim. Disneyland isn’t as far either , need help or more info ? Feel free to ask the staff named Stephanie or any other staff , and they’ll be more than happy to help you to share prices with you , etc just like they helped me
Manager Response: Hello loveelyvaleriee - Thank you so much for the Stellar review.    The team works very hard to take great care of our customers, and we always listen to our guests as we look for ways to make the guest experience even better.  We are very proud of Stephanie and the great service that she provides our customers, and we will make sure that she is acknowledged with a nice little gift card on your behalf.  I hope you will be back to visit with us again soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Stayed at this hotel. It is great location if you want to visit Disneyland. But I was attending a wedding, so it was little bit further. Also they charge $17.00+tax for parking your vehicle. Otherwise a good location.
Manager Response: Hello Charudatta B - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review.   We are so glad that you had a great stay as we appreciate the 5 Star review.  I know that parking fees are the on thing that can upset a guest, but i there are some positivies to it, we try very hard to price ourselves moderately verses the market.    I do hope that you will be back in the very near future, and please let me know when you are coming in as I would personally like to make your reservations for you and thank you for your business in person.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: I've stayed at different hotels in the area and this location has staff that actually care hoe your stay is. The front desk supervisor Stephanie was just a delight. I had came in really early to check in and she tried her best to get me in. I do understand sometimes they cant which okay but just the fact that she made me feel like she wanted to help made this encounter great. The breakfast is a separate fee of like $13 per adult and $7 for the kiddos but it was so worth it! They have more if a restaurant style so I got my omlette made fresh with extra veggies! The breakfast staff very helpful. It did seem busy and yet my family got what we asked for. The rooms were kept clean all the time with extra towels which was great.   Con: The evening dinner food was great but the young
Manager Response: Hello Travelmom265 - Thank You so much for the Stellar 5 Star review.   I cannot tell you enough as to how much the team appreciates it.  We learn so much from our customers reviews and experiences and I will make sure that Stephanie receives a Gift Card on your behalf as I appreciate your comments greatly and I am sure Stephanie will be thrilled to read this as well.  She is a fantastic example of great customer service and we are so happy to have her on our team.  I will review your evening dining experience with our leadership team, as there is little excuse to not give our customers their full attention and it is very disappointing to read this.   I completely agree with your point and I appreciate your feedback greatly.  Please accept my apology for the lack of attention.  I do hope you will be returning to visit with us again in the very near future.  Please make sure that you let me know that you are coming back in as I would like to say hello and thank you for your business in person.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I stayed here again for another trip to Disneyland. This time was not as smooth as times in the past, but it was still a good stay.  Upon arrival we were greeted and the front check in clerk was friendly and things went quick. However, upon going to our assigned room we discovered maintenance workers in the room. They advised us they were replacing a towel rack and we would need a new room. The nice thing was one of the maintenance workers quickly went downstairs, got us a new room and keys, and quickly came back to us. All within a few minutes. We didn't miss our shuttle and received a new room on the same floor.  The rooms are large and clean. They offer the normal amenities: mini fridge, shampoo, conditioner, soap, coffee maker with coffee. They also provide
Manager Response: Hello flyawayCA - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am so sorry to read about the maintenance issues. We try very hard to make sure there are no issues and if there are..... that they are resolved right away.  It sounds like we partially accomplished that, but you still had warm water in your shower in the morning, and no matter how many people are taking a shower this should not happen  I reported this to our General Manager for follow-up, and we will investigate this concern, as it is important that this is not a regular issue and properly resolved.  I know I like a hot shower when I travel so it is important that we make sure that this is not a regular occurrence and I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention.  I hope you will be returning to us again soon and please call me direct to make your next reservations.  I would love to meet you and your family in person to thank you for your business.  Best regards,  Mitchell  .

Summary Heading: Find another hotel to stay at......
Summary: Not the best with accommodations, good location but you can get a better deal at another hotel in the area, which includes free breakfast and parking. I recommend any other hotel in the area that has better services and accommodations.
Manager Response: Hello busnossman2017 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your  recent stay.  I am so sorry that you did not enjoy your stay, as the staff works hard to make sure that each and everyone of our guests have a wonderful stay and it sounds like we failed to provide you with the service we have become known for.    Please give me a call the next time you are coming into our city, as I would like to make your reservations for you, and come up with a room stay package that will work great for your budget, and exceed your expectations!  Have a wonderful day and thank you again.  Mitchell

Summary: Hotel well situated to Disneyland which was reason for visit. Breakfast included was very good. Jose in the restaurant was always pleasant and friendly. Shuttle service was good also. Beds super comfy. Denise and Andrea
Manager Response: Thank you so much Denise for your 5 star review.  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed the breakfast service that Jose provides.  He really is fantastic and I receive so many compliments on him.  We will make sure he receives a Gift Card on your behalf, and I am sure he will be thrilled to have earned it.  Honestly he is always this way day in and day out and we are proud to have him on our team.  Have a wonderful day and please thank Andrea.  I hope you will both be returning to us again soon.  All my very best,  Mitchell

Summary: I recently stayed at this property (9/21 - 9/24) because of its location and price. I was there to conduct a little business at UCLA and have some fun in the Disneyland area. It served it's purpose well. The room was clean, staff was friendly and breakfast was suitable. The parking is tight and can be a challenge if you are coming in really late. I felt the parking rate was a little high ($18 per night) considering the struggle to find parking. To be honest, I don't even know why they are charging for parking when I am paying for a room.
Manager Response: Hello Sheri B,  Thank you for the wonderful review about our property during your visit with us.   All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn really appreciate the stellar review and we are all thrilled to see that you had an exceptional stay. Thank you for mentioning the location and the dining and attraction in your review, as it is really one of the great reasons to stay with us, as we like to say we are "Close to the Action without the Distraction". It is nice to be just the right distance away to avoid some of the crowds and at the same time have easy access to return to Disney or the beaches.  As the brand of Brightheartedness we strive to deliver exceptional service from the first hello to the next, thank you for allowing us to do so, we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: An overall excellent experience!  Great breakfast, very helpful and friendly staff, clean and comfortable room with microwave and fridge, and noon checkout.  Always stay here when visiting Mickey!!  The best!
Manager Response: Hello Cynthia T,  Thank you for the wonderful review about our property during your visit with us.  I am thrilled to see how great your experience was, especially our amazing restaurant and our staff.  We hope you continue to choose our hotel during your Disney and So Cal visits.  As the brand of Brightheartedness we strive to deliver exceptional service from the first hello to the next, thank you for allowing us to do so, we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: Air/Heat system did not work.  Could not turn off the air. Tried to call the front desk to get it fixed and the phone was disconnected.  Too late to walk down to the front desk so had to block the outlet or freeze to death.  Worst Garden Inn I have ever stayed.
Manager Response: Hello pcorpac - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I am very disappointed to read this review as it is unusual for us to have items in our rooms not in working order and there are no excuses for the issues you experienced.    If you can please call me direct at 714-620-2141, as I would like to review your stay with you.  Our maintenance team works hard to keep our property in excellent shape so it is very important that we address these issues.  Thank you so much and please accept my apology for the issues that you experienced and I look forward to our conversation.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Nickel and dime you at every turn.
Summary: This Hilton is nice but they charge for everything. Parking $17 per night Shuttle $7 per day per person No continental breakfast. We were just a bit disappointed. We will not stay here again. Pay a little bit extra and stay closer to the parks.
Manager Response: Hello Geoff R  - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am sorry that you found our costs to not be in line with your travel budget.  We do make sure that we are priced properly in all areas, and we find ourselves to either be at or below the market value for the mentioned items, plus we tend to be a great value in our room pricing as well.    Closer to the park can be at times more convenient, but the price of rooms will definitely be higher, unless you sacrifice in other areas of hotel choices.  We are 1.5 miles from the park, and a great hotel to be away from some of the hustle and bustle of the area and with more expensive amenities, such as Food and Beverage, Parking, and so on.  I do hope you will give us another chance in the very near future and allow me to personally make your reservations.  I want to make sure that you and your family are not only comfortable, but also enjoy some of our value-adds with your room.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day,    Mitchell

Summary: this is a great hotel for breakfast they have but it is kind of expensive if your going to Disney on budget i would suggest somewhere cheaper when my family goes to Disney we only are in the room long enough to sleep so no point in expensive rooms. But it is very nice.
Manager Response: Hello bentheredonethat55  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I travel a lot as well, and I fully understand as to how much time you spend in your hotel room, verses pricing.  I tend to look for hotels that are near the areas, and shoot for value, but I won’t sacrifice cleanliness and service.  I was very glad to read that you found our hotel to be nice as the staff works very hard to keep our property clean and well maintained.  We also pride ourselves in having brighthearted service, and I do hope you experienced the friendliness of a few of our outstanding associates during your visit.  Please contact me direct the next time you are visiting with us as I would be more than happy to make your reservations for you to make sure that you have the perfect stay at the great value.  Again, thank you and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: The staff was nice and helpful.The room was clean as you would expect at a Hilton. Although,  it is a little dated as Garden Inns go.The food was as you would expect at a Hilton.It is only about, on average, a $6 Uber ride to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Bryan - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am very glad to read that you found our service to be excellent, as we really do try to get better and better with each and every guest visit, and the team does work hard on our overall guest focus and product quality. We call our culture "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and it sounds like we achieved that with your stay.   I am sorry that you found our food to be average, as it is something that Hilton is always working on to improve, and I will take your comments to our Food and Beverage Manager for further review and discussion.  We look forward to your return and I hope I look forward to seeing you and your family in person then next time you visit. Please give me a direct call should you need reservations.   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Hotel for the duration of our Hockey Tournament
Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn provided our team with a fantastic long weekend of accomodation during our tournament.  They ensured the players had a room set aside for team breakfasts and even provided us with "brown bag breakfast" when we had to eat earlier than the normal breakfast hours allowed. We felt very welcome, thank you !!
Manager Response: Hello dicksonchildfamily - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   I am so glad to read that you had a great stay, and that you found us to be a very good value. We hear this comment from a number of our customers, and we do hope we are building "customers for life", so your thoughts and recommendations are priceless to us.   Our staff works hard to take care of our customers, and as we say at HGI they are "Bright Hearted", and I really hope that it shows!!  I was very glad to read that you found our service very accomodating to the team, and the "brown bag" breakfast worked for you, as it is important to us that your experience is an easy one so that you can concentrate on winning you tournament!!   I hope you will be returning soon and please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you, and your family and friends in all of your visits to our area and our hotel. Have a "Bright Hearted" day, I hope that you and your team will be rebooking with us again soon.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good Stay at the Hilton Garden Inn
Summary: I stayed at this property recently for conference in town. The hotel was a value thanks to my rewards level status but it’s also a great value for everyone.  My room and bathroom were clean (standard king bed Hilton Garden Inn layout), offers digital key, and the comp breakfast daily was good. The location isn’t too far from the resort / convention area and Disneyland. There is an outdoor pool and small fitness center. The hotel lobby has a small bar. The hotel was busy but surprisingly quiet during the evening throughout the four nights I stayed.
Manager Response: Hello wawazatt -  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay!   All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn really appreciate the stellar review and we are all thrilled to see that you had an exceptional stay.   Thank you for mentioning the location and convenience to dining and attraction in your review, as it is really one of the great reasons to stay with us, as we like to say we are  "Close to the Action without the Distraction". It is nice to be just the right distance away to avoid some of the crowds and at the same time have easy access to return to Disney, the beaches, or take the 45 minute drive up to LA to see some new sites. I also appreciate you pointing out all of the amenities that we offer to our guests.  Again, thank you so much for visiting with us and I hope you will be returning to your 2nd home soon,   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: Difficulty checking in (no one at Desk). Room was clean but very out dated. Shower was Luke warm.Only positive was the free beverages in the reception area.Checked out super early.Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello johneatherly - Thank you for writting a review of your stay.  First let me apologize to you and I want to say that with the title of your review as "Family Vacation", only told me even more as to how important your trip was and there is no one more disappointed than we are. We have very high service standards here, and our Hilton Garden Inn culture of being "Bright Hearted" is what separates us from our competition, and I am so sorry that we failed to achieve that during your stay.   We have reviewed the shower and to make sure that this does not happen again to you during what I hope is another chance for us to service you and your family, and as well to our future guests. Our desk does have coverage 24 hours a day, and I reviewed this with our night manager, to prevent this from happening again.  I do hope that you will allow us another opportunity to serve you and your family again in the very near future. I personally know the imporatnace of a family vacation, and I know they may onluy happend once a year, so iut is impoortant that your stay is perfect. Please give me a call the next time you need reservations and I will gladly make them for you. I will make sure you have a great stay and I would like to personally thank you for your business.   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary: The Hilton Hotel App made advance room selection easy.  The free breakfast with the Hilton honors membership was outstanding.  Location to nearby stores and restaurants was within walking distance.  Shuttle to Disneyland available for reasonable charge
Manager Response: Hello toplightworker - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy travel day to write a review of your recent visit. We are all so glad that you enjoyed your stay and our staff.  We hear that our location is excellent from many of our guests and it is always good to read it in a review. It is also nice that a guest can walk to some local shopping and additional choices for reasonably priced food. All I can say is simply "Thank you" for all of your kind words, and I hope that you and your family will be returning to us soon.   Please call me direct should you need anything in all of your travels to our area.   Best regards,   Mitchell  Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary: Always a pleasure staying at a Hilton Garden Inn and this one was no exception.  Great service, great location, great night's sleep. The only thing that would have made this experience better is if they served free breakfast.  But you can get anything to eat within a short walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello Raebear730 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   Wow - Thank you for the 5 star review!  I am very glad to read that you found our service to be excellent, as we really do try to get better and better with each and every guest visit, and the team does work hard on our overall guest focus and product quality. We call our culture "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and it sounds like we achieved that with your stay. We hear alot about our location, and it is a short walk to most dining and shopping areas.  I am sorry we do not oiffer the free breakfast, but if you do travel alot, I advise you to join Hilton Honors. As you earn your points from your travels, our gold and diamond members get free breakfast, which is a great value for them, and it is open to everyone to join complimentary.  We look forward to your return and I hope I look forward to seeing you and your family in person then next time you visit. Please give me a direct call should you need reservations.   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: Bryan at the desk was extremely helpful, professional and courteous. The rooms were ok. We have stayed there for 2 nights. The shuttle to and from Disney Parks were great to have.  Housekeeping can do a better job.  Thanks for everything!
Manager Response: Hello Jordan - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   We are very proud of Bryan and all of the work she has accomplished with us. As a Guest Service Agent he has helped us to raise the bar for guest satisfaction at our hotel, and truly emulates our "Bright Hearted" culture at Hilton Garden Inn.   Due to your wonderful comment and acknowledgements I made sure that Bryan received a gift card in your honor for the outstanding service that she provided. I also took your comment to our housekeeping Supervisor to review with her team.  We take alot of pride in our housekeeping too, so when we do hear any negative comments they are immediately addressed.  We all hope that we will be seeing you again soon and have a wonderful day!   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: Staff was amazing, rooms were clean, very accommodating for early check in and late check out.  Nice snack store, good breakfast buffet, convenient to Disneyland. Shuttle operating every 1/2 hour- worked out great!!!
Manager Response: Hello V2233NBlisal - First I want to thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review for us.   I am thrilled to read that you had a very good stay, as the staff works very hard here to ensure that our customers do have an exceptional stay. I will also let my Housekeeping Team know that you found your hotel room to be clean and comfortable, which is very important to all of us.   We receive many compliments on our staff and our rooms, and it is great to read about your rexpereince. Please let me know if there is ever anything else we can do for you and your family in all of your travels, and I hope you will be visiting with us again soon.   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary: Members of staff were very helpful and welcoming. I was a little u sure how service would be since location was so close to major theme parks and there were tons of guests but they handled each Individual as a valued Hilton family guest.
Manager Response: Hello matthewsoto - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am so glad your enjoyed your stay and I am especially happy to read your comments about our staff. Our culture at HGI is call "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and I am very happy that we exceeded your explanations.   Having an "Excellent staff" are two very strong words that we strive for at our hotel, and we will continue to make sure that we provide that type of service to you and all of our guests.  Thank you again and I hope we will see you again very soon.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: The Staff is nice but the room could be kept up. Meaning the doors could be repainted in the rooms and cleaner shower curtains. The beds were very hard which was very hard to sleep on.the breakfast was pretty good.
Manager Response: Hello RafaelSB83 - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review.  I personally appreciated the feedback, and I was very glad that you enjoyed our staff and our 'Bright Hearted" hospitality.  We started to work on a number of the items that you mentioned, and it is important to keep up with maintenance and new product each and every day.    I also had a discussion in regards to your review with our leadership team as well.  I want to thank you again for your review and as I always say - it is the details that separate a good hotel from a great hotel, and we will work harder on those details and earn that fifth star from you the next time.  Have  wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: Outside of hotel and the lobby are nice. But once you go past lobby and to the Elevators and hallway it feels like a low budget brand. Carpet looks dirty and hallways smelled. The room was cleaned properly and the Restroom wanst any better. Could definitely use a remodel.
Manager Response: Hello gabec1384 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I want to apologize for the conditions that you found.  Our housekeeping team works very hard to keep our hotel fresh and clean, and we take pride in our work.  I did take your observation and discussed it with our leadership team, as there are always improvements that could be made in any operation, so I want to personally thank you for bringing this to our attention.    I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you and please let me know the next time you are in our city as I would love to have you stay with us again, and I would to meet with you in person.  Thank you again,  Mitchell

Summary: Was too far to walk to convention center but very close to Target. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was included with my stay and was good. When I arrived there was plenty of parking but in the morning was surprised that every parking spot was taken, glad I got there early.
Manager Response: Hello jeannel295 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review.  I am so sorry about the parking disappearing, we share it with our other two hotels and if there are special events in town or a busy Disney day, sometimes the space go too quickly in the late evening, so please accept my apology for this inconvenience.  we are addressing it with a solution, that I hope will be initiated shortly.    I am glad you found our location to Target and some local restaurants good for you to venture out of the hotel to visit, which we hear from a number of our customers.  The breakfast team works very hard and I shared your comments with the team.  I hope you will be returning to stay with us again soon. Please call me should you need anything for you or your family and friends in all of your travels to our area.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Breakfast is awful Many hidden fees! Many staff members are not friendly and could care less if they help you or not. Will not stay at this location again. Breakfast is terrible and restaurant is sub pare.
Manager Response: Hello smosimann0910 - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay. Please accept our apology for what you experienced during your stay. It is very unusual for us to receive comments like this on our staff and our breakfast quality, as our staff works very hard to make sure that our guests are well taken care of, as we like to exhibit what we call our "Bright Hearted" culture. It sounds like we failed to do this and it is critical that we make sure that all of our guests are properly attended to and having a great stay.   It is also very important that we always listen to our guests during their stay should any problems arise, and resolve them quickly to their satisfaction. I do hope that our team members discussed your experience with you while you were here and did something to help to resolve this challenge. It is also very important to us that we do not allow our guests to leave our hotel, without asking them how their stay was, and if it does not exceed our standards, then we should address it at that time and make sure you are well taken care of. It is important to us that you do not leave without an attempt at problem resolution. We always want to make sure that you know that we listened to you and that we care!   Please call me direct the next time you are coming back to our area as I would like to meet you in person as well as make your reservations for you, as I do hope we can earn another chance of making your next stay perfect!  Thank you for writing and I hope to see you again soon.   Please also feel free to call me direct as I would love to discuss your stay further.   Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales  714-620-2141

Summary Heading: Helpful staff, clean hotel, convenient location.
Summary: Convenient location, not only for Disneyland, but any other business in the area.  Nice clean, updated rooms, although the bathrooms are a little small for an extended stay. The staff at both the registration desk and restaurant were friendly and efficient, and both dinner and breakfast are better than many.  It may be a little noisy in the AM as the families gather to head to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello BRSSalem - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   We all really appreciate the 4 star review as our team really does work hard to emulate Hilton Garden Inn's "Bright Hearted" culture. Guest Satisfaction will always be our main focus, and we are thrilled that enjoyed the room cleanliness and the friendless of our staff.  We receive a lot of compliments on our front desk staff and we expect them to emulate our "Bright Hearted" culture to all of our guests before, during and after their stay.  I do understand about the bathrooms, but I do hope you found them clean, and manageable during your stay, and next time if you are staying longer, let us know and possibly we can add a few items to your room so that you have everything that you need for a long term stay.  Please come visit with us again soon and call me if you need anything in all of your travels.  Next time we will try even harder to earn that "5th Star" too!  Best regards,   Mitchel Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: Overflow hotel Need easier access to Hyatt  Nice hotel with affordable breakfast that has a variety of options Friendly and helpful staff Rooms were clean  The bed was very comfortable but could have used more pillows
Manager Response: Hello pljordan74 - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad that your overall experience was good, and I promise you that your next visit will move us from a "4 Star" to a 5 Star visit! We strive hard to achieve that with all of our guests and I am glad you enjoyed the little touches of our breakfast.  I was also glad to read that you liked our location to the Hyatt, as we are just close enough to enjoy the convenience, but yet far enough away to not have to get into the middle of the hustle and bustle of being in the crowds.   I would like to think we are a good price value and I do hope you will be retuning soon. If you do travel a lot or at least beginning to, you should join Hilton Honors and get points or miles for your stay. The reason I am bringing this up is because certain levels of your travel achievements allow you to receive complimentary breakfast. I am thrilled that you found your room to be clean (as it should be), as our Housekeeping team works very hard to keep our hotel clean, crisp and perfect for our guests.   Next time you come in, when you receive your Text Message greeting, let us know and we will have those extra pillows in your room prior to your arrival.  Thank you again and I hope to meet you n the very near future.   Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Quiet & Clean Hotel w/ great location!
Summary: Had a super seamless stay here! They offer a very reasonable price shuttle to Disney but we just ended up taking Uber which was only about $10. Thanks to Cosme and all of the amazing breakfast staff for making our stay awesome!
Manager Response: Hello 17rebeccay - First I want to thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review for us.   I am thrilled to read that you had a very good stay, as the staff works very hard here to ensure that our customers do have an exceptional stay. I will also let our Breakfast Team know that you found them to b amazing but that they made the stay awesome!.   We receive many compliments on our staff and our rooms, and it is great to read about your experience.   Please let me know if there is ever anything else we can do for you and your family in all of your travels, and I hope you will be visiting with us again soon.   Best regards, Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel needs to be remodeled badly. Horrible condition. The beds are uncomfortable and the sheets are stickie. It is not condusive to sleep. The pool is small. Parking is nonexistent even when you pay to park. You have to hike with your luggage to your room after a long day hiking at Disney. The shuttle to Disney is outrageous. It’s better to drive over and park. It’s cheaper and easier!
Manager Response: Hello  Shellee L - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I want to apologize for the conditions that you found.  Our housekeeping team works very hard to keep our hotel fresh and clean, and we take pride in our work.  I did take your observation and discussed it with our leadership team, as there are always improvements that could be made in any operation, so I want to personally thank you for bringing this to our attention.    I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you and please let me know the next time you are in our city as I would love to have you stay with us again, and I would to meet with you in person.  Thank you again,  Mitchell

Summary: Great stay, perfect location and perfect stay for family or business trip! I would recommend this hotel, clean rooms, friendly staff, hotel overall is very clean.  The excellent customer service, friendly staff have made every stay for us perfect.
Manager Response: Hello Maria  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels.  We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",   Mitchell

Summary Heading: Excellent care and great family facility
Summary: My family and I recommend this hotel and will be staying again. The staff made us feel welcome and took care of us very well. The manager took the time to talk with us and share a comic book with my son. Luis in the restaurant was ready with milk for my kids and Maria Alvarado was so careful and considerate to work quietly while my kids slept in order not to wake them. The location is perfect and the shuttle is the best to get to the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Hello 714cmlc - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  WOW! - We really appreciate your comments and your wonderful compliments on our "Bright Hearted" Team.  We will make sure that both Maria and Luis are recognized during our team meeting and we will present to them a special gift card in your honor for recognizing them during your visit.  I am so glad that your son enjoyed the comic book, and it really makes me feel wonderful when I can put a smile on a child’s face, and especially when their parents are so engaged with their children as you both wonderful are.    I hope you will be visiting with us again soon, and please call me direct the next time you are needing reservations as I would be glad to help and make them for you.  Best regards and best to your family!  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Good hotel with many dining options nearby.
Summary: I needed a decent hotel in the area for two nights.  There are a lot of dining options nearby. From chains to mom and pop joints. Good variety. Close to Disney, you can catch a shuttle from the lot. Short drive to LA Angels home field.  Hotel room was clean and had sufficient room.
Manager Response: Hello Tom - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so gald that you enjpoyed your stay and I am gal you enjoyed our hotel being clean as our houskeeping and maitenance team works very hard to keep our hotel clean and well maintained.  I am gald you enjouyed our location as well, as we hear that often, and I can only say taht I hope that the Angels won on that day, as it sounds like you might have went to the game!  Thank you again and we all hope to see you again soon, and the next time I hope can earn 2 more stars to make it a 5 star review, hich is what we always shoot for.  My best to your family!  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Nice and Clean and close to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was very nice, clean, and easy to get to from Disneyland.  They had a shuttle, which was great, but we drove which was probably a mistake because when we returned late at night there was NO parking to be found.  We had to park across the hotel at a restaurant and next to a trash dumpster.  We had to walk two sleepy girls across the way, which I didn't care for, but other than that our stay was very pleasurable!  Our room was very comfortable as so were the beds, great amenities in the bathroom, and the bathrooms were also nice and large.  I would stay there again, plus it was close to a Target!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is amazing and truly cares about your stay. They were extremely friendly and tried to make everything as good as possible for your stay.  Given constraints of a chain hotel they tried to go above and beyond.
