Manager Response: Hello marcecarlson - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I know that whenever we receive a 4 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels.  We all hope that you will be returning soon. One more thing.......next time we will try harder to earn that 5th star!  Best regards and as we say at Hilton Garden Inn - always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary Heading: Great hotel for leisure and business
Summary: I am currently at this hotel, front desk is very supportive. Mr. Hassan Torres has been very supportive and helpful with check-in in an overbooking situation and applied a better room rate for all of us. Conveniently close to Disneyland, highly recommended.
Manager Response: Hello Giuseppe G-  First I want to thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review for us.   I am thrilled to read that you had a very good stay, as the staff works very hard here to ensure that our customers do have an exceptional stay. I don't know what the situation was, but it was very important to know that Hassan did address it as we empower our associates to solve our guest opportunities and to make sure we live up to the Hilton promise.   We receive many compliments on our staff and our rooms, and it is great to read about Hassan making it right! we made sure that Hassan received a gift card in your name for his positive actions and positive impact on your stay.   Please let me know if there is ever anything else we can do for you and your family in all of your travels, and I hope you will be visiting with us again soon.   Best regards, Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: If you have  conference at the Hyatt, save yourself some bucks and stay here. There is just one other property between the Garden Inn and Hyatt, and it's on the same side. Also, great Italian restaurant that nearly shares the same driveway. Good frig and large TV. Noisy pool area at night, which was due to the hotel music speakers. Could use some air movement in the exercise room. Otherwise, safe, comfortable, convenient.
Manager Response: Hello cangeroth - Thank you for taking the tme out o fyour day to write a review.    It sounds like you may have had a better stay then your rating for us, so we will definitely work harder to make sure that we are perfect in all of the areas that are important to our customers.      We normally turn the music off in the late evening, so please forgive us for the slow reaction.  It is good to know that this does disturb our guests, and I will make sure that our Night team is aware of this.  Thank you again and I hope you will be returning to visit with us again very soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Service was customer friendly and facility was clean and well maintained.  Breakfast had good number of options and hotel overall was good. Number of restaurants within easy walking distance.   Parking was busy but always found spot.  I’d stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Austin  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",   Mitchell

Summary: The staff was great. The hotel was clean. The rooms were clean and cool. If you’re staying here four the Disneyland parks, it’s a short shuttle ride  back and forth. I would definitely come back to this hotel when visiting Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Hello David  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and as we say at Hilton Garden Inn - always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: I’ve patronized businesses where I’ve needed staff support at a later time. I’ve been mostly let down, so I’m truly thankful for the kind & prompt help from Stephanie Flores. I misplaced an itemized room service receipt, which I needed for an expense report. I called the hotel today, and Stephanie said she’ll email it to me today. I was able to forward my receipt to my agency before 5pm today, thanks to her prompt follow up. Kept promises mean a lot. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hello Xiomara S - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your stay.  We take a lot of pride in having integrity and follow-up, and I am so glad to read that we did just that!  Stephanie has been a fantastic addition to our hotel, and she has even won Associate of the Year! I know she has already seen your review, but I will make sure that she has receives a gift card in your name.  I hope you will be visiting with us again soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Stayed here for a business trip in May. Great location to Disneyland, although that was not the purpose of my visit. Checkin was smooth and efficient. Very friendly staff. Enjoyed the hot, made to order breakfast, which sure beats the microwaved eggs at any Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: Hello mrd1352 - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  I am thrilled that you enjoyed our breakfast, and our hotels location.  I hear that a lot from our customers, and it is really nice of you to mention both of these items.  Our team is what we call "Bright Hearted" which is the HGI service culture, and I am so glad that you enjoyed our staff and your check-in process.    We all hope to see you again soon and please let me know if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family in all of your travels to our area.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Usually i dont leave reviews but we had a really wonderful experience during our stay. As soon as we walked into the hotel we were greated and felt like we were at home. Stephanie was the one who checked us in and she was very patient and gave us the breakdown on the hotel. I just want to say that everything was really great ! Also, i love how the pool is kept really clean!
Manager Response: Hello Paulette M - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the greeting you received, to your room, to the clean pool and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Stephanie is a gem of ours and she provided our guests with outstanding service, so thank you for personally recognizing her. Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: When I had checked in, in the morning I was greeted and assisted by Stephanie and Maryann. They assisted me in buying Disney tickets and reminded me of breakfast time, checkout time and the best time to head over to Disney...they answered all my questions and provided a toothbrush and toothpaste when I forgot mine. I had a great experience during my stay and would recommend this hotel to family and friends and highly recommend them to the 2 that assisted me.
Manager Response: Hello Angelica M - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the greeting you received, from MaryAnn and Stephanie and I am thrilled that they made the Disney ticket purchasing experience better, as well as answering all of your questions and more to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Stephanie and MaryAnn are two gems of ours,who both provide our guests with outstanding service, so thank you for personally recognizing them. Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: From beginning to end, this was one of our best Hilton stays EVER. Hassan at check in was absolutely wonderful and truly greeted us almost as if we were family. Each staff member at breakfast was polite, accomodating and kind.  The reception desk staff was also to a person, excellent and helpful!
Manager Response: Hello Lisa S - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the greeting you received, to your room, to the breakfast staff and more to be to your satisfaction. Best stay EVER are very strong word, and all I can say is WOW and Thank you!  I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. Hassan works hard to make sure the guest experience is memorable, so thank you for personally recognizing him.   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels.   We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: Usually I don't write reviews and I don't stay at much hotels, but this one was one of the nicest experiences I've had. None has stuck to me better than this one. The staff was great, especially the front desk supervisor Stephanie. She was very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions and concerns, including the Disney tickets. If I'm ever in the area again I'm definitely staying here.
Manager Response: Hello Rob C - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the greeting you received, from Stephanie and I am thrilled that she made the Disney ticket purchasing experience better, as well as answering all of your questions and more to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.   Stephanie is a gems of ours, who always provides our guests with outstanding service, so thank you for personally recognizing her. Because of your review she has received a gift card in your name!   Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: Great food!!! I enjoyed the environment and the staff are very helpful, if we needed anything they were willing to help and resolve my problem. I would be more than happy to book them for my next trip!
Manager Response: Hello Alejandra D - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   Wow - We all really appreciate the 5 star review as our team really does work hard to emulate Hilton Garden Inn's "Bright Hearted" culture.    Guest Satisfaction is always be our main focus, and we are thrilled that you enjoyed our Food, as our Food and Beverage team, works hard to make sure our guests dining experience always is excellent. They know  how important it is that it your stay goes smoothly, and the memories are great!   Please come visit with us again soon and call me if you need anything in all of your travels,   Best regards, Mitchell

Summary: So I recently stay at this location and I can say probably one of the best stays I’ve had at a hotel. Everyone was very kind and helpful. Front desk supervisor Stephanie Flores made my stay at your hotel great! Breakfast by far was better than other hotels I’ve recently stayed at! Definitely will be returning to this location!
Manager Response: Hello MoonKnight94 -  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and it sounds like you enjoyed the engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. Stephanie is a gem of ours and she provided our guests with outstanding service, so thank you for personally recognizing her.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell

Summary: The staff is honestly very friendly! They made my family and I very comfortable. If there was an issue they would find a solution without any problems. I will gladly book this hotel again when the time comes. Thank you again!
Manager Response: Hello JoshuaV98  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay. Wow - We all really appreciate the 5 star review as our team really does work hard to emulate Hilton Garden Inn's "Bright Hearted" culture.   Guest Satisfaction will always be our main focus, and we are thrilled that you highly recommend us as this greatly appreciated. I am glad you and the family all had a great time and we definitely understand how hard it is to travel with kids, and how important it is that it all goes smoothly, and the memories are great!   Please come visit with us again soon and call me if you need anything in all of your travels,   Best regards, Mitchell

Summary: Me and my family had a great time at this hotel everyone was very helpful answered all our questions , the dinner stuff was very informative and also all the things in Anaheim and Stephanie one off the staff there help me and family decide which kind of tickets Disney tickets was best because I wasn’t sure if I even wanted to go in and made the trip just so much nicer knowing that everyone at the hotel was very nice and willing to answer any and all questions I had
Manager Response: Hello Vacay - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. Whenever I see a 5 Star review, I know we did it right, and accomplished our goal of providing Bright Hearted hospitality, and hopefully built a relationship and a customer for life!   Thank you so much and I also appreciate you mentioning Stephanie by name in your review.  She is an incredible asset to our hotel, and recently won Associate of the Year.  I am glad you also enjoyed our full staff, as they love providing great service!   Thank you again and have a wonderful day!   Mitchell

Summary: Hotel was amazing I booked the room kinda last minute I had contacted the staff and had requested the highest room available to surprise my wife with a weekend away from our busy work schedules the staff was amazing the room was great I wasn’t expecting the staff to go above and beyond with the wonderful gestures as soon as we walked in the room with assorted sweets and chocolates to compliment the bottle of wine given to us for the night I’d highly recommend for couples and family’s plenty to see plenty to eat so if your interested in staying or are undisisive look no further Hilton garden In is anticipating your arrival !
Manager Response: Hello Humberto  G - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay!   I cannot tell you enough as to how much we all appreciated your stellar 5 star review, and I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. As I tend to say often, out team emulates the Hilton Garden Inn culture of being what we call "Bright Hearted", which is a critical part of our service focus. Everyone at our hotel enjoys going the extra mile for customers.    I especially appreciated you noting your wife's birthday treats which tells me that not only did we listen to the customer, but also had good follow-up as well - so thanks again! Please let me personally know if you ever need anything, and I hope you will be returning to visit with us again very soon!   Have a wonderful day, Mitchell

Summary: Stephanie made my stay unforgettable. It was my bday visit to Disneyland and she sent me a bday basket and I loved the breakfast staff. A very clean hotel with a helpful and friendly staff. Will definitely return
Manager Response: Hello karinaarome  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.   I am glad you found everything from the staff of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. I made sure Stephanie received a gift card on your behalf, as we are very proud of her service to our guests.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: We went in the beginning of June. The hotel personal is so polite and helpful. Wonderful supervisor (Stephanie Flores) we couldn't get into room w key card she went above and beyond to make sure that we wouldn't have anymore problems. This wonderful young Lady needs to be Manager!! She was such a delightful person never have we ever been so pleased with our stay anywhere! Thank you Miss Flores 👍💖👍
Manager Response: Hello lizard2674 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad you found everything from the staff of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction. I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well. I made sure Stephanie received a gift card on your behalf, (and she also has a great career path too) as we are very proud of her service to our guests.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels. We all hope that you will be returning soon.   Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted", Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Such a great place to stay for families. I’d would recommend this hotel to anyone & I’d come back again with my family!! Had a great stay! We will definitely come back with friends & more family for a longer vacation!
Manager Response: Hello wolvesca  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. Wow - We all really appreciate the 5 star review as our team really does work hard to emulate Hilton Garden Inn's "Bright Hearted" culture.   Guest Satisfaction will always be our main focus, and we are thrilled that you highly recommend us as this greatly appreciated. I am glad you and the family all had a great time and we definitely understand how hard it is to travel with kids, and how important it is that it all goes smoothly, and the memories are great!   Please come visit with us again soon and call me if you need anything in all of your travels,   Best regards, Mitchell

Summary: Made a two day visit to Anaheim for a high school graduation.  This is a great location for a Disneyland visit. Hotel was nice and clearly catered to Disneyland guests.  Staff very good.  Was able to walk to many restaurants and retail stores within a mile of the hotel. The entrance to Disney was easily walkable, for those that need it I did notice signs for Disney shuttles while walking around the local area. Room had a refrigerator, microwave and Coffee maker. Great when traveling, especially with kids. The only complaint I have was the fruit water was often empty.  I did notice people filling large water bottles from it. Which is a good idea when heading out to Disney.  Overall I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Lori B - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I was so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and that you so much for your recommendation. We are very popular with guests coming in to enjoy Disney and our location is as exactly as how you described it with us being close to restaurants and very short drives or walks to shopping areas and other area of entertainment.  The beaches are close to us as well, so the next time you are visiting with us, plan a day at one of the beautiful nearby beaches such as Laguna or Huntington.   I apologize about the lobby water being out at times.  We do hope that our guests do not fill bottles up out of it, and we will keep a better eye on and fill it back up immediately, or help guests who need bottles filled up, separately upon request, but either way I am glad you mentioned it.  Thank you again for staying with us and for the stellar review.  All of us at Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove hope to see you and your family again soon!  (Please don't wait a year).  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: I stay at this hotel often.  I like it better than the Hilton because it is smaller and more comfortable.  Hiltons chains get 5 stars for cleanliness.  The front desk staff are exceptional as well as the restaurant staff.  Beds great.
Manager Response: Hello Christy - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    We are all thrilled that you had a great experience at our hotel, and that we earned a 5 star review.  I really appreciate the complements for the team, as they all work so hard to make sure that our hotel is clean and the service is excellent.  We also listen to our guests to make sure that we always strive to get better with each and every guest visit.    As I mention on many reviews our service culture at HGI is call “Bright Hearted” and it is something we live by, and emulate to our guests and with each other.  We are proud of our clean rooms and especially of our hardworking Front Desk team, Housekeeping Staff and  Restaurant Servers.  I am so glad that you acknowledged their efforts in your review and I will share this with our team.  I hope you will be returning soon, as I will always be at your service.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay while in Garden Grove
Summary: Nice Hilton property. Lobby very modern. Staff quite helpful, and friendly. Location was good for why I was there (wedding). Very close to Disney & Knotts. Rooms were plenty big, and would accommodate a family nicely. Did not like their charge for self parking though. $18/night? For a family visiting the area for Disney or Knotts, it would add up. I chose not to rent a car because of it. Uber instead. Made it a little inconvenient. As a Hilton Honors member, I've never had to pay to self park at any of their locations. Why here? Could it be because it's close to Disney? Hmm.
Manager Response: Hello Jo Ann – Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    I was thrilled to read that you found our staff to be quite helpful and friendly as this is an important part of our “Bright Hearted”  Culture.  We enjoy taking great care of our guests and as I always say we listen to you as well and always try to improve with each and every guest visit.  I do understand your point about parking, it is really a premium here, but we try hard to not out price ourselves verses the other hotels in Garden Grove and Anaheim.  UBER is pretty good here, although I see your point about having the convenience of a car.  I do hope you were able to walk around a bit, as there are many places to visit within walking distance.    The next time you come into our hotel do me a favor and give me a call prior to your arrival and let me make your reservations for you.  I would like to also say hello to you and your family when you arrive as well.  Thank you again for the 5 star review – All of us appreciate it greatly!  Have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: Nice hotel with queen size beds (we had two beds) and close to Disneyland. Great breakfast value. The staff was very nice and helpful. Have stayed in this hotel many times but this is the first time I posted a review. It was about time
Manager Response: Hello Andy S -  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay (and for posting a review for the first time too!)	  I cannot tell you how much we appreciate the 5 Star review as out team works so hard on behalf of our guests to try to make each and every stay memorable.  I am really glad to read that you have been here many times before, especially since we know that you have many choice in this market, and we have to earn your repeat visits!  Thank you for mentioning the Breakfast as a value….we really believe it is a great value especially if you compare it to going out for breakfast these days it is really reasonable and you do get a nice variety of food choices in return, plus if you are a Gold or Diamond Hilton Honors member it is complimentary too which is always nice!  Thank you again for the wonderful review and I will share this with our staff.  I hope that you will be visiting with us again soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 3 nights and all three nights were amazing! The hotel was clean, the amenities were super convenient, it was close to Disney, and the staff was super friendly and knowledgeable. We had breakfast all 3 days at the hotel, continental buffet that was offered, best chioce to make in the morning! Jose Lopez went above and beyond every morning. He was friendly and fore saw things before we could even ask for them. He sure made our mornings special. We were made to feel like family. Thank you to all the staff and thank you to Mitchel H. For the time, energy, and hospitality you showed us. We will absolutely be returning!!  THANK YOU!!
Manager Response: Hello Belen A –   Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  First let me say “Thank You” for writing such a wonderful review of your stay.  It was an absolutely pleasure to take care of your beautiful family and we all enjoyed having you stay with us. I will personally reach out to Jose and in your name present him with a nice gift card in your name, as we are very proud of him and the service that he provides, not only to you but to all of our guests.  I wish I had half the memory he has when it comes to our guest’s food orders - Lol.  I have always been impressed with Jose and his ability to remember their orders if the guest has been staying with us for more than a few days.  Plus he is extremely personable and friendly.  And by the way…..You Are Family…..so give me a call the next time you are coming back so we can take even better care of you the next time!  Have a wonderful day and my very best to you and your lovely family!  Mitchell

Summary: Our family stays here every year for our Disney vacation. Everyone is so nice and helpful. Great pool and hot tub, excellent breakfast and super clean rooms. Highly recommend for a great family vacation. Stay here and you won’t be sorry. Can’t think of 1 single negative thing to report. Great staff, feels like home away from home!
Manager Response: Hello 69z282018 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    Our entire staff works so hard to make sure our guests have a wonderful stay, so whenever we achieve a 5 star review, it is something that we are so proud of that we smile from ear to ear!   Our culture is what Hilton Garden Inn calls "Bright Hearted', and it is something that live by and strongly believe in.   We all look forward to your return next year, and please call me direct should you need anything (try not to wait a full year), we would love to see you sooner!  Have a wonderful day and my very best to your family -   Mitchell

Summary Heading: Pretty decent with proximity to Disneyland
Summary: Here for a week, with a visit to Disneyland.  The beds were comfy enough, with HDTV, fridge and microwave in the room.  There's also a Keurig coffee machine.  The coffee pods could be improved though.  Décor was functional.  Bathroom looked a little worn.  Amenities could do with some update.    Fitness room was pretty basic, with a couple of treadmills, an elliptical and some free weights.  Bad thing though is that people accessing the pool keep going through the fitness room, and so you constantly have people walking in and out of the fitness room.  Breakfast was good,  - you could order eggs, waffles, French toasts.  The coffee though, (IMHO) is not really up to snuff.  There're the pastries, and breads, scrambled eggs, and yogurt/fruit spread.  Cheese would be great too.
Manager Response: Hello Jon C - Thank you for taking the time out ofyour busy day to write a rviw of your recent stay.   I appreciate the feedback and expecially the overall review of the facilities.  I am glad you had a good stay, and the staff works very hard to try to make sure each of our guests has a wonderful stay. We always listen to our guest comments and also make improvements to our hotel, and to the guest experience in all facets.     We will check on the coffee pods as I assume it was variety, which is a Hilton brand standard, but if there are other options, we will definately take a look at them.  I am curious about the scrambled eggs and not having the schredded cheese, I like the shcredded chesse with my eggs as well and couldn't agree with you more.  Thank you for bringing that to my attention and I will reach out to my F&B Manager for comment, but I am glad that you enjoyed our breakfast.  Again, thank you for choosing our "Bright Hearted" Hilton Garden Inn - we all hope you will be returning to us soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights on a coach tour. Lovely big room , comfortable bed and pillows. Good Wifi, fridge and big TV. Sales Director saw us off which was a nice touch with Nature Valley bars to munch on the coach.   Bar drinks very expensive though, $16 + tax for 2 medium sized beers. Decent breakfast included.
Manager Response: Hello Linda - With as busy as your travel schedule was - THANK YOU for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent experience at our hotel.  I am so thrilled it went well and I hope you enjoyed our city as well.  It was an absolute pleasure to meet the group during your recent visit. What a wonderful group of people, and I enjoyed meeting them, and sharing a few "Bright Hearted" moments with them.  Actually I should say it may have been the other way around......they made my day.  Next time you come in, I will make sure we take the departure munchies up a notch and I will add a little Hilton Garden Inn memento for the next visit.  We all hope it will be very soon -   Best regards and stay Bright Hearted -   Mitchell  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: I never usually write reviews, but feel compelled to do one.  The hotel itself was clean and we didn't have issues during our stay.  It was after the stay that really turned me off.  There was an issue I was running into with points being taken out of my hhonors account when they shouldn't have been.  It turned our to be a glitch and hhonors was able to refund all my points.  My issue with this hotel is that I tried for two weeks (and 7-8 messages to accounting and a manager) for someone to call me about the issue and I got absolutely no response.  I finally called again and told the girl that answered of the problems I was having with someone called me back, and only then did someone finally pick up.  In my eyes, this is really poor customer service, especially in this
Manager Response: Hello jennmcc272 - Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay during your busy travels.  I first want to apologize to you for our lack of response.  It is very unusual for our guests to experience such a problem, and at the very least we should contact our guests to tell them that there are some delays due to research or other issues that may affect our response time.  I hope that you will still allow us another opportunity to stay with us, and I hope that outside of this poor communication that you still had an excellent stay while you were with us.  I would like to follow-up on your experience directly with you so if you can please make some time for me and call me at 714-620-2141, I would like to discuss your visit and also personally thank you for your business.  I hope that we can earn back your loyalty for that October visit.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: The hotel lobby and bar area is nice.  Rooms were noisy, antiquated and tight space.  Need to modernize the place. I had to switch rooms for above reasons. I would rather stay somewhere more comfortable and peaceful. A bit of an older odor feel
Manager Response: Hello izmetg - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so sorry that you had to switch rooms not just for your reason but for any reason reasons.  Normally our guests are very comfortable and I am truly sorry that we failed to accomplish that goal during your stay.  As a Director of Sales I especially know how important your room is to you and please accept my apology for not exceeding your expectations.    I will look into the odor you noticed and check with my Executive Housekeeper to see if this is related to a product we are using or something else.  Unfortunately I cannot tell what room you were in from your TripAdvisor ID, but I would love to know so we can investigate your concerns.  If you can, please email that information to mitchell.hirschman@hilton.com and I will follow-up.  I also hope you will be returning to our hotel, so I may do something positive about this situation for you and your family.  Best regards and thank you again -   Mitchell

Summary: I just recently came by the Hilton inn and stephanie was so amazing!!! She was so helpful and a joy to be around!! She made ny experience so wonderful and its because of her I'm going to becoming back to this wonderful place!!!
Manager Response: Hello Jordan - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    We are very proud of Stephanie and all of the work she has accomplished with us.  As a Guest Service Supervisor she has raised the bar for guest satisfaction at our hotel, and truly emulates our "Bright Hearted" culture at Hilton Garden Inn.     I am sure with all of the new items that Stephanie has rolled out at the hotel, and having such an amazing Guest Service posture, that the future is very bright for Stephanie with our hotel and also with company!   Due to your wonderful comment I will make sure that Stephanie also receives a gift card in your honor for the outstanding service that she provided.  We all hope that we will be seeing you again soon and have a wonderful day!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: We stayed this weekend for a basketball tournament. We had several rooms, and they actually personally texted me the day before our arrival, asking if there was anything they could prepare for our stay. I asked about possibly extending us a deal on parking or breakfast because we had multiple rooms. They gave is free parking. The room was comfortable, good mattress and pillows. Staff was always friendly and helpful. Breakfast while a bit pricy, was good. Enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Hello Larry - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    All I can say is WOW whenever we receive a 5 STAR review, as we all know at the Hilton Garden Inn how important it to provide impeccable service, but to also build customers for life!  With so much hotel competition out there,  and you have so any choices when you visit with us, it is our goal to build long standing relationships with our customers.  We hope that is passed down to their family and friends as well.  As you see me say often we have a culture of  "Bright Hearted Hospitality" at our hotel, and I am so glad to read that you experienced it.  I am glad that you enjoyed the Text messaging system, as it really gives our customers and us a chance to not only meet each other prior to arrival, but also gives our guest a chance to tell us what they may need on the way to the hotel, or if they are running late and so on.    Our Sales Manager on the Account - Alexis, is also really good in understanding what our sports market guests need for them to have a great stay as well.  Again; thank you so much for the stellar review!  Have a wonderful day -   Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights in May 2018.  A warm welcome from the front desk.  Our room was clean and comfortable. Free WiFi throughout hotel.  Breakfast was very good, items cooked to order.   Conveniently located for Disney. Places to eat nearby.   They charge for parking, which is always a disappointment.   Would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello swb84 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay!  I am so glad to read that you had a very good stay, and that you also found our rooms to be clean and comfortable. I always say that first impressions are the most important in our industry and I was so glad that you received a Warm Welcome" as that is what sets  many hotel apart from another.  We call it Bright Hearted Hospitality, and it starts at the top and never stops.  I also was glad to read that you discovered the many places to eat in the area (our food is pretty good too), and there are also many within a short drive as well.  One of my favorites is the Anaheim Packing House, so next time you come in check it out as well if you missed it.  Again - Thank you so much for staying with us and I hope you will be visiting with us again real soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We usually stay at Holiday Inn Express  but rooms were all booked, so we stayed here  For the price, we were disappointed to have to pay extra for parking and for breakfast to stay in a shabby, dirty room.  Big screen TV was great, but small gym had condensation dripping onto the equipment from the overhead fluorescent light.  No wipes to wipe down equipment either. Location was the only thing going for this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Sleeli  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    First let me apologize to you and I want to say that with the title of your review as "Disappointed", there is no one more disappointed than we are.  we have very high service standards here, and our Hilton Garden Inn culture of being "Bright Hearted" is what separates us from our competition, and I am so sorry that we failed to achieve that during your stay.    We have reviewed the fitness room, as we know it is an important part of our travelers morning and afternoon, and we found the problem as there should not be any condensation build up from the AC unit and it has been repaired with the light fixture cleaned out.  There are always wipes in the fitness room, but I do not like the location of them, and because of you not seeing them, we found another location in the room for them.  I want to thank you for bringing both of these items to our attention, as it allowed us to correct a problem.   Although there are fees for breakfast and parking they are still the most reasonable and our breakfast is a good value-ad for our customers for a buffet that includes a cooked to order item at $15.00 with the tax already included.  We ear that from our guests all of the time, and I hope you enjoyed the quality of our breakfast.  If you can please enroll in Hilton Honors and for our Gold and Diamond members the breakfast is included in their stay which is also a great value for them.  Parking is still priced well in our market, and we are working on fixing the amount of spaces that we have.    I do hope that you will allow us another opportunity to serve you and your family again in the very near future.  Please give me a call the next time you need reservations and I will gladly make them for you. I will make sure you have a great stay and I would like to personally thank you for your business.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: From start to finish excellence service, Also had an issue with my company car the battery was dead, I asked Stephanie at the front desk if she had someone to help me jump start my car and immediately she began to call and the third person she asked was Jose and a waiter came asked where was my car parked and he drove his car to the back and we started my car :) Also everyone that works in the hotel are very friendly also welcoming back. I travel all over the US and this hotel is excellence..
Manager Response: Hello Robert - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am very glad to read that you found our service to be excellent, as we really do try to get better and better with each and every guest visit, and the team does work hard on our overall guest focus and product quality. We call our culture "Bright Hearted Hospitality", and it sounds like we achieved that with your stay.  I am also glad we were able to help you with your car battery, and I will make sure that both Jose and Stephanie read your review and we will acknowledge them with a special gift just from you.  They are both very valuable associates and we are proud of the guest service they provide each and every day. We are all glad that you returned home safely. There is nothing worse than having car trouble while you are out of town, and I am so glad that we could help.  We look forward to your return and I hope I look forward to seeing you and your family in person then next time you visit.  Please give me a direct call should you need reservations.  Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed at this hotel to attend a nearby concert.  The receptionist was friendly and efficient.  When I asked him how far the Venue was away from the hotel, he printed out directions for me. The hotel is clean, the bed was very comfortable, but if you’re looking for a modern, sleek hotel, this is not it.
Manager Response: Hello Mischablue  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.   I am thrilled to read that you had a what sounds like a very good stay, as the staff does work hard to keep our service standards up and our facility clean and well maintained, and I do hear often that our guest like the comfort of our beds.   They will surely make our day,and keep us well focused towards always trying to improve ourselves even further.   Thank you again and I hope that you will be visiting with us again real soon.  Please let me know if you ever need anything fro you or your family and friends in all of your travels to our area.  Best regards,   Mitchell

Summary: This hotel is in a good location for Disney. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. The beds aren't the greatest but the worst part was the parking. Getting back from Disney at 1245am there was no parking and my family had to circle around to find a spot for atleast 10 minutes which is crazy because the hotel definitely wasn't at capacity and they charge everyone a nightly fee to park.
Manager Response: Hello Evelyn - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I appreciate the excellent review as out team works very hard to make sure that our guests have a great experience. We call it "bright Hearted" as that is the Hilton Garden Inn experience culture.    I also want to apologize for the lack of parking during your visit.  That is something that we are very empathic towards in our service, as sometimes there may be a late event at the other hotels in the cluster, and that can cause some compression as we share the parking lots with them.  I hope that did not take away from your visit, as we hope to remedy this soon.  Please make sure that you contact me direct the next time you are visiting with us as I would like to personally make your reservations and meet you and your family in person.  All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn appreciate our guests, and we especially love to see them return.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman Director of Sales

Summary: First of all if you want to go to Disney this is a great location also close by is an outlet Mall and other great places, Staff are friendly.   I am a diamond Hilton member and stayed at a few Garden Inn and all other Hilton chains and thought I would book here as my friends were staying in the Hyatt next door, I was asked if I wanted breakfast or points as my offer and I choose Breakfast, had my first days breakfast and handed back coupons to get points as the breakfast was average and even the special made Omelet wasn't that great, has Luke warm water in the shower which told reception and then on check out I asked for a late check out to 2 and was told no only to 1. I have never had that at any other property as people check out all the time and it was just an extra hour,
Manager Response: Hello David - I am very glad that we met, and I again want to apologize to you for our failure to provide you with our normal standard of service and our failure to exceed your expectations.  It was disappointing for me to hear your story, and as I stated to you in person, it was unacceptable as we had discussed.   These issues were all correctable while our guests are here, and as a business travelers' hotel by design, and also having a strict culture of "Bright Hearted" hospitality, whether our guests are on business or not, we at the very least should have attempted to honor your late check-out request. In our culture of service we try to spell "no" as "know", and should have listened, empathized and identified your needs, and made adjustments as you and I discussed upon your departure.   As for the omelet, we normally receive compliments on our food, and I am sorry that you did not enjoy your breakfast. I will bring this to the attention of our Food and Beverage Manager as well.   I do hope you will be returning to visit with us again soon, and please contact me direct to make your reservations at 714-620-2141. I will make sure that your next visit is perfect. Although I wish we had met under different circumstances, I was also very glad that I was able to do something positive about this situation after we talked.   Take care and safe travels,   Mitchell Hirschman  Director of Sales

Summary: Great place to stay! Restaurant food was tasty for dinner! Staff was on top of everything I needed!!!! Traveled with 5 kids and needed 2 rooms and the manager text me before we arrived to ask if there was anything I would need. I was able to request the exact room and get the baby crib ready before we even arrived!
Manager Response: Hello bradyty - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    Wow - We all really appreciate the 5 star review as our team really does work hard to emulate Hilton Garden Inn's "Bright Hearted" culture.  Guest Satisfaction will always be our main focus, and we are thrilled to be called "Overachievers", that was a first for us, and great appreciated.  I am glad you and the family all had a great time and we definitely understand how hard it is to travel with kids, and how important it is that it all goes smoothly, and the memories are great!  Please come visit with us again soon and call me if you need anything in all of your travels,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: A blessing in the midst of a family emergency trip
Summary: From the time of arrival, into a beautiful entry lounge to the time we left was an A+. We arrived for a family emergency & were blessed to be able to have restful & CLEAN accommodations at the Garden Grove Hilton. Staff was amazing & so hospitable! Definitely will go back! Thank you Hilton!
Manager Response: Hello besajian - Thank you for taking the time to writer a review of your recent stay!  From all of us at the Hilton Garden Inn, we want to thank you for your kind words and we understand what a family emergency can mean to a family.  As a hotel, we at times need to be the one place where people can gather in not only fun times, but also in a time when they need support and additional empathy to allow them to concentrate on their family emergency.  We all hope that everything has worked out, and I hope you will be back when you really can relax and enjoy our Hotel further, our city and maybe even take in our nearby California beaches.  Please let me know if I can still help you in any way, as our team will always be at your service.  Stay "Bright Hearted",  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Everything we've come to love about staying with Hilton
Summary: Another great experience staying with Hilton. I love the little things I can count on when traveling, even to a new location. The lobby was bright and inviting with water and coffee available and the staff was friendly and accommodating. Even with several athletic groups staying there this weekend, the staff never seemed too busy to help us with whatever we needed.
Manager Response: Hello L4tune - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay and you have a very cool TripAdvisor name.  I cannot tell you enough as to how much we all appreciated your stellar 5 star review, and I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay.  As I tend to say often, out team emulates the Hilton Garden Inn culture of being what we call "Bright Hearted", which is a critical part of our service focus.   Everyone at our hotel enjoys going the extra mile for customers, and to also not allow them to feel any less special when we have groups in-house that also demand our attention.  I especially appreciated you noting “the staff never seemed too busy to help us”, which tells me that not only did we listen to the customer, but also had good follow-up as well - so thanks again!  Please let me personally know if you ever need anything, and I hope you will be returning to visit with us again very soon!  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Wonderful first time visit to Anaheim
Summary: The hotel was centrally located to most places in LA with easy access to the highways and shops.  The staff were very helpful and friendly, beds very comfortable and complementary drinks available in reception which was a nice added extra.  The only downside is parking: 1) this is an additional charge 2) there was not always spaces available late at night. But don't let this put you off it's a lovely hotel 😊
Manager Response: Hello jtraynor81 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review. All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn appreciate your comments. I am so glad to read that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful.  As we like to say we call our culture "Bright Hearted", so I am glad we lived up to not on our expectation, but most importantly - yours! I do hear that our beds are comfortable which is a great part of our room product, as getting a good night's sleep is so important to our guests experience. I am sorry to read about the parking, honestly I do understand your concern over the fee, but when we priced it our, we shopped our market competitors, and it was still the same or much less, but I also understand your frustration that a spot was not available which would have upset me as well.   Lastly, I want to thank you for summing up your stay as us being a "lovely hotel". That was very kind of you as our staff works very hard to make sure you do have an excellent stay, from the Desk clerks to the Housekeepers, to the servers to the maintenance staff. They all are focused on providing you with excellent service, and we are very proud of them. As I always say we do listen to our guests, and I will pass on your parking concerns to our executive team and I hope we can prevent that situation the next time you visit with us.  Again, thank you and have a wonderful day,   Mitchell

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights for our family and friends trip to Disneyland. Upon arrival we were greeted by Jim he was fantastic made our arrival so smooth could tell he loves what he does. Thank you Jim for the great service during our stay. Your energetic spirt is awesome. We had breakfast each morning at the hotel with great service from the staff I am sorry I do not have your names to thank each of you by name. The food was great. Room was clean and comfortable. I also want to especially thank Mitchell Hirschman the director of Sales I just want to thank you for all you did during our stay you are very kind and really take care of your guests. The boys love the comic books you gave them. Will see all of you again soon.  Sincerely  Sherri Pastor
Manager Response: Hello Sherri - I first want to say "Thank you" for all of us at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove.  You have an absolutely wonderful family and it was our pleasure to serve you and your family. I cannot tell you how much it meant to me and our team to have the opportunity to serve you again.    I think I may have told you that our culture is meant to be what Hilton Garden Inn's call "Bright Hearted" and it sounds like we lived up to that and more.  I will make sure Jim is acknowledged by you with a special gift card (from you), as he obviously made a positive impact on your stay, which is what we try to accomplish with each and every guest's stay.  He has more energy than any person I know, and he is pretty amazing as hard as he works. I am also glad you enjoyed breakfast, and it was the perfect place to visit with you and your family.   As I always say our housekeeping team works very hard to keep our hotel clean and tidy, so thank you for recognizing that as well.  I am glad the boys enjoyed the comic books as much as I enjoyed presenting it to them.  They keep me young!!  Please don't be a stranger to us and come back real soon.  I look forward to your next visit, so call me if you need anything in all of your travels.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: parking was ridiculous, they make you pay for parking and dont guarantee you a spot.  The front desk gal said she would reimburse me for the parking, but never did.  I had to park two blocks away in a no parking space that kept me up worrying all night.
Manager Response: Hello Brandon - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so sorry that you did not have a good parking experience at our hotel, and I hope that this did not completely ruin your stay.  I want you to know that we do listen to our guests, and it is very important that should there be any problems, that we address them while the guest is here, so please again accept my apology as it sounds like we failed to do so.  Please do me a favor and send me your email address, and phone number as I would like to discuss this with you further.  You can send them to me at my email address - Mitchell.hirschman@hilton.com and I will follow-up with you.  I really appreciate this opportunity, and thank you for staying with us.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Hotel staff is amazing from check in to check out! My wife could hear the people in the room next to us. You do have to pay for breakfast but the breakfast is amazing! We always stay at a Hilton every time we visit Disney just because of the amazing staff and the breakfast!
Manager Response: Hello Waltmoore - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.     I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and especially our team. We are very proud of our "bright Hearted" culture and our staff does all that they can to live up to it and exceed our guests expectations.  I am glad you enjoyed breakfast, as it is a very important part of our daily concept, and we do take pride in it as well as make sure we improve upon it each and every day.  I would hope that you could not hear the people in the room next to you, and I apologize for this being part of your experience.  I do not hear that concern often, but I will definitely make sure our operations team is aware of your concern.  I like my room to be comfortable and quiet, so please forgive us for this, but we will look further into it for sure.   I am glad you choose Hilton when you travel and especially glad that you stayed with us at our Hilton Garden Inn.  I appreciate the personal recommendation for a Disney stay and as we like to say we are "Close to the Action without the Distraction", which is another reason why our guests choose us.  Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you and your family again soon,  Mitchell

Summary: Customer service was outstanding! Everyone was very helpful when you had a question. Great location and friendly staff, especially Jose in the restaurant. He was very accommodating and friendly! Thank you!
Manager Response: Hello JoKiNo71 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so thrilled to read that you had an outstanding stay, and I am very glad that you found our service to be outstanding as well. I also cannot tell you how much we enjoyed your group's visit.  everyone that I had the pleasure of meting with Religious Education Congress had a heart of gold, and made my day each and every day that you were here.    I am glad you enjoyed Jose each day, as he is a very special associate of ours and like you, I have many guests that enjoy his service each day in our breakfast room. We will make sure he is acknowledged at our next team meeting with a special gift card due to your comments.  It is amazing that on many occasions he can remember the guests order from the prior day, and present himself with a smile each and every day.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you again next year (or we hope sooner).    Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Bryan on staff is an incredible hospitality leader.  Every hotel should be looking to add him to a highly talented team.  Not only did he solve one the hardest travel reservation debacles I have experience, he helped me make the most of the rest of my stay.  Food, bar, market cafe is very good.  Walking distance to Convention Center and Disney.  The site itself:  fitness room is in need of repairs; cleaning service staff timing is off business cadence.
Manager Response: Hello Wendy - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I first want to thank you for acknowledging Bryan - we are very lucky to have him on our team, as his service is excellent, but even more important his follow-up is even better. I don't know of anyone who can multi-task guest inquiries as good as he does and he somehow manages to see everyone one of them through to their completion to keep our guests happy, and their overall stay very good.  I appreciate the comments on our food and market café.  The F&B team does a good job in staying on top of it and we do receive some excellent compliments on it, and as I always say, we also listen to our guests when there are things that we can do better!  The fitness room is one of my personal pet peeves, as when I travel I do use the gym, and there is nothing more aggravating then finding equipment not working.  I will make sure this has already been resolved, so the next time that you visit, everything is working 100%.  Again, thank you for your review and I will make sure Bryan receives a gift card for your comments.  I know he will greatly appreciate it.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: During my stay, I greatly appreciated how great my family and I were treated from beginning to end! From the moment I walked in I had awesome service from Stephanie! She greeted me every time I walked in and out and made sure that all my needs were met! The food and kitchen staff were kind and efficient. Wences took my orders and always made sure that my family and I were satisfied. (: We loved the convenience of all the dining areas and attractions nearby. Overall, it was a lovely stay and will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Hello Yasmin - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn really appreciate the stellar review and we are all thrilled to see that you had an exceptional stay.  Stephanie has been an incredible addition to our team, and has added so much to our guest service and our "Bright Hearted" approach to guest satisfaction, and I have heard this from so many of our guests.  Wences has been with our hotel for a number of years, and continues to drive home the message that our customers come first, and he works so hard each day in our dining room to keep our guests happy and coming back each day (I love that he can remember our guests orders from prior days too).    Thank you for mentioning the location and convenience to dining and attraction in your review, as it is really one of the great reasons to stay with us, as we like to stay "Close to the Action without the Distraction".   It is nice to be just the right distance away to avoid some of the crowds and at the same time have easy access to return to Disney, the beaches, or take the 45 minute drive up to LA to see some new sites.  Again, thank you so much for visiting with us and I hope you will be returning to your 2nd home soon,   Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: I was in town for the Keller Williams Family Reunion at the Anaheim Convention Center. Stayed here for 3 nights. Such a friendly and helpful staff. I really enjoyed my time there.  The rooms were clean and comfortable... even cozy.
Manager Response: Hello to our friend from Keller Williams - Thank you for taking the time out of your very busy day to write a mobile review of your recent stay!  I am so glad to read that you really enjoyed your stay with us, as our team I very proud of our service and product quality at our hotel.  Keller Williams is not only an awesome company and the guests that stayed with us were amazing as their company.  We all enjoyed your visit as well, and I do hope you return not only on business, but possibly on a pleasure trip to Disney or a visit to our nearby beaches.  I will let our Housekeeping team know that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable, as our Housekeeping team works so hard to keep our hotel ready for our guests. We like to call ourselves "Bright Hearted" by our Hilton Garden Inn culture, and it sound like you found our teams culture to be like that!  Again, thank you so much for staying with us, as I know that it was a very big Anaheim Show and you had plenty of hotels to choose from.....and I am glad you chose us.  Have a wonderful day, and keep on selling those fabulous homes that Keller Williams represents.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary Heading: Great Location and Extra Friendly Staff
Summary: Was visiting Disneyland with my family and location was very convenient.  Staff at front desk always greeted you, had a smile and asked if they could assist you.  Hotel was very clean and beds were comfortable.  We had breakfast each morning in the restaurant and had superior service from Jose Perez.  He greeted us with fresh, hot coffee, asked if he could get us something from the grill and helped to get our day started.  We were there for 3 days and the service from the entire staff helped us to have a wonderful vacation.
Manager Response: Hello wildcatmom0812 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. All I can say is "THANK YOU" for writing such a stellar review for us, as 5 stars are not very easy to earn, and when we do receive them, the team feels it is the greatest compliment in the World. I was glad to read that you found the room to be clean and comfortable.   The Housekeeping staff works very hard to keep our rooms clean and crisp, and they do a wonderful job. Our breakfast team is excellent, and thank you for mentioning Jose in your review. I will make sure that I give him a special gift card in your name for letting us know. He is excellent at guest satisfaction and successful remembers many of the guests meals if they say with us a few days (that has always impressed me), and he is very personable and caring.   I am glad you had a wonderful vacation and I hope that you will be returning to visit with us again soon. Please let me know when you are coming back as I want to make sure that I say hello and also thank you in person.   Have a wonderful day and as we say at Hilton Garden Inns - Always be Bright Hearted! Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: This hotel is amazing and they always treat you like family. We always stay here for our Disneyland vacation. The staff is amazing, the food/bar experience is wonderful and we always receive a clean room. If you want a nice, relaxed stay, this hotel is the place to be!
Manager Response: Hello thepound06  - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay. I seem to enjoy saying two words in our review responses and one is "Thank you" and the other is "Wow" for a 5 star review and even more for "Making your Family Vacation Special".  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay as much as we enjoyed having you with us. It was and will always be an absolute pleasure to serve you and your family. I will make sure our Housekeeping team knows that you spoke so highly of our cleanliness, and I will relay your comments to our Food and Beverage team as well.    Everyone here works hard to take care of our customers, and when we see comments like this, it only makes us want to work even harder!! we always listen to our guests, which is one reason why we can always find great ideas, and ways to improve our product and services.   I hope you will be returning to us soon, and don't hesitate to call me if there is anything else I can do for your family in all of your travels,   Best regards,   Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: My #1 favorite part of my stay was the beds, quite honestly. I would be gone at a business convention from 8am-10pm, and it was seriously such a wonderful thing to come back, take a hot shower in a clean bathroom, and sleep in those super comfortable cloud-like beds. My bed at home isn't even that comfortable. But most importantly, I felt like an honored Hilton Honors member! Such a respectable staff!
Manager Response: Hello 752angelt - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  We try so hard to achieve something even close to perfection, and in your case, I am so glad to read that you found our hotel to be in the "Perfect Location" along with "Perfect Service".  Compliments like yours do not come by easily, and I was very glad to read that you felt exceptionally well treated as a Hilton Honors member.  We try to take care of all of our guests, and it is very important that our honors members are recognized and feel very embraced by our staff in all areas.  I was also glad to read that you enjoyed the comforts of your room and bed, as those are two very important areas for a guest to feel great about, and I hear so many compliments on our beds alone!  We all hope you will be returning to your "2nd home" soon, and please let me know if there is anything I can ever do for you and your family in all of your travels to our city.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: I was impressed even before I checked in! I received a text asking for my approximate arrival time, and if I had any special requests.  I asked for a ground floor room, and they responded immediately with a yes! We had an issue with our iron, and it only took them about 10 minutes to be at our door with a brand new one.  Can't wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Kristine - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay!  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and especially to read about your experience with our text messaging program also known as "Whistle".  Our guests love it, and honestly it gives us a chance to meet you even before you arrive, and I was glad to read that it made you feel welcome in advance of your arrival.  Great to read that our follow-up was good on the replacement of your iron, as that is really important, as I have stayed in hotels in which it has taken a really long time, and I was on a serious deadline to leave, so I know what it feels like to wait for an iron!  Thank you again for the stellar review and we cannot wait to have you stay with us again as well!  Please let me know if you need anything in all of your travels and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights and provide great room which is clean and comfort. Staff are friendly and complimentary coffee or tea each day. Consider the services it provide, this hotel definitely worth the price that I paid for
Manager Response: Hello cks99 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so glad to read that you had a great stay, and that you found us to be a very good value.  We hear this comment from a number of our customers, and we do hope we are building "customers for life", so your thoughts and recommendations are priceless to us.  Our staff works hard to take care of our customers, and as we say at HGI they are "Bright Hearted", and I really hope that it shows!!  I was very glad to read that you found our rooms clean and comfortable as our housekeeping team is incredible at what they do and they work very hard to stay on top of our rooms.  It is not an easy job, so thank you for acknowledging their results.  I whop you will be returning soon and please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you, and your family and friends in all of your visits to our area and our hotel.  Have a "Bright Hearted" day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Great stay, great staff, very clean comfortable bed, microwave and refrigerator was wonderful! Very clean pool and jacuzzi. Nice and strong drinks and the shrimp cocktail was excellent. Bartender was very friendly and fun.
Manager Response: Hello Jacqueline - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent visit.  I m so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  The staff works hard to always be "Bright Hearted" as we say at Hilton Garden Inn's, and I always love reading a review that includes a particular department or associate that made a real positive difference in your stay, so I will share this review with our bartenders and cooks.  I am also glad that you enjoyed your room, as the set-up has just about all that you need and it is good that we have the larger refrigerators as a standard in our rooms too!!  I hope you will be returning soon and please call me if there is anything else that I can do for you, your family and your friends visiting our area.  Best regards and have a great day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: I learned to prefer Hilton Garden Inns  when I travelled. This one did not dissapoint. Comfortable beds and pillows, good lighting, great water pressure average internet connection. Good location to areas entertainment
Manager Response: Hello sbs48 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am glad you found everything from the location of the hotel, to your room and more to be to your satisfaction.  I know that whenever we receive a 5 star review, our staff was also highly involved with your experience, and I do hope you enjoyed any engagement that you had with our fabulous team as well.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your family and friends in all of your travels.  We all hop that you will be returning soon.  Best regards and always stay "Bright Hearted",  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: It was a great experience.  The staff was very friendly and helpful during out stay at the hotel.  We arrived like 1:30 am after our long flight.  We were greeted by a great front desk desk, checked in and that started off our vacation on a good note.  The room was clean and the daily housekeeping was superior.  The breakfast was good and the restaurant staff very helpful.  Would stay here again and recommended this hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: Hello es123578 Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay.    It was an absolute pleasure to take care of you and your family, and I am so glad to read that you had a great experience.   We know you have plenty of choices as to where you can stay these days, and I am very proud of our staff and how hard they work to allow our guests to have a very good stay.     1:30 AM can be a very long day and things have to go right from the start of your arrival and that is always the key....the first person you meet in any business can set the tone for the remainder of your visit, so I am glad we did a great job at that hour. The breakfast staff works hard as well and I am glad you found it to be a good experience as well.  I hope you will be returning soon, and this time I also hope that you don't have to arrive that late, but if you do.....we will be ready again!  Have a wonderful day and please call me direct should you need anything in all of your travels to our area!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Great experience!  Recommend highly!!  Staff great....food good....prices good!  I also was greeted every time.....and that cookie!  😀. Personal service at its best.  Oh...and free parking and so close to the Land!!!
Manager Response: Hello Karri - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent visit.     Lately I have been using two words in replies....WOW and Awesome!  All I can say from this review is Thank you....Thank you....Thank YOU! (and WOW and Awesome).  I am so glad that you had a wonderful stay, and I am very happy to read that you enjoyed our staff, the service, the food, and yes that cookie is pretty darn good as well and can be  little habit forming in a very good way.  I was also glad to read that you were greeted each time, because that is a critical part of our "Bright Hearted" service culture.  That is such an important part of our hotel, and we really do try to excel at it.  I hope you will be back soon and please call me direct should you need reservations.  I (We) will always be at your service.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Excellent breakfast and very professional wait staff. Rooms are very comfortable Great location as everything is nearby and easily accessible. If Disneyland is your reason to travel this is an excellent location as it is Mabye 1/2 mile away
Manager Response: Hello TexasVoyager73 - Thank you for taking the time out of you busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I first want to Thank you for this stellar 5 star review.  As I always say, they are not easy to come by and when we do receive them, I love seeing that one of the reasons was our "Bright Hearted" staff.  Our breakfast team works very hard to meet our guest’s needs, and when a guest stays a few days, they all tend to even remember what the guest orders each day, which I personally love to hear and read in reviews.  I was also glad to read that you enjoyed our location to the park, and as I like to say, We are "Close to the Action without the Distractions", which makes it even more enjoyable especially if you take our Shuttle which is at a pretty reasonable cost which I hope you may have tried. (Let me know what you thought of the service if you did).  Again thank you so much for staying with us and I am thrilled that you had a nice visit!  Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you in all of your visit to our area, and we all hope to see you again soon.  Have a great day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary Heading: Great location, cleanliness and desk staff-can't say the same for breakfast staff. Eat breakfast somewhere else
Summary: The room was very comfortable and the bed was exactly what we needed after a long day at Disney. Front desk staff was very helpful upon arrival, but the breakfast staff was inattentive, curt and overall lacking in customer service. Their breakfast was incredibly blame and lacking. Definitely go somewhere else for breakfast. Other than that, it was a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello B C - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review o your recent stay  I am very happy to read that you found the room to be comfortable and we do hear a lot of positive comment bout our beds, so thank you for confirming this as having a nice influence on your overall stay!  I was very disappointed to read that you did not have a good breakfast experience.   It is such a mainstay of our hotel, that it is important that we are consistent, and do a great job each and everyday.  There are no excuses, especially in being curt, or not having the quality that not only you, but I expect as well.  Normally we receive excellent comments, so I am taking your review to our Food and Beverage Manager to take a firm look into what we did not properly do during your visit, and why this happened so it does not happen again.  Either way it is unacceptable, so please accept my apology, as had it been good, it would have only helped to make your stay perfect.  I do hope you said something to our Managers while you were here, and that we did something positive for you to attempt to make up for this poor dining experience.  Thank you again, and I hope that you will be retuning soon.  Please make sure that we meet during your next visit, and let m know if you need reservations.  Take care and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary Heading: Nice stay for a cheap price
Summary: Nice place to stay for the price. The area has a lot of other hotels, but because of the surrounding area they over charge the consumer. Would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone visiting the Disney area.
