Manager Response: Hello Jose - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I was very glad to read that you enjoyed your stay.  We really are an excellent price value hotel, and not far from Disney, plus you can take a shuttle there with back and forth all day privileges for a very reasonable price versus driving to the park.  Thank you for your recommendation as it means a lot to our team, as we love to provide excellent customer satisfaction with each and every guest.    I hope that you an your family will be returning to us soon - please let me know if you need anything in all of your travels!  Best regards and have a great day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: The staff really went out of their way to make my 21st birthday celebration special! They answered all questions I had over the phone and upon arrival and really made the whole check in process quick, easy, and convenient. I travel all over the country a lot and stay at many different hotels and I have to say this was definitely one of the best experiences I have had. The rooms were very clean and organized. You could tell the staff was all in sync with one another and worked well together as a team and it really showed with how smoothly everything ran. The breakfast was great, had fast service and was always kept looking clean, which I really appreciated. And I have to say that even the appearance of the building outside all the way down to the parking lot was kept nice and
Manager Response: Hello rhionnat - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay.    All I can say is Thank you so very much and WOW!!  I am so happy to read that we exceeded your expectations especially on such a special occasion as your 21st birthday!!  I was also glad to read that you do travel the country a lot, so you have great vision and great comparisons, so this was really a wonderful compliment to our team.   I was glad to read that you found the staff in sync, as we try so hard to accomplish that, so nothing slips, but just as important is the follow-up when we do make an error, and we try very hard to fix it right away.  I was also glad to read that you liked not only the inside of the hotel, but that you also liked the curb appeal, as that is a first impression, so again thank you for mentioning that as well.  I hope you will be back soon and if not soon, lets make it a 22nd birthday celebration at the very least.  Please call me direct the next time you need reservations as I look forward to meeting with you during your next stay!  Have a Hilton Garden Inn "Bright Hearted" day,  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: The whole experience was great. Stephanie had AWESOME service which surpassed my expectations. We ordered room service and the food was excellent (Same with the breakfast). The room was CLEAN as well as the Lobby. Restaurants are in walking distance from this location. Overall I would recommend this hotel to friends and family for the excellent service / friendly staff, clean rooms, and the amenities.
Manager Response: Hello Victor - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your stay.  Our egos are not quite that big.....but we sure love the word PERFECT, as that is something we strive for with each and every guest that stays at our hotel.   I was glad to read that you loved our staff and found the hotel to be clean and maintained.   Stephanie is an outstanding associate and I cannot tell you how much I appreciate the acknowledgement in your review.  We will give her a gift card for your mention "in your honor" as a way to say Thank You.  She is extremely dedicated to her work, and we are very glad to have her on our team.  I also was glad you mentioned Room Service, as with us having a number of guests who either put in a ;long work day or a long Disney day, and many would just like to stay in their room, do a little work, watch a little TV, and just relax.  Room Service can be a critical part of our services that we provide, and I was happy to read that you had a excellent experience.  Thank you so much for everything and we all hope you will b returning to us again soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: We stayed here for 7 days whilst visiting Southern California. I have to say from the time we walked in the Hotel to the time we checked out, we had a great time. The staff were very professional, courteous and helpful. The suite was excellent, with the bed being really comfortable and the room presented very nice. Always had fresh towels, hot water and the service was no1. Breakfast was amazing, the choice of fresh fruit, cereal, toast, coffee or a cooked meak was just great. Thankyou for making our time in your hotel, one to remember. Excellent job.
Manager Response: Hello Bonz66 - Thank you for takin the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  We appreciate the great review and the "WOW" in your heading.......We try so hard to accomplish this with every guest, and I was thrilled to read that we did accomplish that type of experience during your stay.  We listen hard to all of our guest comments, and share them with our staff, and I will also share this directly with our breakfast team!    Thank you again and I hope that you will be returning to your new 2nd home soon.  Have a wonderful day and please call me if you need anything in all of your travels.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: You will pay extra for parking, breakfast and internet.  Factor that into your research.  The property itself is very nice but the other hotels in the area are probably a better choice at a total cost to value ratio.
Manager Response: Good Morning stebog - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent experience.  I appreciated your comments and I also took a close look at our hotel verses other hotels that are similar choices in our market as future guests as I appreciated you mentioned "factor in their research", when you choose where you stay. We always  hope we are always considered a great value, as many of our customers say.  Our Internet is actually complimentary, and there is an upgraded version as well which is faster and at a cost, but most of our customers do not find a need to purchase it, as our standard is good for them.  Our breakfast is $13.95 for adults, and it is a breakfast buffet, but hat makes this an even better bargain (I go out to breakfast often with my family and friends and it is no longer a frugal treat for a party of 4), as you get the buffet, and also can pick one cooked to order item as well, such as an omelet, pancakes, or French Toast.   With tax it comes out to $15.00 for an adult, with no add on fees for extras.  Children are $6.95 which is also a good cost.  I see your point for parking fees and our hotel is currently at $15 per day, but is the least expensive in our area, unless you can find complimentary parking at one of the hotels.  I understand the frustration of paying for parking.   I just came back from San Diego and my parking fee was $47.00 per day.....that was incredibly high, but the average there was $30 and up.  If you are a regular traveler, I would also suggest that you join Hilton Honors.  It is a great program, where you can use your points either in airline miles or hotel points towards complimentary stays.  Once you reach Gold status, your breakfast is complimentary.  I hope this helps a bit, and I really appreciate you writing a review.  Please contact me direct the next time you are coming to our city as I would like to make your reservations for you, and maybe you have a few minutes to chat and say hello during your stay.  Thank you again,  Mitchell

Summary: From the moment you walk through the lobby to check in, you will be greeted with a smile.  Lobby is also clean.   Our room eas nothing spectacular but clean, including bathroom and windows. We choose the breakfast over the points and they have a variety of items to choose from.   In the evening they offer warm apple cranberry cookies that would make you come back for more.  Only thing that bothered me especially during this flu season is that on 2 occasions I witnessed 2 different men grab food items with their hands instead of using the tongs.
Manager Response: Hello Love2TravelSoYnot - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay, and by the at I love your TripAdvisor handle!  We greatly appreciated the excellent review, and the mention of your room cleanliness.  Our housekeeping team works so hard to keep our rooms and our property clean, and we have great housekeepers as well as great leadership in this area.  I am also glad to read that you enjoyed your breakfast and the evening cookies (they recently changed a bit, but are still yummy).     I appreciate the heads-up on the tongs,  I wish I could always control some people's bad habits, and when I see it..... I do.  We will take your observation and see if it can be remedied with additional signage or associate awareness to correct, so thank you for that!  We hope you will be returning soon, please let me know if you need anything in all of your travels.  Have a wonderful day and stay "Bright Hearted".  Mitchell

Summary: Booked this for a trip to Disneyland with my daughter. Great value for the price. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The only slight negative was that could hear the family in the adjacent room through the shared door. Thankfully they were not very loud, and they did not stay up very late.   The shuttle to Disneyland, which transports guests from three different hotels, was very convenient. The pick up stop was right next to the hotel, and our drivers dropped off in front of the hotel during the return trip.   Overall, this was a great option for any family on a budget. If you're looking for something nicer and closer to the park and willing to pay a little more, I suggest the Hilton Hotel down the street. They have a nicer and bigger pool.
Manager Response: Hello Erica - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I don't know if we had met during your stay, but I try to meet many of our guests, and I am a very big fan of Mother/daughter and Father/Son get-a-ways, as these trips personally are also a part of my own fondest memories' growing up, and I am glad you chose our hotel to stay at while enjoying this special trip to Disney with your daughter.    I was glad to read, that you enjoyed your stay and our hotel was a great option to choose from, and at a great value for a family on budget!  It was also great to read that you found our staff to be friendly,  as we are all very proud of them and I am glad that they left a great impression with you!  I do hope that you will return (maybe to celebrate another occasion), and that you will decide to stay with us again.  Please contact me direct should you ever need anything in all of your visits to our area.  Have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Great Staff - average to below average facility.
Summary: Poor quality food at breakfast menu.  Dingy rooms.  Odd smell in the hallways.  Close to Disneyland.  Great Staff, very friendly and helpful. Small workout center, needs a universal weight machine.  Beds were comfortable, small bathroom.
Manager Response: Hello David - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.   First let me apologize to you for not having a good breakfast experience.  It is a very important part of our guest stay, and normally we receive very good reviews in regards to our breakfast, and again I am sorry that we failed to provide your with the quality that we should have.  I hope that you expressed this to our personnel on duty and that we did something more for you while you were here to meet your expectations.     I was also sorry to read that you found the room not updated, and as we move forward, we are always making improvements, and I do hope you will continue to be a customer of ours.  I was also glad you enjoyed our staff, they do work hard to makes sure our guests are well taken care of and they all enjoy providing "Bright Hearted" hospitality.    Please call me direct should you ever need anything as I would like to make your next set of reservations and have the chance to meet you in person.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman Area Director of Sales

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim  General Remarks  LA and area remains in my mind one of the busiest and least efficient places to visit as a traveller.  The vehicle remains the primary mode of travel here.  If you intend to get around by way of public transportation I am happy to note the buses have upgraded over the years, but cleanliness and general hygiene are still going to be interesting for you.   This mode of transportation is still as inefficient as ever.  About driving, the local communities here are mostly safe.  In my humble opinion the drivers are less "professional" and more immature than other destinations in North America, but that's just my perception.  I did witness some accidents of such severity that I questioned whether there were survivors, and that seems to be a
Manager Response: Hello Percival - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy travel day to write a review of your recent stay.  As a traveler myself, and one that has been to and lived in many metropolitan cities over the years, I appreciate your comments and insight into the area as a traveler and driver, and I tend to agree that the highways in the area lean towards traffic congestion and at times aggressive driving.  Unfortunately, many metropolitan areas tend to show similar driving patterns, especially during rush hours and so on.  I like you; would prefer to avoid them if I can.  I appreciate the comments in regards to the hotel, and we are looking into the problem that you experienced and making sure that it is corrected in your room.  Thank you so much for bringing it to our attention, and I want to apologize again for our failure to correct it during your recent stay.  We do take these items seriously and work hard to find permanent solutions as guest satisfaction and safety are always our first concern.  I was glad to read that you found the hotel to be clean and many of the items properly maintained.  I do receive a number of compliments on our beds, so possibly it is time to replace the mattress in your room, and I will email you direct to make sure I reference the correct room from your visit.  Thank you again as our team works hard each and every day to service our customers and earn their business.   I do hope you will be visiting with us again soon, and please contact me direct the next time you will are coming into our city as I would like to meet with you and say hello in person.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Stayed for two nights and I would definitely go back! Customer service was extremely nice. They did their best to make me feel comfortable. The cooks are great! Their omelettes are delicious. Stephanie, at the front desk, did a great job attending us! Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Joshua - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.    I was so glad to read that you had a very comfortable stay and that you will definitely be coming back.  The staff is truly "Bright Hearted" and they all work hard to make the guest experience memorable.  I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed the breakfast, our cooks are really good and our servers compliment their cooking as well.    Stephanie is a shining example of what makes our service memorable and always does a great job in taking personal care of our guests, and I will relay your great comments to her (along with a gift card).  Thank you again and we all look forward to your next visit.  Please contact me direct should you need reservations.  Best regards and have a great New Year!  Mitchell

Summary: Great hotel and staff really enjoyed our stay no issues at all.  Shuttle to disneyland was just a few steps away or if you prefer to drive the toy story parking lot is about a 6 minute drive both are handicap accessible. It's a great location.
Manager Response: Hello 857danicaa - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy travel day to write a review of your recent visit.  We are all so glad that you enjoyed your stay and our staff.  We hear that our location is excellent from many of our guests and it is always good to read it in a review.  It is also nice that a guest can walk to some local shopping and additional choices for reasonably priced food.  All I can say is simply "Thank you" for all of your kind words, and I hope that you and your family will be returning to us soon.  Please call me direct should you need anything in all of your travels to our area and have a very Healthy, Safe and Happy New Year!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: In price and service.  I always try to stay at this hotel when I am in the area. You don't have to worry about parking and the breakfast is great.  Also, everything is within an easy drive. I stay in a lot of hotels and Hiltons are the best brand. They are ALWAYS clean.  I try to get this hotel everytime I am in the Anaheim area as it is so convenient and friendly and comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Christy - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.   I was so glad to read that you try to stay here often.  We all try so hard to turn our first time guests into repeat or regular guests and I was trilled to read that you try to stay with us often.  There is no better compliment than that and all I can say is that we will all continue to earn your business!  I will share your comments at our morning "Bright Hearted" Huddle and I know the team will be really glad to hear this compliment.  The next time you are in town please stop by the desk and ask for me as I would like to say hello and thank you for your business in person!  Best regards and have a very Happy New Year!  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Excellent time and place to stay. Thoroughly enjoyed myself.  The manager even remembered me from our last stay in August.  It made me feel like family, being welcomed back. I will definitely return to Hilton Gardens.  It is my go to place to stay while visiting Orange County and particularly Disneyland and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Hello Tom - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.   It absolutely made my day and our team was very proud to have you and your lovely wife back again!  I know I recognized you but when I first saw you I asked my self.....how come he looks younger and I look much older!!!  It was an absolute pleasure to take care of you and your wife again and I am so glad that you came back to celebrate your very special occasion with us.  I am looking so forward to your next visit and I hope it will be soon.  Please call me direct should you ever need anything.  Have a wonderful Holiday!  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Good value with comfort and quality
Summary: Hilton Garden Inns offer the value, comfort, quality and location for a variety of travelers.  I'm a retired senior staying at this hotel as a tourist but it is close to the Anaheim convention center and several local businesses that might be needed during any stay such as a Target, and local restaurants.
Manager Response: Hello billmF9734EZ - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  It was an absolute pleasure to take care of you and your family during your recent stay.  I am glad you found our hotel to be convenient and up to your standards.  We receive a lot of compliments just from our location alone, and I am glad you also found us to be a very good value along with a comfortable facility as well.  I hope you enjoyed our staff as well, as they all work very hard to help our guests to enjoy their stay!  Take care and we all hope you will be returning very soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: From the moment we checked in and were handed our bottles of water, as well as our free breakfast voucher till the next day when we checked out; we were treated with great enthusiasm by all of the staff.  This made us feel welcome and our patronage appreciated.
Manager Response: Hello VKmarks - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  All I can say is WOW and Thank you!   The staff will love to read your review and wonderful comments as they do work very hard to do exactly that.......always show enthusiasm and always be there for our guests!!!  Thank you so much and please return to our hotel real soon and let me know when you are needing reservations!  Have a wonderful day -   Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: I stay at this hotel often for business trips.  I can always expect a clean and comfortable room.  I appreciate the complimentary coffee and newspapers each morning, and having both a refrigerator and microwave in my room.  I can always count on a good stay when I come here.
Manager Response: Hello Kathryn - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  Thank you so much for being a loyal guest of our hotel, and I do love the word "Consistent", as it is something that we strive for at our hotel.  I always tell our team, that our guests, love the small details and it is critical that we always provide them and strive to exceed their expectations with friendly "Bright Hearted" smiles and service.  The team is looking forward to your return and I want to personally thank you again for sharing with us such a stellar review.  We will always try hard to exceed your expectations and get better with each and ever stay!  Best regards and have a wonderful day - We look forward to your return!  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: This property is in very central location. Close to a lot of great restaurants and Target. The rooms are spacious and beds are comfortable. Breakfast has a lot of variety from eggs, meats, fruits, cereal, pastries and much more. Staff are very welcoming and accommodating especially Luis from the breakfast crew and Aimee and Bryan from Front Desk. Great Disney 5 for 3 Promo where you purchase a 5 day entry for the price of 3 days! That includes free breakfast and parking! Shuttle to the parks just outside the hotel. Definitely best bang for your buck!
Manager Response: Hello Jasmine - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.    It was an absolute pleasure to take care of you and your family and I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay.  The staff works so hard to exceed the expectations of our guests and it is wonderful to read that you had such an excellent stay.  I love to see associate names as service references in our TripAdvisor reviews and I will make sure that I honor Aimee, Bryan and Luis with a special gift in your name.  I know they will greatly appreciate it.    The 5 for 3 promotion is a great way and a great value to see all of Disney over a 3 to 5 day period and the savings as well as the other hotel discounted items make it a great value.  I am glad you also enjoyed our breakfast and other facilities and I hope you will be returning to us soon!  Please call me direct if you ever need anything and thank you again for staying with us.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: This HGI is awesome. I have been staying here for the last 5 years without fail. With all the properties in this area the HGI Garden Grove is awesome. It great for the road warriors like me and families. Hassan Torres front desk manager and Ruben the bar tender on Monday and Tuesday nights are awesome. Hassan is just a top notch front desk manager. Hassan is always willing to accommodate my room request. I have rented the same room 614 for the last 5 years when I request it of Hassan. Ruben is the best its a shame that he only works at the HGI Monday & Tuesday because he is a top notch bar tender and server. The super cooks are awesome. Any thing that I ask for they will try to accommodate if it is within their power.
Manager Response: Hello ncolon60 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.....  What can I say....one of my favorite words is AWESOME and to read about us in the same light makes us all smile as we try to live up to the Hilton "Bright Hearted" service.  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and also that you mentioned Rubin and Hassan.  They have both been with us for a while now, and they are both very much into making the guest stay perfect, and they truly extend our culture of great hospitality to all of our guests.    We better make sure that we keep your room perfect, and I can assure you that our housekeeping department will make sure it is.  Thank you again, and we all look forward to your return.  I will make sure Hassan and Ruben receive gift cards in your name when I see them this week.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: As always good and friendly service
Summary: Stayed there for a at least 20 times and as always good.  Friendly Staff, always receive a warm Welcome when coming back. Clean Rooms,  Good and typical local Breakfast. The Hotel is close to Disneyland and a Shuttle at the Corner of the Hotel.  Good Value for the money.  Will come back.
Manager Response: Hello Hugo - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  All of us truly appreciate your business and I want to personally think you for the very kind words and acknowledgement that you gave our hotel.  Your loyalty to our hotel is truly one of our greatest accomplishments, as it takes consistency to earn a guests repeat business today, and I can promise you that we will always strive to continue to get better.  I look forward to your 21st visit, as it is truly something that we should celebrate!!!  Have a wonderful day and please let me know when you are about to return to our hotel.  Best regards,  Mitchell  Mitchell Hirschman

Summary: Always a great experience at any of the Hilton hotels. From the front desk to housekeeping and restaurant. We almost always stay at a Hilton hotel. Always located easily for my family and many to choose from as well
Manager Response: Hello M8651UKlizd - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent visit!  I appreciate your comments as it is never easy to earn a 5 star review, and whenever we do the team gets extremely pumped up and even more guest focused.  I shared this with my housekeeping team as well, as they are truly the "Heart of the House" and we would not have a great hotel without their efforts and hard work.  I hope you will be returning to us soon, or what I hope will become your home away from home!  Thank you again, and please call me the next time you are coming into our city, as I want to thank you in person, and celebrate your return..  Best regards to you and your family!  Mitchell

Summary: Ya’ know, when I travel for business, I don’t expect much of my hotel stays because I stay at mid-priced Hilton or Marriott properties. But every now and then, there’s a hotel like this one that goes the extra mile with nice touches like neatly arranging my toiletries and putting that extra creative fold into a wash cloth. Such little touches are common at higher end properties but rare in the mid-market.   This place does that, and it’s one of the many reasons I’ve been a Hilton traveler for more years than I can remember.   Nicely done and thank you for making me feel at home.
Manager Response: Hello Steve  - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review and a stellar one at that.  I am very happy to read that you noticed the little touches that we are trying to apply to our guest stays, and that means the world to all of us at the hotel.  Steve - Please call me direct at the hotel to make your next reservations as we all look forward to you returning "Home".  Best regards and have a wonderful holiday season!  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Extremely professional and friendly staff. Breakfast is delicious. Very clean & comfortable rooms.
Summary: The staff are friendly and professional. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. The breakfast is delicious. It’s a quick Uber drive to Disneyland, so the location is convenient. We also feel welcomed when staying here.
Manager Response: Hello jimjenkm - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  I am thrilled to read your review and all of us appreciate a 5 star review as they are not easy to come by.  As I always say the team works very hard to take great care of our guests, and I was glad to read that you found our hotel to be both clean and comfortable.  I agree with you that UBER is easy from the hotel and very guest friendly here. It is also an easy drive and pick-up from John Wayne airport should you ever decide to fly here.  I was very impressed as to how easy it is to use their services at this airport.  Glad you enjoyed your stay, as the team is definitely what we say at Hilton Garden Inn - "Bright Hearted", and we always try to get even better with each guest visit.  We hope you will be returning to us soon!  Please let me know when you are coming back in as I would like to make your reservations for you and make sure I say hello.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights with two adults and a baby.   Good: The staff is fantastic - thoughtful, sincere, and very helpful. They even had a pack n play crib ready for us on arrival without asking for it! Breakfast buffet (complimentary for Hilton Honors guests) is solid and includes sausages, pancakes, eggs, potatoes and menu order items like omelette, French toast, etc. also a large selection of continental breakfast items. Really great to get your day started for Disneyland! The Disneyland shuttle stop is right next to the hotel and very convenient.  There's a small pool and gym if you need it/have time.   Bad: The room I stayed in was old and needed updating very badly. Housekeeping did a great job of cleaning but the carpet looked and felt old and dirty. The overall room
Manager Response: Hello Jennie - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay.  I want you to know that we appreciate your thoughts and your experience is very very important to us.  I first was thrilled to read that you enjoyed our staff.  They really are friendly and they all work hard to make sure that you do have a wonderful stay.  I am also glad that you enjoyed the hotel breakfast and the items that we offer, as we are always looking for ways to add to our menu and a perfect breakfast.  Our breakfast cook can make a very good omelet, and we are pretty proud of the team.  I was sorry to read that you found the room to be a little dated or warn.  I will look into the carpet situation for your room and make sure it is being kept up, as we try to be meticulous in this area and we are normally on top of this.  As a traveler myself, I do understand your concerns.  Please keep in touch with me, and let me know the next time you are coming into our city as I would like to make your reservations and meet you in person to thank you for your business.  Have a wonderful day and I hope you will be returning soon,  Mitchell

Summary: Amazing service and location. From staff knowledge of local area through to fresh hot coffee in the lobby,just a fantastic place to stay Bryan on main desk goes above and beyond to ensure you are treated like the Rolling Stones or Jonny Depp
Manager Response: Hello Mark - Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your stay!!  I was so glad to read that you had a wonderful stay, and I will definitely get with Bryan to share your comments with him, and I promise you that I will get him a gift card to say thank you for the excellent service in your name.  Being a Rolling Stones fan (yes I am a baby boomer), I loved the comparisons, and honestly when I see reviews like this the team gets even more excited and motivated to provide even greater service!   Have a wonderful holiday and a great New Year. We all hope to see you again soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We stayed here first time with big crowds and was very busy . Room was noisy but Mitchell GM took care of it wisely: he was very handy and always listens guest issues. Breakfast buffet was great even though it was very crowded. Convenient location and overall great service! Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Hello Drmaing - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your visit to our hotel!  I really appreciated that you allowed me to do something positive about this situation, as I always want to make sure that our guests enjoy their stay.  Although there are times when there are special events or larger crowds in our hotel or the area, it is very hard to find an excuse that is acceptable for our guests not to enjoy their stay.  You were so kind to me to allow me to attempt to resolve this, and I cannot thank you enough for being so understanding, and open minded as I tried to find a resolution.  I am thrilled that you enjoyed breakfast, and even more excited that you will definitely be returning to us.     Please give me a call the next time you are coming into our city as I would like to say hello and make your reservations for you.  Please keep in touch and thank you for the very kind words and great review!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Stayed for 5 nights at this hotel delivered everything we needed. Staff were excellent, room and amenities were very high quality. Staff at the front desk were probably the best front desk hotel staff that i have encountered at a hotel in the Anaheim, Garden Grove area, and i have stayed in this area 4 times before. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Hello wrightyoz - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I have said it before and thanks to you I will say it again....there is no better word to see in your review than the word "Awesome"!!!!  we are so proud of our team here and they really try to get better and better each and every day, so I really appreciate your comments and comparison to other hotel front desk teams in the area.  There are some pretty good ones, so thank you for this terrific compliment.  We all hope that you will be returning to us soon, and that possibly we will become your new home away from home.  By the way - I really love your TripAdvisor handle of wrightyoz.  Take care and please let me know when you are next visiting our city!  Have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Excellent custormer service at reasonable price
Summary: We arrived at Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim after a 15 hour overseas trip. Check-in was correct, and the room was clean,  nothing fancy, whih a 90´s look. The beds were really comfy. Next morning we had trouble with breakfast,  incluided in the price by the way, but  hotel representative did no realized it. They politely apologized for their mistake and the missunderstanding and  everything was just perfect. By the way, beakfast was really great.
Manager Response: Hello Carlos - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay!  After a 15 hour overseas trip, I am sure you were tired and looking for a great experience at the hotel, and I am glad we lived up to your expectations.  I do receive many compliments on our beds and in some cases people ask me where they can buy them, so I am not too surprised your enjoyed your evening sleep.  I also am glad that we correctly fix our error in regards to your breakfast coupons, we try so hard to be perfect, but when we are not we also do everything we can to make it right as that is our culture and our "Bright Hearted" way of conducting ourselves with our customers.  I hope you will be returning to us again in the very near future, although I understand that a trip to Disney and other places along the way can be an incredible trip of a lifetime, but again I do hope you  do it again real soon and stay with us!  I want to wish you and your family a wonderful holiday and a very happy New Year!  Best wishes -   Mitchell

Summary: We enjoyed the hotel, the staff was excellent. Room service was very good and accommodated special requests. Beds were a bit hard though . They also need to work on getting more hot water. I like a hot shower and only got warm water.
Manager Response: Hello laural - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I greatly appreciate your comments and thoughts.  I first want to say thank you so much for staying with us.  I am glad that you found our hotel to be accommodating and that you enjoyed our Room Service as well.  It is funny I just got through writing a response on how comfortable our beds were, and I definitely take comments seriously so I will look into why your bed was not, and also into the warm water verses hot.    If you don't mind please send me an email with your stay information (and also if you are a Hilton Honors member please send me you number) as I would like to check on this room.  My email is Mitchell.hirschman@Hilton.com.  Again, thank you for staying with us and as I always stay our staff works very hard to take great care of our guests, and I am really glad that you found them to be excellent, and we always try to get better with each guest stay.  Thank you again and I look forward to receiving your email.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: This was my first trip to California and traveling alone.  I went for work but the staff made me feel welcomed and like I was at home. The hotel was very clean and breakfast was delicious! I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello 793karissab - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim Garden Grove really appreciate your business and I am so glad to read that this was also your first trip, as our overall goal is to try to make our customers.....customers for life!!  Our housekeeping department works very hard to keep our Hotel clean and welcoming to our guests and it sounds like we met that goal as well.  Breakfast is always busy, and is something that we try to improve daily, and again, I am very happy that you found it to be delicious   It is an incredibly good price value as well, and I know this first hand as breakfast is my favorite meal, and it can be very pricy these days, with little on your plate and at our hotel you have a nice buffet and a choice of a cooked to order item, which is really well received.  Thank you again, and I hope you will be returning to us soon.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed my time at this Hilton Garden Inn. I am a Hilton Loyalty rewards member and they were very accommodating and great to work with for my trip. When I arrived earlier than expected, they helped get me into a room earlier and still have everything I had previously wanted in my room. I would recommend them to anyone looking to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Hello lauren - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn really appreciate a "stellar" review when we earn them, and as I always say the team works very hard here to make the guest experience wonderful.    I am very glad to read that we were able to get you in earlier as you requested.  We are using a new text method and I don't know off hand if you communicated with us that way, but I actually hope that you did because it really has helped us to improve pre-arrival communication with all of our customers.  We also do not like for our guests to wait unnecessarily, so again, I am glad we could help and able to accommodate all of your requests.  I hope you will be returning to us soon, so please give me a call to allow me to make your reservations for you, as I look forward to saying hello and also thanking you again for your business.  Best regards and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I believe this hotel was recently remodeled. The lobby looked pretty good. Our room didn't cool off to our liking. There were workers in the hallways (carpet cleaning, maintenance etc). The lighting wasn't too great. The beds were ok. The shower was luke warm.
Manager Response: Hello 4F0rds - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  First I want to thank you for your business and I want to apologize to you for not having the stay that you expected and deserved to have.  I was very dissapointed to read your review, as we try to make each stay perfect, and when we fail to do so, it is something that every member of our team, is disappointed in.    When I travel, I expect the basics no matter what is going on in the city or at the hotel, and a hot shower, excellent AC, and some quality quiet time for me and my family, and we did not accomplish that for you during your visit.  I tried to track down what went wrong for you, so that we can make the necessary changes to make sure this does not happen to you again, and to our other guests as well.  I always believe that it is important that our guests see that we are cleaning, shampooing, and other work that improves services, and product quality...but not at the expense of a guest not having personal "quiet" time, so please accept my apology once again.  I do hope you will give our hotel another try in the very near future, and I would like for you to call me direct to make your reservations, and possibly we can make time to shake hands, so I can welcome you back.  Thank you again,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: 13 Booking of First Respondents that lived in Texas had to cancel due to the recent events. We had to cancel and this hotel would not waive the cancellation fee. The Front Desk Manager was very rude. They could have at least waived some of the fee's.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location to the convention center made this stay very efficient and the staff was excellent. They always had fresh cookies stocked in the lobby which was a nice touch. However, I feel like paying the price to stay here they should have complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello 781suhailb - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your stay.  I am glad that your overall experience was good, and I promise you that your next visit will move us from "good" to "great"!  We strive hard to achieve that with all of our guests and I am glad you enjoyed the little touches of our "welcome bars", which is a nice little touch that we love to share with our Hilton Garden Inn guests.    I was also glad to read that you like the location to the convention center, as we are just close enough to enjoy the convenience, but yet far enough away to not have to get into the middle of the hustle and bustle of being in the crowds.  I would like to think we are a good price value and I do hope you will be retuning soon.  If you do travel a lot or at least beginning to, you should join Hilton Honors and get points or miles for your stay.  The reason I am bringing this up is because certain levels of travel stay achievements allow you to receive complimentary breakfast, or when you do return, possibly one of our bed and breakfast packages will be available which does include breakfast at a very good value-add price.  Thank you again and I hope to meet you n the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Dated Rooms For A "Newly Renovated" Hotel
Summary: Whilst the lobby looks great, light and vibrant, the guest rooms themselves look and feel dated with some fittings appearing to have been there since the 70s and yellowing plastics.  The room is also dim as light for the main area only comes from a lamp either at the bedside or far corner of the room.  The shower is weak and mildly warm at best.  The room may be big but that hardly made it work the price.
Manager Response: Hello L2899COjamesl - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I first want to apologize to you for the inconveniences in the services that were not up to not only your standard, but ours as well.  We expect every guest to enjoy a hot shower, and to be very comfortable during their stay.  I have looked into the situation in the room you were in and I did have our maintenance team change out what may have been a small valve that we decided to replace that may have caused it.  When a guest is experiencing a problem we alwsys do our very best to make it right, and I hope at the very least that we had a conversation with you during your visit, to make sure that you left here knowing that we care.  It sounds like posibnly we failed to do so, so again pleae accept my apology, as I hope you will be returing again in the very near future.  I also want to thank you for your comments, as we do try to keep our rooms fresh and updated, and again I will look into the room lighting, as I want the rooms bright and inviting to our guests.  Again, thank you and please call me direct the next time you are coming to our city, as I would like to meet you, and thank you in person.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Fine hotel if you like lukewarm shower
Summary: Hotel is clean and staff is friendly, but could have easily stayed at hampton or embassy suites that share a parking lot and had hot shower and hot breakfast. If you are looking for hotel near disney there are lots of options that i would prefer. We stay in the area several times per year.
Manager Response: Hello Karen - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  Please first accept my apology for the end result of your recent stay. I do appreciate the positive comments as to our staff friendliness and cleanliness of our hotel. Everyone does work hard to accomplish that, and our team is very guest satisfaction focus or as we like to say at Hilton Garden Inn - "Bright Hearted". Either way, if you are not getting a good night sleep or experiencing a lukewarm shower, then it is simply not a great stay. I try to teach my team, that a hotel has to provide the basics at the very least for our customers, and if you don't understand them, then try to simply just be the guest!! I would not like a lukewarm shower, so why would my guest? I do hope that we treated you properly and did the right things for you and your family.  Please contact me direct as I would like for you to experience my hotel again or if there is anything else I can do for you while you are traveling - 714-620-2141  Thank you -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Excellent property.  Excellent staff.  excellent value. I specifically choose to stay there when ever possible because of the excellent service, location and accommodations when in town for business. I highly recommend this property toe everyone.
Manager Response: Hello UnclePhilvw - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  WOW!!   Thank you for all of your very kind words as this means a lot to our staff.  They all work hard to achieve 100% guest satisfaction, and even if we are not perfect, they all try to make it right and take great care of our customers.    Excellent property. Excellent staff. excellent value are the 3 delights that we try to achieve, so again thank you for mentioning them!  As a Hilton brand that is built for Business and Leisure clients, it is great to hear from our business travelers in a review, as we learn so much about ourselves and what we need to do to keep our business clientele to keep on staying with us.  I have to be careful though when I see a review like this with a TripAdvisor handle that says the word "Uncle" in it.  I don't want my other guests to think that I had my own Uncle write a great review for me...LOL.  Thank  you again and have a wonderful day and a very successful business week ahead.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn while attending a conference for work and I am so glad I choose to stay here.  Although it was not the hotel where the conference was held, it was a great getaway for in between times.  It was in close proximity to Disney, restaurants and the greater Los Angeles area was easily accessible.  The staff is nice, professional and more than accommodating.
Manager Response: Hello 969dominiquej - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  Whenever I see a 5 Star review, I know we did it right, and accomplished our goal of providing Bright Hearted hospitality, and hopefully built a relationship and a customer for life!  Thank you so much and I also appreciate you mentioning in your review the close proximity to other business in the area.  Our location makes it very convenient to walk around, or take a short car ride to where you want to go.  I am glad you enjoyed our staff, as they love providing great service!  Thank you again and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I love Hilton Garden Inn Garden grove Anaheim. Its a home away from home. You feel welcome every time we stayed here. Amy at the front desk goes beyond and above. Very good customer service even at their restaurant. Parking is safe. Room is clean, fresh bed sheet and complete amenities. Will surely come back.
Manager Response: Hello and Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.    What can I say but "WOW".  We love our guests, and I personally know that we truly accomplished something when 2 things happen in a review:  1- The guest mentions one of our associates by name as going beyond in their service, and for that I will give AMY a gift card on behalf of you!  2 - The guest states that the experience was a "Home Away from Home".  Nothing gets any better in a compliment than that.  I am so glad you enjoyed everything that you crossed your path with us, and I hope you will be returning Home to us soon!  Have a wonderful day as you sure made mine!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Excellent overall experience. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Free WiFi was acceptable. Breakfast buffet was fresh with a decent variety. They ran out of coffee in lobby, but a breakfast server was nearby and helped out quickly!
Manager Response: Hello Sean - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  I am thrilled to read that you had an overall excellent experience.  I am glad you enjoyed our breakfast buffet as the breakfast team works very hard at keeping it fresh and looking good.  I am sorry about running out of coffee, and I was glad to read that we reacted quickly and made this a positive moment for you!  If you remember the name of the server, let me know and I will recognize him on your behalf and get him a gift card in your name for providing excellent service.  Thank you again and I look forward to your next trip to our hotel, please make sure we get a chance to meet, so I can thank you for your business and friendship in person.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, just watch your knees!
Summary: It was a great hotel. The staff is very nice. The location is excellent: right by Disney, very close to the Block, and surrounded by other shops and restaurants. There is a pick up for the Disney shuttle right outside of the hotel! Now, the comment about the knees. I was in a double queen in room 411. For whatever reason my knees and the corners of the bed did A LOT of touching while walking by. Needless to say my knees were a little sore by time I left. I commend the houseman that brought me blankets and watched me keep a straight face while in pain talking to him. He literally watched me hit my knees twice. My friend laughed historically though. So just watch your knees everyone.
Manager Response: Hello Lawrence B - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay as 5 star reviews are always something that we have to earn.  I am vey happy to see that you enjoyed our "Bright Hearted" team, as everyone works very hard to make sure that the guest experience is an excellent one, and as I always say to my guests - We listen to you.  I am so sorry about the bed frame and the contact with your knees, as a traveler myself, these are the moments when I get a little angry, as we always want our guests to enjoy their room and try to always feel at home, and I take your comments seriously.  I do appreciate the good sprits that you were in, and I hope you will be back soon.  Please call me direct the next time you are looking tomake reservations as I would like to thankyou for your business in person.  Have a great day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Overall I would stay here. The staff ALL were great!  Friendly. Knowledgeable. Helpful. The rooms are dated but livable otherwise. It’s close to Disneyland. Shuttle service is convenient.  Kitchen was good. Lots of food options around the area.
Manager Response: Hello W3577KGchristophert - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  I was glad to read that you would recommend to our new guests to stay here, and that you recognized our staff to be friendly.  They do work and try hard to take great care of our customers, and they realize that your visit is a very special one, and we try to treat it as such.  I appreciate you comments, and I will also look into ways we can make sure that we are always staying on top of our design timelines, but it most important is that we keep our rooms clean and crisp at all times.  I am also glad you liked our location, and the additional food options within walking distance.  It is really a convenient place for a Hilton Garden Inn, plus with our hotel having a restaurant and bar, you can stay in and relax if you don't feel like heading out on one or two of your nights.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can ever do for you or your friends and family during all of your visits to our area.  I hope I get the chance to shake your hand and thank you for your business in person next time in.  Take care and my very best to you and your family!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: This place is easy to find, location is close to Disneyland, the bar and kitchen staff were amazing!  Room itself was clean.  Internet was hard to connect to. Breakfast was great. We are happy we found this place.  We will stay her again.  The family was pleased.  Thank you to the staff and the staff attending the bar.  We appreciate you!
Manager Response: Hello Danny B - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy travel day to write a review of your recent stay.  I was very glad to read that you enjoyed our breakfast and our staff, and especially glad to read that you found your room clean, and that your family was pleased.  I personally know that you have many choices to stay at when you travel, and we have to earn your business, and I would love to have you come back and visit with us again real soon.  I am looking into the internet connection issue that you had, as we recently increased bandwidth just to make sure our guests enjoy that part of their stay, so I will investigate this comment carefully.  Thank you again, and I will also let the bar staff know that you said hello and thank you as well.  Take care and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn was a superb! Its proximity to Disneyland is great and the shuttle service works out wonderfully. The breakfasts in the morning were just enough and the attendants service were genuine.  The overall hotel was clean along with the rooms and even had convenient juice/coffee/water bars in the main waiting area.  We got package with parking and breakfast that was definitely worth it!!
Manager Response: Hello christyp188 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay!  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your recent stay. I am also glad to see that you enjoyed your breakfast and you are right about our servers, they are all truly genuine and they really understand the importance of the guest's experience.   Good to see you booked our value add package as it is really a great deal, especially when you can save on parking and breakfast, which in today's travel markets, it can really take a chunk out of your "fun budgets", so hopefully this allowed you to enjoy the fun events that take place at Disney and also in our city a little bit more.    Please come back and visit with us soon, as we do our best to keep our great packages open year round, and if you I can help you and your family in any way further please let me know, as I would love to meet you in person during your next stay and say "Thank you again!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: AMAZING hotel, GREAT staff, CLOSE to Disneyland
Summary: We are loving this hotel so much that we actually decided to stay an extra day and even though the hotel was completely booked, they were able to accommodate us for the extra night. Shout out to Brian at the front desk and Mitchell for making this possible for us.  Every single time we walk into the lobby whether its 2 AM after a late night fast-food run or 8 AM when we are going to grab the shuttle to go to Disneyland we have been greeted with a smile, and more than once we have been given complimentary bottles of water. It's the little things that make this hotel extra special and very personable.  The manager Mitchell, is regularly at the front desk greeting hotel guests and inquiring about their stay and everything else and that is something you don't always see at hotels
Manager Response: Hello NanandMan - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I seem to enjoy saying two words in our review responses and one is "Thank you" and the other is "Wow".  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay as much as we enjoyed having you with us.  It was and will always be an absolute pleasure to serve you and your family.  I made sure Brian knows that you spoke so highly of him, and I will do a nice presentation to him with a little gift from you!  Everyone here works hard to take care of our customers, and when we see comments like this, it only makes us want to work even harder!!  we always listen to our guests, which is one reason why we can always find great ideas, and ways to improve our product and services.  I hope you will be returning to us soon, and don't hesitate to call me if there is anything else I can do for your family in all of your travels,  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The front desk staff and restaurant staff truly take care of you. Booking with them is easy. When there is an issue, report it, and the front desk will take excellent care of you. Ann Marie, Angel, and the morning managers work diligently with their team to ensure your stay is pleasant.
Manager Response: Hello TamDisneyLover2 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I was very glad to read that you found our Front Desk team to be helpful and sincerely wanting to take care of you.  We are very lucky to have such a talented and caring team on board.  Our Restaurant tam, also works hard, and really understands the guest experience.  It is so busy in the morning at times, I sometimes wonder how they can keep up with our busy business levels, but yet they manage to keep our guests happy, and in many cases they remember our guests food orders from the previous day as well, and our breakfast cooks do a tremendous job as well!!.  I am glad you mentioned that our desk also tries to take care of any issues as they occur, as that is an important piece to the service puzzle, as if or when we are not perfect, the team tries to quickly remedy the problem and make our guests feel very appreciated.  Thank you so much for staying with us and I value your comments greatly.  I hope you will be retuning to visit with us soon!  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: This place meets Hilton Garden Inn standards except the water is especially cold. The shower was COLD with a little bit of warm water, and the hot tub was luke warm. I've stayed in hundreds of hotels, and this was the coldest water I've ever experienced at a hotel. But the staff are friendly, the hotel is well-appointed, and the location is good.
Manager Response: Hello HapaPapa1 - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I first want to apologize for the cold water, being an avid traveler myself, that would completely upset my stay and it is the last thing you expect to deal with in any hotel.  I had my maintenance tech look into this and we found a bad mixing valve in your shower and we replaced it, which was why the temperature was off.  I did also noted the problem in the Spa, and that has been addressed as well. Thank you for bringing this to my attention and I hope we did something for you and your family once this was pointed out to us.  On a positive note I am glad you found our staff to be friendly, and we will continue to always strive to get better and better each and every day.  I do hope you will be returning to us again soon, and I hope I will have the chance to meet you in person.  Thank you again for your review, and I will always be at your service.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: This hotel has a warm welcome everytime you step through the door. Every member of staff is friendly. They offered brilliant and helpful advice for us as we had never been to LA before ie  restaurants shopping beaches etc. Hotel is spotless . Pool area really nice as most of the hotels I looked at pool areas were extremely small. Plenty of places to eat around as well that you could walk to, although uber's to and from  the  cheesecake factory and restaurants in that area was roughly $5 each way. Uber to disney was also $5. Universal was roughly $50 each way.   I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Carolyn - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I was very glad to read that you enjoyed your stay, and found our hotel to give you a warm welcome when you come in, as we call it being "Bright Hearted"......our culture is to be just that, and although I wish we were perfect, our team try's very hard to be.  Our Housekeeping staff works hard as well as our Heart of the House staff is extremely important to ensure that our guest rooms are kept clean, and inviting to our guests.  I personally appreciated the costs that you put into your review, as this comes up often, and it is really great to have such accurate answers (the cheesecake factory is pretty darn good too!)  All I can say is thank you again Carolyn for choosing to stay with us and I hope that you and your family will be visiting with us again real soon.  It was a pleasure to serve you, and don't hesitate to call me direct should you or your family and friends ever need anything in all of your travels.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here multiple times over the past few years. I must say, Luis and Winees, do an exceptional service during breakfast hour. They take time to make you comfortable and happy to be here. In the evening, you can count on Joel and JJ to deliver the same top notch service. The staff is exceptional in service, they all really make you feel at home. A great place to stay and relax, knowing you are their number one concern. I cant wait to return.
Manager Response: Hello to the Capek family!   Thank you so much for taking the time our of your very busy day to write a review.  "Thank you and Wow" are the first two things I need to tell you.  It is and always will be a pleasure to serve your family and I want you to all know that we will always continue to try to get better each and everyday.   Thank you for acknowledging our associates.  They truly are as HGI says "Bright Hearted", and they work  very hard to make sure you have an enjoaybale experience.  I will make sure they are honored on your behalf with some very special acknowledgement and gift cards, as I love to see names mentioned in our TripAdvisor responses as we accomplish our service goals.  Pleae let me know if you or your family ever needs anything, and don't ever hesitate to call me direct if you would like for me to make your next reservations.   Take care and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary: My mother, son and I spent a week in Anaheim to go to Disneyland. Upon our arrival we were not greeted or offered help when searching for the luggage trolley. I did not receive my complimentary water bottles at check in nor was I acknowledged as a HH member. The staff upon check in were not pleasant towards us they acted very aloof to our presence. It was extremely disappointing. We’ve done a lot of traveling this summer and have stayed at numerous Hilton properties. The garden inn has always been a favorite because of the layout, decor, & ambience of the property itself. This particular property unfortunately fell short of what I thought the Hilton standard should always be held at. When we checked into our room it was the saddest excuse for a Hilton room I’d ever seen. The
Manager Response: Hello Sara - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I appreciate the further insight to your stay as we discussed and I again want to apologize to you and your wonderful Mom and son, as I strongly feel this was an anomaly for us, as we should have caught these items and not have released your room at the time. Our staff is normally outstanding in service, and again, I have discussed this with those on duty, and we will always work harder to try to get better and always stay "Bright Hearted".   I left feeling that we did accomplish what was a much better remainder of your stay as I got to know you and your family, and I do want you to know that I will always be at your service if there is anything else I can do for you in your travels.  Thank you again, and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for price
Summary: Place was clean. Breakfast staff was amazing. Would recommend this place to anyone. Hotel was a great place to stay for the price we paid. Close to restaurants and short walk to Disneyland. All staff were a pleasure to deal with.
Manager Response: Hello 714hannam - Thankyou for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay!  I personally appreciated the great review, and I can tell you that our team is very proud of our hotel and they all work hard to make sure that our guests have a great stay, as well as always trying to improve our services and product quality.    I am glad you mentioned how close we are to local places for restarants and shopping, and to be able to walk these days and not have to pay for transportation is a nice amenity that sometimes goes unspoken.  I hope you will be returning to us again real soon, and please make sure that the next time you are vising that you allow me the opportunity to say hello and welcome you back.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Great stay.  I could have stayed in the hotel for a long time.  Very comfortable.  Room was good and clean.  Staff was helpful and courteous.  For me, it was in a great location for what I was doing, and it was easy to get to.
Manager Response: Hello Alan - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove appreciate your comments, and what I enjoyed most was your statement that you could have "stayed here for a long time".  We try so hard to accomplish that, and as I always tell my staff and my guests.....we are not in the one time customer business......we are in the repeat customer business.....and I do hope you will continue to come back again and again Alan.  Please let me know if you ever need anything and my very best to you and your family!  Thank you and take care!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Fair price, large rooms a little run down
Summary: Again we stayed there during the NAMM 2017 (January) and we were a group of 12 people. Check-in was very efficiant, the Hotel is a little run down but everything works. We were there shortly after Trump was elected and was ranting against Mexicans. We have to say without the Mex people in this Hotel it would be abandoned. But the guys and girls made it worth while. Breakfast is quite good also sometimes when all the people wanted to eat at the same time they are understaffed...but they manage. Rooms are quite large, there is a little kiosk where you can buy things for the room as there is no roomservice. The Gym is bad though...smelly small and bad machines. Considering that this is a convention center Hotel they keep it up pretty well...but it does not deserve more than a good.
Manager Response: Hello Ralf - Thank you for a taking the time to write a review of your January 2017 stay.  With a group of 12 people and attending a major convention, I am sure I had the pleasure of meeting you or member of your group at that time.  I want you to know that I have addressed your concern about our fitness room, and although it has not become larger, I believe that your other concerns have been remedied.  I have also had the pool and spa resurfaced since your last visit, so that will be another plus for your next visit.  We hope you will be staying again with us next year for the conference.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Good place to stay, close to Disneyland and not to far to the beaches. Rooms were adequate and clean and very little outside noise. Shower was not very hot, and caulking job was sloppy to say the least. Overall good hotel for what you're paying for, and good access.
Manager Response: Hello Sonjam - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent experience.  I am glad that your overall experience was good, but honestly we shoot for "Great" here, so I really appreciate your comments.  I would like to investigate further your room, as possibly there is an isolated issue on the shower valve that needs to be repaired and of course I want the caulking job re-done as that is unacceptable as well.  I hope though that your memory of your experience is good, and it is very important to me that you seek me  the next time you are at my hotel.  I would like to meet you in person.  If you can please email me ( Mitchell.hirschman@hilton.com) your name and room number when you can, as I would like to revisit this again.  Thank you and have a great day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Was in Anaheim area for a three day business trip.   Booked on Hilton site and was not aware of it being adjacent to Disneyland until we arrived.  Had concerns about noise and tourist level accomodations.   Turned out no worry needed.  Hotel did have many families, but all was quiet.  The rooms were clean, well appointed, and comfortable.  Restaurant selection within 10 to 15 minutes was great.   American, Asian, Mexican, etc... all available with several great choices.  The house breakfast buffet was also well done, quick and graciously served.   I have the advantage of it being bfree due to Hilton status.  If visiting Mickey and friends, location could not be better...free bus shuttle just outside.
Manager Response: Hello iradeannas - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent visit.  I appreciated all of the information that you shared on your review, as our guests will at times book their reservations based on local information, hotel location, and food choces.  I am glad you enjoyed our breakfast, and found our reooms to be clean and well appointed as the staff works vey hard to maintain our hotel and we do make every attempt to keep it that way for allof our guests.  I am also glad you found our location to Disney great, as well a being "close to the action without the distraction"......as I like to say.  Have a wonderful day, and we all hope to see you and your family again soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: enjoyable stay at Garden Inn, Anaheim , CA
Summary: Nice hotel, very close to Disneyland, hotel provides shuttle bus from 10.00-12.00 midnight on weekends. the bus comes every 30 min.  It requires a bus pass to board the shuttle bus, the hotel reception will issue the pass for you.
Manager Response: Hello Elly M - Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review!  I cannot tell you enough as to how thrilled I am to read that you enjoyed your visit.  It is great to be just close enough to Disney, and yet to be able to get a little bit away from the crowds.   I am also glad that you enjoy the convenience of a reasonably priced Shuttle service.  They do a very good job for us and they represent our hotel well.  We all hope you will be returning to our hotel again soon, and please let me know if you need anything in advance of your return!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: This was the perfect 4 night stay.  We arrived early, and they had a room available for check in.  Our granddaughter loved the pool.  The breakfast every morning was wonderful, including the service.  All of the staff we encountered were very friendly.  The shuttle to Disney was great for the 1 day we went there.  I would stay at this hotel again without a doubt.
Manager Response: Hello Gloria - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I am very glad to read that you had an excellent stay, and also glad to have had the  pleasure of your family's visit for 4 days as well.   I know you have plenty of choices in our market where you can stay and we are all glad you chose our hotel or what I would now like to call as your "2nd home".  We are glad you enjoyed breakfast and the service of our breakfast team.  They continue to amaze me especially with how busy the dining room can be, and on many occasions after the first day, they seem to actually remember what you will order for the remainder of your stay, which has always impressed both me and our guests.  I look forward to your return, so please do not stay away too long and call me if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family in all of your future visits to our hotel.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Marred by Bad Experience
Summary: Booked two nights in order to enjoy a wedding/Disneyland weekend in Anaheim. Everything about the hotel is great to include the front desk staff, self parking, and location of the hotel.  Unfortunately I believe that an expensive item was stolen from the room while we were out enjoying "the happiest place on Earth". Suffice to say, this turned what was a great weekend into a not so great weekend.  In all fairness, the optimistic in me wants to believe this is a one-off occurrence and hopefully others have not had similar experience here. Like I said before, other than this incident, the hotel and staff are great.  The front desk had me fill out a claim report which would initiate an internal investigation by the hotel and their insurance company. I was not provided any sort of
Manager Response: Hello Daniel -  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I first want to apologize to you for the incident that you epxereinced.  It is very unudual for us and I take these momrnets should they happen very seriously in my career.  I want you to know that it was a pleasure to talk with you and I appreciate you allowing me to do something positive about this situation.   You and I will keep in touch as I continue to follow-up with you.  I am glad that you had a enjoyable weekend and again I am so sorry that you had experienced something that marred your stay.  I look forward to talking with you as we bring this to a conclusion.  In the meantime please do not hesitate to call me direct.   714-620-2137  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Family of 4 for business trip and Disneyland. The hotel was nice and close to Disney. Our room included breakfast (with many items made to order fresh). The rooms were comfortable, a little cozy for two adults and two children, but it worked and when we needed more space we hung out in the lobby or by the pool.
Manager Response: Hello Andrea - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  As I always say; our team works very hard to take excellent care of our guests and I am very proud of their service capabilities.  They are very focused on achieving the perfect guest stay, that they want to discuss each day as to what we could do better.  I am very lucky to have what Hilton calls a very "Bright Hearted" team.   I am sure you found the rooms to be a little cozy, but I am glad it did not alter your stay too much, and that you also enjoyed the pool with the kids.  Again, thank you for staying with us, and I do hope you will be returning to us again soon!  Have a wonderful day and please call me if there is ever anything I can do for you, your family and friends.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with Amazing Customer Service
Summary: My son and I stayed here for 4 nights on our recent trip to Disneyland.  The amazing customer service started before we even arrived with a text to welcome us to the hotel and ask when we would be arriving so our room could be ready.  We arrived a few hours before check in time and our room was ready and waiting for us.   Our room was a good size and was clean and comfortable.  The staff at the hotel were friendly and helpful.  I will recommend this hotel to my friends and it will be my go to hotel for all our future Disney trips.
Manager Response: Hello pinkkfrogzz - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay and by the way......that is the greatest TripAdvisor name that I have ever seen!  I am so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay, and I am even happier that you and your son stayed 4 nights and enjoyed our new text messaging application which is called "Whistle".   It really is a wonderful new service and I am hearing so many positives about it from our guests.    Our staff works hard to make sure that our guests experience is very enjoyable ans it sounds like we accomplished this for you and your son as part of our daily goal!
