I don't know if we met during your visit as I do try to meet most of our guests, especially in the breakfast period, and I want you to know that one of my most memorable moments of my life was when I went on a similar trip with my mom at the age of 8, and to this day we still talk about.  I am sure it will also be wonderful memory for both of you and I do hope that you will do it again and stay with us.  Please let me know if you are coming back soon as I would like to make sure that I meet you both in person to say "hello".  Thank you for staying with us and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Corporate picked the location but I truly enjoyed my stay. I was most impressed with the friendly staff. There wasn't a day I wasn't greeted or acknowledged. The shuttle to Disneyland was convenient too.
Manager Response: Hello krystal - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay, and by the way.....thank you for the title of your review!  We like to think we are exactly that, and our team works very hard to live up to those words.    I am glad they reached out to you each day, as we know that is very important to our guests as providing "hospitality" is such a critical piece for each and every one of our guests to experience.   Being both a leisure and corporate travelers hotel, I am glad that we met your needs and it sounds like you also enjoyed your visit to Disney as well.  The shuttle is a great convenience and they do a good overall job in the service that they provide to our guests!  Please let me know if you ever need anything and I do hope you will be visiting with us again soon.  Have a wonderful day -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I stayed here two nights on a work-related trip.  With the proximity to Disney it is a great area.  The hotel is lovely - just what I expect from a HGI property.  The room was clean and comfortable.  I slept well here!  There was enough room in the lobby to gather and wait on teammates.
Manager Response: Hello Virginia - Thank you so much for witting a review of your recent stay!  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay.  Our team works hard to make sure that our hotel is properly prepared for your visit, so when I read that this is what you have come to expect from an HGI property....it nothing is better than that to hear form our guests!! - Thank you so much!!  I hope that you and your family and friends will be returning to visit with us again soon.  Please let me know if you ever need anything in all of your future visits to our hotel and to our area.  I do hope I get the chance to meet you in person and welcome you back!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The only real problem we had was parking at the hotel. Would be nice to have more parking Other than parking the stay was great. We asked for pillows and towels and were delivered with in 5 minutes or less. Was a great trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Anthony - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent experience at our hotel.  I appreciated reading your feedback and I was glad to see that we exceeded your expectations in the delivery of your pillows and towels.  You would be surprised as to how many times I hear this, as it can be something very critical to a guest, especially after having a long day at the park.  We recently started a guest "texting" service called "Whistle", so next time you come in you will be able to send us a text asking for these types of items in advance of your arrival, and we can have them in your room prior to getting here!  I hope you will be returning to us soon, as I am still working on the Parking availability with our other sister hotels located within our cluster.  Thank you for your patience on this, and I look forward to your return in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: If you are looking for a nice hotel with outstanding service, try the Hilton Garden Inn - Anaheim/Garden Grove. It has a great location and nice accommodations.  Best of all, the staff really makes sure you are satisfied with your stay. The housekeeping staff forgot to clean our room the second day and we received an adjustment to our bill (and quickly brought towels and supplies) - Service is Outstanding here!!! Thank you!
Manager Response: Hello Edward - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am very glad to read that you found our service to be excellent, as we really do try to get better and better with each and every day, and the team does work hard on guest focus.  I read that we missed an initial opportunity in Housekeeping to take care of your daily room cleaning, and I empower my staff to make the proper decisions, and I am very glad to read that we did try to accommodate you for this inconvenient, and I also want to apologize for that error as well.  Sometimes it is not just having a problem, it is even more important to let the guest know what you are doing about it, and finding a quick solution, and in this case it sounds like we did.  I look forward to your return and I hope I will have the chance to meet you and your family in person and shake your hand!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Outstanding! First impressions were WOW. The price was right. Quality Hotel and great location. Actually spent my time in Downtown Orange attending a meeting, but this hotel was the best choice for the price and the accommodations.
Manager Response: Hello johna - Thank you for taking so much time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  Well as a big believer in first impressions, I am so glad that we met or even exceeded your expectations.  I am also glad that you found us to be an excellent value, as we not only try to give you what you need to enjoy your stay, but also to make sure that we are a great value-add for your travel budget.  we all hope you will be returning to us again soon!  Have a wonderful day - Mitchell

Summary: We decided to visit Anaheim to go to Disney with our 1yr old and his grandparents. (4+child total) This hotel was perfect for everything each of us needed! Large, clean, quiet rooms big enough to fit a crib with ample room to move, a fridge and microwave to keep and heat bottles and food. On site restaurant for easy, delicious meals.... AND MOST IMPORTANT, a very friendly, welcoming staff that took care of our family's every need/question without hesitation. Every single staff member had impeccable customer service and made us feel like we were the only guests there, even though they were sold out with several sports teams in house. The shuttle to the parks was convenient and the recommendations from the staff on what to see and do there was very helpful! We will definitely be
Manager Response: Hello Kojojo - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn really appreciate your thoughts on your recent stay.  I seem to always say that the staff works very hard to accommodate our guests and I am very proud of all of other efforts.  One of the best things about my staff is that we do listen to our guests as we learn from every visit as to how we can continue to improve our services.  They are all truly "Bright Hearted" as we say at HGI.  I am glad that you enjoyed your room, and I know that our refrigerators can hold a little bit more items due to their size, and I am glad you found our room amenities very helpful to you and your family.  Our location to Disney does make it convenient as well as easy to get there with the Shuttle, which does allow you a little all day freedom to explore the park.  Again, thank you so much for staying with us, as we know that you have many choices in our market.  I also want to top you on one thing.......WE CANNOT WAIT TO HAVE YOU BACK AS WELL!  Have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Solid restaurant and bar, dated/dim building, poor internet but close, straight away access to highway and far enough away from Disney crowds. Gym is very small, but has treadmills and dumbbells with bench up to 50lbs.
Manager Response: Hello Danny - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent visit to our hotel.  I appreciate the feedback greatly, as I always tell our guests that we listen to them and look at always finding ways to improve our service and product, so I want to thank you for sharing your thoughts with me.  I am glad you enjoyed the restaurant and bar, as my Food and Beverage Manager is working on new and exciting things to roll out shortly to our guests. we also have a strong business clientele in part due to the reasons you stated, but also many of them come back with their families to enjoy a day or two at Disney,  but I know they also like to not get too deep into the crowds, which can also be a benefit to them.  Please let me know if you ever need anything in the very near future as I do hope you will be returining to visit with us again.  Take care  and have a great holiday weekend,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The people were super friendly and the hotel was very comfortable and clean.  The little added touches like water and coffee in the lobby as well as a little afternoon treat were extra special.  Next time I want more time to take advantage of the breakfast buffet and some evening time in the lounge.  They looked amazing!
Manager Response: Hello frayah - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I really appreciate the praise you gave our team! We try so hard to take great care of our guests and we honestly enjoy meeting people and hopefully making friends for life.  Let me know the next time you are coming back into our city, as it sounds to me that I need to introduce you to our lounge team, and treat you and your family to a beverage!  Thank you again for this stellar rating, it means the world to us!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Peaceful place to stay in L.A.
Summary: Everything is taken care of...just enjoy the day! Room clean to a T. Everything crisp and white. Check-in easy and quick. Keys are no longer numbered and you just wave in front of your door lock and it opens. Check-out was fast. Staff was attentive and went above and beyond.
Manager Response: Hello laura - Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay!  I am thrilled to ready that you enjoyed your stay, and what meant the most to me (us), was you felt that the staff went above and beyond, because that is what we are trying to achieve at our hotel, everyday and with each and every guest.  I am also glad you like digital key, it really is pretty cool, and we are receiving good reviews about it so far.  You will probably see a lot of changes and improvements in it as well as Hilton upgrades its capabilities.  we also just added "Whistle" a really cool, guest communication tool that I hope you will come back to experience, as I would love to hear your thoughts.  Again....Thank you so much for this wonderful review, and please let me know if there is anything I can every do for you, your family and  friends in all of your visits to our fabulous city!  Have a wonderful day -  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: We thought it was a great value for a Hilton Hotel. The staff was extremely friendly. The food could be a bit better & higher quality but overall this is our new go to for trips to Disney. It's a smaller hotel so more individual service and it's appreciated.
Manager Response: Hello Nancy - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent visit.  I am very glad to see that you felt that the size of the hotel corresponded with the individual service as we do try to get to know our guests and at a Hilton Garden Inn, it is definitely a plus!  We always try to be a "Great Value", and I was also glad to read that you may have felt that being a great value did not detract from our service and product quality.  Wow....and to be called a new go-to for your Disney trips, that makes it even a more of a special review for us.    Our goal is to build customers for life and I was thrilled to read that you will be back again!  Please let me know if you ever need anything and I would like to personally make your reservations for your next Disney visit.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Unforgettable anniversary well done you ruined everything
Summary: I was celebrating my 20 year anniversary and I wanted to be special but this hotel make a big effort to ruin everything hilton it's a big name on the industry but the service of this hotel don't meet the expectations of this big name thanks for ruined this big celebration an you only celebrate 20 years one time good job
Manager Response: Hello Ivanni  - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I apologize for us not catching that you were celebrating a 20 year anniversary.  In researching this reservation booked on Booking.com, we do not see any information that was transferred to us, so we can do what we do best and that is help celebrate our guest's special occasions.  I would  like to talk with you to find out how this was comunicated to our team, so we can properly address and hopefully you will allow us to do something positive about this situation.  Again, please accept my apology as we normally do not disappoint our guests enjoying special occasions.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Good hotel. Staff is very helpful. Was easy getting to Disneyland using Uber. If you want disneyland tickets they sell them there. Good breakfast selection and will make you fresh omelets and pancakes.
Manager Response: Hello Michael - Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay.  I am thrilled to read that you had a very good stay, and that you enjoyed our hotel and the engagement of our staff.  They all work hard to make sure that our guests are happy and have a very enjoyable stay.    As I always tell our associates; we are in the repeat customer business and not the one time customer business as we hope that we "earn" the loyalty of all of our guests, and they will return to us soon.  I hope we succeeded that goal from your recent stay and that we will be seeing you and your family again soon.  Have a wonderful day and please call me if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family and friends.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Nice location. Close to Disney, Chapman University, and Angels stadium. The rooms were modern and very clean. The bathroom is a little small and will soon need an update. The staff was great. My only complaint is the parking situation. We were charged for parking (which is typical in this area), but returning one evening couldn't find a spot. Half of the cars didn't have the parking badge hanging from the mirror, so I don't know if they forgot or if they weren't guests. I probably will ty a different property when I return to the area. We were credited for parking because of this issue.
Manager Response: Hello Dan - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I appreciate you mentioning how close we are to a number of venues, especially Chapman University as we have a lot of the student's parents staying with us.  Thank you for your comments on our staff.  The work very hard to keep our guests happy and I hope you may have "stepped" through one of our Lobby Bright Hearted huddles in the morning or afternoon.  we really enjoy our guests and when they are mentioned like this I always bring this up to them so they can feel proud of what they accomplished.  I cannot help but to agree that parking can be a challenge later at times in the evening, and I will find a solution to this as I want you to return to us, and I don't want to lose your business over this reason.  Give me a little time to figure this out and also call me the next time you are coming into town as I would like to meet you and your family in person.  Again, thank you and have a great rest of your day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: very clean and business travel oriented
Summary: recommend for business travel. hot breakfast. good location, good italian restaurant next to hotel. Not far from disney land california. may charge for parking. breakfast cost $15 approx. unless you are hilton gold.
Manager Response: Hello liaoh137 - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent visit.  Our goal is to build customers for life and I was thrilled to read that you found our hotel to be good for business travelers and having a central location being a big plus.  We love our Hilton Honors members and there are a tremendous amount of benefits to capture at a Hilton Garden Inn, so please keep on visiting us.  We will continue to try to get better, and as I always say to all my guests.....we listen to you!  Please let me know if you ever need anything  or are coming back to our property. I would like to personally like to thank you for your business it and shake your hand.  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Don't bring a Vehicle, since the parking is extremely limited
Summary: IF this hotel had adequate parking, I would have given it 3 stars.  In Addition, If they provided complementary nightly beverage of coffee and tea like all the other Garden Inns I stayed in, I would have given 4 stars.  Expect to pay for every little item. This hotel has 6 floors with at least 30 rooms on each floor, yet LESS than 100 parking spaces!!!!  While I didn't take an exact count, I don't think they have 70 parking spaces.  And the parking is extremely tight.  PLUS they add a $15 per night parking fee. DON"T plan on being able to go anywhere with your vehicle after 6 pm because when you get back, you won't be able to park it at the Garden Inn,  You will have to pay a private lot, take a chance on getting towed, and STILL get charged the $15 parking fee by the Garden
Manager Response: Hello ExtremeRoadWarrior - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.    I first want to apologize about the parking.  We try our best to accommodate everyone for parking as close to the hotel as possible even in this communal lot being shared with our neighboring, Embassy Suites and Hampton Inn.  I do see your point about space, and I have additional signage on the way to help prevent unnecessary overflow from special events.    Thank you for acknowledging that our staff is friendly and accommodating as I am very proud of our guest posture and service standards, as we are always looking for ways to get better and better.  Hilton and HGI is working on new menus with local and regional dining selections and you will see some new changes down the road.  I do not believe that the lobby all-day coffee and tea is a Hilton Standard any longer, but I will check as I had done that before and if it is an option I will bring it back.  Thank you again for your detailed comments, and I hope that I can earn your business again in the very near future as we want to earn a 5 star rating from you.  Please call me direct should you need reservations or would like to discuss your stay further.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The staff was so friendly and helpful. Check in was fast and efficient. The rooms were very clean. Anytime we needed something they were quick to help us. The pool and hot tub area was very nice and private.
Manager Response: Hello CLM8595 - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent stay.  I am glad to read that you had a good check-in experience.  We have been working on that to see what we can do to make the arrival better, and I think it is starting to come together.  I also appreciate the fact that you found the staff friendly and our rooms clean.  That means a lot to all of us here, and we never stop trying to improve ourselves, so that ou guests will have a great stay.  I hope that you will be returning to us soon, so please let me know if there is anything I can do for you and your family in all of your travels.  Best regards and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell

Summary: Love this hotel. I booked on Booking.Com, just 2 days prior to arrival and I lucked out on a GREAT price!   I was blown away by the genuine friendly and helpful customer service.  Our 2 queen bed room was clean and tidy and beds were extremely comfy.  I appreciated the microwave and the fridge.  I didn't use the hot tub or pool, but upon our next Disneyland visit, we will choose this hotel and hopefully take advantage of the the nice cook to order breakfast, 24-hour coffee, and the pool/hot tub.    Parking can be challenging if you're returning from the parks late at night, but we lucked out.  Previous visits, we parked way in the back by Embassy Suites.  This hotel doesn't offer airport or Disneyland shuttle BUT, if you walk out the door and make a right and head over to
Manager Response: Hello redenvelope - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so glad to read that you loved our hotel, and especially feeling like you may have found a "Gem".  I was especially glad to read that you found the staff to be very friendly, but most important that it felt genuine, as we truly are, as we all know that all of our guests have many choices in this market, so to read this made us all feel very proud.  We strive to get better, as evident by our daily Bright Hearted" huddles, (next time you come in you will have to join us), in which we discuss our daily service goals and guest satisfaction accomplishments.  Please call me direct should you ever need anything, and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Had to be in Southern California for a two week work stay. This was a great place to do so.  I was close to the office and many restaurants as well.  The staff was fantastic and the facilities kept very well.
Manager Response: Hello Martha - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I am thrilled to read that you had a fantastic stay, as the staff does work hard to keep our service standards up and our facility clean and well maintained. I will relay your comments to our team.  They will surely make our day, and keep us well focused towards always trying to improve ourselves even further.  Thank you again and I hope that you will be visiting with us again real soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: This hotel was priced at a better rate that ones that are not rated as highly as this one was so it was a no brainer to book here for the price.  What was the best deal was how nice it was and how great the staff was.  The room was very clean and comfortable.  Special accommodations in the nightstand lights and plug in area at the desk for phone and computer charging stations.   Lots of towels available everyday and a little frig so we could keep drinks and food in the room.  I made the reservation here because it was close to the convention center and Disneyland. Both places which were the reason of my visit.  I arrived one day before my reservation had been made and the staff made accommodations for me to leave my luggage onsite until my room was available.  Free Coffee, water
Manager Response: Hello Paula - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy travel days to write a review of your recent stay.  You wrote an incredibly thorough review of our hotel and I cannot tell you how much I appreciated all that you observed and said.  I was glad to read that you found our accommodation's well suited for your needs, as well as an excellent price value.  The wait staff is pretty darn good here, as they work very hard and considering the amount of guests they see each morning, it is great to read that you had such a positive experience.  It sounds like you made our hotel your "2nd Home", so please come visit us again soon.  Don't hesitate to call me direct to make your reservations as well!!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Excellent quality, spotless rooms, and friendly staff at a reasonable price. Vegetarian options available at the in-house restaurant. Free parking too! Do take advantage of the lovely outdoor pool and hot tub!
Manager Response: Hello Victoria - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed our pool and hot tub in particularly only because we just had them both resurfaced, and I have not received any feed back on it prior to your comments.  We are still working on adding a few new amenities to the deck, so hopefully you will come back soon and see what else we have done.  I am also glad you  enjoyed your room and our staff.  We love to provide great guest service, and those items are always a top priority of our improvement focus each and every day.  Thank you again and I hope you will be returning soon,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Stayed here in recent trip to area. Nice hotel, friendly staff. Only 30 minute walk to Disneyland, but quick Uber ride. Lots of amenities within walking distance. Did not have a car, but parking requires nightly charge.
Manager Response: Hello Staci - Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your recent experience at our hotel.  Althouhg I see that we were a three star experience, it sounds like you had a very good stay, as I love to read when there are Mom/Daughter or Father/Son get-aways.  One of my most memorable moments of my life was taking a trip with my mom when I was 9 years old, and I still can remember it to this very day.  I was glad to read that you found our hotel to be nice and also about our friendly staff.  There is as you mention a nightly fee for parking, but honestly compared to other hotels in the market or at nearby similar vacation cities, it is still a reasonable fee compared to them.  I do understand your concern though and I want to thank you for mentioning it, as well as the fact that a car is not always necessary due to the location of our hotel to restaurants and amenities nearby.  I do hope that you will return soon, and I hope that you allow me to personally make your reservations for you and your family on your next trip!  Thank you and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Doesn't seem like the carpet has been updated for years. The decor seems like it's from the 90's so it looks old. There was a big hard stain on the room carpet. The curtains had what looked like vlood stains on them. There is no fan in the bathrooms and they didn't serve cookies in the lobby while I was there. These are the bad points. Other than that the rest of the place is like a normal, but smaller, garden inn.
Manager Response: Hello O6480ZCmatthews - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent visit to our hotel.  First let me say that I am so sorry that you did not have a very good experience at our hotel, and I am very disappointed that you did not receive a room up to my standards and not only yours .  It sounds like the room should not have been released yet, and had items that needed to be changed out or repaired.    I promise you I will take care of these things, as I don't consider anything too small of an issue to fix, and I try immediately address any items that effect our overall guest satisfaction.    I do hope that you will allow us another chance in the very near future, and if you have a free moment please contact me direct at 714-620-2137 to discuss your stay further.   Again, thank you and I do hope to hear from you this week,  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Been staying at this hotels since daughter was 5 year-old.   Now, she is 19 years of age.  Never disappointed with the hotel cleanliness and cost.  As long as daughter wants to return to Disneyland plan to return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Martha -  Thank you so much for writing a review of your recent stay at our hotel, and honestly I should call it your hotel since you have been coming here for so many years!!!  We all appreciate your tremendous loyalty, and for being such a valued part of our HGI family throughout the years.  I think we should plan on celebrating your daughters 20th birthday as well, but maybe we should just wrap it all up into a "Hilton Garden Inn Family Disney Reunion" and bring everyone down!!     Wow....again thank you for such a fabulous review, and I will pass all of your kind words on to our (your) staff!!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Nice and quiet, comfy bed, cold fridge, microwave. Pool is kinda small, but I did not use. Lots of nearby/walking distance eateries. Staff was courteous and helpful. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Sheryl - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I am very glad to read that you enjoyed your visit, and I can speak on behalf of our  team, that we look forward to your return.    We take so much pride in working hard to make each and every guest have a great stay, and when I see that our guest's review reflects our efforts, it makes us want to work even harder.   Please let me know when you plan on coming back and call me direct to make your reservation.  It will be my pleasure to do so and I would love to meet you and your family in person to welcome you back.  Have a wonderful day -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels close to Disneyland but have this one to be the best in service and person ability. The friendly staff really seem to care about you in seeing all your needs are met. We will definitely be returning the next time we go back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello robin - Thank you for taking the time out of your travels to write a review in regards to your recent stay with us.  I am very glad to read that you enjoyed your stay, and I will let my staff know of your wonderful compliment to all of their hard work and "Guest Focus".  We have "Bright Hearted" team Huddles each day, and we review what our guests say, and what their experiences were like, so we can always find new ways to improve in our services.  I am very glad that you found our staff to be friendly and caring, as this is a very big part of our service focus.  I am very blessed with a wonderful team, that takes great pride in their work, as we try to always achieve 100% guest satisfaction.  Thank you again and I hope you will call me direct the next time you plan on coming back to allow me to make your reservations.   It was a pleasure to serve you and your family.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Good location on hotel strip, about 2 mile walk to parks
Summary: We stayed here for a conference at the Hyatt next door, which worked out great. easy check-in, microwave/refrigerator in room, and parking (with pass at extra cost) in shared lot. If you're here for Disney, you can buy shuttle passes or simply walk, which we did. Rooms didn't get cleaned until late afternoon, but otherwise, a good experience.
Manager Response: Hello CleopatraBunny - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I first want to apologize to you for not having your room ready early enough for you upon your arrival.  I personally know what it is like to travel, and not be able to have a room ready upon my arrival.  It is nice to be able to immediately relax, and get comfortable after a long trip.  Our housekeepers work hard to make sure that your rooms are clean and ready for your occupancy, and again please accept my apology if this caused you any inconvenience.  Since we are both a business traveler and leisure customer hotel, it is great to read that you were here with us during a convention, as we do value your business greatly.  I hope you enjoyed our city, and again I am glad that overall you had a good experience.  I hope you return to our hotel and our city soon, and please don't always wait for a convention to do so.  Don't hesitate to call me direct the next time and I would be more than happy to make your reservation for you, as I would love the opportunity to say hello the next time you are planning a trip.  Thank you again,  Mitchell Hirschman General Maanger

Summary: Hotel met my expectations of HGI. Frequent shuttle service to Disneyland Parks available at a nominal fee. Knowing your room number prior to arrival was new beneficial feature. Ample parking was available.  Great front desk staff.
Manager Response: Hello kelvin - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent trip.  I am so glad to read that we met your expectations, and that you also found us to be a very good price value, which is also very important to us being both a business traveler and family friendly hotel in a nearby resort area.    Next time you are coming into our city please let me know, as I want to make sure that we "exceed" your expectations and not just meet them.  I want to make your reservations for you and see what else we can do for your and your family during your visit.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: We didn't go to Disneyland this trip but planned an evening at a restaurant in Newport Beach and it was a reasonable distance. The next morning we headed to Hollywood and that to was doable from this location. Also went to Medieval Times, great show & food!
Manager Response: Hello Linda - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review.   I am so thrilled to read that you had an excellent stay.  When we can earn 5 stars as part of your overall visit to our hotel and our city, it is a great accomplishment for us, and we are still looking for ways to make your next visit even better.  I was also glad to read that you experienced our state a little bit, with a visit to Hollywood.  I am sure that was an experience in itself as the history there both past and present, and some of the sights can really be remarkable. I am also sure our friends at Medieval Times would be glad to read that you had a great time there as well (it can be really fun!)  Next time you are coming in and have a planned Disney adventure let me know and I will make your reservations for you. Disney has so many new things going on, and I know you will also like California Adventure even more now with their new connection with Marvel!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Easy check in/out  Convent to restaurants stores and shuttle bus to Disneyland.  Awesome breakfast Buffett.  Quit rooms.  Easy purchase of Disneyland tickets and bus tickets.  Waved our parking charge.  Will be returning.
Manager Response: Hello Renee - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent journey to our hotel and your stay.  I love to always read about restaurant conveniences and our breakfast.  We are constantly trying to fine tune it as well, and with further changes being made by our Hilton brand we have a few exciting "new" things on the horizon as well.  We appreciate your loyalty to us and again, I am glad you had what really sounds like a wonderful vacation.  I (We) hope you will be visiting with us again soon;  Best regards and have a wonderful day!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Staff Very unknowledgeable about their own specials like the Family Fun Package I purchased.  Wifi very poor especially if you get stuck with the free wifi.  System doesn't allow you to change to premium wifi for 24hrs.  Really hindered our Skype meetings.
Manager Response: Hello F9149UVaaronb - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your recent stay.  I first want to apologize for your overall experience as I personally want you to know how important it is to all of us at the Hilton Garden Inn, that you and all of our guests have an exceptional stay, and I am sorry that we failed to do so.  I have addressed this with my team, and I am also looking into the free to premium exchange as possibly this can be avoided with a simple re-configuration of the system.  I am very glad you have brought this to my attention and I again am sorry that it effected your ability to Skype for your meetings.  As for the knowledge of our staff in selling packages, I have addressed this with the individual who you initially discussed it with, to make sure they had a better grasp of the programs and packages offered.  Form what I do understand the package you are talking about is a AAA package and it is based on availability, and most likely did not appear on the website on the day you needed.  That is still not an acceptable excuse as my clerks are empowered to make guest decisions and possibly it could have been offered had the clerk known about it, so please forgive us.  Please call me direct the next time you are in our city and allow us another chance to take better care of you, your family and fellow associates.  Thank you for your time today and have a great rest of your day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: about room cleaning, my room is every day cleaned by this amazing lady by the name of Khawla Hamdan. she is very professional, accurate about my request and very detailed oriented. for me that i am here for 40 days i think that is that best you can have thank you Khawla for your professionalism.  MM
Manager Response: Hello boardslide912 - Thank you for writing a review of your stay and mentioning a staff member. I will follow-up on this and see what I can do to make sure she is recognized for her amazing cleaning efforts and customer service.  I hope you enjoyed or are enjoying your visit to our area.  If there is anything that I can do for you during your travels please let me know.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: If you are traveling as a family, this is NOT the place for you. As a disabled guest, I had trouble moving about the room. The rooms are narrow and cramped for more than 2 people in the room. I almost left to find a hotel with more room.
Manager Response: Hello kcatspit - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review -   I apologize that our room size did not fit your needs. In looking at the room that was occupied it was not a room that is normally offered to a disable guest, so please accept my apology if you had requested one upon arrival.  Our disabled guest rooms are easier to maneuver in and the bathroom areas are larger and more comfortable for the customer.  I do hope you allow us another chance to take care of you and your family in the very near future. Please call me direct the next time so I can personally make your reservations.  Thank you again, and have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: We visited Anaheim and stayed in this hotel for the biannual D23  Disney Expo. We were pleased to be in great walking proximity of the convention center. Everyday we woke to great service, clean rooms and delicious and adequately priced breakfast. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting for conventions or even Disneyland(although Disneyland is a little bit further, about 2 blocks) Overall pleasant stay!
Manager Response: Hello Vanessa - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  We take a considerable amount of pride in our service, and that is something that we work on everyday.  It is great to read your thoughts on our service, as for me......I listen to all of my guests, and we (I) always try to improve upon it.  I am also glad to read that you found our breakfast to be "well rounded" for you and your family in all categories.  Price value and quality are both important to us, and we do hear that from many of our clients, and again we are diligently working on service as it is a busy restaurant.  Again; thank you so much for the review and I hope you will be visitng with us again soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Great location with lots of restaurants and shopping within walking distance. Close to Disney. Rooms were really clean, food in the hotel was good, staff was very nice and beds were super comfortable. Parking is a bit limited and hotel menu is pretty limited too. Rooms were quiet.
Manager Response: Hello Liz - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.    I am glad you found our hotel and staff good and accommodating to your needs.  It is a very good team here, and we are constantly looking for was to get better.  I also agree that our hotel is conveniently located near restaurants, and if you are a "walker" you can walk to the convention center as well as other places nearby, plus we also offer a Disney Shuttle for a reasonable price.  I am working on improving Parking availability, and some of it has to do with making sure that our guests are getting all of the attention that they need in the areas surrounding the hotel.  Hopefully with proper additional signage we will accomplish that goal.  In the mean time thank you for your patience, and I do hope you will be returning to us soon.  Call me if you need anything! - Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman  General Manager

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at the Hilton Garden Inn, we'll be back for our next Disney Trip for sure and will be recommending it to others as well🤗 Thank you again Hilton Staff, you made us feel like we were at home, you're the best😘
Manager Response: Hello Cynthia - I appreciate you taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I am so glad to read that you had a wonderful stay.   It is our guests that are actually the best, and we work hard towards making you feel at home.  We all look forward to your return ....so come home soon!!  Have a wonderful day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: the Hotel was wonderful, the staff was great the  lobby was spot less. I came to the hotel before my wife to be and the staff made sure hat she didn't have any problems for I had to be at a meeting. When she arrived, they gave her the room key, car keys I left for her. Made her feel like a VIP. Thank you Hilton Garden Inn.
Manager Response: Hello Rodney - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.    One of the greatest accomplishments that our team can make is to allow the guests to feel at home and "Bright Hearted", as we are!      Your review means a lot to me, as we are constantly looking for ways to improve our services, and your comments allowed us  all to see that our hard work and customer service mentality is reaching our customers.  I want to thank you for staying with us, and I hope you and your family will be visiting again with us soon,  Have a fabulous day -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I travel frequently and highly recommend this hotel for all types of travelers! Rooms are clean, breakfast is far better than all the other hotels I've stayed at, but the thing that stands out the most is their excellent customer service! Special thank you to Hassan from Guest Services and Luis from the restaurant! Made this stay memorable and enjoyable for me and my family! THANK YOU!
Manager Response: Hello BeastMode - What a great TripAdvisor name!!!   Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am very happy to read about your comments and especially to see the names of tow of our associates listed, as we take a lot of pride in making a positive impact on the total guest experience.  Hassan and Luis work hard to exceed our guests expectations, and it is great to read that they engaged with you and your family.    I will present to them gift cards courtesy of you and your family due to their service and for being what we now call "Bright Hearted!!!  Thank you again and I hope you will be returning to us shortly.  Call me if you need anything...and don't forget to mention BeastMode.....Take care!  Have a great day,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Close to different restaurants and has transportation to Disney. Rooms were clean and well kept. Staff were very nice and provided me with packing tape when my suitcase broke at 2:30 am in the morning.
Manager Response: Hello Denise - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I was thrilled to read that you had an excellent stay, and of all the things you wrote, I was especially happy to read about the packing tape.  It may not sound like out of the ordinary, but it shows me that the staff will do all they can for our customers and work with our guests for problem resolution (especially at 2:30 AM).   I will let the night manager know about this acknowledgement as it meant a lot to me.  I hope that you and your family will be back soon.  Let me know if I can help you in all of your travels to our area.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Great hotel, friendly staffs, good facilities, perfect location! Love everything of this hotel! If you are looking for the accommodations near Disneyland, this place is the right answer! We will absolutely come back to this hotel again!
Manager Response: Hello Tai - Thank  you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review and I want to also thank you for writing a review with so much passion for facilities and service.  As I always seem to say, the staff works hard to exceed out guests expectations, and we really do strive to get better each and every day.  We also recently rolled out our new "Bright Hearted" program, and these are the results we are all expecting    from our team members.  Thank you again, and I hope you and your family will return shortly to our hotel and what I hope you will call a second home.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: My family and I decided to stay at the Hilton garden inn, and it was a great decision! We had a slight issue with our ac unit, but it turns out We didn't know how to use it. Manuel Gil, a maintenance worker, was absolutely great! He not only helped me work the ac unit,but his friendliness to me and my family was astonishing. It sucks to work on a major holiday, but that did not faze Manuel. I would definitely stay there again! Also I can't forget about Mitchell , the general manager, he was a super nice man who seems to care about his guest and the hotel. Kudos to you sir and a great establishment that you run, - the family in 619 with the happy little boy.
Manager Response: Hello Alex - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I am so glad that you had a wonderful stay, and I want you to know that we appreciate your business, and especially for allowing us to do something positive, as we attempted to fix your AC unit.  Manuel has been with us for a while now, and to read this, not only makes me feel great, but also makes me very proud of Manuel's guest focus in problem solving.  I will make sure he receives gift card recognition on your behalf.   It is always a pleasure to recognize one of our associates when I read such a positive comment in a review.  Pleae let me know if you need anything and I hope you will be returning to our hotel soon,  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: The location is great.  The staff are fantastic, especially the breakfast staff. Very helpful, very engaged, and hard working. The pool and hot tub are nice, when you're in southern california you won't spend much time there, but it's perfect for a quick swim with the kids.
Manager Response: Hello Kyle - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review.  I hope that you and your family are all doing well.   I am thrilled to read that you had a wonderful stay.  I am especially glad to read that the family also enjoyed a quick swim.  we just finished resurfacing our pool and spa as well as our deck, and it has taken painfully too long to have it completed, so to read this meant the world to us all.  I will pass what you wrote on to my team, especially because you used the word "engaged" in your review.  That is so critical to any well run hotel, and it is something that we strive to do daily.  We all hope that you will be returning shortly and please call me direct should you need anything in all of your travels to our area,  Have a wonderful day -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Staff was all very helpful and extremely friendly. I got off of work late but Jim that works the overnight shift was fantastic. Victor in maintenance made sure I had all I needed as well. Thanks guys!
Manager Response: Thank you tvj - I know you are busy, and I appreciate the time you are taking out of your day to write, and it is great to read such a wonderful review of your stay.    I was especially glad to read about Victor, as being in maintenance it is great to not only have someone who can resolve a problem, should one arise, but it what makes him even more valuable to our team, is that he has great passion for customer satisfaction and loves to communicate this with our guests.  That is a much added bonus for us to have an associate like him in this position.    I will make sure that he sees this review and I will give him a special gift card just from you.  We all hope to see you again soon, and please contact me direct should there be anything else that you need in all of your travels.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Dirty rooms and horrible service makes this overpriced hotel a place to avoid.  The staff member that checked us in went out of his way to make us feel anything but welcomed or appreciated.  Avoid this place at all costs.
Manager Response: Hello Catherine - Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay.  I have reviewed your comments and I am addressing this with my department leader, and we will review this with the associate.  It is not something that I am accustomed to reading about my hotel and our associates, as we all take a lot of pride in our services.    Housekeeping also works hard to make sure that our rooms and facility are properly managed and kept in excellent condition before the customer arrives, and during their stay.   We obviously failed to do this during your recent stay.  I will try to reach you by phone as well to discuss further, as we are always trying to improve ourselves.  Thank you -   Mitchell

Summary: In the last day there I felt rushed out because housekeeping came to the room at 7am and again at 8am when checkout is at noon. I didn't care for this and they also removed a grocery item we purchased from the room the second day we were there. The hotel did comp our last night for this inconvenience which I thought was a very nice thing to do.
Manager Response: Dear NikoSwift - Thank you for your review.  I would like to talk futher to you about your experience.    Although we did comp your room for the inconvenience, the bothering or disturbances that you received were way to early, even for our staff to knock on doors and conduct room checks.  We also have special internal rules about removing grocery items from the rooms from guests who are staying over, so again I would like to look into this further to see what caused this.  If you have a moment to discuss, please give me a call at 714-620-2137.  I would greatly appreciate this.  Thank you and please accept my apology for the inconveniences during your stay.  I hope to talk to you soon,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Had 4 of us in a double queen bed room.Was at the Vidcon convention most of the time.The pool was closed ,the breakfast is average and overpriced.Its a 1 mile walk to the convention center. No shuttle .
Manager Response: Hello Joanna - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.    We work hard to make it right for all of our customers, and I want to apologize as to the overall success of your stay, and I was very disappointed to read, that we failed to overcome our pool being closed by allowing you to have a better dining experience during breakfast.  ur pool project was to be finished in time for VidCon, but unfortunately it was not, although our hotel neighbors have been very kind to us by allowing use of their pool facilities.  Our pool is about to re-open, but again....not in time for VidCon, as we truly enjoyed our guests attending the show and wanted it by then to avoid any disappointment.  Unfortunately;  this show did not provide any shuttle transportation to the convention center as some shows may offer.  Again, please accept my apology for any inconvenience, and I do hope you will allow us another visit in the very near future.  Please do not hesitate to contact me direct to make your reservation and you will also be hearing from us again shortly with additional follow-up.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Recommended. Nice hotel - ideal for disney
Summary: Travelling with my partner and our 6 year old we checked in on the 14th April for 7 nights. Having just experienced the worst customer service in Vegas, the gentleman that checked us in (apologises for not remembering your name) was excellent. A great first impression.  The room (604) was nice. Fairly standard, but clean, comfortable and spacious. House keeping was good.The bar and restaurant area looked nice though we didn't use them. The only negative was that the pool was closed for refurbishment. Only a minor inconvenience as it was a short walk to use the Embassy suites pool. Parking for us was never a problem. Location was excellent in every respect. The reason for staying was that we were visiting Disney which is 1.5 miles up the road.We purchased the 3 day ticket for the
Manager Response: Hello Autarky:   Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of your stay.  I am so glad to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay.   I am glad you found the overall costs to be reasonable, as we always hope we are a great value for our customers.   I was also glad to read that you enjoyed your room and the check in experience.  As I always say housekeeping works hard each and every day, so it is great to have them recognized as well.   The pool is finally back open after a long re-surfacing project, so I hope you will call me direct to make your next reservations and let me know if you are bringing your 6 year old again, we will be able to doing something special for them, especially if you are celebrating a special occasion.  By the way - Joe's Italian Ice is pretty darn good.....isn't it.....  Take care and I hope to see you again soon.  Mitchell

Summary Heading: if you don't have to stay there...then dont!
Summary: loud...noisy and you must pay to park in there crappy parking lot I must say however there coffee was not bad (the one in the lobby) I needed it since I was awakened all night ! #neveragain ...usually hilton loyal but not this time
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Francess.   First let me apologize for the inconveniences that you received and I do want to thank you for your review.  I want you to know a few things in regards to your stay that I am working on.  The first is the parking and making sure that our guests and only our guests are using the lot.  I fully understand your frustration in this area, as it can tend to be a mutual hotel lot, which can cause some difficulties.    The other item, is you being awakened.  One of the most important reasons to stay at a hotel is to not only enjoy the facility, but to get a good night sleep.  I believe you were in during an amateur  or youth tournament, and I have discussed this with my team, and as to making sure that our guests not with the tournaments are not disturbed.  I depend many times on parents to be just that....parents.  Unfortunately, sometimes, they do not do as good a job controlling noise during these events, and that is where we need to do a better job with informing them of these disturbance and remedying the situation quickly and effectively.   I hope that no matter when you stay in the future, and I do hope you will give us another chance, that you will never hesitate to speak up and let our desk associates know immediately that there are disturbances and we will definitely make sure we react quickly.  I am disappointed that I did not meet you during your visit, as I would have like to have done something more for you to help, and meet with you in person.  Again, please accept my apology for this poor stay and I hope you will allow us another chance.   Please feel free to contact me direct to make your next reservation,  Regards,  Mitchell  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: This hotel was clean. Staff was available and attentive. Housekeeping was excellent. The. Real fast was sub par. Pancakes burnet. Omelette over cooked. Would not recommend the food. Otherwise, all other services were great.
Manager Response: Hello Victoria - Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay.  I am very glad to read that you enjoyed our overall services, as customer satisfaction is incredibly important to our team at all levels.  I will also take what I learned from you to our Food and Beverage Manager for review with improvements.  I personally love to eat breakfast, and it is a mainstay in my household, and I also tend to treat my family to a Sunday restaurant a few times a month.  This makes me very critical of my own operation, as I look for great service, as well as a great food product.  It sounds like the items should not have been even served to you, so please accept my apology.  I guarantee you that we will make improvements there, and I cannot tell you how much I personally appreciate your feedback.  Please call me direct should you ever need anything, and let me know if you are returning to our area as I would like to make your reservations and have a chance to meet with you in person.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Our family stayed here on our spring trip to Disney in Apr 2017. Spacious, clean suite, large breakfast buffet and happy hour from 4-7 included!  Nice pool and hot tub onsite as well as a restaurant. Close proximity to Disney with frequent shuttle service all day long.  The only negative is there are only 2 elevators to service many floors and many school students staying there made the elevator waits painful at times.. especially with little kids. Other than that it's a beautiful place to stay with friendly staff. Wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Timcamrose - Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am very glad to read that you enjoyed your stay.  We all hope to see you again soon!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and a great location.
Summary: We spent one night in this hotel and we were very happy with it.  The hotel was very clean and had a great location.  We were able to walk to several places to eat, including Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles.  The wifi worked great and everyone was super friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Kat - Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel.  It was absolute pleasure to serve you and your family.  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and I also appreciated that you recognize our staff for their friendliness.  As they say - They are "the real deal" in service.  We all look forward to your next visit!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: A very good value and a nice room.  This hotel was much quieter than a more upscale hotel I stayed ta the lats night of my trip.  A much better value to me.  The location was convenient and located close (within walking distance) to many restaurants
Manager Response: Hello Kenneth - Thank you for taking the tim to review our hotel.  I am thrill dto see that you had a great stay.  Please let me know when you are coming back into our city as I would love to meet you in person.  Best regards and have a successful day!  Mitchell

Summary: This is a very nice hotel close to many attractions including Convention Center. They do have shuttles to Disneyland. The service is extremely good. The people who work here are very helpful and would try to make your stay easy. If you try to book through the official website, that would be probably the best price that you will get. Recommended.
Manager Response: Hello yatri - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay and the service that we provided.  We love providing customer service at our hotel, and we do all we can to ensure that our guests have a great stay.  Thank you again and we all look forward to seeing you again in the very near future!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Should have stayed in a closer hotel to convention center about a 15 minute walk. Hotel undergoing renovations during stay breakfast was moved several times during stay. Very small dining area and crowded.
Manager Response: Hello Allen - First let me thank you for taking the time out of your busy travel schedule to write a review.    I am so sorry for the disappointing stay that you experienced.  If I may be candid with you. the pool being renovated has been a thorn in my side for a while now, and I was hoping to have it finished prior to your convention.  I met so many guests with the show and each and everyone of the attendees were terrific people and I fully understand your frustration.   Having to move the breakfast was another issue that I had to address as the Kitchen floor remodeling was also not something planned for during the convention, and again unfortunately I could not move this time frame back, as it also had short notice.  I do hope that you will allow us another opportunity to serve you and your family again in the very near future.  I would be more than happy to make your reservations for you, and it would allow me the opportunity to both meet you and ensure that your next stay will exceed both of our expectations.  Please do not hesitate to call me and discuss this further.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager 714-620-2137

Summary: The hotel is very clean and staff are very friendly. Will come back again. The location is very convenience. The lobby is clean and drink provided 24. Room is very clean and big screen tivi available in the room.
Manager Response: Hello Chieu - Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review.  We work hard on cleanliness at our hotel and it was great to be recognized for it in a review.  Our team learns more and more each day, and we all love the interaction that we have with our guests.  Thank you again and I hope to see you again soon - Please call m direct should you ever need anything prior to your return visit.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: very nice room but awful food service.  Staff never got orders correct and two days had to eat very limited breakfast in a meeting room.  The food was very limited and of low quality served on paper plates with plastic flatware.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Alexander - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.     I want to apologize for your recent experience.  The relocation of breakfast was not  in our original plans and is not part of our normal treatment of our guests and the quality of our service.  Unfortunately there was a kitchen floor remodeling with short notice, that forced us to move our breakfast to a meeting room.  I was hoping that we could still continue our normal quality in service, as well as the choice of food items, but we obviously failed to do so.  I am glad that you enjoyed your room, as our housekeeping staff works very hard to keep our hotel and our rooms in excellent shape for our guests.  I do hope that you will allow us another chance in the very near future, and please do not hesitate to call me direct if there is every anything I can do for you in all of your travels to our area.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager 714-620-2137

Summary: The location of this hotel is good with several restaurants within walking distance. The shuttle service to Disneyland is very helpful. We had breakfast every morning of our 7-night stay. The staff in the restaurant were friendly and helpful which made for a pleasant start to our day. Ordering from the menu is more desirable than the "hot" buffet items. The rooms are adequate - could use updating. Liked having a refrigerator. Common areas (hallways) could also use updating. But overall this is a safe place to stay and the staff are friendly.
Manager Response: Hello pqjb - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay.  I took great note of your comments on the breakfast items on the buffet, and I will review them with my Food and Beverage Manager.  I think there are things we can do to improve them, and I also was happy to read that you also enjoyd our morning staff.  Thank you again, and I look forward to your return visit!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: I truly enjoyed my stay! Although I live in So cal, I decided to get a room for my family as I participated in the Disney Tinkerbell run and wanted to stay close to the park. Our room offered plenty of space for my family of 4 and was very clean. We took advantage of the shuttle service to Disney and from our hotel. We also purchased the breakfast on site and my kids love, love, loved the waffles! Furthermore,  the staff were all very friendly and happy to help from front desk, to restaurant service, to the cleaning staff that were kind enough to give us some extra towels upon request. Without a doubt, my family and I will definitely be staying again! As a bonus we even had a great view of the Disney fireworks!
Manager Response: Dear ainmom - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am so thrilled to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay.  All of us look forward to your return visit soon.  My team works hard to ensure that our guests have a wonderful stay and it sounds lik we achieved our daily mission.......  Please call me direct should you ever need anything in all of your travels.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Blood found all over bathroom.  Dirty carpets. Musty smell. Generally dowdy.  Very disappointing stay. Had I been there any more than 2 nights and not working I would have found other accommodations. I will be returning to the area soon and will definitely NOT STAY HERE.
Manager Response: Dear 393cheryl - Thank you for taking the time again to review your stay.    I have addressed this situation and I am more disappointed than you are, as this never should have happened.  Room inspections and room releases have a very specific process, and we should not have released this room.  It was a mistake on our part, and I hope you accept my apology for this error.  Please let me know if you are ever in our area again, as I hopewe can earn a second chance and I would lik to met you in prson.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: This was my first visit and I will stay there again. My trip was for business reason which means that I was not able to visit Disney land. But anyhow after the long trip from Germany the check in worked well and I got a ticket for free parking. There are enough parking places around the hotel. Due to the fact that breakfast was included in my rate I received the coupons for the whole stay next morning. Breakfast was typical American and there is also additional stuff to be ordered by menu. I was so happy that I did not needed to use plastic knifes and plates. All real. For the visit to Disney Land it looks like there is a shuttle bus next to the hotel but again I could not visit it. But I have seen a lot of people traveling to the Disney land entrance. Company booked a kind size
Manager Response: Hello Andreas - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.    We would love to have you back again, and I appreciate all of your comments and and both the positive and negative feedback.  I have to take a look at the bill processes to see why we cannot have all of the information that you needed on it.  I completely agree with you as to making sure we have a process in place in which a DND is double checked.  Normally we do that and it can man the room will have service, but it could be limited based on the time of day.  Normally we try to reach out to all of our customers as we respect the DND sign to see if they need anything in the afternoon, so I will take another look at our processes.  I again want to thank you for your visit and I hope I have the opportunity to shake your hand in person in the very near future.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: The staff, from check in to check out were amazing and so lovely. The room was a little tired but we knew that from reading the reviews and it didn't bother us one bit. Would recommend and would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Darlowsinnz;  First lt me thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your stay at our hotel.  I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and especially our staff.  Thy are all "naturally friendly" and they pay particular attention to providing guest satisfaction, and all of them are very proud of it.  I am always listening to our customers, an even though we had a renovation 3 years ago, we work hard to keep the rooms fresh and well maintained.  Our company is always looking for product improvements, so I will always pay attention to the comments that our guests make in this area, so please don't hesitate to let me know your thoughts the next time you are in our city, as I hope you will be back soon.  Best regards and have a wonderful day,  Mitchell

Summary: Was visiting Disneyland. Inexpensive shuttle service to the park every 30 minutes. Hotel was about full but quiet at night. Comfortable bed and pillows. Breakfast cost about $10 per person with my package.  It was cooked to order, hot and delicious. Everything felt clean. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Libbyb - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write.    I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a nice visit.  We try hard to be a very good "Value Add" hotel and it sounds like we succeeded in meeting your expectations.     I hope you also found our team to be both friendly and accommodating as well, an from all of us at the Hilton Garden Inn - Thank you for your business!  We look forward to your next visit!    Have a wonderful day - Mitchell

Summary: We had a great stay.  Close to Disneyland, shopping and a variety of restaurants. The staff was excellent. The hotel was clean, breakfast and dinner menu's just perfect if you did not want to go out after a long day.
Manager Response: Hello tonac - Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am so glad to read that you had a great stay.  Our staff is always looking for ways to make improvements in our service, and they were thrilled to read your comments.    You will have to come back again as we will be rolling out a new dinner menu and I would like to have your feedback on it.  Again, thank you for the wonderful review and please let me know if there is anything I can do for you and your family and friends!  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: We had a family emergency come up at the last minute and the front desk staff (Brian) was compassionate and accommodating, making a tough day a little better!  The GM (Mitchel Hershman) followed up with kindness and concern for our family.  He went over and beyond to acknowledge his staff member as well as extended a kind gesture to console us.  It was truly touching and felt remarkably genuine.  They have earned my loyalty!! ❤️ Thank you!!
Manager Response: Hello lp2here4you - First let me apologize for responding so late.    It was an absolute pleasure to have you stay with us, and I cannot thank you enough for the stellar review that you gave us.    Our team here works hear to provide great service, and I shared your review with Brian and he also earned a little gift card from me (on your behalf of course!!).    We all try to provide genuine service to our guests an honestly, we don't know any other way to do it.   We always learn from ach guest experience and try hard to improve our service daily.     Please call me direct should you ever need anything and I hope that you and your family will be returning to our hotel soon.    Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: The hotel is a nice place and close to Disney and other local attractions. Hotel is currently having the pool and spa renovated. Had a minor issue with a large party staying at the hotel being noisy. We were supposed to be moved but this never happened.
Manager Response: Hello chrisf1965 - Thank you for writing a review of your stay.    I was going back to review some of my past responses and I noticed that for some reason or another that your responses was not done, which is unacceptable to me, so please accept my apology.  As late as this response is, I do want you to know that I am always at your service, and yes our pool and spa are now open and it is nice to have a new surface in both areas, as the guests are now enjoying our Spa once again.  I also want to mention that when there is noise and the guest request to be moved as you did, we should have followed-up and made sure that it happened, especially if we failed to resolve the noise complaint.  I want to apologize to you for our failure to move you as you requested.  Please call me direct to make your future reservations, as I would personally like to make them and make the opportunity to meet you and your family upon arrival.  Again, thank you for your business, and please accept my apology for not responding earlier.  Sincerely,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: Amazing stay.  The staff was very pleasant, very helpful and very well groomed.  The grounds were very well kept, food was very tasteful and appropriately priced and the drinks were absolutely amazing!!  Absolutely great location and experience.
Manager Response: Hello shernadaa2017 - I hope that you and your family are all doing well.    I was going through my past reviews and I want to thank you so much for giving us a stellar review.    The term "exceeded expectations", is not easy to earn these days and my staff works so hard to accomplish that with each and every guests, and if we fail to accomplish that, we revisit the guests stay, and always try to improve.  Please let me personally know if there is ever anything I can do for you and your family in all of your travels, and I hope you will be visiting with us again very soon.  Give me a heads-up prior to your return, as I would like to make sure I am here to say hello.  Best regards and again Thank you!!  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: I had the nicest experience at this property. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The housekeeper, Leticia, was especially kind and extremely good at her job (which is perhaps the most difficult role at a hotel).  But what made her stand out even more was that as I was leaving my room, with too many bags for me to control, Leticia stopped what she was doing and helped me with my bags! I am sure she had a lot of work to complete but she took the time to help me! What a lovely and kind gesture. Leticia is a true asset to this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Amy - I hope that you and your family are all doing well and getting ready for the holidays!  I just wanted to write you a note to say thank you for staying with us over this past year, and we hope you will be returning to us again soon.   All of us at the Hilton Garden Inn know that you have many choices in hotels, and we are glad that you chose to stay with us and I appreciated your review and wonderful comments.  By the way I shared this prior with Leticia - Thank you for the compliment for her and she earn a nice gift card on your behalf!  Have a great New Year and I hope you will plan another trip and visit with us in 2018. Please don't hesitate to contact me direct should you need anything in all of your travels to our area!  Best regards to you and your family, and have a safe and very Happy New Year!  Mitchell

Summary: Everything about this hotel was great. I've never had as great of service at any hotel as I did here.  Breakfast in the restaurant was Fresh and the staff even reminded me about the discount for being a hilton honors member  Highly recommended!!! I'll be back for sure.

Summary: Excellent hotel, clean, welcoming, friendly helpful staff, comfortable rooms and bed, clean bathroom, good value . Great breakfast each day, we will be back

Summary: Our stay here was pretty comfortable and we had no issues. The room was clean and comfortable, a little small but we weren't staying here to be in the room. Everything you would need is within walking distance and Disneyland is only 1/2 mile away. We had a fridge and a little microwave so we ate breakfast in the room. I would definitely stay here again and recommend.

Summary: Great Disney neighbor hotel, reserved for large (over 100) students / chaperones for high school event. Staff was beyond friendly! Breakfast and conference room we were set up in was fantastic, great food options, plenty of food. Beds super comfortable, kuerig in room was a great touch!  Only down I would have to say is small fitness center with only a handful of machines, but swimming pool and outside area were nice and clean! I would definitely recommend for future!

Summary: Our family was in Anaheim to visit Disneyland.  I'm a Hilton Diamond member and always stay at Hilton's - Garden Inns have become one of my favorites (personal preference).  Right from the get-go, I was extremely impressed with my reception.  Hassan Torres (Guest Service Supervisor) made me feel so welcome and genuinely seemed glad to see me.  I thought he had mistaken me for a regular, or something.  But, throughout my stay - my interactions with him remained consistent and he went above-and-beyond to make our visit more enjoyable!  Hassan gets a five :)  The hotel was great, I dinged it from a five for one or two unfortunate service aspects in the restaurant.  But, I'm picky - it is a wonderful place to stay if you are in the area!!
Manager Response: Hello emweave - I hope that you and your family are all doing well. I just wanted to write you a short note to say thank you for staying with us over this past year, and we hope you will be returning to us again soon. Summary Heading: Great time coming back on business too!
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay, I was actually a little surprised as to how well the place seemed to work for both business folks and families alike.  I was there attending a convention and I am definitely coming back with my family next time for a little fun.  Really good location to everything, and the hotel had a very nice and efficient staff. Hotel was clean and had everything I needed.  I will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Hello TusconTesla - I hope that you and your family are all doing well and getting ready for the holidays!  I just wanted to write you a note to say thank you for staying with us over this past year, and we hope you will be returning to us again soon.
