Summary: Usually I don't complain when I use points and get a free stay but this time we were really not happy.  The hotel decor is hideous, browns, light browns and reds dominate.  There is one elevator off the lobby and it takes forever to come when called.  Doesn't seem to matter what time of day it is, the elevator is slow.  We ended up just taking the stairs.  The beds were not comfortable.  The mattresses were lumpy and the bedding was cheap and irritating to the skin.  Outside noise was audible throughout the night.  Sirens, conversations, yelling, we heard it all.  Also lots of police presence which is good but makes a person wonder why?  Maid service okay, not a lot in terms of toiletries but shampoo, soap, conditioner and lotion were provided.  We were on a tight schedule for
Manager Response: Good Afternoon seattlefamilyoffive;  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am sorry that you were so disappointed with your stay.  There were a number of amateur tournaments in Anaheim/Garden Grove this weekend, which was why it was so busy.  I believe the police presence was generated in the area due to the considerable amount of children and teenagers walking around in the evening, which was a good thing to protect the children should there be any problems.  I am sorry about the elevators, we have two off of the lobby area, and I will look further into it as to their speed and I appreciate the comments on the building decor.  I do help you will allow us to have another visit in the near future, and I would appreciate if you call me direct as I would personally like to make your reservations and talk further with you.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: There seems to be something on the bedding that is biting me or itchy. Unfortunately, I don't know what it was. The hotel charge for a parking even if you're a Diamond member.  You can hear loud noise coming from the hallway. Staff don't car about your membership.
Manager Response: Dear Jamie - Thank you for taking the time to write to us in regards to your recent visit.  I take our reviews very seriously, and I want you to know that being a Diamond Member as well as being a guest of our hotel is something that we take very seriously as we know that you have a considerable amount of choices when you travel.  I always teach my staff that we are not in the one time guest visit, but in the repeat guest visit, which is critical to our success.  I will immediately look into any possible reason as to why your bedding may have been uncomfortable for you, as we take any complaint seriously and I try to find resolutions to any problem that a guest may experience in our hotel. Please contact me direct to discuss this at you convenience.   I will also address this with my staff as we always try to improve ourselves and we pay strict attention to our surveys and review them with our team.  Thank you again for taking the time to write, and I hope you will allow us another opportunity to serve you in the very near future.  I would like to meet with you in person, so please let me know the next time you are coming into the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.  Best regards, Mitchell   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager 714-620-2137

Summary: We stayed 6 nights, rooms were comfortable, had a microwave and fridge.  Free wifi.  We ordered from the menu and had the meal in a room a couple of times, meals were very nice.  There are also other restaurants in walking distance.    Target is close by also (walking distance)  Shuttle bus service to Disneyland was great, $6 adult $3 child, drivers were pleasant.  All staff were friendly, we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Seren27;  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for us.  We appreciate your business greatly and the staff works very hard here to provide our guests with excellent service.  I was very happy to read that you enjoyed the shuttle service to Disney as well as the location.  Again, thank you for staying with us and I hope that you will be visiting with us again very soon.  Best regards,  Mitchell

Summary: Great hotel stay. Convenient distance for the Disneyland parks and from restaurants and fast food places. Waking distances to the stores great area. Rooms are nice staff is great. And shuttles to and from the park, drivers are nice and helpful when carrying a child and stroller
Manager Response: Hello LamBra L -  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  It was wonderful to have you stay with us and I was so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay.  I was also glad to read that you enjoyed our staff as they really do work hard to make sure that everyone enjoys their stay, and each and that is a really large focus for our team.  Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you and your family and friends in all of your visits to our fabulous Magical city.  Best regards and have a great day,  Mitchell

Summary: We stayed here with the hockey team for a tournament.  The hotel was just average.  Rooms were clean, but the beds are not very comfortable.  Service was also inconsistent in replacing shampoo and clean towels.  The lounge bar was only open until 9:30 or 10 on weekend nights we were there.   The biggest issue though is the water temperature.  Every room we had as a team never had more than warm water for the showers.  Given the abundance of choices in the area, not sure I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Plamb11 - I hope that you and your family are all doing well. I just wanted to write you a short note to say thank you for staying with us over this past year, and we hope you will be returning to us again soon. Summary Heading: Good price for a hotel near Disney...
Summary: Have stayed here at least 5 times the last year. The hotel is nicely appointed and the staff is friendly. The crew during breakfast is always spot on and helpful. The room does have a small microwave and a mini fridge/freezer.  You are about 1 1/2 to 2 miles away from the Disney gate so it is a long walk for young kids, they do sell the shuttle passes. Close to restaurants and Target if you need last minute stuff. Also very close to Joe's Italian Ice, if you are looking for some sweet treats.   Rates are usually lower than many of the hotels closer to the Park, would recommend this for a family planning a Disney trip.

Summary: My husband and I just stayed here for 3 nights on one of our Disneyland trips. I've stayed here once years ago for business so wanted to try it again with the purpose of visiting Disneyland.  We arrived around 330PM and parking was abundant. (Parking costs $12/day but was free for me as a Gold HHonors member).  Inside is a spacious lobby, dining area, and bar. The fireplace was on making it extra cozy. Lemon water was out for guests. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful with my Disneyland questions.  A Disneyland shuttle is available for $6pp/day. The shuttle picks up from the hotel every 30 minutes on the quarter hour increments (example: 815Am, 845Am, 915AM, etc.) The shuttle picks up every 30 minutes from the park on the hour and half hour (example: 9PM, 930PM,

Summary: * Clean * comfortable beds and pillows * excellent hotel staff everywhere. I recommend this hotel for business or families. Easy walking distance to just about anything you would need. Stay here very pleasant and trained staff.
Manager Response: Hello Michael - First I want to thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review for us.  I am thrilled to read that you had a very good stay, as the staff works very hard here to ensure that our customers do have an exceptional stay.  I will also let my Housekeeping Team know that you found your hotel room to be clean and comfortable, which is very important to all of us.  We receive many compliments on our staff and our rooms, and it is great to read about your rexpereince.  Please let me know if there is ever anything else we can do for you and your family in all of your travels, and I hope you will be visiting with us again soon.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: We checked in on a Friday and were in a 5th floor room overlooking Harbor Drive. Strangely, for a Hilton, we could hear road noise. Not just a little - a lot. The first night we were here we heard a lot of vehicle noise. The second night we got the vehicle noise all night and then in the morning there was a marathon passing by. The local cheerleaders were stationed in front of the hotel and they gave us a 5:30AM wake up call. The hotel should really upgrade the windows so that the rooms overlooking the busy roadway are more soundproof.  The morning $12.95 breakfast food is of ok quality. There isn't enough seating for the large hotel and there were only two servers. Those guys were running to keep up with the volume of guests.  The hotel is clean and modern. We had a microwave
Manager Response: Hello Wendy - Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of our hotel and your recent experience.  I want to first apologize to you that you did not sleep comfortably due to the noise that you experienced from the marathon that was taking place.  It was good for me to learn about the exterior noise from this event and the placement of the "cheering motivators", at that time of the morning.    I will also look into any additional noise that you experienced, on that side of the building.  I always monitor my guest concerns and comments greatly, and I want to be sure that I review your concerns with my maintenance team.  I fully understand that the breakfast area is small and can be extremely busy, but there are ways to improve that, and I hope that you enjoyed the quality of the food, as we do receive many good reviews on the quality.  Our wait staff and our chefs work hard and are proud of what they do, which is fantastic to be able to tell our clients.  Thank you so much for acknowledging our staff and our clean hotel, as we are always working on ways to improve our service and we do listen to our customers feedback.  Please contact me direct when you are ready to make your next reservations and when your travels bring you back to the area.  I would like for the opportunity to meet you and your family in person.      Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary Heading: Still a great place in the Anaheim area
Summary: We spent 4 nights here while visiting Disneyland in December.  We decided to come back because our first stay was so good.  I still find the rooms to be very clean and comfortable.  For a family of 4, we had plenty of room for all of us and our luggage.  The staff is still very friendly and always willing to help.  The only complaint that I have is the parking.  The parking is always very full and it is hard to find a spot to park when coming back from the parks.  It seems the lot for the Garden Inn is the smallest between the 3 hotels that share the area.  Not sure there is anything the hotel can do about that, but just be aware if you have a vehicle while traveling.
Manager Response: Hello ute4lyf -   Thank you for taking the time out o your busy day to write a review in regards to your recent stay at our Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove.  I was glad to read that you had a very enjoyable stay and that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable.  We are very proud of our staff as well as I always say in my responses as to how hard they work and care about providing great guest satisfaction.  Parking is something that I will be working on as an issue.  I think that some of the issues revolve around not having the proper or even enough signage that protects our parking from other visitors that may be in the area as we cannot share these spaces with the other hotels in the area, and I want to thank you for mentioning that in your review.   Again, thank you so much for staying with us and I do hope that I will have the opportunity to meet you in person during your next visit to our fabulous hotel and the surrounding areas.  Best regards,  Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Summary: This was not our first stay at this hotel.  I gave it two stars because the staff was really friendly and i agree the beds are comfortable as well as the pillows.  But the biggest disappointment was how dirty the hotel lobby was, the thread bear towels, the slow, incomplete housekeeping service and the short staffed restaurant at breakfast.  You have to pay about $8.00 a day for parking and then find out that they really don't have enough parking directly by them.  If you drive in after 10 pm you will park in the back 40.  I realize that we stayed during Christmas week, but these problems weren't there about a year ago.  Hilton properties are generally managed quite well, but this one has fallen through the cracks like the ones in our shower.  I don't know if I would stay at
Manager Response: Dear Holtem;  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent experience.  I have to apologize for the delay in responding.  I am the new General Manager and I am first getting caught up on my reviews.  I like to personally respond to them and conduct the follow-up which caused this delay.  First I want to say thank you for returning to our hotel.   It is great to have repeat clients, as we are in the "repeat client business"f.  I am glad to read that you found the staff to be friendly and the bedding comfortable.  I have made certain goals for our hotel, and one is never to have rooms that are not ready for our customers, purchase correctly, and improve staffing in areas that need the help.  These are things that I consider critical to any well run operation, and I can assure you that our team is up to the task.  Once again, thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to complete our survey and for allowing me to do something positive about this situation.   Please also contact me direct when you are ready to make your next reservation, as I would like to personally make sure your future accommodations are perfect.     Have a great day -   Mitchell Hirschman General Manager

Breakfast was great, room service was great and the hotel staff was knowledgeable, friendly and accommodating.

Summary: I am still in Anaheim for Disneyland. The customer service of the hotel is very poor. Beds are dirty and no tea/coffe pouches in the room with the coffee machine. I have never seen such customer service from Hilton.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim was friendly and accommodating. The property is clean and quiet, and the rooms are comfortable, but small. There is a shuttle available to Disneyland (for approximately $6 per person), but our group opted to just walk the mile and a half or so. Right across the street there is a Bucca di Beppo, which was able to seat our large group right away on a Sunday night. The fruit infused water and welcome bars are always a hit! This HGI delivered on all of their promises.

No tablespoons.  Way too many options in this neighborhood.

Summary: I have stayed at Hilton Garden Inn's in other cities and I always look for them when i travel.  However, I won't be staying here again.  Pros:  Excellent Customer Service as always from the Front Desk.  The shuttle bus drivers were also very friendly and helpful.  Clean and Comfortable Rooms - beds and pillows are soft.  Cons:  Bathrooms have no exhaust fans so any funk is stuck unless you leave the door open.  Hilton shares their shuttle bus (which cost me $60 for 3 days for 3 adults and a child).  The bus was often near full before it ever got to our hotel since it stops at two other hotels first.  Hilton charges $150 a night than makes you pay more to use the shuttle but doesn't even have its own bus?  This is particularly bad if you have to run to make the bus late at night
Manager Response: none

Hot water was not very hot.

Conveniently located, I liked the multi functional chargers they had in the rooms for many different electronic devices.i haven't slept that well in a long time. thank you for a great stay!

Summary: Highly recommend this property.  Staff greeted me by name at each encounter.  The propert was always clean.   Nothing fancy, but everything that makes it comfortable being away from home.  Only negative is the lack of in-room safes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights the staff was always very helpful & friendly, clean and comfortable rooms, nice pool and hot tub, liked that towels were set out and you could see workers taking care of the area.   Hotel was busy but not crowded, and no issues with noise (unlike next door with a sports tournament going on). Kids ate free for breakfast with each paid adult, food was very good. The lobby is so pretty and comfy, like that they have coffee & flavored water out and kids liked the treats.   Fitness center was small. Used the business center to print boarding passes, very easy & they had nice equipment.  Overall a very good stay, great value, would recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a beautiful hotel and centrally located in the heart of town. I had such a great explaining that I'm Planning my next try for July. This time I may do more to take advantage of the great amenities.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was great , no complaints. Everyone working there was super helpful and nice. Great location in regards to Disneyland. The shuttle to the park was great and was a great price as well. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay we will be back!!!
Summary: Had a wonderful visit clean room . STAFF WAS SO GREAT. Breakfast was Great and Priced Perfectly we ate there everyday so many options and the wait staff was so helpful I have a gluten allergy and he was so knowledgeable and caring. Will definitely be back couldn't ask for a better place to stay. And I'm tuff to please 😁..
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend and I checked in around 2am in the morning on a Friday morning and Jim was the most upbeat person I could have imagine for 2am. The only thing we wanted after a long drive (from Arizona) was to get into our rooms and go to sleep. He was so great at making sure we were checked in in a timely manner and he treated us well. He talked to us in a way where we wanted to stay and listen, and we did (for being 2am). Again, he was the most patient, caring, and respectful individual I have met, especially in his line of work and at that time in the morning. Please do what you can to take care of him as an employee for Hilton. In addition, Jose Martinez was our server for three mornings in a row and we were beyond grateful every morning to be with him. He treated us well,
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean and neat. Comfortable bed. Internt was great. Breakfast was fantastic. Staff were polite and very helpful. Transportation from the hotel to the disneyland was easy and fast. i would recommend this hotel to anyone. We enjoyed out stay very much.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The queen-size beds were comfortable for my whole family. The refrigerator was large and cold enough for drinks and leftovers. The shower was nice with good pressure. The staff was very courteous. (My only minor complaint: We asked for a couple of extra pillows, but they were never delivered.) We used the ART shuttle for Disneyland. The closest stop was a short walk away. We were there during D23, but the hotel was very quiet and the shuttle was quick and easy. Oh, I almost forgot: the pool was nice. My kids loved it. I would definitely recommend the Hilton Garden Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great customer service throughout the stay had by myself and travel companion.   I would stay at this hotel again and you should too.   Close to many restaurants and a quick ride to the beach and other attractions.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The manager and staff @ this Hilton Garden Inn location were superb!  Extremely friendly and customer focused.  Enjoyed the service provided by the breakfast staff!   Rooms are a bit smaller than newer HGI properties.  Would definitely stay at this property again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family stayed at this hotel a couple of weeks ago. We were travelling with make a wish for our daughter who is on chemotherapy. Everything was fantastic about our stay there. Front desk staff were very friendly right from the start. The shuttle bus was basically right out the door to take us to Disneyland which was about a 10 minute ride away. The only complaint I have was that at Disney's closing time there was only one bus picking people up every 1/2 hour. Room was comfortable and very clean. Breakfast was amazing with made to order hot breakfast. We had ours included in our package, so I'm not sure if that is the norm. I would like to acknowledge the breakfast staff. They were very attentive and polite even when run off their feet. The pool was a good size and the hot tub
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Room was unacceptable condition and noisy
Summary: We were very displeased with the condition of our room.  There was a hole in the wall above the light switch in the bathroom, many large scuffs/black marks along the walls, peeling paint, and black scratches along the outside of the bath tub.  I definitely wouldn't return to this hotel. The only thing decent was the hotel lobby and the restaurant breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice Garden Inn....not really a new place but nicely appointed rooms with very large flatscreen TV. Modern furniture and plenty of outlets including USB ports near the bed.  Decent workout room with 2 treadmills and an elliptical, but no recumbent. Outdoor pool and hot tub on site and the usual made to order breakfast buffet. Very friendly staff and good parking situation.   If you don't like kids, stay away because there were a ton of them here visiting Disneyland which is maybe a mile away. There us a free shuttle bus that runs all day to the park....but hey, kids are so cute when they are excited to see Micky!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk went out of their way to be helpful. The room was nice. My only complaint was that the bathroom needed a vanity/storage area & the shower head wasn't adjustable for pressure (felt like little needles),but other than that I really enjoyed the stay. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel about 25 times and have never once been disappointed, from the friendly staff to the room, breakfast, and overall experience this Hilton Garden Inn is consistent and high quality.  I travel 30-40 times a year and this hotel is always top notch.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very comfortable. Breakfast was very good and the front desk employees were fantastic.  Every one of them made our stay more enjoyable.  A big shout out to Mark Morihiro....you made us feel like family.  Thank you for being very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A bit away from Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: We could not get into any of the primary big hotels for Natural Products Expo West - so we opted for this smaller hotel about a mile away.  Clean, easy check in, small but serviceable fitness center and walkable to events.
Manager Response: none

Summary: have returned to this hotel for business trips for the past 5 years because of the friendliness of the staff and the quiet location which is important. We have also used the conference facilities which are good with the staff being helpful setting up and providing lunches, etc of excellent quality. Breakfasts are good but as a vegetarian, dinner is hit and miss for choice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My first stay here was not that great. Room faced the street and made it hard to fall asleep.  However after finding basically nothing in Anaheim near Disney we decided to stay here. Great front desk staff as always. Room was extremely comfortable and quieter!   Our parking pass flew out of the car at Disneyland and the front desk agent replaced it with no questions asked!! He also made sure to let us know to take advantage of the shuttle which we ended up doing.   Upon check out, desk agent was just as great. Asked us if we needed directions or maps to local attractions as well.  I'm glad we had a better experience and would definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a two day visit to Disney with family and we were completely exhausted the first day. It was great to arrive to a fast and welcoming checking. The front desk staff was great and provided excellent customer service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sons basketball team participated in a tournament in Westminster and our organization reserved 30 rooms. The hotel did a great job of keeping us close together and the staff was great. The rooms, grounds, pool and bar were all clean and inviting. The only drawback was the restaurant/bar. I don't think they were sufficiently staffed for a sold out hotel of this size. At one point on Saturday evening the wait for food was an hour. The one waitress they had was a little overwhelmed and her attitude started to border on rude ( not acceptable ). Once it arrived the food was very good though. The bar ran out of juice. I always think that's poor planning. Overall the visit was pleasant and when I go back to the Anaheim area I would definitely stay there again. The only reason they
Manager Response: none

Summary: A very nice, modern, clean hotel. Easy access to all of what's around Disneyland in Anaheim. Check was especially rewarding. The hotel gave us the option to pick a room and checkin the day before checkin time. It eliminated the need to arrive late in the day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay here couldn't be any better! We were able to check in a little early with a gentleman that was filling in from the Hampton inn next door. I don't remember his name but the check in process was quick and smooth and he was very nice and informative.  The second night we chose to eat at the restaurant at the hotel. The food was delicious and the service was excellent! He had a great personality and was full of great energy. Thank you Joel!  The following morning we had breakfast at the hotel. The food was great and the morning crew was excellent. Jose served us and did a fantastic job! He is very informative and knowledgable about the area. He also had a great personality!  The rest of the staff we encountered were very friendly and welcoming! Always with smiles on their
Manager Response: none

Summary: ... the hallways and elevators are always hot (speaking of temperature) + the exercise room needs a good amount of improvement. That room needs to double in size and have several more exercise equipment added to it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel staff was friendly and helpful. I was extremely please to find a regular bed as opposed to the sleep number bed.  I typically shy away from HGI because the last three "sleep number" beds have had issues and I end up in a hole somewhere on the bed.  The breakfast was good and the rooms were quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff is very friendly and accommodating!  Location to Disneyland, beaches and Orange County airport is perfect.  The rooms are quiet and very clean.  The pool area is small but clean and a fence provides privacy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed here many times as we come to Anaheim for volleyball tournaments.  Great location, clean, easy parking, nice small lobby restaurant.  Really it is the ease with this hotel.  You can walk to stores, restaurants and coffee houses, so you just park your car and relax.  Love this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel met or exceeded my expectations.  It was easy to get to, plenty of food choices near by and the shuttle to the parks was both cost effective and very punctual.  Staff was great and really can not say anything bad about our stay.  Would certainly stay at this property again if making a trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of my top hotels near Disneyland
Summary: This is an absolutely great hotel and we had a wonderful stay. Check in was easy and engaging. Our room was clean and comfortable. We stayed here to visit Disneyland and took advantage of the shuttle provided at a fee, this is a third party company that shuttles the three Hilton hotels that are on property. The shuttle does fill up quickly but they have them going frequently.  The small refreshments in the lobby are a nice welcome and always caught my husbands eye. Although we didn't indulge in breakfast or evening drinks it seemed as if people were enjoying themselves. The lobby has recently been remodeled and it looks beautiful, very inviting and comforting.  I can not say enough nice things about the staff. On a day when it hit 100 degrees the Frond Desk MOD could clearly see
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide us with such detailed feedback. We always love hearing great things about our staff and will ensure that your words of praise are passed along. We pride ourselves in providing the highest caliber of guest service and it sounds like your needs were correctly anticipated. We look forward to having you stay with us again for your next Disneyland venture!

Summary: Just around the corner from Anaheim Convention Center. Very clean and like 99% of all Hilton's they treat you right and have everything you need for a great stay. Hotel staff were awesome and helped with transportation and had snacks and cofee all the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of our property. We are glad you were able to enjoy our clean rooms and helpful staff. We will pass along your words of praise and anticipate your return!

Summary: Very nice and clean hotel very close to Disney. Breakfast was very good and the service at the hotel was great. You can walk to many restaurants in the area with ease and it is a safe area to walk. Only issue I had was the hot water wasn't as hot as I am used to but that may just how it is in California because I have had the issue at other hotels in California. I would absolutely stay at this hotel again for business or on a family vacation
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and will look into our hot water and make sure it is working properly. We are pleased that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location and safe neighborhood. We also thank you for recommending our hotel to your friends and family. We hope to see you again for your next Anaheim venture!

Summary: Very friendly staff who went out of their way to make our stay a pleasant one.  I Recommend this hotel for families that are visiting the are for Disney.   The rooms very very comfortable in which we were able to sleep 3 plus a baby in a crib without feeling cramped in the room.  Good breakfast where they make cook to order pancakes, waffles, and omelettes  although I didn't have to pay due to some courtesy free breakfast passes.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us! We are pleased that you highly recommend our hotel and we will pass along your words of praise to our wonderful staff.  We hope to see you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disney/So Cal Resorts
Summary: Loved this hotel. Great staff, night manager was extremely helpful with some questions I had. Great location, nice inexpensive shuttle to Disney. Convenient Restaurant right in the lobby. Nice pool too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of your stay! We are glad you were able to take full advantage of our great staff and convenient location. We will also pass along your words of praise to our night staff. We hope to see you back in the future.

Summary: I should start by saying, there is nothing wrong with this place, all and all, it was a good room for my family to stay. It was clean, had a fridge, Kuerig,  large TV (42 in), and located in a decent location. As for the negatives, it was a little further on the outskirts or the Disneyland area than I prefer to be; parking was $12 a day, and the bath/shower was a bit aged. On this trip, i used points so i don't know what the regular cost is, but I'd stay again for the right price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback. It sounds like you and your family enjoyed your stay with us! We are glad that you were able to make good use of our clean rooms, large TV and convenient location. We hope you will choose to stay with us in the future and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Rooms are remodel, plenty of USB for your convenience.  Breakfast were great but the area is small so plan on being there early so that you can get good service.  They now charge for parking which is not bad considering that you can walk to Disneyland or you can purchase a all day round trip ticket to Disneyland for $5.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We greatly appreciate your taking special note of our newly remodeled rooms, delicious breakfast and convenient shuttle transportation. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: I was not able to get FREE wifi and my shower curtain needed to be retired, the top ring hole area torn.Did not like parking fee. At the end when I checked out there was an additional fee I was not aware of so I called them and they stated its an inceident fee that will be put back if everything checked out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback. We greatly appreciate your consideration and we will make sure to inform our front desk and housekeeping of these issues. We apologize that our front desk did not explain our hotel's incidental policy and we will make sure this does not happen again. We hope you will give us another chance, we look forward to an opportunity to redeem ourselves.

Summary: Our family had a great 4 night stay, room was great, staff was super friendly and helpful.  We would stay again.  They are just a few blocks from Disneyland.  We took the shuttle to and from Disneyland each day.  Never had to wait more than 20 minutes for the shuttle and all the drivers were super friendly, even with strollers and cranky kids.  Food at the hotel was also good.  Much better than the free complimentary breakfasts that usually have cold eggs/pancakes that you have to wait inline for 10 minutes.  While there breakfast was not free, it was good food, great selection and no wait.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed our convenient shuttle transportation and helpful front desk staff. We will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our staff.

Summary: This was my first time staying at the Hilton Garden Inn.  Pulling up out front didn't have a big curb appeal, but the inside was clean and had a modern feel. I was impressed. The staff was super friendly and welcoming. The rooms were recently updated and are well appointed. I slept so well I had to check the brand of mattress.   Breakfast was a little confusing. It was half walk up buffet and half sit down and order from a waiter (maybe because the kitchen was small). It had your basic staples and also cooked to order omelettes.   I would definitely recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation of our property. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are pleased that you enjoyed our clean rooms and recently updated look. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: Used Hhonor points to stay here. For the amount, got a pretty good deal. Parking fee was waived. Place was clean. One of the only issues I had was the noise of screaming and crying children during the morning hours. It would seem that someone's kids wasn't going to Disneyland that day. Sunday night after park closing and trying to get to sleep, someone in the room that shares the wall nearest to the headboard was hitting the wall. I was too tired (17 hours walking) to complain to the front desk, the beds being so comfy didn't help me trying to get up and pick up the phone. The service was good, the cleaning staff was ontime. The front desk personnel was knowledgeable, (they knew they couldn't sell disney tickets at any discount. Beware of those offering discounted tickets. Only
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of our hotel. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are pleased that you were able to enjoy our helpful staff and convenient location. Thank you again for your loyalty and we look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: This is a great hotel with a very central location to many restaurants and target is right across the street. My family loved how it wasn't packed with kids running all around considering Disneyland is right up the road. The staff is great, from the check in to housekeeping everyone was very pleasant. Thank you for such a great memorable stay. We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of our property! We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and we will pass along your words of praise to our amazing staff. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: Mark Morihiro was fantastic in helping our basketball team book, make adjustments to, and finalize our accommodations. Next time we are here for another tournament, we won't stay elsewhere. Team breakfast at the meeting rooms was A++ and a really nice perk.  Will be returning 10/16 for another tournament, will be staying at the same hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to book with us! Mark never hesitates to exceed guest expectations and we are lucky to have him on our team. We look forward to having your team stay with us again and we thank you for your positive feedback.

Summary Heading: Most Excellent Family Vacation at Disneyland
Summary: The Hilton was a wonderful hotel and very accommodating for a group of 15, which included 4 little ones under 3. Everyone at the Hilton was helpful and kind..we will definitely be returning on our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us! We are pleased that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back again for your next vacation!

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for 2 nights just myself and my wife. Room was clean, breakfast was good and the staff was very friendly and hard working. The hotel is close to Disneyland and there was a shuttle that had rides to and from the park all day. 5 bucks per person, not bad at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback of our hotel. We will make sure to pass along your words of praise to our hard-working breakfast staff. We also appreciate you taking special note of our convenient location and clean rooms.

Summary Heading: Good location. Good for business too.
Summary: Nice business class hotel with bar and full service restaurant. Ample parking. Comfy beds. Rooms remodled with 40 inch tvs and ample power plugs for all your devices. Clean and friendly staff. Would recommend and stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation! We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn is a very nice hotel, with very comfortable beds, excellent room service and shuttle to Disneyland (for a fee). The room was clean and we received extra towels when requested. We ate at the restaurant for dinner and had a great meal at a fair price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback of our hotel. We greatly appreciate your praise and will pass it along to the rest of our staff for you. You can count on us!

Summary Heading: Good quality hotel with convenient access to Disneyland
Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn was a pleasant place to stay while visiting Disneyland. We stayed on the 6th floor, and the room was quiet. The room was clean, and the beds comfortable.  The cooked-to-order breakfast was a nice touch (and free to Gold members), with friendly and helpful wait staff.  While it would be nice to stay closer to the park, the shuttle was generally just a 7-8 minute trip. Great value for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving such great feedback. We always love when our guests have a great stay with us! We are pleased you enjoyed our breakfast and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: I stay at Hilton properties whenever I travel, which is often.  This location is not a bad one, just not to the standards to which I am accustomed.  The property is clean, staff is friendly and the proximity to all of the attractions is superb.  Make sure you ask upon check-in about the breakfast coupons and if you quality for them as breakfast is not complimentary.  One day I fixed myself a bowl of oatmeal and had coffee and cranberry juice.  I was not feeling well and ate one bite of the oatmeal and simply could not eat it.  I told the service staff that I just wasn't feeling well an could not eat.  I was still charged the full amount for the breakfast.  Happy Hour is a nice benefit and the fresh baked cookies at night are fantastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We greatly appreciate your kind words in regards to our clean property and friendly staff. We apologize that your experience with our breakfast restaurant was less than perfect and we hope you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves. We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Well priced comfortable hotel that is clean and well kept with nice sized rooms and comfortable beds within short distance to Disney.  Shared bus for minimal fee takes you to Disney.  However, have breakfast elsewhere.  Food is generally cold, poorly prepared and restaurant more than not totally understaffed and overwhelmed.  Suggest you try CoCos across the street or Denny's across from Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough feedback of our hotel. We greatly appreciate your consideration in choosing to stay with us! We apologize that your experience in our breakfast area was less than perfect. We are constantly improving and hope you will give us another try in the future!

Summary Heading: This is a very friendly and welcoming hotel.
Summary: We love this hotel because they go out of their way to welcome you. They went through a total renovation last year and the only reason I don't go 5 stars is because the upgrades aren't great. The bathrooms are sloppily updated and seem old and there is still cottage cheese ceiling. Otherwise beds are comfy, staff is excellent and love the constant free water, coffee or evening cookies. The rooms aren't awesome but they are clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback. We are continually improving on our recent renovation and we appreciate your input. We also appreciate you taking special note of our comfy beds and excellent staff. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Favorite hotel when I visit CA
Summary: I'm a Hilton Honors Gold member.  I've been to many Hilton brand hotels and this one never disappoints.  I've been to Southern CA a few times over the last month, and I always stay here.   Here are a few things, in my opinion, that make this hotel good: 1) They always have made to order breakfast if you want. 2) They have flavored coffee creamers.  Many hotels discontinued,  they haven't.  A big plus. 3) They always have fresh cookies available at night when you return from working all day. I always stay here, and will continue when I return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind consideration and loyalty! We appreciate you taking special note of our delicious breakfast and tasty coffee creamers. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located to Disneyland. The rates were reasonable, even for a last-minute booking.  The rooms were extremely clean, smelled amazing, and the staff was very friendly. We were very pleased with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We also greatly appreciate you taking note of our convenient location and reasonable rates. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: I read past reviews and was a little hesitant to stay here because of the bad reviews. I have nothing but good things to say about this hotel. I arrived around 11:00am and was feeling sick so I asked to see if I could check in early and they had a room for me. The front desk was very helpful. I ate at the restaurant for dinner and breakfast and was pleased with the service selection and value. The staff at the restaurant were very helpful and nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We greatly appreciate your consideration and hope to see you back again for your next Anaheim venture!

Summary: This was our 4th trip to this hotel. We like the proximity to Disneyland and nearby restaurants. What keeps us coming back are the staff. Mark, Jose, Manuel, Nevin, (I think I remembered everyone's names!) are friendly and genuinely care. The breakfast can be a bit crazy, but it is made to order and far more relaxing than the buffets at other hotels where you get nearly elbowed while finding a table or reaching for a pancake. The only negative is the parking -- it can be a bit taxing to find a spot at 1am after Disneyland closes and everyone heads back to the hotels. But overall, we will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your valued feedback! We appreciate you sharing your experience and we are pleased that it was a positive one. Thank you for your understanding about our breakfast area. Although it is delicious, I know it can get pretty busy from time to time. We will share your parking experience with our staff and hopefully have a constructive solution during your next stay with us. We look forward to having you and your family back again soon!

Summary: This is a standard Hilton Garden Inn hotel. Conveniently located very closely to the parks - you can't walk there but it's a 5 min drive! They offer shuttle service to Disneyland ($5 per guest) that leaves every 30 min. Downside- Paid hotel parking.  Good breakfast and great staff!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We appreciate you taking special note of our convenient location and tasty breakfast. We will also make sure to pass along your positive comments to our staff. We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again!

Summary: At our arrival the receptionist was very friendly and helpful to give us informations we needed. The room was spacious and clean. WiFi was available in the room. Breakfast was good. Next door to the hotel there was a stop of the Disneyland shuttle. The Orange outlet center is also within a 5 min driving distance. Alltogether a recommendable hotel in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving such great feedback! Our housekeepers do a great job of keeping our rooms clean and we appreciate you recommending our hotel to others. We also appreciate you taking note of our delicious breakfast and convenient amenities. We look forward to your next Anaheim trip!

Summary: We had a wonderful visit.   Service was impeccable with a clean comfortable room and I love the bed.  The fresh coffee in the lobby was a treat we enjoyed many times.  We will be back!  Loved the secluded patio area just outside the bar.   We strongly recommend that you stay here.  Close to everything!
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback! We greatly appreciate the opportunity to have you as our guest and we are pleased that your enjoyed our comfortable beds and clean rooms. We also thank you for recommending our property to others.

Summary: Stayed at Hilton garden inn garden grove for 2 weeks and had no dramas. The place is very close to the Anaheim convention centre and Disneyland, either by walking or bus.     About an hour by bus+train away from universal studios/ hollywood. The staff there was also helpful and friendly. Will definitely stay here again in the future if I decide to go to Blizzcon again(anaheim convention centre).
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We greatly appreciate your feedback and We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We will pass along your words of praise to our helpful staff and we look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Unfortunately once one gets beyond the lobby, it is clear to see this is a high traffic and tired hotel. After some research, I decided on this hotel for my family due to write up that the hotel was newly renovated, however our room was not properly cleaned with musty pillows and bed coverings and the bathroom was already showing a lot of wear for a 'new renovation'. My family and I are travelling back through Garden Grove to stop over at Disneyland on the way nack home and I have already set up my reservations at the nearby Sheraton...
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay with us was not perfect. There is never an excuse for a "tired" seeming room. We hope you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Please give us a call when arranging your next trip into the Anaheim area. We greatly value your consideration and thank you for your feedback.

Summary: The hotel staff was wonderful and helpful. The room was clean. Breakfast was cook to order with some buffet items, we all enjoyed breakfast. When we got back too late, we ordered room service which was good tasting and fast. Overall, it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving such great feedback. We are pleased that you have enjoyed our delicious breakfast and clean rooms. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great location with a very nice staff!
Summary: For this trip, I stayed with a friend in this hotel because it was within a reasonable driving distance from Disneyland and it was be on the route for the ART bus to take me from my hotel location to Disneyland for the half marathon. It is within walking distance to Disneyland but it’s a little over a mile and I wouldn’t do it if I had children. We did take an Uber from Disneyland to our hotel after the race and it was about $10 since the hotel is right down the street.  The hotel is right across the street from a Bank of America, Del Taco, and a dessert place. The Target is the next block over so it’s extremely convenient if you needed to go pick up items you had forgotten to purchase. There is a hotel gym but I didn’t look at it much and I know the hotel has a bar and
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We are pleased that you have enjoyed your stay and will pass along your words of praise to our staff. We also appreciate you taking special note of our convenient location and comfortable amenities. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed over Halloween weekend and had a less than average stay. I would not return, but  I guess it all depends on what you are looking for. We simply wanted a clean, safe, convenient place to stay - we were gone from early morning to late night being at the parks.  A few things prompted the poor rating.  See below.  Pros Close to Disney and Knott's Berry Farm and restaurants  Relatively safe area  Cons - Poor management - very strange attitude - didn't give us paid for breakfast vouchers until we asked at check-in (after handed us keys and dismissed us from counter) and it took forever - acted like we were trying to get something for nothing.  They seem really concerned with penny pinching - from breakfast buffet to condition of rooms.  - Breakfast buffet (pay for either
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your past stay with us. I always appreciate hearing from our guests – including places of improvement. I apologize that the comfort of your stay was interrupted and I have taken your comments to our team to ensure that in the future we do a better job of welcoming you as our guest. The next time you have the opportunity to travel to the area, I hope that you will be our guest again.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Guest Relations Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Garden Grove for business.  It was close to many restaurants and convenient for my meetings.  The thing that stood out for me was the service.  There are two girls who work behind the front desk in the morning and Mark who was there in the afternoon who specifically made me feel very welcome.  When you travel constantly, nothing stands out, but these three made my stay extra special and I would definitely come back here or recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments on our service! We take pride in helping our guests and I'm glad you had a great experience. We hope to see you next time you are in town for business. Best regards, Mark Morihiro Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim/Garden Grove over a busy weekend. When we left, we accidentally left our pillows we had brought from home in our room. I called the next day after we checked out and the housekeeping staff had turned them in. The front desk staff offered to mail them back to our home address (we paid but they sent out the shipment) — the whole process was hassle-free!  We really appreciate that the staff took great care of us while we were there and great care of our belongings when they were mistakenly left behind. The rooms were also clean with complimentary Wi-Fi that wasn't horribly slow like some other hotels we've stayed at. As far as complaints, they're minor: We wish our bathroom had a fan and that there was a safe in the room (we did not ask
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and detailed feedback. We greatly appreciate the opportunity to have you and your friends stay with us and we hope to have them back again for your next vacation! We will pass along your words of praise to our front desk and anticipate your arrival!

Summary: I was here for a conference. I chose this hotel because of its convenience to my meeting, price, and previous reviews. The dinner menu was limited but probably because of all the private restaurants nearby. The breakfast selection was excellent. My room was quiet, clean except for a hair I found in the sink. I would rate my experience as pleasant and would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing our hotel. We greatly value your feedback as well and appreciate you taking special note of our convenient location and delicious breakfast. Thank you again for your kind recommendation, we will pass your words of praise along to our staff. We hope to see you back again soon for your next Orange County business venture.

Summary: Last time we went to Disneyland for a family vacation we stayed at the Grand Californian. After a great stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in Twin Falls we decided to try it in Anaheim.   The hotel is fine, outdoor pool and hot tub area is clean, beds are okay, people are nice and the food is satisfactory. There's also a shuttle to and from Disneyland every half hour. The best part of the hotel was the bill at the end. Three nights with some F&B was less than one night at the Grand Californian.   I may try another property next time but this served its purpose and was a comfortable property with nice people and very affordable.
Manager Response: We greatly value your consideration and feedback. Thank you for taking special note of our convenient shuttle transportation and awesome value. We hope to see you and your family back again soon for your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: good rate and good staff. Need to improve in cleanliness especially in the bath tub area and the work of the air condition .  Location is great and it is so convenient to go to a go to eating place.  We are very please actually with the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We greatly value your feedback and apologize that your room was not made-up to perfection. We will pass your words of advice to our staff and hopefully rectify the issue before your next stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I had huge room all by myself. Great staff, very helpful, good and clean. Complimentary internet. The place to stay if you are with family or friends or for business. It was walking distance from most of the places that I wanted to visit. Target is just across. Convention center is also near just 2 blocks away. I would definitely recommend the place for families or business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We greatly appreciate all of your feedback. Thank you again for taking special note of our oversized clean rooms and convenient location. We hope to see you back for your next Anaheim business venture!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting the Anaheim area
Summary: My family and I truly enjoyed our last stay at this hotel.  We have stayed here many times before, but since they have completed the remodel, it is much more enjoyable.  We love the addition of the fireplace, indoor bar and beverage.  They are both true complements to the nice buffet/limited menu breakfast that they serve.  Additionally, they have done a nice job revamping the rooms so to offer some additional amenities including an extra chair to sit in and more places to charge your electronics.  One was not enough for a typical family of 4.  One con to the overall guestroom to watch out for is the footboard.  The new design makes it easier to hit your leg on it than the traditional Hilton bedframe.  It not a deterrent, just something to be mindful of.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us! Additionally, we appreciate your remarks on our renovation. The lobby and restaurant have never looked better and we couldn't be happier about our guest rooms as well. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel due to its location. We will stay here again. The room was quiet, wi-fi worked well, check-in and check-out was fast and the breakfast was wonderful. Buffet and sit down service. Omelettes were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving such detailed feedback. We appreciate you taking special note of our location and quiet rooms. Personally, I think our omelets are the best as well. We look forward to seeing you back again!

Summary: Stayed here for a week long conference.  Not a bad walk to the convention center, but a little longer than you want to be if the days are very hot.  The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable.  The rooms could use a refresh along with the hallways and elevator.  The bar/restaurant is very nice.  All in all I had a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the convention. We also appreciate you taking special note of our clean rooms and accommodating restaurant service. We hope you choose to stay with us again when traveling to Anaheim on business!

Summary Heading: Not a bad choice for Disney!
Summary: Normally I stay in the Hampton Inn, part of the "Hilton horseshoe" of hotels on Harbor Blvd about 1 mile from Disneyland.  They were recently very expensive for the weekend I wanted to go, so we tried the Hilton Garden Inn instead.  The lobby was very nice, obviously redone recently.  there is a full service restaurant but we didn't try it so I can't comment on it.  There is a pantry of items you can purchase like snacks and forgotten amenities.  The front desk staff were all very helpful and polite.  The rooms are a bit small - we just fit three of us and our luggage.  I think a family of 4 would be hard pressed in there.  The beds were comfortable and the room had a fridge, coffee maker and microwave.  The drain was broken but the next day was fixed after we reported it.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We know there are plenty of options for places to stay and we greatly value your consideration. We appreciate you taking special note of our clean lobby and comfortable beds. We also appreciate your understanding in regards to our shuttle service.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in September. A short walk to Disney. Hotel is next door to Conference centre and was full. Breakfast was excellent.Plenty of choice and special omlette and egg bar. Staff very helpful and pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We greatly value your consideration for choosing our hotel. We are pleased that your enjoyed our delicious breakfast and we will pass along your words of praise to our amazing staff!

Summary: Our room was not cleaned and I had to go find someone to get towels. Pool area had no towels and dirty towels and cups were laying around. Happy Hour waitress acted like she wanted to be else where. Glimmer of hope was Angel at the front desk. His smile and attitude were great. Would think hard before staying here again. Plus a nice pair of sun glasses came up missing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We will ensure that your praise is passed along to Angel, he never hesitates to provide top-notch service. We apologize that you did not experience a perfect stay with us. Please give us a call when considering coming back to the Disneyland area. We would like to do all we can to redeem ourselves.   Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Guest Relations Supervisor (714)620-2138

Summary Heading: Nice Stay but HORRIBLE MATTRESS ARE A NIGHTMARE!!
Summary: We were in town for a basketball tournament that was centrally located. The stay was nice but the most important part of your day getting rest was a night mare! THEIR BEDS ARE EQUIVALENT TO CEMENT BEDS!! Everything else was fine. I hope that they look into replaceing and updating their beds in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We greatly value your opinion and hope we can make this right in the future. We are glad that your stay was good overall and we look forward to having you and your family back in the future.  We will consult our bed vendor supply company and see what kind of updates are available. Thank you again for your consideration!

Summary: Quick one nighter. Has a basketball tourney just down the road and this place offered a group rate and even gave us a private room for breakfast. Clean and friendly staff. Perfect for a one night turn around.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on our clean rooms and friend staff. We appreciate your positive feedback and hope to see you and your family again soon, for your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The staff was very helpful throughout my stay at this hotel. The hotel room was very clean. The breakfast that they serve every morning is great, and is a great deal. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We greatly value your feedback and appreciate your consideration in choosing to stay with us. We are glad you have made note of our helpful staff and clean rooms. Thank you for your recommendation, we look forward to seeing you for your next Anaheim business venture.

Summary: One of the best hotels we have stayed in the area. We stayed on the 6th floor during a recent 3 day trip to Disneyland.  The room was a great size with a King size bed and room to spare.  The hotel was clean and looked almost new.  The staff was very nice and always accommodating to any small need we had.  Halls were very quiet, not a lot of noise heard from other guests. We had drink downstairs in the bar (which was a bit on the pricey side), but when your on vacation, it can be worth it! There are great restaurants and stores within walking distance. The hotel uses the PCA shuttle service to Disneyland, the hotel only sells 1 day tickets at $5 a day but in the same parking lot the Hampton Inn sell the multi-day tickets which is 2 days for $8, so we walked over there and bought
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We are pleased to be one of the best hotels in the area. We will pass along your words of praise to our diligent housekeeping staff. We appreciate you making special note of our ideal location and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: My sister, my daughter, my two grandsons and I stayed here for a long weekend visit to Disneyland last week (10/2 thru 10/4).  We LOVED the 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit.  It was very comfortable for our stay.  Not having a restaurant or a bar/lounge was a little disappointing at first, however the Hilton right out thru the pool area is so close by that it seemed like it was part of our hotel!  And they were also very accommodating there as well.  We also went to Outback right next door one night too.  I have to mention that the clientele staying here was also great too, since we left an iPAD at breakfast one day and didn't realize it until the next day - but much to our relief someone had turned it in and it was locked up safe and sound for us to retrieve.  Thank-you so much to the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are glad you and your family enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back in the future. Our clientele here is one of my favorite things about this property, our guests are the best, and we would not be here without them.

Summary: Close to all the attractions, very friendly staff, On site restaurant. Pool, Gym. Good value for the price. My son attends college nearby and staying here is easy. It has everything I could want or need in this price range of hotels. Quieter than the Embassy suites next door where I have also stayed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We strive to provide the best possible service and it sounds like we have succeeded. I will pass along your words of pray to our friendly staff; they never hesitate to exceed guest expectations. We are pleased that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Consistent, Clean, and Great Customer Service
Summary: As a Hilton Diamond member commenting, you can't go wrong with a Hilton Garden - consistent, clean, nice rooms with comfortable beds, and often a great location.  This hotel is very convenient to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland!  You might not find this to be a "luxury hotel" with the fancy lobby and architectural design... but you WILL find a great group of employees and management who are friendly, helpful, and provide great customer service.  At the time of our stay in mid-Aug. 2015, many kudos to Angel, Margaret, Hassan, and Lisa!
Manager Response: Firstly, we thank you for your loyalty as a Diamond Member. Secondly, we greatly appreciate your consideration in staying with us and the feedback you have provided. We thank you for your compliments on our clean rooms, great location, and comfortable beds. We will pass along your words of praise to Angel, Margaret, Hassan, and Lisa; they always do a great job of exceeding our guest's expectations.

Summary Heading: Excellent property - my favorite in 11 years
Summary: This is a newly renovated and very fresh property. I've been here mostly for business but also brought my family, friends, and many business associates. They have all loved the amenities, the friendliness of the staff, and the look of the hotel. Every room has a large TV, the food is very good in their restaurant, and this place focus's on the little things. It's close to Disneyland and many other places. For the price you get more value than you would expect. I've been a very frequent guest of the property for a reason and it will continue to be my favorite. If I had to give names of individuals who have gone above and beyond I would say Martha M, Mark M, & Judee F. They have made the experience great along with many others whose names I have forgotten. Thank you to the
Manager Response: From everyone here, a big "Thank you," to you Ryan. We greatly appreciate your review and will definitely pass along your praise to our Sales team and helpful staff.  We couldn't agree with you more in regards to the value of our rate. We always do everything we can to ensure every detail has been taken care of. We can't wait to see you back again soon!

Summary: We booked 4 rooms the weekend of 9/19. The rooms were all nice and clean. The staff was very nice. When we arrived we got two water bottles. You must pay for parking . The pillows are very soft so you might want to bring your own pillows. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We greatly value the feedback you have provided. We thank you for your compliments on our clean rooms and accommodating staff. As a Garden Inn brand, we always strive to provide the best possible service with a comfortable  atmosphere. We hope to see you back again soon for your next family vacation!

Summary: My room was ready before the check in hour. Staff was helpful and full of energy. love the complementary drinks they had to offer. At check out time we asked for a late check out and they gladly agreed i will definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We will pass along your words of praise to our helpful, energetic staff; they never hesitate to exceed our guest's expectations. Also, I'm glad that we were able to accommodate a late check-out for you. It sounds like you had a lot of fun and we can't wait to have you back again for more!

Summary: All in all this is a very average hotel. Decent price and the customer service was okay when we needed it although we didn't need much assistance. While it is definitely not within walking of Disneyland, my group and I were prepared for that. We weren't prepared for the fact that we would be paying $12 a night for parking (this was not explained when we checked in but we might have missed it somewhere on the website when we booked so I won't fault them for that) and that the parking was shared between three hotels and a restaurant and at one point we were unable to find parking. So we were paying for it but couldn't find a spot. If you're paying for something, it should be guaranteed. I'm also extremely disappointed with the fact that the room we were staying in has been paid
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us! We thank you for your compliments on our rates and customer service. We understand that you ran into an issue with billing. We hope it has been resolved since this post. To redeem ourselves, please let us know when booking your next trip to our area. We would like to do all we can to correct this experience for you.  Best regards,  Hiren Patel (714) 620-2137

Summary: Upon our late return our kids were thirsty and hungry for snacks and the Night Manger Jim was amazing!!! He was extremely attentive and hilarious.  He had my kids laughing from start to finish.  Every night during our stay my kids made it a point to stop by and say hi to Jim.  We wish we would experience more travels like this everywhere we went.  Whomever says different of his obviously doesn't know what they are talking about and needs to know how to travel better.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such great feedback! We will make sure to pass along your words of praise for Jim to our upper-management staff. Jim is one of the most genuine people I have had the honor of knowing. He always has a funny joke or an interesting fact, he is extremely courteous as well.  We look forward to having you and your family back again for your next vacation!

Summary: Great location,view,clean terrific for families nice pool barbecues housekeeping really enjoyed ourselves very close to disneyland and local attractions I highly recommend this hotel for your next vacation in Anaheim. The only downside was my credit card being charged the wrong amount for my stay since i had hilton certificates and notified the hotel in advance so i would be charged the full amount at check in to max out my credit card :-( Which made my stay stressful. Other than that good place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us! We apologize for the issues with billing and thank you for your detailed feedback. Please contact us when booking your next family vacation, we would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro (714)620-2138

Summary: Night manager and front desk clerk Jim and Angel greeted us and made sure our stay was great. Wonderful hotel in the Disney area; good price, great beds, clean rooms. Great place to stay when you come to Disney. Reasonable prices, great breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on two or our finest. Angel and Jim never hesitate to go above and beyond our guest's expectations. They are always courteous and gracious to both guests and staff. We could not ask for better teammates! We look forward to your next family vacation with us, I will let Jim and Angel know their efforts are appreciated.

Summary: Air ventilation in bathroom was a loud constant rumble.  200 characters minimum so I will write 200 characters minimum over and over because I have nothing better to do, 200 characters minimum.  200 characters minimum.  Is that 200 characters yet?
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us. We understand that your stay was not perfect and we want to do anything we can to redeem ourselves. Please give us a call when planning your next trip out to our area. We appreciate your feedback, and look forward to hopefully seeing you soon!

Summary: Stayed a week at this hotel. Room was a one bedroom suite. Hotel provided a pack-n-play for my youngest and the sofa sleeper worked for the older child. Pool was nice onsite restaurant had good food but was a little pricey. It is about 1 mile south of the Toy story Parking lot for Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We find our hotel is ideal for families of up to 4. We thank you especially for taking note of our convenient location and accommodating staff. We hope you and your family will come back and stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Love Hilton properties, but will never stay here again
Summary: The night auditor/manager checked us in around midnight and was less than pleasant. Being an Assistant Hotel Manager in Las Vegas, I understand that Fridays can be rough; when I tried to make conversation to lighten the mood, he brushed me off and acted as if I knew nothing about working in a hotel (I didn't feel the need to mention to him that I am an AHM; I simply tried to converse about arrivals and when they typically date roll on a Friday night). He didn't even issue the vouchers that I was supposed to receive as a Hilton HHonors gold member. I still smiled and wished him a good night at work. He heard me and completely ignored me; he could have cared less.  We got to the room to find that our shower did not have hot water; it was lukewarm, at best. When I called to have an
Manager Response: Dear Lauren N   We are sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will give us a call next time coming into town, we would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves.   Thank you,  Hiren Patel (714)620-2137

Summary: The customer service at this hotel was really impressive.  Our party had a total of four (4) rooms; however, there was some confusion because 2 reservations had the same last name. Tesh and his manager (sorry, I didn't get your name) took great efforts to ensure that the reservations matched up and even comped us with breakfast because of the confusion.  At the breakfast room, the hot breakfast was great and our server, Jose, treated us with the utmost in hospitality - like we were guests at his home!  The rooms were clean, the common areas are well maintained, and we felt safe. There were restaurants and stores nearby.   We had an absolutely great experience at this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such great feedback. We will make sure your kind words are passed along to Tesh. He has been a great recent addition to our team. Jose is also a valuable asset to our team; he never hesitates to provide the best service possible. We thank you for taking special note of our clean rooms and well maintained common areas.

Summary Heading: great value for the money, great location
Summary: I usually stay here during business trips and this is my 3rd time here.   Pros: - Staff is generally nice and friendly. There are a few who are not that friendly but they are not disrespectful either so I just move on. These few seem like "they are just doing their job" as opposed to "loving their job".  - Dinner food at their restaurant is surprisingly very good! I have tried their salmon, the quesadilla, chicken wings and turkey club sandwich. They were all good! Heck, even the french fries, which seem very basic were great. Another great value for the money! - Location is perfect! Other dining areas are just within 1 mile away. Disneyland is also just 1 mile away. - Room is very clean. This seem to be what you should expect in every hotel but  some hotels have disappointing
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and consideration for our property. We also thank you generously for taking special note of our delicious dinner service and perfect location. We will also make sure to pass along your words of praise to our hard working Housekeeping Staff. We are lucky to have such a great team on staff. Thanks again for your feedback and we look forward to your next trip out to our area!

Summary: This was our first time to this hotel! It was newly renovated and very nice. The staff was excellent and they provided exceptional service. Breakfast buffet in the morning was great! Create your own omelets, croissants, and much more! Restaurants next door and many more within walking distance. There's a shuttle for Disneyland as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are thrilled that we made such a great first impression with you and your family. We are very grateful to have a staff that will not hesitate to go above and beyond our guest's expectations. We will make sure and give your regards to our chef; he always creates the best breakfast creations. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary: I was very impressed with the hotel. It was very clean. The staff was very friendly except for one food server, must have been having a bad morning. I did have a problem with a charge on my card and they tried to fix it but unfortunately couldn't so I got a parking fee waived and a free night for a future stay. The bank wouldn't do it so I am greatful to them for what they did do. Join the Hilton honors club they make you feel GREAT checking in with a welcome bag.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. I apologize that we weren't able to solve your credit card issue on the spot, but I'm glad that reasonable accommodation was offered to compensate for the inconvenience.
