Thank you again for your loyalty as a Hilton Honors member, we always appreciate your consideration.

Summary: I have stayed in many Hotels in the vicinity and this one has just surpassed my expectations.  My wife and I were provided with the Bed & Breakfast promotion which added a very nice breakfast buffet for only $10.00 for both of us.  The room was very clean and the staff was very, very accommodating.    Great Job Hilton !
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We hope you enjoyed your stay, and it sounds like you did. We thank you for your special note in regards to our great value and clean rooms. We hope to see you back again for your next vacation!

Summary: The room was spacious. They have a breakfast restaurant and bar. No dinner facilities. There are plenty of good restaurants in the neighborhood. Staff is very efficient, helpful and friendly. Good location and parking. Worth checking this place out
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind recommendation. Our restaurant in our lobby has been open for close to a year now and we have tons of yummy items on the menu to try. Dinner service is from 5pm-10pm with a happy hour from 5pm-7pm. We will pass along your words of praise to our staff; they truly are the best. We look forward to seeing you and your family back again soon!

Summary: It is a nice stay, good breakfast (paid extra). We love it. It is close to DisneyLand. The lobby is very pleasant and comfortable, easy Internet access. The pool is great too. The lobby staff is very nice that they let us enjoy our take out there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your details feedback and words of praise. We greatly appreciate you taking note of our delicious breakfast and unbeatable location. We also recently remodeled our lobby and we appreciate you taking notice of that as well. We hope to see you and your family back on your next vacation!

Summary: Very nice hotel, great breakfast service and good location. Parking can be an issue with limited space .  Nice lobby, looks like this hotel was refreshed lately. We would stay there again. Did not use the facilities (pool/Gym etc...)
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking special note of our great location and outstanding breakfast service. We are continually improving our pool and currently remodeling our fitness center. Hopefully all of our upgrades will be complete during your next stay with us! We hope to see you and your family back for your next Anaheim vacation.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel recently for one night.  We enjoyed a speedy check in and comfortable corner room. Enjoyed that they have a mini fridge and microwave for convenience.  Buca di Beppo in the adjacent parking lot which was great for a great quick dinner.  Quick advice though,ask for a even numbered room. We had an odd numbered room which faced the street so loud cars or bikes will be heard.   But still a really great hotel with awesome Hilton standards met!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback! We greatly appreciate your consideration in choosing our hotel. It appears that your enjoyed our plush amenities and awesome service. We hope to have you back again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Very Family Friendly, Superb for Disney
Summary: We have stopped at this location on 4 previous occasions and have stopped at many hotels in the area and still consider this the most friendly in the area.  All the staff were friendly and went out of their way to help especially Lauren at breakfast.  They were happy to arrange a late check out and ensured everything they could do for us they did.    Breakfast was good, free coffee, cookies and lemon water is a bonus.  Okay its not a stunning hotel or in the best of conditions but it is a great location for Disney.  It also has its own bus service that is timetabled and costs five dollars a day.   Hopefully we will be back again next year.    For those who like a happy hour they have one of those as well, very good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for considering our hotel "The most friendly in the area." We always take comments like that to heart, and we will pass along your praise to our wonderful staff. Lauren is a valuable asset to our team and always exceeds our guest's expectations. Thank you again for taking note of our delicious breakfast and great location!

Summary: We stayed all of the Hilton hotels in this property (Hampton Inn and Embassy Suites) and I liked this hotel. Because we went to Disneyland from very early in the morning, we only could eat their breakfast once but it was good. They have a happy hour too but we didn't participate. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful, and the lobby area is very welcoming and nice.   If you are going to Disneyland, you can get a ticket for shuttle ($5/day) but you can walk if you want to (about 4KM, 30 min walk). Especially if you want to do Magic Morning, the earliest shuttle leaves 7:15am, so it'd be too late (because you want to be there by 6:30am for 7am open!), so prepare to walk, it's perfectly fine as you are going to walk all day long in the park anyway.  The only drawback is
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us! We appreciate your time for providing such detailed feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast and clean rooms. We can't wait to have you back again for your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary Heading: Not bad but not great either
Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for our Disneyland trip mainly because everything else was booked. The Staff was great. Hassan did a great job and they were very friendly. I will say that I am a little disappointed in the house keeping staff for keeping my wife's Ray Bans that she left versus turning them in. But what can you expect, right? The rooms were not bad and they were clean. Beds were comfortable. The pool was small but most are unless you stay at one of the Disney hotels or the Howard Johnsons. I WOULD ABSOLUTELY NOT RECOMMEND THE SHUTTLE!!!!! The cost is 5 bucks a day per adult but you are not at all guaranteed a seat! Going to Disney wasn't too bad but if you wanted to come back good luck. I walked back 5 times after paying for a pass. If you did get on, you
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay with us was less than perfect. We will communicate your message to our bus company in order to better accommodate parties coming back from the park. Thank you for your great remarks on our breakfast restaurant and helpful staff. We will pass along your words of praise to our team. We hope you will give us another chance when coming back into the area. Please give us a call when planning your next Disneyland vacation, we would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Guest Relations Manager (714) 620-2138

Summary: This was slightly below par for a Hilton Garden Inn but given the tourist location it was not bad. I moved here from the Hilton nearby after a poor night due to Vidcon and was relieved to have a good stay.  My main disappointment was that they did not offer breakfast & points with my Diamond status which many HGI do. Instead I went to Roscoes Chicken for a good Southern breakfast which was fun!
Manager Response: Firstly, thank you for your loyalty as a Diamond member. We know how much you travel and we greatly appreciate your consideration in choosing to stay with us. Secondly, We appreciate your positive sentiment in regards to our location and we hope to see you back again soon for another great stay!

Summary: I stayed here several years ago and swore I'd never be back; it was really dirty and run down.  I saw they had "rejuvinated" and, becuase most Hilton Garden Inns are very nice, decided to give it another try.  They have cleaned it up substantially, but still not the same as every other Hilton Garden Inn that I have stayed in.  Seems cheap and still not all that clean.  Room was clean but the common areas need work.    The AC in our room wouldn't turn off.  I even turned the thermostat up to 78 and it kept going.  Maintenance came in the 1st night and turned the whole unit off, but never came back to fix it so we were without ac or heat the entire stay.  Luckily we weren't in the room but to sleep.  The fitness center was out of service for our entire 4 day stay.  Staff was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you encountered with your room. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Please contact us when planning your next trip to our area, we would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves.  Thank you,  Mark Morihiro Public Relations Manager (714)620-2138

Summary: A very nice, cozy and accommodating hotel. The fitness center is a little bare-bones but it's sufficient for a short stay. All you can eat breakfast was reasonably priced and quite tasty too. The internet in the room is not very good. You can use the lobby WiFi which will be acceptable but for anything you would want to do in a web browser I recommend using the Business Center in the lobby. There is a shuttle to Disney for $5. Probably cheaper to get a day pass on the OCTA Bus and ride it instead. There is no shuttle to the convention center. Need to either walk or take a bus unless you want to Uber or cab it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are pleased that you found our hotel to be "Cozy and accommodating." We are continually improving our Wi-Fi, hopefully next time you stay with us, your connection will be faster. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: July in Anaheim with no air conditioning for the first two days.   First room no air so on second day moved rooms.  Second room did not have working A/C either so maintenance finally changed out the entire A/C unit. No compensation for inconvenience even though Hilton advertising 100% satisfaction guarantee. Lobby is small and food is only average. Rooms are small and towels are rough with no robes.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We apologize that your stay with us was not as good as it could have been. I would like to make sure your next stay with us is the best. Please contact us during booking, so we may have a chance to redeem ourselves.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714)620-2138

Summary: I found this hotel to be clean, fresh in appearance, and comfortable.  I would recommend this hotel.  It was good to have a restaurant on-site and we found the food to be quite good.    No complaints.  Thank you for the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us! We always appreciate good words about our hotel. We are always improving our menu and trying to make our restaurant better, even though the food is already delicious. We greatly appreciate your consideration and value your feedback.

Summary: We so enjoyed our room with all the extras available to us. We appreciated the guest laundry and the size of the Hotel made it more family friendly. We enjoyed the Temp. control's in the room, to adjust  as we wanted it. The coffee machine in the room was great, and the added coffee in the lobby also.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your consideration in staying with us. Firstly, our Keurig coffee makers are one of my favorite brand standards. They always make the best convenient coffee. Also, our guest laundry is a nice amenity for traveling families and extended stay guests. We thank you for your praise and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: My wife was on a business trip to the area and we spent four nights at this hotel. I can’t claim that the hotel was in any way fancy but it was a good location, the staff seemed very efficient and eager to be helpful, everything appeared to be immaculately clean and there was a very nice, sheltered pool and hot tub area.  Our room had a refrigerator and microwave, a nice desk area to work, very comfortable beds and the largest flat-panel television I’ve ever seen in a hotel room. Our parking and breakfast were complementary and I would say the hotel well exceeded our expectations.  We stayed in nicer hotels on the trip but in terms of value for your money I think this hotel came out ahead of the others.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your most recent business trip. We appreciate your honest feedback and are pleased that you enjoyed our hotel. We hope to see you back again for more fun! Thanks again!

Summary: We spent a few days here and returned again after a short trip to San Diego. From the time of check in to the second we left, the staff of the hotel were absolute professionals and made our stay great. Special thanks to Hassan Torres for his professionalism. He is a true depiction of what excellence in customer service is. Also breakfast here is great. Will definitely return here in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your outstanding feedback! I will pass along your words of praise to our Front Desk Supervisor Hassan Torres, he is an essential part of our team and always takes the absolute best care of our guests. We also thank you for your compliments on our delicious breakfast and hope to see you back in the near future.

Summary: Very good overall!  Within walking distance to nice restaurants and amazing Italian Ice place!  We used the complimentary internet and lost connection several times.  We had to re-log in frequently and it was slow.  We were limited to 3 devices as well.  Would have rated Excellent if they had provided high quality complimentary internet service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback. We recently improved our wireless internet service. This is the first issue that I have heard of and we plan on fixing this right away. Please give us a call on your next trip out to our area, I would love the opportunity to make this experience right for you.

Summary: The location is fantastic but parking space is very limited and comp. service is very slow and poor. I love Hilton brand but this was a bit less than I was anticipated. I will not use Hilton Harden Inn in the future.
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay with us was less than perfect. We would like to do all we can to redeem ourselves. Please give us a call when planning your next vacation, we would appreciate the opportunity to make this experience right for you.  Hiren Patel (714)620-2137 hiren.patel@hilton.com

Summary: The room was just what the pictures showed... Linens & shower curtain could stand to be replaced, but other than that we were very satisfied.....desk clerks were helpful when we had questions!!! I would definitely stay here again!! I would recommend this hotel to friends & family....
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We are glad that you and your family had such a great time here. We are very lucky to have a great front desk team. They never hesitate to help and always do everything they can to make our guests happy. Thanks again for your recommendation for friends & family. We always appreciate your support!

Summary: Loved our stay here in Anaheim! The lobby is a very comfortable and up to date place to meet, hang out and relax. The rooms were updated and cool. The staff were friendly and always around to help customers right away! Canʻt wait to come back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback. We always appreciate praise for our newly renovated lobby. We value your consideration in choosing our property and can't wait for you to come back!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: We spent 4 nights at this hotel and found it to be a great stay.  The staff was very friendly and helpful during our stay.  The room was very clean, and was a very good size.  We had breakfast at the hotel on our last day and the food was good, and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Overall a great place to stay for a quick stop, or a longer vacation.  Will definitely stay here again and recommend to family and friends coming to the area.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you had such a great stay with us. Our friendly staff is trained based on our companies core values. Thank you for your consideration in staying with us and thanks again for the great feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you back again for your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel to get a good restful sleep
Summary: Pleasant stay at this Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim/Garden Grove, CA.  Price is good.  Room is clean and quiet.  Bed is comfortable.  We arrived late so it was welcome that sleep come easily.  Internet reception is good.  Staff is very friendly.  I would recommend this for travellers for business or leisure.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you have enjoyed our clean, quiet rooms, comfortable beds and friendly staff. Our housekeeping staff does the best they possibly can to keep our rooms clean. Additionally, we just bought brand new beds as of two months ago. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for week, as a Fathers day Daddy daughter trip to Disneyland and other attractions.  I chose this hotel based on its proximity to the Park.  The staff was welcoming and provided many helpful tips and guidance.  There was a shuttle provided to Disney.  It cost a very reasonable $5 per person.  The shuttle kept a good schedule and we rarely waited for more than ten minutes.  The hotel is near many restaurants and stores.  Target is right down the street.  The restaurant in the hotel has an excellent breakfast and a well stocked breakfast bar.  There is a decent bar in the hotel as well.  There is parking for vehicles in the lot around the hotel.  I however, did notice that many vehicles had to park in spaces that are not actual spaces.  They must have
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We also value your appreciation for our great staff, convenient locations and excellent breakfast. We are glad that you found such great accommodation with us and we look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Nice renovated property with excellent staff
Summary: I've been coming to this area for almost two decades and have stayed at many properties in this area. For the value I have picked this Hilton Garden Inn as my home base. The property is newly renovated, has large TV's, and a great staff - too many other things to list. You'll be impressed by the entry and the freshness of the entire property. I have been impressed and will continue to stay here monthly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our property to be your "Home Base." We are pleased that you appreciate our recent renovation and value your loyalty. Thank you again for your praise to our staff. They always try to go above and beyond our guest's expectations. We look forward to seeing you back again soon and we greatly appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Friendly and helpful staff, very clean room, great breakfast. So nice to have a fridge and microwave in the room. Close to Disneyland, and shuttle was only steps away from  the hotel. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We greatly appreciate the opportunity to accommodate you! We are glad that our friendly staff took care of you and it looks like you enjoyed our delicious breakfast. We hope to see you all back for your next family Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Upon arrival, the beds were dirty.  They had hair and stains in the bed sheets and it's obvious nothing was changed.  It was disgusting.  I immediately called the front desk and they apologized and ensured us this will be corrected.  I'm not being difficult, but the first thing I want is to lie down on a clean hotel bed after a long day.  Is that too much to ask?  But to have to find it dirty, call front desk, and wait for the correction, do that make it a good experience?  No.  I hope this does not happen to others.  Such a disappointment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that your stay with us was not perfect. There is never an excuse for an unclean room. We hope you will give us an opportunity to make this experience right for you in the future. Please contact me directly, I would love to help make you next stay with us as memorable as possible.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620 2138

Summary Heading: Good alternative to higher priced nirghboring hotels.
Summary: Stayed here for daughter's dance convention that was happening at the Hyatt next door. This hotel was about $60 a night cheaper than the Hyatt. It met our needs. Clean, comfortable beds. Room and hotel in general was very clean. Rooms are a bit small, we had 3 people in the 2 queen rooms and felt a bit squished. The sink and mirror are in the bathroom and that was difficult to manage 3 women and showers and getting ready for the day, but we managed. Staff was very friendly. Pool area was nice. We took advantage of the grill and there's a lovely covered area with tables. We would have preferred that the pool stayed open until 11, it closed at 10. Fitness area was small, but had a good selection of equipment. It needs a fan in there, or the ability to adjust the temperature. It
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback! We greatly appreciate your honestly a suggestions. We are currently working on having informational desktop caddy's for all of our rooms. These caddy's will have detailed information on our amenities, restaurant, pool hours and much more hotel information. Hopefully we will have them in all of our rooms when you stay with us on your next Anaheim venture. We are glad you and your team found comfortable accommodation at our property and look forward to your return.

Summary: Room was clean, accommodating us very well. The hotel is decorated very nice and has a bar, with happy hour. staff very responsive to all needs. shuttle close by. parking at the hotel was 12 bucks a day. pool was great kids had a great time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing our hotel! Thank you again for your compliments on our most recent renovation. We recently added the bar and we are glad you were able to enjoy it. We also greatly appreciate your compliments to our staff. We look forward to having you back on your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel on a busy 4th of July weekend. Although we ultimately had some trouble with the AC unit in our room on our last day, it was handled very professionally by the evening staff.  The front desk manager, "Jim", was helpful, professional, and sympathetic to our needs; which we appreciated.  The room was very large, the bed was comfortable, and the free wifi worked flawlessly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We greatly value your feedback and appreciate you taking special note of our professional staff and comfortable beds. We look forward to having you back again soon on your next vacation!

Summary: Very good, breakfast was very good, pool very clean, staff very helpful and friendly.  Clean lobby, staff very helpful finding us transportation to theme park and airport.  Room staff were very quick and through.  Quick to respond to our immediate needs (pillows, towels, toilet paper)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and consideration. We are also glad that you were able to take advantage of our delicious breakfast and helpful staff. We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: The front lobby was very welcoming and enjoyable. The pool was beautiful. The rooms were very very clean. Convenience having restaurant on site. Location was great and the price was very reasonable.  Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad you took notice of our welcoming lobby and beautiful pool. Right now is a perfect time to enjoy our outdoor patio area and pool facilities. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Good location in the Disneyland Area
Summary: I stayed here several days and had no issues whatsoever.  Good location very close to Disneyland.  Also an easy drive to restaurants and shopping.  I'm a bit fussy when it comes to beds but had no issues here..  Bed was very comfortable and slept well.  Room was clean and quiet.  No issues with service.  Front desk were very helpful.     I would highly recommend this place
Manager Response: We appreciate your consideration in staying with us. We are glad that our hotel is up to your standards. We try very hard to maintain all of our rooms and public areas. I will pass along your kind words to our staff. They always to everything they can for our guests.

Summary Heading: Business Trip to Hilton Garden Inn
Summary: Awesome experience... The room was nice and clean. The beds were so comfortable. I was so thankful . The staff was over the top. Excellent service and friendly staff. Food was great... The best time ever. I highly recommend this hotel... Close to Disneyland and activities.
Manager Response: Thank you for your outstanding feedback. We are glad that your enjoyed yourself at our hotel and took advantage of our clean rooms and comfortable beds. We train all of our staff to exceed guest expectations and it sounds like they did a great job! I will pass along your praise to the rest of my team and we look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: Loved this place.  Stayed here on a weekend trip to Disneyland and thought it was great.  Staff was helpful and very polite.  Breakfast was decently priced to other HGI breakfasts I've had and good selection of food.  Room was clean and quiet.  They don't have those adjustable mattresses that many other HGI have.  I really don't care for them since I have no desire to remove sheets and touch a hotel mattress to adjust my comfort level.  The multi use device charger in the room was awesome!  No need to pull cords from bags or the car.  Able to charge 3 devices at one time.  Great little perk!  Used the shuttle to Disney which is managed by seperate company, PCA I think.  I thought it was great.  $5 a day and not have to worry about parking.  One morning I caught the first shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We greatly value your feedback and appreciate you taking special note of our helpful staff and convenient shuttle service. We are also glad that you took advantage of those charging cables on the room phones. We look forward to seeing you back for your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: What one expects of a Hilton Garden Inn
Summary: I like HIlton Garden Inns.  This one is like the others which is very comfortable.  The room was great.  Service was great.  There's a property bus that will take you to and from Disneyland for $5 a day -- it's punctual and convenient, making the trip every half hour.  Parking was a bit tight.  There are plenty of options of places to stay near Disneyland.  All of them are filled with families with kids.  This is one of the better choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in choosing to stay with us. We appreciate you taking special note of our outstanding service and convenient Disneyland transportation. It really means a lot when guests tell us that our hotel is "one of the better choices." We try our best to maintain our facilities and train our staff to exceed guest expectations. We hope to see you back again for your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: My family and I booked this property because of the reputation they have.  This place is so overrated even at one star!  The room they assigned us first had a faulty air conditioner, the maintenance man was very nice but we had to switch rooms.  The next room had been smoked in and the smell of stale smoke and crappy air freshener was overwhelming.  The next thing we know we are cancelling the reservation and looking for another hotel on a Saturday night in Anaheim.  We almost had to cut our vacation short but luckily after two hours of searching we found a room at a great non Hilton property.  This has convinced me that I will never stay at another Hilton property again.
Manager Response: Dear Bill H,  We are sorry we were unable to provide you with the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay. We apologize for the issue with the A/C unit in your first room and will work with our maintenance team to ensure this does not happen again. Likewise, I regret the inconvenient smell you encountered in the second room. If you return to our area, we hope you will consider giving us a second chance.  Thank you,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We spent five days here and from booking to arrival everything was very slick .Having booked several months in advance we appreciated the courtesy e mail confirmation a few weeks before travel . On arrival we were warmly welcomed and were very pleased with our room and the general ambiance of the hotel . There are tea/coffee making facilities in the foyer throughout most of the day ...a bonus if you wish to meet up with friends and chat in comfort. Breakfast was good with variety of choice and pleasant waiter/ ess service. Reception staff were helpful with directions , local information ,taxi and ticket bookings. The hotel does not have a restaurant although snacks are available ---but there are several good eateries in easy walking distance.[The pool is on the small side and a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We greatly value your feedback and appreciate you taking note of our helpful reception staff and convenient location. We hope to see you again soon on your next Disney vacation.

Summary: The hotel itself was pretty good.  Nicely appointed rooms that look to have been recently remodeled.  They also had a decent breakfast buffet.  Note: More varieties of fruit would be appreciated, and the omelet guy does seem to overcook everything). There was also a small, but adequate fitness room.  Did not use the pool facilities, so no comment on them.  The location is good, with lots of restaurants nearby, and Disneyland just up Harbor Blvd.    My only real complaint is that for this size of hotel, there is not enough available parking to accommodate everyone.  On two of our three nights, when we returned about 10pm, there was absolutely no parking available.  Had to park behind the nearby Embassy Suites and walk back to the Hilton garden Inn.  The front desk did the right
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and providing such great feedback. We appreciate your honesty and are glad you enjoyed our breakfast and recently remodeled rooms. We apologize that your parking situation wasn't ideal, but we hope to make it up to you next time you're in town. Please give us a call when planning your next trip to the Disneyland area, we would love to have you back again.

Summary: My stay at this particular Hilton was not a pleasant one. The staff is very polite and helpful, but the cleanliness of the hotel is 1/5. The sheets and comforter were quite disgusting and found their way on the floor within seconds.
Manager Response: Dear Sed M,  I am so sorry you found your guest room unacceptable. Our housekeepers work very hard to keep our guest rooms clean and an unacceptable guest room is not the standard at our hotel. My sincerest apologies. I hope you consider staying with us again. We’d love to have the opportunity to redeem ourselves, next time you are in the Disneyland area.  Thank you,  Mark Morihiro Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove Reservation Supervisor (714)620-2138 mark.morihiro@hilton.com

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn is our favorite place to stay, but this one was a little lacking compared to the rest. First is was clean, but the room was a little smaller than the one's in Pismo Beach, Las Cruces, and San Antonio. There were no free happy hour drinks like at all the others we've stayed at. The staff is friendly, the breakfast was a little more expensive than others. On a scale of 1-10 of all the Hilton Gardens we've been to I would put this at a 3. Next door is the Embassy Suite, we will stay there next time. Sorry, still like Hilton Garden but this one just was standard fare.
Manager Response: First I would like to thank you for your review. I would also like to apologize that you were not satisfied with the overall accommodation at our Hilton Garden Inn Garden Grove. We strive to provide excellent service at our hotel and have the cleanest rooms in the area. In regards to the free happy hour drinks, we will definitely look into implementing that in the future. If there are any other concerns please feel free to contact me at the hotel directly.I hope that you give us another chance to show the exceptional service we can provide.  Thank you,  Hiren P General Manager

Summary: The rooms were clean and comfortable. Friendly staff. Took advantage of the breakfast in the morning. Pretty decent. Able to walk from the hotel to several restaurants like Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack, Outback Steakhouse.
Manager Response: Thank you for the time to give us a review. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We make it a point that we provide the cleanest rooms and exceptional service to all our guest. Please keep us in mind  for your next visit in the area.   Thank you, Hiren P  General Manager

Summary: Rooms are well-maintained, comfortable, and very clean. Small refrigerator, microwave, and Keurig coffeemaker make snacks easy and quick. Reasonable rate made this an excellent choice for our lodging. Staff welcoming and helpful. Greeted my grandson with a small toy, which was a great beginning to a wonderful stay. Breakfast area staff were courteous and provided terrific service. Pleasant, airy lobby is a nice place for family to gather. Fireplace provides a warm focal point for coffee in the morning. My daughter-in-law lost her earring down the bathroom drain. Maintenance technician was able to retrieve it for her. Conveniently located near Target and other stores, as well as several restaurants and fast food places. All in all, we could not have been more pleased with our
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate you taking special note of our helpful and welcoming staff. They always do anything possible to exceed guest expectations. We are glad that maintenance was able to recover your earring! We hope you choose to stay with us again next time you are in town!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for the four years my daughter has been in college in Orange.  After four years, this is my second review of the place.  It continues to be a wonderful and predictable stay every time.  They have made some upgrades this year to the rooms.  New beds and remodeling are great!  Thank you, Hassan, for continuing your outstanding customer service at the front desk.  You've always been helpful with whatever my needs.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your loyalty. We greatly appreciate your consideration when visiting this area. We will make sure to pass along your praise to our Front Desk Supervisor, Hassan Torres. He always goes above and beyond our guest's expectations. We appreciate you taking note of our recently finished renovation. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary: Convenient hotel for shuttle buses to Disney ($5 per person for the whole day, back and forth as many times as you like) there is also a steak house, burger bar, crab shack just a couple of hundred yards away.  The hotel rooms are good, very clean and well equipped and all the staff are pleasant.  A full American breakfast is available in the morning - which is very good - and a limited choice dinner in the evening but as there are plenty of restaurants nearby no problem.  This hotel is one that was recommended by British Airways and we have no complaints whatsoever.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! It sounds like you have enjoyed your stay with us, and we are pleased with your feedback. We greatly appreciate you taking special note of our pleasant staff and convenient location. We will make sure to pass along your kind words to our staff and thank British airways for recommending us!   Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary: I loved my stay at this hotel! Great Staff! Angel at the front desk was very helpful at the time that I booked my stay and I met him in person when checked in and his customer service was 100%+ I will be back to stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We greatly appreciate your feedback as well. We will make sure to pass your praise along to Angel for his exceptional guest service. We are pleased that you have enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you back again for your next Disney vacation.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary: A good, clean and efficient place to stay. Very close to the Disneyland Parks. My family and I have stayed here before and have had a good experience, except for the onsite food. We will not eat here, the restaurant is a joke and the food is terrible. There are several other places to eat nearby that are much much better. As a Hilton Honors member I will usually choose from one of their brands when we stay in this area. This one had the best price this time around. The rooms are nice and in good condition with all the modern conveniences that you could ask for. The staff was professional and friendly. The new Hilton Honors online check in was great. You get to choose your room and all you need to do is to pick up your room key when you arrive at the hotel. This greatly speeds up
Manager Response: Firstly, thank you for your loyalty as Hilton Honors members. Secondly, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We also appreciate you taking special note of our clean rooms and convenient location. We will pass on your praise to our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: You really can’t beat the service at this hotel. Coming to an HGI right next to Disneyland, I was expecting large families creating mass chaos at breakfast and crowded elevator with noisy neighbors on my floor- not your typical HGI. I was very pleasantly surprised though, not that there weren't plenty to families with loud kids and crowds at breakfast (there were) but how it took me some time to notice them because of how well the staff managed the flow of the breakfast and never allowed their service to alter because I was only one person travelling rather than a larger group. I was hugely impressed the restaurant staff both in the evenings and morning for taking such great care of my requests and listening to me when I had questions or needed assistance. Thank you specifically
Manager Response: I loved your review. Thank you so much for all the positivity. We are congratulating Elvira, JJ, Rubin, Isaac, Lauren and Jose for all of their hard work. We are so glad that our staff takes such great care of our guests. Also, thank you for taking special note of our sincere hospitality. There is nothing that makes me happier than reviews like this.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Conveniently located on Harbor Blvd just down the road from Disneyland ,the friendly and efficient staff do their best to make sure your stay is an enjoyable experience. For families visiting Disney, the Disney shuttle operates on the half hour from a stop behind the Hotel. A large Target store a few minutes walk away provides any forgotten holiday needs and supermarket options. Rooms are clean with access to Wi-Fi. Nice lobby area with cool water and coffee and cookies available through the day. Option to hold / store luggage is also available,  We would not hesitate to stay here again and to recommend this Hotel .
Manager Response: Thank you for providing great feedback and staying with us. We appreciate you taking special note of our convenient location and clean rooms. Currently, we are ranked #14 out of 560 in terms of cleanliness for all Hilton Garden Inn Brand properties. Needless to say, we plan on being at the very top of that list very soon. We look forward to your return and thank you for your recommendation.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Very nice hotel. But real key to my two trips here for business are the great people who work here.  I want to single out Mary Ann at the Front Desk and Jose at the American Grill for being very helpful and flexible when I stayed there last week and was under the weather.  They and the other staff made my tough situation of being ill away from home much better than it could have been.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the feedback provided and will pass on your praise to our staff. We understand that being sick away from home can be a difficult experience, we are pleased that we made your stay memorable and hope we can continue doing so in the future.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Recommended for everyone.  Nice lobby with a complimentary  coffee and cookies and so with the wi fi.  Approachable and helpful employee.  Surprise with the amenities in the bathroom (Neutrogena products). Keurig coffemaker is in the house, really nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. It sounds like you had a great stay and we couldn't be more pleased with our amenities and staff. We hope to see you back for your next venture to Anaheim!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: very satisfied from check in to check out. rooms are clean and sanitized. breakfast is satisfying. staff are courteous. location is excellent for the trip. rate is very reasonable even less than what I expected. I will choose or recommend this place in our next family event or business meetings.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We hope you enjoyed your stay and we appreciate you taking special note of our: clean rooms and satisfying breakfast. We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Thought second visit would be as great as the first, but was dissapointed in stay
Summary: My daughter had a dance convention at the Hyatt nearby, and I chose to stay here because of a pleasant stay several years ago for another dance convention.  The front desk staff and breakfast staff were friendly and helpful, and answered all of my questions.  The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  I have three complaints: 1)  The turntable in the microwave didn't rotate, so some of the food I brought to eat ended up being thrown out because it didn't cook properly.  I didn't report the problem until checking out, so they offered me free parking, which was okay. 2) The french toast at breakfast was tasteless and cold.  The other items available are not a good value for the $12.99.  I have been to other hotels where they offer the same type of food, but it is free, and
Manager Response: We understand that your stay was not perfect, and we want to do all we can to redeem ourselves. Please feel free to contact me when planning your next trip to the Anaheim area. I will talk to my housekeeping and let them know that this type of behavior is not tolerated. Thank you for sharing your experience and I look forward to conversing with you soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary Heading: Good family hotel at a good price
Summary: Stayed for a week while visiting Disneyland, Adventureland,and Universal and Seaworld. Beautiful foyer with plenty of seating, help yourself coffee, tea, water cookies. Friendly and capable staff. A Keureg coffee machine in the room which was a nice change from the old pots. Nice and quiet with a cute pool, gym and hot tub. Great deal on breakfast too.  Very satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We are pleased that you have enjoyed our capable staff and quiet location. Considering we are located just one mile from the park and surrounded by great restaurants, we like to think of ourselves as having the perfect location for small families and business travelers. We hope you will keep us in mind for your next trip to Anaheim and we look forward to seeing you and your family again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We found all staff members to be friendly, respectful and helpful.  Our room was nice, clean and quiet.  We enjoyed our meals eaten at the hotel.  The location was great and easy to get to.  I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We especially appreciate your kind words in regards to our staff members and food quality. Our staff will never hesitate to go above and beyond guest's expectations. I will pass our your praise and we all look forward to seeing you back again!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We stayed 2 nights here whilst visiting Knotts. The rooms had been revamped and we couldn't grumble. A nice touch was multiple charging leads for our phones/ipad which was very convenient. We had breakfast included due to having a Hilton Honors account. The staff at breakfast were very polite & courteous and the choice of food was very good. The lobby area is light & airy and altogether we enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back.
Manager Response: We appreciate your consideration in choosing to stay with us. We always value our Hilton Honors members and thank you for your loyalty. We will pass on your praise to the rest of our staff. We look forward to seeing you on your next trip back!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: When you walk in it is beautiful!  It has comfy chairs to sit in by the fireplace in the lobby.  They also have dinning room/bar when you walk in. The lobby/dining room is very clean.  The front desk staff is over the top friendly.  When we first went to our room there was dirty dishes outside our room and was there until late that night. Then the next morning the room was still not cleaned by 1:00 pm.  They are very stingy with their coffee and I ask them 3 times to bring us coffee. Before heading out stopped in for breakfast and it was good.  They had fresh squeezed OJ. that was amazing. The food was good. :o(
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your praise of our lobby and apologize for the dishes outside of your room. Since this comment, we have had a meeting with our entire housekeeping staff to stress the importance of cleanliness, especially near and outside of our guest rooms. We feel that this is just as important as you do and we want to do everything we can to prevent this from happening again. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope you stay with us again and I would personally like to take you as much coffee as you need for your stay upon your arrival. Please feel free to call me when booking your next vacation.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary: Clean efficient hotel located several blocks from Disneyland on main hotel strip. Lots of families stay here. Quiet rooms (ask to be on side away from Habor Blvd), c/w microwave, small fridge + free WiFi. All inclusive breakfast buffet with cereals, fresh fruit & cooked to order. Regular shuttle bus ($5 return) to Disney every 30min. Too far to walk to Disney. Short walk across road to Shoe outlet store, Subway, Target store & Denny's diner.  We walked the 2 miles to 'Outlets on Orange' but too far for most people. I suggest a taxi.  Join the Hilton Honours Club before you arrive & you may receive breakfast discount coupons.  We joined after arrival & still attained a breakfast coupon. Tip: Do Not go to Disneyland during Spring Break!  Ride wait times up to 80mins.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and congratulate you on becoming a Hilton Honors member.  We appreciate you taking special note of our clean rooms and convenient location. We hope you will consider staying with us again!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Personal article removed from room by hotel staff
Summary: While staying at this hotel for spring break a $200 personal pillow was taken from the room by hotel cleaning staff.  They admitted the pillow had been removed because they had the pillow case and returned it to us.  After checking with them every day (4 days) no one could figure out what happened to it.  Manager said they would replace it if we provided documentation, which we did.  A month later the pillow has not been replaced and they ignore contact attempts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for negative experience at our hotel. If you would like to discuss these issues in more detail, please contact us at the information below. We would like to do all we can to redeem ourselves, and we look forward to hearing from you soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary: I love this Hotel and stay there everytime we Visit LA. Staff are friendly and helpful always happy to help out. Rooms are comfortable and quiet. Overall excellent place to stay. Price is great. Excellent location close to Convention Center and Target which is always convenient.  Pool was great as it was heated. Every afternoon would come back and sit and relax in the spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback, and thank you for acknowledging our: comfortable rooms and convenient location. We hope you back on your next visit to the LA area!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn lives up to the Hilton tradition
Summary: We had a great 5-day stay at the Anaheim Hilton Garden Inn which capped off the end of our So. Cal holiday in April 2015.   We specifically travelled to California from Abu Dhabi to attend the Star Wars Celebration Convention, but made a full tourist trip starting in San Diego and ending in Los Angeles.   The staff at the hotel are extremely accommodating, and the updated rooms offered a good night's sleep.   We didn't eat any meal at the hotel during our stay -- after staying at Hilton's Homewood Suites in Carlsbad, which offers a nice free breakfast and evening meal, it's hard to pay $12.95 each for breakfast.  I also believe that the $12 daily fee for parking in an unsecured outside lot surrounding the hotel was a bit excessive, but they are taking advantage of how close they
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel. We are glad that your trip was such a success, it sounds like you had a lot of fun. We appreciate the acknowledgment of our accommodating staff and newly updated rooms. We apologize for the inconvenience with your parking fee. We hope to redeem ourselves next time you are in town. Please give me a call when planning your next vacation, I would love to help!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary: This is a well located hotel with very friendly staff.  I was traveling on business, and the hotel (despite its proximity to Disneyland) was great for a business traveler.   I will return to this hotel.  Upon my arrival, Jennifer did a great job greeting me, and (to my surprise) her smiling face was there again in the morning when I went for breakfast.  Great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We appreciate all of your feedback and kind words. We will make sure to pass on your praise to Jennifer at the Front Desk. She always makes our guests feel welcome in our hotel and we are lucky to have her. Our hotel specializes in business travel, so we are happy to hear that it was convenient for you. If you travel to Anaheim often, please talk to our Sales department, they might be able to negotiate a consistent rate for you. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary: Jim and all of the managers are awesome. I had a great time at the hotel, and everyone was very nice. I was here for a total of three weeks and they gave me exceptional service throughout the entire trip. I would highly recommend this place, if I ever come back to Anaheim I will always come back to here.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate all of your praise and kind words to our staff. I have already passed your message along to our management team so they may congratulate Jim on such a great job. I cannot imagine this hotel without Jim, he is truly an asset to our team and a close friend of mine.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: A lovely end to our 2 week SoCal vacation
Summary: We're leaving tonight on an overnight flight so when we checked in I asked what it would cost to extend our stay until 3pm. After a quick check this was offered complementary, something we're really going to appreciate today. The rooms are very comfortable having been completely renovated. The only nit here is it would have been great if they could have updated the shower head in the bathroom. It's still old and worn. Breakfast was great. Not expensive, and when I ordered eggs and bacon, I got just that. No extras like soggy potatoes to waste. Service here was a little challenged when it was busy but ok all the same. The location is great for Disney (of course we went) and while car parking has been criticized, we spent $22 parking on just Sunday in 3 different parts of LA so I
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and providing feedback. We appreciate you taking special note of our comfortable rooms and tasty breakfast. We hope you and your family had a great time at Disneyland. We can't wait to see you back for your next vacation!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: nice property that takes advantage of its location. Food was way over priced and they charged $12.00 a day for non secure parking.  Hilton Honors members received 2 bottles of water as their benefits for staying there. The complimentary internet is slow and the the premium internet overpriced. I have stayed in the Hilton Properties for over 15 years but this may be the last one.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback for us. Firstly, I would like to thank you for being part of our Honors Membership program. Your loyalty means a lot to us and I intend to make up for your last stay any way possible. We would not be here without our loyal honors members, and we want to do all we can to redeem ourselves.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary: This older hotel has had a beautiful remodel done in the lobby/dining area.  Some (if not all) of the rooms have been updated as well.  We stayed five nights and had a wonderful experience.  The beds and pillow were very comfy.  The in-room refrigerator and Keurig coffee maker are very nice touches.  The location was fabulous with a shuttle right next door that left every 30 minutes for Disneyland.  Parking was included and the hotel facilities were clean and beautiful.  Well maintained.  The staff was amazing and extremely helpful and friendly - thanks, Jim!  The wait staff in the dining room were great as well - thanks you, Jose!  Very prompt and attentive.  The breakfast buffet is a good value and great food cooked to order.  The sparkling pool was beautiful with plenty of
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your acknowledgment of our comfortable rooms and great staff.  Also, we thank you for taking note of our "beautiful hotel facilities." It sounds like you had a great stay with us and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!   Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary Heading: Not Up To Garden Inn Standards
Summary: The place was packed with kids on spring break and they were running wild. I about got knocked off my chair while eating dinner by a kid running through the restaurant with a tube on the way to the pool. Why in the world would a main door to the pool area be in the crowded dining room.  Also, why would they pick a busy period such as the spring break to paint the doorways and hallways? That one is hard to figure out. The air conditioner was noisy and could be controlled from the wall as well as the unit under the window as well. I have never seen that before. The breakfasts were good but the dinners I ate here seemed pre-packaged and right out of the freezer. Pretty tasteless, but alas, quite convenient. I usually stay at the adjacent Hampton Inn which is a superior property. I
Manager Response: Thank you Tim,  We apologize that your stay was not perfect. We understand that you are a loyal Hilton traveler and we want to do all we can to redeem ourselves. Please feel free to contact me directly, I would like to make this experience right for you as soon as possible.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620-2138

Summary Heading: Excellent value for Money and very helpful staff
Summary: We have just returned from 14 nights in this hotel and felt we needed to let others know how lovely this hotel is.   We chose the Hilton Garden Inn for it's location and cost. The location is perfect for Disneyland and for visiting the LA area without being too close to the city.  The cost of this hotel was very good and much cheaper than similar hotels in the area.  All rooms have been fully renovated and are extremely clean and fresh. All of the staff are very helpful, from front desk to the room maids.  They are very friendly and always ready to help with anything including travel tips and local knowledge to searching the internet for you to find the right answer to your problem. The restaurant staff are also very pleasant.  We had breakfast there each morning as it was very
Manager Response: Thank you for letting the world know how lovely our hotel is. We love your praise, and could not do it without our outstanding employees. We greatly appreciate your acknowledgment of our knowledgeable and helpful staff. Jose Martinez is an extremely hard worker and we are very lucky to have him on our team. I will make sure he knows his diligence is appreciated. Thank you again for your consideration, and we can't wait to see you back in Anaheim!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary Heading: Nice Stay, Good Breakfast, Close to Disneyland
Summary: Anaheim was one of the stops that I have during my Christmas trip in the USA, because I have to visit Disneyland for a day. I decided to have 2-night stay in Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim by using a total of 40,000 points (20,000 point/night). It was a great decision, as the hotel is very close to the Disneyland and the value is great!  It seems that all the hotel around Disneyland are very out-dated and need a renovation for sure. For this Hilton Garden Inn, it was renovated and everything looks very new and clean especially the lobby.  The lobby is beautifully decorated, everything looks fresh and clean. The check-in was a breeze, they even waived the parking fee due to my birthday. (used to be $18/day, just checked the web site it is $12/day now)  Since the hotel has only one
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with feedback from your most recent stay with us. It sounds like you had a great time and we appreciate your consideration. Thank you for noticing our guest laundry facility and our delicious breakfast area. It sounds like you frequently visit Disneyland, so we hope to see you back for your next Disneyland vacation!   Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary: Good hotel overall.  Not a fancy pool but it was nice and a good place to relax after a long day at Disney Land.  Good shuttle and very helpful staff.  Decent, comfortable rooms and quick meals.  Good value for the money.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and value your consideration. Thank you for taking special note of our comfortable rooms and helpful staff. We will make sure to pass on your praise to the rest of our staff. We look forward to seeing you back again on your next Disneyland venture.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor

Summary: Excellent pricing per night which is important when going to Disneyland.  The rooms were just renovated and were comfortable & very quiet at night.  Free wifi from the room which is a MUST!  Not far from Disneyland with great restaurants close by.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such great feedback! We appreciate you taking note of our comfortable rooms and outstanding value. Between free wi-fi and our great location, we try to add as much value as possible for our guests. We can't wait to see you back for your next Disney vacation!   Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620 2138

Summary Heading: A Gold Mine Six City blocks away from Disneyland
Summary: We have been going to Disneyland with the kids for 12 years now. Most visitors don't know that the spirit of Disney spans 5 miles North, South, East and West of the Disneyland park. This Hilton hotel is one of those gold mines found while looking for alternative options to the actual Disneyland Hotel itself. This hotel is approximately 75% cheaper than the Disneyland Hotel and has a 8 foot Disney statue in the lobby waiting for you and the family to enter without any hassle from long check-in lines (Heavenly!).  The first day we checked in we purchased 2-Day Disneyland tickets at the front desk (done), then we purchased 2-Day Disney shuttle bus passes for $5; so we didn't have to worry about trying to find parking at Disneyland. The shuttle left the hotel every 30 minutes and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We love being able to provide the same accommodations as some of the larger hotels up the street. It sounds like you and your family had a great time, and we hope to see you all back again for your next Disney venture!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620 2138

Summary Heading: It's an HGI branded location but not what you would expect
Summary: The location provided the usual HGI hospitality but the location  does not appear to have been built for HGI as the configuration from the lobby to the elevators and guest rooms are not up to usual HGI quality standards and size.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and want to do all we can to make up for any negative experiences during your last stay with us. Please feel free to give me a call when planning your next time out to the Disneyland area, I would like to do all I can to redeem ourselves.  Thank you,  Mark Morihiro Reservation Supervisor (714) 620 2138

Summary: We were very happy with our stay while visiting Disneyland. Excellent value for the money. It's a little too far to walk to Disneyland regularly, but there is bus service between the hotel and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback and value your consideration in choosing hotels. We always try to add value for our guests and it sounds like you appreciate our rooms added value as well. We hope you choose us next time you are in the Disneyland area.  Best regards,

Summary Heading: We have used this hotel for our exhibition visits the the NAMM shows.
Summary: The hotel is big enough and has all the facilities you could wish for. A new bar has inaugurated the exhibition visitor's delight. Rooms are bright, spacious and clean. And the beds are comfortable to sleep in. The operation of the reception is positive and they are very helpful. WiFi is included in the quoted rate which is appreciated. The only thing that's a pity in the car's paradise LA, is that you have to pay extra to park your car at the hotel's large parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during the NAMM show. That tends to be a big event for our area and we like to think of ourselves as a prime hotel for the show. We appreciate your mention of our newly renovated restaurant and bar area. We also appreciate your consideration for our hotel. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you back for NAMM 2016.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Great Staff, especially the Assistant Manager
Summary: All around a great experience. The staff at check in was very helpful, accomodating and friendly. Rooms were clean and nice. The Assistant Manager, Viren Singh, is very hands on and attentive. He knows what is going on and genuinely wants the guests to feel comfortable. Great Hotel! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We are pleased that you met our Assistant General Manager, Viren always does everything he can for our guests and it shows. Also, we appreciate you taking note of our clean rooms and helpful accommodations.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed staying at this hotel. The room was clean, recently renovated, and a great deal. Elvira was kind and personable. We will definitely stay at this hotel in the future because of the service that we received from her at the restaurant/bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and consideration when choosing our hotel. We are pleased that you noticed our clean rooms and dedicated staff. Elvira always strives to go above and beyond guests' expectations. We are truly lucky to have her on staff. We hope to see you back again soon for your next Anaheim venture.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Best Staff in a Hilton since they did in the Conrad Hilton Standard of Service
Summary: This is a Good Neighbor Hotel for Disney.  They ought to be a Gold Standard for Disney and Hilton.  Their staff was always courteous, friendly and greeted us with "have a great day" or "welcome back to our home" and a big smile. Lots of advice, jokes, coffee, good food and excellent cleaning and maintenance.  You never saw the cleaning staff but it got done.  They do a "cook for you" breakfast on eggs, omelets and other items.  Very good.  Well worth the money.  We ended up with some extra coupons so friends could join us for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your positive feedback. We love hearing great things about our hotel and it sounds like you know us well. Our staff always treats our guests as their first priority. They take pride in their service abilities and empowerment. We appreciate your observation of this. We appreciate your consideration, and can't wait to see you back!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: This is a pretty good hotel to stay with. The pool was cool and the spa was hot. The rooms was small but simply and tastefully decorated. Bathrooms clean and staff was great. I will be back especially since I have season passes to Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and thank you for acknowledging our outstanding staff and tastefully decorated rooms. After going through a refresh, it feels good to know our guests like the new look of our rooms. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you on your next Knotts Berry Farm vacation.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: This hotel has the best staff I've ever encountered.  Rooms are updated and comfortable.  I cannot say enough good things about it!!!  Whether for business or for some Disney fun, you cannot pick a better place to stay!
Manager Response: We appreciate your consideration and words of praise. Our staff is truly amazing and do all they can for our guests; we could not ask for a better team. Thank you for acknowledging our newly updated rooms, we look forward to seeing you on your next Disney venture.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Big rooms, money well worth it!
Summary: The rooms are very big, nice and clean. Great pillows. The staff were very nice. Would be perfect if they offer complementary breakfast. The breakfast was delicious. The hotel is less than a mile from disneyland. Parking is a little too price.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such great feedback. We appreciate your consideration and pleased that we were able to accommodate your stay with a nice, big clean room and great pillows. We will pass on your praise to the rest of our staff. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you back soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim.  The room was clean and cozy and room service was speedy and the quality of food was great.  The staff at the hotel were very helpful and always greeted me as I walked through the door.  I will continue to use Hilton Garden Inns whenever and wherever I can.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and your loyalty. Thank you for choosing to stay in our clean and cozy rooms. We are pleased that you enjoyed our room service as well. Thank you again for your consideration and we look forward to seeing your back soon.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We stayed here in May of 2014, It was our first trip to the states so were were a bit unsure of local customs etc. The concierge went above and beyond to help us out, rooms were immaculate and the lobby was bright and inviting.  I would highly recommend anyone to stay here, it is a bit of a walk to Disneyland but its worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation. We can't wait to see you back again and we will make sure to pass on your praise to our concierge.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Just left and I wish I could have stayed longer. This place was comfortable, clean, and quiet! The staff was incredibly helpful and courteous. You have to pay for breakfast but that wasn't a big deal. My friends and I would rather go to Downtown Disney for breakfast anyway. No complaints. Great vacation! I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such outstanding feedback. We greatly appreciate your consideration and hope you will come back to experience our comfortable, quiet and clean accommodations. We look forward to seeing you on your next Disney venture!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: The bed was nice and comfy!!! I slept like a baby. The check in was fast, and since I am a silver member I received two bottles of water and a cookie;) Next time I visit I need to remember to include breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our nice and comfy beds. We appreciate you taking note of our efficiency and friendly accommodations. We hope to see you back again soon for your next vacation.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Good Choice for Anaheim Business or Pleasure
Summary: This is a well placed, busy hotel on Harbor Blvd. south of Disneyland, and just north of Chapman Ave. in the middle of several nice restaurant locations. It's clean and comfortable, check in and check out are quick and efficient. The staff is attentive and knowledgable about their resort area, and not hesitant to offer suggestions or solutions to the harried tourist or business visitor.  Parking is for a daily fee, but there are no in/out gates to trouble with, and apparently plenty of parking spaces.  The hotel is one of three large ones directly adjacent to each other and there are good restaurants within walking distance.  If your goal is Disneyland, there is a regular shuttle between the hotel and the Disney drop off area, with regular and dependable pickups at both places
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such great feedback. We greatly value your consideration and pleased that you enjoyed our knowledgeable staff and thoughtful accommodations. We hope to see you back to the Anaheim area on your next vacation and anticipate your arrival until then.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim, CA  The front desk staff was very helpful.  The shuttle service was very convenient for Disneyland.  My family likes our privacy and the employees were very respectful of that and didn't bother us unless we called them for replacement items.  There were several restaurants close by with some nice places within walking distance of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We hope you will come back again soon to enjoy our convenient amenities and respectful staff. We train our staff based on our core company values and it feels good to hear that we are all on the same page. Thank you again for your consideration and we look forward to hearing from you.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Overall stay was very good I would recommend this hotel to others despite the fact that a staff member entered my room. I take it that is was an honest mistake and isn't something that happens often. We all make mistakes and could have easily made the same mistake. Not having a working is the over site of hotel staff. That should not have happen. The room should have been set to out of order.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  I hope this message finds you will. Thank you for providing us with such valuable feedback. We appreciate your consideration and apologize for any inconvenience. Also, we value your understanding of this incident but would like to compensate you for our oversight. Please contact us when you plan on coming back to our hotel; we would like to do all we can to make this right for you.  Warmest regards,  Mark Morihiro (714) 620-2138

Summary Heading: Good business hotel in convenient location
Summary: Hotel is close to Disneyland, freeways, restaurants, shops.   Easy walk to all.   Rooms are well-appointed and clean.   I stayed for business but it appears to be a good hotel for family and kids as well.   Friendly staff and good value overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate you taking note of our convenient location and clean rooms. We hope to you and your family back again soon for your next family outing. We will make sure to pass on your words of praise to our housekeeping department.  Thank you again,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: Clean, efficient, kind staff and a great location for any trade show at the Anaheim convention center. There is a full service lobby for breakfast and cocktails if you should desire. I particularly enjoyed the on-line check-in where I could choose my room. A little pricier than normal times, but probably because of the convention. I always choose this place because it's a nice walk to and from the convention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for complimenting our clean and efficient staff. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to our staff. We hope you will come back to enjoy our convenient location on your next Anaheim venture. Thank you for all of your great feedback.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary: My boyfriend and I went on our very first trip to Disneyland together. Now, I work for a Hilton Property and also a Starwood property, in the Sales Department. So, I am quite picky about service. But, I was absolutely impressed by Mark who checked us in. Greeted us with this grand smile, and made it very personable. He made sure that our check-in was memorable by greeting us with a Disney gift and a few drinks to hydrate before we entered the park. Breanna and Jessica at the front desk answered every question we had. Everyone had a smil & the place looked SO clean. The Hilton Garden Inn team just seemed to be close, worked well together and made everything seem seamless. Thank you all for everything :) -Kayla A.
Manager Response: Hello again,  I'm so glad that your stay was noteworthy. Thank you for complimenting our staff and myself. We could not be more humbled by your comments. Jessica says hello and Breanne gives her best to you two. We hope you come back again soon to enjoy our clean rooms and helpful staff.  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: 2nd stay here, as good as the first
Summary: I stayed here for a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. It was my second stay here, I had enjoyed my stay a few years back and immediately booked again when we returned to Anaheim. It is within walking distance to the convention center, about a 15 - 20 minute walk depending on your pace. I like staying about this far away from convention centers when I travel because I usually end up eating more than I want during shows and this way I get some walking time in when I don't have time to exercise.  The hotel is comfortable. Quiet. There was a nice mix of families headed to Disneyland and business people. If you are headed to Disney you might want to take the shuttle, especially with younger kids. The group I was with ended up having a couple of meetings in the bar area
Manager Response: Thank you for complimenting our quiet and comfortable hotel. We are pleased that you have enjoyed your stay with us and will make sure to pass on your notes of praise to our staff. We hope you will come back again soon to enjoy our clean rooms and convenient location. Thank you again!  Best regards,  Mark Morihiro

Summary Heading: Freindly Staff and Newly Renovated but...
Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it is near Disneyland and near a hotel that my cousin will have her surprised birthday party at. I noticed right away that the hotel is undergoing renovations and was confirmed by the front desk agent. It was not noisy or anything and we requested a newly renovated handicapped room for my mother. The room we were given was newly renovated with microwave and small refrigerator. I was content with how they renovated the room. I was a little disappointed though with how they renovated the bathroom. They positioned the mirror way high than a person in a wheelchair could see his/her reflections. Also, it will be nice to put a walk-in shower instead of a tub because, as an Occupational Therapist, I know for a fact that handicapped people have a hard
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our newly renovated property. We appreciate your feedback and are happy that you had such a positive experience. We have two rooms on property that have "roll-in" showers. From my knowledge, they were being renovated in January and completed in early February. We hope you will come back and stay with us again soon. When you call to make your next reservation, please specify that you would like a room with a "roll-in" shower and we should be able to accommodate your request. We are glad that you were pleased with our staff and we anticipate your next arrival.

Summary: We were looking for an inexpensive hotel near Disneyland for a quick stop over on our way to Carnival cruise lines.  Normally we stay somewhere near the park within walking distance but it was New years weekend and everything was booked up or way out of our price range.  The Hilton Garden Inn fit the bill for what we were looking for.  The rooms were clean and updated.  Only complaint about the rooms were the awful pillows.  A free sit down breakfast was complimentary and probably would have cost us $40 in a normal restaurant.
