Deduct that from what we paid for the room and the price for the room was probably the best deal in town for a hotel within short driving distance to the park.  Beware, there was some construction still ongoing on the upper floors of the hotel and the
Manager Response: We appreciate your consideration in choosing our hotel. We know that there are many options on our block, and we are glad you chose us. Considering our breakfast is normally $12.95 per adult, it sounds like you got a great deal on your room! Construction is nearing completion, we are looking to finish within the next couple days. I will make sure to communicate your feelings about our pillows to our housekeeping staff. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Professional service and Excellent Business Hotel
Summary: The staff is professional and makes a business trip stay smooth.  Have stayed here several times and they are consistently terrific on service, and the morning breakfast.  Convenient location to local businesses and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our convenient location and terrific service. I will make sure to pass on your praise to our professional staff and we hope to see you again on your next Anaheim business trip.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good location but it smells
Summary: I liked the location of the hotel. Plenty of things to do in a walking distance including DisneyLand, DownTown Disney and many restaurants. Hotel is nice. Prices are good for the value I get. One problem I had, the carpet smells mostly in hallways and a little bit in rooms. I think it is poor ventilation.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our convenient location and great value. In regards to our carpet, we just got all new carpet in our hallways and guest rooms. Initially, the smell of new carpet was a little strong. Considering the carpet has been laid for three weeks, the smell is no longer lingering. We hope to see you back for your next Disney vacation.

Summary Heading: Excellent Value, Super Service and great location
Summary: We accidentally arrived here when my older grandson decided to come to Disneyland and we needed a second room. The original hotel could not accomodate us. The woman Sheri who made our reservation could not have been more helpful. We needed an adjoining room to best supervise the children. She made sure all our questions and concerns were addressed. The room was modern with everything one could want.( microwave, fridge, hairdryer Keurig coffeemaker). The beds were heavenly. Every staff member was helpful,polite and truly cared that we were comfortable. I introduced myself to the manager Mr.Torres and let us know how much we enjoyed our stay. A really hands on manager, who takes pride in his job. There is always coffee, cold flavored water and cookies in the lobby. The lobby has a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We appreciate you taking note of our helpful staff and accommodating rooms. We are glad your enjoyed our "Heavenly" beds and committed staff. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Simply Fablous Place To Stay and Staff!
Summary: Howdy,  I want to tell you of a wonderful place to stay if you are going to be in the Disneyland (CA) area. It's the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove.  I know there are a lot of hotels/motels and other places you could stay, but WHY?    This is one of the best hotel I think you can stay at near Disneyland.  You can walk to the park, there are good places wo eat within walking distance and it's quiet and super friendly.  It's like staying with family.  I have to compliment the staff, Keith-General Manager, Janette, Mark, Husan, Patty and everyone who works there.  They are some of the best hotel staff I have ever met. Anything I needed or request was done right now.  They even called me before I was to check in to confirm my reservation with me and to see if I needed
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your attention to detail and amazing feedback. We wish all of our guests would experience our property through your eyes. Thank you again for making us your choice hotel in the area. That always feels good to hear from a frequent traveler. We will make sure to pass on your praise to everyone mentioned in your review and we look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Always the good first, and it's just about all good. Super friendly and obliging staff, working very hard and trying to please everyone. Beds and bedding very good, ditto breakfast with plenty of choices, though the restaurant staff and kitchen a bit overwhelmed by sold out hotel numbers. My brother stays here often and says it's usually a well run place. As previous reviewer said it is better to drive to the parks. We parked in a large multi-story on the "far side" of the park then took the tram. This was better and cheaper than the shuttle, which can be super crowded and difficult with strollers. Though they do charge to park there are lots of little extras not usually found at budget type hotels, including freshly baked cookies and juice in the lobby in the afternoon. Perfect
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We appreciate you taking notice of our, "super friendly and obliging staff." We hope you enjoyed our warm Welcome Bars, and comfortable amenities. We hope to see you for your next Anaheim vacation. We will be anticipating your arrival until then.

Summary: We were overwhelmed by the kind, friendly and very helpful staff.  They made our stay very easy.  This hotel has been renovated and it looks great - outstanding option compared to other hotels in the area that need a facelift. The breakfast was awesome. Very easy to and from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. All of your positive feedback is greatly appreciated. I will make sure to pass on your praise to our kind and helpful staff. From your survey, it looks like you had a flawless stay and we hope you will come back to visit us again. Thanks again, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Good clean hotel, they are in the middle of a remodel and we ended up with a new room, pretty well done, nice and fresh but nothing to knock your socks off.  Just a good clean honest hotel.  It is nice that they have fridges and microwaves, a lot of area hotels we looked at didn't.  The staff was super friendly, they have cookies in the lobby at night and nice hot coffee in the morning.  I never tried the restaurant but it seemed pretty popular, 12 bucks for breakfast....probably not the best value but its right on par for the area.  The place I booked my stay through got a discount on parking so that was 6 bucks a night usually 12....again I don't agree with paying to park in your parking lot (why did you build one if you didn't think people would drive here) but again its on
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to our "super friendly staff." We appreciate you taking note of our prime location and fresh appearance. Thanks again and we look forward to your next Disney vacation.

Summary Heading: good place to stay to go to Disney world
Summary: we staied ther with my family to go to a day trip in Disney. great location, the rooms are a good size. one restaurant: ok diner but not much choice if you want to go Healthy. breakfast was good.  we stayed with my wife and three kids (brought our Baby cot). i will come back for our next visit
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your family vacation. We appreciate your taking notice of our sizeable rooms and great location. Our restaurant is always improving and modifications will be made to our menu for the future. I will make sure to pass along your input to our Food and Beverage Manager, in regards to healthier dinner options. We look forward to seeing you on your next Disney vacation.

Summary: Stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for 3 nights in December for a Disneyland Trip.   This property does not live up to Hilton standards in any manner.  First, when I booked the trip the website stated they were doing renovations that would be completed by the 19th.  No problem for us, we were checking in on the 20th.  But they were not done and were working at night. Hard to relax in a hotel room with someone hammering all day and through the night in the room above you. Plus, one elevator was closed, and workman were all around the building with ladders, tools, debris. They have no regard for guests.  And the hotel staff could not be bothered. So, this place lies to you and then is rude about it.   The room was fine.  Nothing special.  Was exactly like a Hampton Inn. In fact, the
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such well-written feedback. We sincerely apologize for everything that went wrong during your stay. It sounds like you experienced a combination of unsatisfactory behavior and we want to make sure it does not happen again. We will make sure to share your experience with everyone on property and use your comment to improve for the future. We would like to do everything we can to make this right for you. Please feel free to contact us at your nearest convenience. We would love the opportunity to renew your faith in us.  Warmest regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620-2137

Summary Heading: You can't imagineer a better place to stay
Summary: This property is a short walking distance from Disneyland and includes plenty of parking (for a fee), free internet, in room fridge and comfortable bed with all the amenities necessary for a a comfortable stay. Free cookies in the afternoon and a cozy fireplace in the lobby complement a very welcoming place to stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and your attention to detail. Thank you for taking note of our: convenient location, complimentary internet and essential amenities. We hope to see you back again to enjoy our warm fireplace and complimentary cookies. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Wonderful stay at this facility.  The check-in staff, Jessica, was very helpful! Had a room on the first floor and it was very quiet! Plenty of free cookies every night in the lobby.  The location was perfect to Disneyland.  I took the OCTA to the park every day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback and will make sure Jessica is praised for her consideration. We hope you will come back and stay with us again on your next venture to the Anaheim area. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Lousy Service and Poor response to issues and request
Summary: Noisy room.  Construction being done at night due to meeting deadline.   Room TV had problems.  Technician replace TV 2 times but still a problem.  Was asked to move room in the middle of the night.   Claimed satisfaction guarantee and was not honored based on the accommodation experience.  At check out, no manager available to talk to.  All they have is a front desk clerk who is not authorized to do anything except check  you in and out.  Lousy service.   Sent an e-mail to manager and no response.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for 4 days at the Hilton.   Beds were very comfy, room nice a clean.   Staff friendly.   Took the shuttle to Disneyland right from the hotel.   Would defiantly stay again .  I did not eat at the hotel but food I did see looked good !   Pool was warm  overall good place to stay and close to Disneyland
Manager Response: We greatly value your feedback and appreciate your compliments on our friendly staff. We hope you will come stay with us again next time you travel to the Anaheim area. Thank you for your loyalty and we cannot wait to see you come back!

Summary: While it is great to stay at a Disney owned hotel, this hotel offers a very nice alternative.  Rooms all recently redecorated.  Beds super comfortable.  Very nice hot breakfast or cold buffet available with wide selection.  Free coffee in lobby.  Happy Hour in early evening.  In complex with Hampton Inn and another hotel which all share shuttle to Disney (very short ride) so no walking or hassle with shuttle bus.  Rates are well within budget.  Pool area very nice and peaceful.  Lobby comfortable and was easy to sit and chat.  Definitely would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for identifying us as a great alternative for Disneyland hotels. We appreciate you taking note of our delicious breakfast and reasonably priced room rates. We are fortunate to be surrounded by many great restaurants and even a Target department store. We hope you will choose us again when deciding where to stay in the future.

Summary: The lobby is remodeled into the new food court/bar style.  It works.  Staff were all pleasant and welcoming.  The room is large, comfortable, clean, well stocked.  Exercise room is standard, but the weather here is reason to be outside not on a treadmill.  Breakfast was good.  Plenty of parking but I wonder about the $12 parking fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We appreciate you noticing our pleasant staff and clean rooms. We hope you will return to our property to experience our spacious rooms and ideal weather. Thanks again and we can't wait to see you back soon!

Summary: Our hotel stay was 25 Nov - 5 Dec 2014.  Main reason for picking this hotel was the close proximity to our daughter's apartment building - we did not rent a car, so she was our chauffer!  We were very pleased with our room (we had just arrived from a week's stay in Las Vegas, and we both agreed our room here was even cleaner than the room we stayed in at the Monte Carlo).  The front desk personnel  always greeted us upon arrival and bid us a good day or good evening when leaving the hotel, also very helpful with advice on places to eat, carwashes, anything in general.  There was coffee and tea in the hotel lobby in the morning with take out cups and in the evening there was a large glass container of lemon/citrus water and cookies/fruit to take.  Very nice touch.  The lobby also
Manager Response: Thank you for taking special note of our accommodating staff and clean rooms. We value your feedback and hope you will come back and stay with us in the future. It sounds like you had a great time and we look forward to providing you with the same accommodation (or better!) in the future. Thank you again for thinking of us and we anticipate your next stay.

Summary: It seems like they have been renovating this property forever. My family had a room in an un-renovated room and I was in a renovated room. Big differences, but even so, even though new room had issues. The bath tub shower combo was bad with poor caulking and patch work from some type of damage that was not good. The room itself was bigger then the standard room. The sink leaked too. Staff was hit and miss with one female swing shift worker talking on her cell phone behind the counter and totally not acknowledging guests. Restaurant was a little disorganized as well. Food was average at best. Undecided if I would return with so many options in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We apologize that you had a leaky sink and your shower combo was flawed. We will make sure to correct these errors as soon as possible. We hope you will give us a second chance to redeem ourselves. We value your feedback and will do just about anything to make this right. Please contact me next time you plan on coming to the Anaheim area.  Best regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620-2137

Summary: This hotel is extremely clean, the grounds are beautiful, shopping is close by, beds are super comfortable, staff is incredibly friendly and helpful BUT......We didn't like the fact that there was a charge for having a car there. Hotel guests should very definitely receive complimentary parking passes. We also disagree with a charge for the shuttle. This was our 4th time in Anaheim and we have never paid for shuttle service to Disneyland. Also, with the price of the rooms, wifi should also be free WITHOUT having to re-log in every day. The above reasons will be why we will look around for our next visit there- we loved the comforts of the hotel but we spent an extra $80 on shuttles and parking the car that we feel is completely unnecessary.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking note of our extremely clean hotel and friendly staff. We apologize that your stay was not perfect. We understand that you feel that you overpaid and we would like an opportunity to make that right for you. Please call me directly when setting up your next vacation. I would love the opportunity to help you plan for a future trip back to Anaheim. We look forward to hearing from you.  Best regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620-2137

Summary: The hotel is currently undergoing a renovation.  When we arrived, we were placed in a room that had not yet been renovated.  Beds were horrible.  Hard and uncomfortable.  We complained to the front desk staff who moved us to a newly remodeled room.  Beds were better, but not the best I've experienced in a Hilton branded hotel.    For the room being recently renovated, I was disappointed to have a broken shower head that was clearly not part of the renovation.   The in-room HVAC system was abnormally loud and provided for interrupted sleep every time it turned on.  When turned off, the room was stuffy and warm.    The facilities are nice otherwise.  Very bright and spacious lobby.  Food offerings at breakfast were average.  Housekeeping was very prompt to wake us at 8am wanting
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We apologize that your beds and AC did not meet your satisfaction. We appreciate you taking note of our nice facilities and spacious lobby. We hope that you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Please feel free to call me directly to arrange accommodation for your next stay with us. I would like to make sure your next stay goes better than your previous.  Best regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620 -2137

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying in the newly renovated rooms, the ambiance of the hotel is very relaxing. during my stay; the bed was already so comfortable, that I did not even need to adjust the bed level. The TV control was so smooth to use and I did not have any trouble turning on the TV. Furthermore the restroom had a beautiful faucet. I had all the towels that I needed and they were all lined up with a nice design done by housekeeping. The iron for my clothes worked right away. When I turned it off the heat went down without me having to worry about leaving it there. Throughout the night my room was quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are pleased to hear that your enjoyed our comfortable beds and “User-friendly” amenities. I will make sure our Housekeeping staff knows how much you appreciate their efforts to make you feel welcome. They work extremely hard to go above and beyond our guests expectations. We can’t wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn Garden Grove, CA
Summary: I travel virtually every week with my job and always stay only at Hilton properties. This property by far is the most exceptional, highest quality and friendliest property I've ever stayed at. Hilton corporate management could do very well by using this property as their flagship property to demonstrate to all other properties in the Hilton chain what excellent customer service, quality of care and value for the money spent should be. It is because of the service I receive at this particular HGI that will keep me and my co-workers loyal to the Hilton brand for many years to come.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and loyalty. Thank you for taking note of our excellent customer service and caring staff. We pride ourselves in our customer service and we are pleased to hear that our staff has done such an outstanding job. We will pass on your praise and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great Lobby / Free WiFi / Long Walk to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim for five nights in November 2014.  I was in town for vacation attending a video game conference (Blizzcon) at the convention center and my friends and I also worked in a trip to Disneyland.  What I liked: 1. The lobby was really nicely decorated.  They also had ice water and snacks waiting for you when you came back in the evening after being out all day.  A small touch, but very nice. 2. The WiFi was free throughout the entire hotel and actually worked great! 3. You are about a 5-10 minute walk from Roscoe's Chicken N Waffles (excellent), a Walgreens, and a Target. 4.  You can buy tickets to Disneyland right there in the hotel, and they have a shuttle to the park which we should have taken because....(continue below)  What I didn't
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and noticing our recently remodeled lobby, comfortable accommodations and convenient location. Also, we are glad that we could accommodate a clean and comfortable room. We appreciate the thoroughness of your review and hope you will be back to provide us with more great feedback.

Summary: We regularly stay at the Hilton Garden Inn, and really like the Garden Grove location when we visit Disneyland.  The staff are just lovely people, and we always feel welcomed and appreciated.  The accommodations are clean and quiet, and HGI is a really good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our clean and quiet accommodations. We also appreciate your feedback and recognition of our wonderful staff. We are glad that you appreciate our value and anticipate your next trip out to our area. Take care in the meantime!

Summary: Great location since we did a theme park marathon. It's almost a central point in all directions to Disney, Universal studious, Legoland, Six flags & Hollywood. The rooms and facilites were clean. The staff super attentive. Close to a lot of restaurants, gas station, pharmacy & highways. Swimming pool, gym & spa with loads of towels ready on demand. Computer room with printer for guests to use. Lovely food available at their onsite restaurant on ground floor. Plus laundry & dryer machines for guests.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for noticing our central location and attentive staff. Also, we appreciate you noticing our clean rooms and friendly accommodations. We hope that you come back and stay with us on your next vacation. We look forward to the opportunity to provide you with more great service.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for airport
Summary: First time I've stayed at hotels south of LAX. This Hilton Garden Inn was OK. Everything I expected--clean, well appointed. Very helpful and nice staff. Arrived at night and left early. Would consider staying here again next time I have to come in from or out of LAX.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We appreciate you taking note of our clean rooms and helpful staff. We hope that you come back and stay with us again next time you fly out of LAX. We look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: Hotel was adequate.  Good location.  Reservations failure to mention a $12,00 parking fee per night left a bad feeling.  They have a restaurant and bar in the hotel, though no customers at either.  They are in process of renovation a floor at a time.  No noise or dirt caused by the construction work.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our property and providing us with feedback. We apologize that your stay was not perfect. It sounds like our parking charge could have been explained better during the reservation process. Please give me a call at your nearest convenience; I would like to talk with you about how we can redeem ourselves.  Best regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620-2137

Summary: The staff was very helpful in making sure that our anniversary was the best one yet.  They made our anniversary a very happy one and ensured that we had everything we needed.  They helped with recommending our trip to Disneyland and a fancy dinner after. The shuttle to and from Disneyland was awesome as well as the Boca restaurant. Thanks again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such great feedback. Our staff always does their best to exceed guest expectations. They are trained to embody the core values of our management company. Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us, we look forward to seeing you back again.

Summary: My sister and I just arrived in Anaheim for the final 3 nights of our vacation. The previous 7 nights were at the Universal Hilton.  We were booked into and even checked into the Clarion up the street.  It was gross and dirty and we had to check out.  We walked into the Hilton Garden Inn without a reservation seeking refuge from an otherwise unpleasant experience. We were greeted and treated very well by the front desk.  We were also able to book without any notice and still get a great rate. Were were constantly welcomed by the hotel staff every time we entered and exited.  We were allowed to see the room we checked into before we committed to it and very pleased with our stay. We were able to save our lovely vacation because we wandered into a Hilton property.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our kind staff and pleasant accommodations. We are thrilled that we were able to make your stay in Anaheim memorable and we look forward to your next stay with us. Thank you again for stopping by and we appreciate you keeping us in mind.

Summary: Stayed here in the past, always pleased with accommodations/service. Rooms are clean, beds are comfy, bathrooms are clean. Free wi-fi ,which is nice.   Hotel staff are very nice/helpful from wait staff to front desk staff.   See you again, Hilton Garden Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback provided. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to notice our: clean rooms, comfy beds and clean bathrooms. Thank you again for thinking of us and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The staff were great.  I had requested a lower level room and was placed on the very top level so that was a bummer.  Plus, they said it had been newly remodeled, but it wasn't a "nice" as I had expected.  There wasn't even a mattress pad on the bed.  =(
Manager Response: Thank you for taking note of our wonderful staff and prime location. Since your stay, we have confirmed that mattress pads have been placed on all of our beds. Also, we apologize that a lower floor room was not available for your stay. Please let us know the next time you plan on coming into town. I would love to have a chance to redeem ourselves. We will pass-on your positive note to our staff and do all we can to prepare for your next visit.  Kind regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620 2137

Summary: I highly recommend this property not only for the safe, cofortable and clean property it is, but for the tremendous staff that works there.  I recommend asking for Hassan Torres personally.  You will not find a better of more conscientous manager at any other hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. Hassan Torres is one of our best; he never hesitates to professionally take care of our guests. We will make sure to acknowledge Hassan for his hard work and dedication. In addition, thank you for making kind note of our comfortable and clean property. We would love to have you back next time you are in town and I’m sure Hassan looks forward to seeing you again.

Summary: the staff was the best ! made my stay very enjoyable. very close to Disneyland Park. great shuttle service. Food was excellent. And drinks hit the spot! the whole family was very happy with our stay. very good value for a hotel of this caliber
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate you taking note of our great shuttle service, excellent food and overall great value. We hope that you come back and stay with us again for more fun. We can’t wait to see you in the future.

Summary: ....and that's exactly it. A warm and efficient greeting that was well appreciated, as traveling these days is such fun! Will gladly return to this property. Nice amenities, comfortable room, and the beds are popular for a reason. But the service from the staff is why we'll return.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such great feedback. We truly value our staff here because they go out of their way to greet and accommodate our guests. We appreciate you taking note of our nice amenities, comfortable room, comfortable beds and caring staff. We hope that we may have the opportunity to make your next stay as memorable as this one.

Summary: We stayed here three nights while visiting Disneyland. A few standouts... Daniel, at the front desk, was very helpful answering our million questions on everything from how to use the public transportation (ART) to telling us how we could print tickets in advance in their Business Center (which we did).  The second employee (I'm so sorry I can't remember her name) worked in the breakfast area.  A very nice young lady who was busy making sure everything was well-stocked and guests happy. She always had a smile on her face and she was just so pleasant! When the pancake machine jammed on my husband, she fixed it and then proceeded to make him two pancakes and brought them to our table. She's a keeper and I hope you reward her with a raise!    Our room was very comfy and spotless!
Manager Response: Thank you for your Trip Advisor response. We appreciate you taking note of our comfy and spotless rooms. We truly appreciate our staff and try to break down barriers for them, when we can. We love hearing that our staff takes such great care of our guests.

Summary: As the title says, this great chain of hotels shows why its one of the best in its class. Not one complaint we had for the whole duration of our stay. All in all great value for money Special mention to the staff at the branch we stayed in (Anaheim). They were awesome :)
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our friendly staff and overall great value of our hotel. We are glad that your stay was perfect and we will do all we can to maintain that perfection for next time. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel, great reception staff, good location
Summary: I booked this hotel for 3 nights whilst we were visiting Disneyland and universal studios and LA.  On the site it said that you had to pay for wifi and car parking and I read some reviews that said it was rubbish wifi and you couldn't get parked anywhere.  This was not the case for us, we got free car parking and free wifi which was brilliant.  We just had to sign into it each day as you get complimentary wifi for 24 hours but then you get it for another 24 and so on.  There wasn't a problem parking either.  May be in high season it could be a problem?  We went the middle of Sept. It was about 20 mins walk to Disneyland but there are buses you can get too.  The reception staff were always very helpful and nice.  You had complimentary fresh tea and coffee in reception as you only
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We appreciate you taking note of our helpful staff and friendly accommodations. We also want to say thank you for recommending us to your friends and family. Our fitness center is a little limited, but we manage to provide the best equipment possible. From our brand new weight set to well-maintained elliptical and treadmills. We can’t wait for your next trip out here, we hope you come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn is close to everything. You can park once and walk to restaurants and shops.  Also for a small fee you can take the shuttle that runs on the half hour to Disneyland. The hotel is going under a renovation but we heard no noise from the remodel. Staff is professional and very friendly. Rooms are well layed out and very clean. Pool area is great for families who need to take a break from the theme parks. I would highly recommend this hotel for business or leasure. We have stayed at many Anaheim hotels but this is our new favorite due to location and great guest relations.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide us with feedback. We appreciate you noticing our professional staff and convenient location. We are doing a lot of improvement around property and we appreciate your kindness and understanding. It sounds like you had a great time, we hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beware of construction- showing its wear
Summary: Booked this hotel at a good price as it was a hotwire hot deal and since it was a Hilton, I thought I got a good deal.   However, they are currently renovating the top floor (6th) and the construction noise was very bad up until 7:30p at night. This detail was nowhere to be found on the booking. Had I known, I would have stayed somewhere else.  It prevented us from napping during the hottest part of the day while we were visiting Disneyland.  To the hotel staff's credit, they did everything they could to minimize the disruption and were very friendly, but even their actions couldn't address the other problems we encountered.  They moved us to a 2nd floor room- but it was right next to the elevator and ice machine. The headboard of bed in that room literally shared a wall with
Manager Response: Good afternoon Ed,  Thank you for staying with us and making note of our wonderful staff. We would not be the same without them. Secondly, we understand that your stay was not perfect and we would like to make it up to you. Please give us a call if you are thinking of returning to the Anaheim area; that way, we can make special arrangements to redeem ourselves. We look forward to hearing from you.  Warmest regards,  Keith Moses Area General Manager (714) 620-2137

Summary: Friendly staff, quick to check in and out.  We've stayed numerous times on our weekend trips to DisneyLand.  Suitable pool, spa and fitness center.  Only concern is parking as the parking lot is shared with another hotel and spots fill up quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our friendly staff and comfortable accommodations. Please let us know next time you are having trouble finding parking. We can usually find a spot close by to accommodate our guests with vehicles. We hope you enjoyed your time with us and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: The entire staff was friendly and accommodating.  Close proximity to major highways, SNA airport and Disneyland.  Breakfast was better than most properties I have stayed at and the restaurant went beyond my expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with feedback. We are glad you took note of our convenient location and delicious breakfast. We always strive to be the best of our brand and it sounds like we did a good job showing off. We hope to continue exceeding your expectations on your next stay with us. Take care and give us a call when you are ready to come back.

Summary: The staff here is excellent. The hotel is in a great location and there are great transit options if you don't feel like driving. I would recommend this location to anyone who is traveling for business or pleasure. Lots of great shopping is near to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our excellent staff and convenient location. We like to think we are cleverly positioned just off all of the Disneyland hustle and bustle. We could not agree with you more when you say our location is perfect for both business and pleasure. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very good business and leisure hotel
Summary: It's a Garden Inn - so don't expect any architectural innovation :) This particular one just had a refit of the entrance hall and breakfast area - very nice and there is a terrace, too where you can take your meals.  What sets this hotel apart is the service quality and friendliness of the staff.  We had a couple of special requests with breakfast (excellently dealt with by Rigo) and needed to change some bills around, no problem, done by the management in a jiffy.  Rooms were clean, if a bit dated, but I hear there is a refit coming for those as well. So if you arrive in 2015, you should be arriving to new rooms as well.  I'd go there again, I travelled on business, but I think it will work just as well if you're looking forward to visit Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking note of our outstanding service quality and friendly staff. Rigo is one of our best servers and we value his attention to detail. Our refit for the 6th floor is nearing completion. Hopefully by 2015 we will have at least one floor complete. We value your feedback and anticipate your next stay. We hope you choose us again when returning the Disneyland area.

Summary: This hotel met the Hilton Brand standards in cleanliness and hospitality as usual.  The hotel is located less than 2 miles from the Disney Park and Disney Downtown. The location appears very upscale with lots of surrounding hotels, restaurants and nicely decorated trees.  The hotel is located 3 miles from the interstate which can be congested at certain times but moving.  We enjoyed a fabulous breakfast at the Hilton Garden Inn then drove to Disney Downtown for dinner with free parking and entertainment on the boardwalk.   We arrived back at the hotel for an early night in.  A refrigerator is available in the room for late night snacks or drinks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide us with feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our delicious breakfast and convenient location. The in-room refrigerator is always a nice amenity for leftovers, snack s and cold drinks. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Good business hotel for Garden Grove/Orange/Santa Ana area.   Perfect location as it's close to all including many good restaurants.   Hotel has everything you need for a comfortable. productive stay at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Our hotel’s location is perfect for our clientele. We like to think of ourselves as just outside of the busy Disneyland block, but still surrounded by great restaurants. Also, there is a Target store within walking distance. Thank you for taking time out of your day to provide us with feedback. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next venture.

Summary: I had come to the hotel to surprise my daughter on her birthday, the hotel staff participated and surprised her with a small bag of goodies and a warm greeting. The staff are always helpful and the hotel is always clean. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with feedback. We appreciate you noticing our helpful staff and clean rooms. Our staff does a good job of going above and beyond for our guests and it looks like they succeeded. We always try to make celebrations special and sometimes a small gift bag is all that is needed. We are glad you appreciate our gesture and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We were at this hotel for our trip to Disneyland.  The hotel was clean, quite and affordable.  We had one minor problem but it was taken care of almost immediately.  It was close to major restaurants and other places of interest.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking time out of your busy day to provide feedback. Thank you for noticing our clean rooms and affordable rates. We apologize for any inconvenience experienced during your stay, and we are glad to hear the issue was rectified. If any further action is necessary, please let us know. We always try to go above and beyond for our guests. We hope you will let us know if there is anything you need. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Everyone here is so friendly.  As soon as I walked in, I was greeted and welcomed.  Bonus points when they cheered for UCLA after seeing my UCLA shirt.  GO Bruins!  I am definitely making this my staple hotel when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our friendly staff. They always go above and beyond for our guests and we couldn’t be more fortunate. We greatly appreciate your feedback, and hope to see you back for your next vacation.

Summary: We stayed for a week with our two children.  The location is great with Disneyland within walking distance.  The staff are very friendly and will go out of their way to help you. I can't fault anything at this hotel and highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing our convenient location and friendly staff. We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you will come back for your next vacation. We train our staff based on our company’s core values. Two of the things we value the most here are: service and loyalty. Our staff is never afraid to go out of their way for a guest, especially if it means that guest will consider returning. We are glad you enjoyed yourselves and look forward to seeing you next time you are on vacation.

Summary: Our family stayed at both this location and at the Hilton just a block or two north of here.  Room was very dirty.  We found pills and food on the floor. Air conditioning was not going below 73 but maintenance guy said it was working properly and that we shouldn't expect it to get much cooler.  Shower was ok.  They had shuttle for half marathon runners which was great (Disney starting lion was 3/4 mile away) but when I asked for family members/spectators they smiled and said "you can catch a cab".  The price difference wasn't much between this hotel and Hilton but we were much happier at the Hilton.  Free parking was good though, if you can find a parking spot.
Manager Response: I apologize that your stay was not perfect. Please let us know what we can do to make it up to you. If you can please give us a call or shoot me an email, I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to turn this stay around for you. We understand how important you are as a guest and we will do anything within our power to reconcile your time spent with us. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to let us know how we can improve. We look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,   Keith Moses keith.moses@hilton.com (714) 620-2137

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but a bit far from Disneyland.
Summary: I just got back from a stay here for the Disneyland Half Marathon weekend.  I really liked the hotel but normally stay within walking distance of Disneyland and really missed the convenience of walking.    The hotel is well maintained and clean, I really enjoyed the lobby bar/restaurant, and the pool was relaxing.  The beds were comfortable and I didn't hear any neighboring guests or bathrooms, the AC unit was a bit loud but not enough to affect my sleep.  The staff was very nice.  The only drawback is the location, it's not bad, just requires a car or shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking note of our clean and well-maintained rooms. Our staff does everything they can to maintain our room’s cleanliness. Although our location is a bit far to walk to Disneyland, we work closely with a shuttle company called PCA. Our PCA shuttle goes to and from Disneyland every half hour and only costs $5 per adult and $2 per child for the whole day. We can’t wait for you to come back and thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay for a week end get away.
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights, hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was clean and quiet and relaxing. Pool was nice and jacuzzi was good. Only negative is the carpet in the room had a couple of old stains, but carpet didn't appear to be dirty, wore white six around the room one night and they stayed clean for the most part. Love the kureg coffee maker, had donut shop brand coffee which I enjoyed . Location convent to beach, shopping and Disneyland. Would definitely recommend and will probably stay again. Good price and value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. The Keurig Coffee maker was a new addition for our brand so we appreciate your feedback on it. In terms of carpeting, we are about to undergo a renovation which will replace all of our carpet and make our rooms look brand new. Thank you again for noticing our clean rooms and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: This was a nice place to stay. Is was centrually located in close distance to all attractions adn dining. The only negative is that Breakfast cost $14.00. THe Breakfast was good but overpriced for the meal. DInner was much more reasonable
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to provide us with feedback. In terms of breakfast, we charge $12.95 for the Full American breakfast option including: omelets, bacon, eggs, sausage, potatoes, etc. Also, for every paying adult, a child eats free off the child menu (scrambled eggs, bacon or sausage with pancakes). We price our breakfast based competitively on what other surrounding local restaurants charge. In addition, we just added a promotion for 25% off breakfast for all blue and silver Hilton Honors members. Therefore, if you sign up for a Hilton Honors membership we will give you a coupon at check-in for 25% off your breakfast.

Summary: Hotel was ok but aging. Carpet in room needed repaired, pay $12 for parking per day as a guess sucks. Staff was very friendly. Parking was a pain. Lots of restaurants nearby.  A/C was a little noisy. near a lot of local attractions.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. It really hurts us when we hear about a guest's stay that wasn't perfect. We are about to undergo a rooms renovation which will entail new carpet and many other improvements as well. Thank you for praising our friendly staff and we hope to see you back after our renovation.

Summary: The hotel staff is excellent, very friendly and willing to go the extra mile if needed.  The hotel appears to be an older location which shows the wear in the rooms but they are very clean and beds are extremely comfortable.   The location is very close to many restaurants and the shuttle service to Disneyland is very convenient.  Definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We are glad your enjoyed our clean rooms and "excellent staff." We train our staff based on our core management company values. We do so to keep consistency throughout our property. We are in the beginning stages of renovation so in a couple months our rooms should start to look brand new. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon!

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn Garden Grove was a clean and nice hotel right near Buca Italian Restaurant and close to Disney and other venues.  Service was good and the Rooms were clean and well appointed.  The staff did a good job of keeping our party together despite our late reservation.  They even made changes for us at the last minute. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to notice our clean rooms and favorable location. Buca Di Beppo is one of our favorite neighbors. They always have great food and fair-sized serving portions. Our front desk staff does all they can to make sure guests have the best stay possible. If this means keeping the whole family together; they will do it. We would love to have you stay with us again. In fact, we look forward to it!

Summary: Clean rooms. Nice pool and Jacuzzi. Breakfast was fresh and good. Staff was friendly and helpful.  Plenty of restaurants in the area.  Fridge and microwave in the room .coffee and tea at your disposal.shuttle to the park's
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with feedback. We are glad you noticed our clean rooms and helpful staff. We truly value the location and condition of our property. We consider ourselves lucky to be surrounded by so many great restaurants and locations. We appreciate your praise and look forward to your next vacation in our area.

Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn is located near The Baseball Stadium, a few Blocks from Disney Land. Very good dinning in the area. Easy access to freeways to work in the area. About 20 minutes to John Wayne Airport. LAX is a long ride due to traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and praise in regards to our location. Our area is constantly expanding and we feel that we have a nice foothold to all the action. Between all the dining options and activities, we really couldn't ask for more. We hope you come stay with us again soon!

Summary: no other place in anaheim, we always stay in hilton garden inn because of the people that work here they care about their guest , and the manner that they approach us was very friendly this the first thing you look into the hotel, thanks again..
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us. We love it when guests make our hotel their "go-to spot." I will make sure to pass on your praise to the people who deserve it most; our staff. Our staff never hesitates to go above and beyond for our guests. We all appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I'm a loyal Hilton Gold member and I've stayed at this hotel twice in the past 4 months.  The location is good.  Very close to Disneyland and a short drive to Anaheim stadium if you want to see the Angels play at home.  Many chain reastaurants around, in addition, many local restaurants around. If you are flying in or out of LAX, the hotel is 36 miles.  I stay here because of the location of my factories. The staff is always welcoming and friendly. My only two negatives, which are somewhat minor: 1) No flavored coffee creamers.  The half and half is not tasteful at all. 2) No typical Garden Inn hot breakfast buffet.  Everything is made to order, so it's much slower. However, the fresh fruit selection, juices and breads are continental if that's what you like.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad you enjoyed both our location and staff. In terms of breakfast, we are always improving. My Food and Beverage manager will order some flavored creamers for your next stay with us. Please request the creamers as needed and I will do everything I can to make sure we keep some stocked for you. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Over the years, I've experienced a lot of hotels during travel. Hilton Garden Inn has become my go-to place to stay when I'm looking for value, service and the amenities I value. The Anaheim location was no exception. I highly recommend for the budget-conscious travelers who like that little extra.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your loyalty and praise. We love hearing guests tell us our hotel is their “go-to spot.” We try our best to make sure our hotel is kept in the best condition possible. We hope you come back in the future and visit with us again.

Summary: Very clean and efficient.  Hotel staff was very friendly and greeted us everyday.  Free breakfast is not included in this hotel. We were their for 5 days to take the kids to Disneyland.  It's close enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are glad you appreciate our friendly hotel staff and clean rooms. Thank you for commending our staff on their friendliness. Our staff is trained based on our core company values and taught to do anything to fulfill guest needs. We hope you and your family stay with us again soon. Thanks again for spending time with us and we look forward to your next vacation.

Summary Heading: Another wonderful stay at Garden Inn Anahiem
Summary: When you arrive at this location your always met with a smile and staff that is willing to help anyway they can. I've stayed at many location around Anaheim  and this one is number 1 on my list. Because of the service and location. Close to convention center and Disneyland / also quite a few restaurants in the area outback, dennys and a great Italian ice place.  If you looking for some items you forgot target is right across the street .    The pool area is very nice and I definitely recommend there made to order breakfast buffet.  Internet is up to speed and it's free.   Bed Quality is very comfy / You can adjust soft or hard.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your number 1 property in the area. We are glad you enjoyed our comfy beds and high speed internet. With Target and plenty of restaurant options; we think this area is the best. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed back to back weeks at this fine establishment reason I say fine is simply we have never had the experience we had from checking in to checking out. First we were there for our Son's basketball camp and we were catered to in every way . Every morning we would go down for breakfast and the service was always exceptional we had a employee by the name of Argines always take care of us which I can say was very attentive always. At times he was the only one running the floor and might I say pulled through with flying colors. Not to be over looked was the rest of staff they all were Awesome! Also the front desk manager was also exceptional Ricky I believe was the gentleman name. He took care of us in every way he was always asking and making conversation when ever we
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We always love when guests tell us how great our staff is. Argenis will be praised for his hard work. He never ceases to impress me, despite how busy the breakfast area gets. Ricky is also sensational and consistently provides excellent service to our guests. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Our stay was nice, we didn't spend a lot of time in the room since we're actually here for Disneyland.  Accommodations we're nice, shuttle was easy to and from Disney.  Price was right.  Two area's for improvement: 1. complimentary breakfast would be nice, but our family is small and was not a problem for us.  2.  Parking is a bit of a problem if you leave the propery and arrive back late in the evening. Might just be our bad luck, but parking late evening was a problem.   Overall I would stay here on our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our convenient shuttle and thank you for your suggestions. In terms of parking, we open up additional spaces at night if we see that parking is getting tight. We also share a parking lot with the Hampton Inn and the Embassy Suites as well. In case parking is difficult to find, we encourage guests to let us know and we will do all we can to direct you to a spot.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights and had a very pleasant stay. The staff is fantastic, very friendly and attentive. They are the star of this property. The continental breakfast offers great value and great selection, fantastic for kids. They have a shuttle that runs twice an hour to Disneyland for a modest price. Our room could use a touch up, there was 2 very large stains on the carpet and it was fraying and peeling up in the bathroom entryway. Quiet hotel, comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback. You are absolutely right about our employees; they are the star of our property. Also, our breakfast area and shuttle service are convenient and add a nice value to your stay with us. In terms of our rooms, we will be undergoing a full renovation in September. With our renovation we will be receiving all new carpets and furnishings. We look forward to having you back, and will do all we can to improve in the meantime.

Summary: We had a blast! The lobby furniture was hip and comfortable. The employees was friendly. The breakfast special was  awesome because our family of four ate a lot of food for the money!I had the pleasure of reading the U.S.A. Today free of charge. They are available in the lobby. The small snack shack didn't have nutritious snacks but chips, candy, soda, and ice cream were available for purchase. I found the fitness center on the first floor and used it everyday of our stay. There are only 2 treadmills so get there early if you are a jogger. There is another aerobic machine too. The exercise towels were fresh and the water machine dispense very chilled water. Our room was well decorated and I love the spare blanket stored in the closet. We didn't need it but I appreciated the fact
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with feedback. It sounds like you had a great time. In an attempt to add more nutritious snacks to our pantry, our front office manager has ordered: baked chips, Nutri-grain granola bars, Nature Valley trail mix snack bars, Fiber One snacks and various diet sodas. We are glad you enjoyed our friendly staff and delicious breakfast. It sounds like your husband discovered one of the great advantages to staying with the Hilton Garden Inn brand; Herman Miller Ergonomic desk chairs. Fortunately, these chairs come standard in all of our rooms and provide more back support than regular desk chairs. Thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Very affordable, good hotel for family
Summary: Very affordable, good family hotel if you are looking to save money while going to Disneyland.  We were looking at this hotel and the Disneyland hotel.  While we wanted the entire Disneyland experience and the closeness and convenience we were also on a very tight budget.  The Disneyland hotel was $1500 versus the Hilton Garden Inn being $500.  This was a significant amount for us at the time so we choice the Hilton and we were very happy with the decision.
Manager Response: Thank you for pointing out a huge value with our property. By staying with us, you are a 10 minute bus ride away from the Disneyland theme park and our rooms are a fraction of the cost compared to the Disney hotel (depending on season). We appreciate your feedback and anticipate your next vacation!

Summary: The Hilton was fresh, light, and like a garden experience in the lobby and dining areas.  The staff at all levels was the best.  Being near to Disneyland and Knots Berry Farm made it extremely easy to have fun in the sun.  The facility was well kept, clean, comfortable, and an over all top notch hotel.  The breakfast, dining experience was a great way to start the day.  The staff was courteous, helpful, and kept the area clean and well stocked.  The food was fresh and delicious.  Check out was a breeze. The bill was slid under the door.  If you agreed, you simply pushed a button on your phone and you were done.  I would stay again at the Garden Hilton on Harbor Blvd. in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback! Firstly, Our staff's hard work is part of what makes our property great. Secondly, Thank you for your consideration in staying with us and complimenting us on our "top notch” service. I will commend my staff on being courteous and helpful. Please give us a call next time you are coming into town, we would love to have you stay with us again.

Summary: Arrived at the eve of the Fireworks and Disney closing - staff was busy and able to handle the diverse moods of people coming in very professional!   Great Breakfast smooth check out process and very supportive staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to provide us with feedback. Our staff does whatever they can to make our guests happy. They are trained to handle a diversity of situations based on our core company values. I never get tired of hearing how courteous and professional our staff is. Our managers do everything they can to break down barriers for our staff, so they can continue to provide the best service possible.

Summary Heading: Good hotel near Disneyland and SoCal favorites
Summary: I stayed here for business but immediately noticed that it would be a great vacation location. It is minutes from Disneyland and pretty easy to navigate around greater Los Angeles with a variety of freeways nearby. It's also relatively close to popular beaches. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff was very friendly. The only knock I had was that the restaurant was painfully slow. I tried it for 2 meals and then planned on eating out the rest of my stay.
Manager Response: We definitely agree with your statement about our hotel being a great vacation destination. Being close to Disneyland what we are most known for. Not many people know, but we are also close to the 57, 5 and 22 freeways.  In addition, our beaches are approximately 20-25 minutes driving depending on traffic. Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and friendly staff. The dining area is always improving and we appreciate you giving us a try. Since your stay we have added a greeter and hired another server. We will make more improvements in the meantime, but hopefully we can make it up to you next time you dine with us.

Summary: We thought that we would save a few bucks and booked this hotel.  It was a nice enough to sleep, but there were very few amenities.  The pool is tiny and is mostly in the shade,  The rooms were recently renovated and comfortable,  We took the shuttle to Disney for a fee and thought we could walk back.  It was further than we thought and regretted that decision.  If you don't want to drive there are the obvious chain restaurants around the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We appreciate when guests go the extra mile and tell us what we can do better for next time. We are glad you enjoyed our comfortable beds and recent renovation. We are also glad that you took advantage of our prime location by going to the surrounding shops and restaurants. Call us ahead of time for your next stay and we will make sure to pre-assign a room on a high floor away from elevators and ice machines.

Summary: I stayed here for one night before attending a trade show at the Anaheim Convention Center, which was about a 5 minute drive. Also about a 5 minute drive from Disneyland. Room rate was very reasonable ($99 per night).   The rooms were clean and nicely furnished.  Free wi-fi (yes!), in-room microwave  fridge, free parking.  The free breakfast had plenty of choices, as well as reasonable fee for upgraded hot items.  PROS: close to Disney and Anaheim Conv Center plenty of restaurants, coffee shops, gas stations, mini marts nearby to pick up this and that. Staff was friendly, courteous, helpful. free wifi  CONS: wish breakfast was all inclusive. Didn't think the upgraded (extra charges) items were very well marked.  WOULD I STAY HERE AGAIN? Yes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We greatly appreciate your loyalty and the opportunity we had to meet your needs. We love our staff; they always go out of their way to make sure the best service is provided to all our guests. Thank you for commending our convenient location, clean rooms and complimentary amenities. These are all parts of what make our property desirable. Thank you again and we look forward to having you back for your next vacation or convention function!

Summary: CONS: I wouldn't stay here again. What they call "premium" internet is BASIC internet. Costs $5+ a day. Breakfast is expensive and is TERRIBLE. Lots of hidden expenses when staying here. Toilet didn't flush properly, water from tap smelled very foul. BEWARNED.
Manager Response: We apologize that your most recent stay with us wasn’t perfect. We are currently preparing to undergo a renovation in September 2014. This means, most of the issues mentioned will be taken care of. Our rooms will have a brand new feel to them and our restaurant has made great improvements in the past couple weeks as well. We hired two new servers and upgraded our ice tray to hold more food. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us a second chance.

Summary: Stayed for one night to go to Disneyland. The hotel offers a shared shuttled with 2 other hotels in the area for $5 / day. They did mention that if we wanted to walk to one of the other 2 hotels to buy tickets, the multiple day bus pass is cheaper...not sure why the Hilton wouldn't just offer the same price for convenience then. Although it doesn't look too far from Disneyland on the map, trust me...after a long day in the park, walking anything more than a block feels like an eternity. The room was decent (smelled a little strange) and the bed was comfortable especially after a long day at the park. The staff at the front desk were very friendly and helpful,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to acknowledge our helpful staff and comfortable beds. We will be undergoing a guest room renovation in September 2014 which will completely change our rooms for the better. We urge you to come back and stay with us next time you are in the Anaheim area. If you give us a call ahead of time, we can send our staff to one of the neighboring hotels to secure multiple day bus passes. We understand that shuttle service is an important aspect of your stay and we will do all we can to correct the future.

Summary: Stayed for four nights for a convention at the Anaheim Convention center. Lobby is nice and the location is good but the rooms are in serious need of renovation. Tiny room with outdated decor and a huge who-knows-what stain on the carpet. The bathroom drains did not work..not in the shower nor in the sink. On the first day housekeeping didn't even take our used coffee cups off of the table. The furniture looks like its from the 1970's and not very many plugs for charging electronics.  We came here from a few nights at Hampton Inn Thousand Oaks which was by far a much nicer hotel. I didn't bother asking for another room because the hotel was sold out due tot the convention so I knew it wouldn't matter. Next time I will research a bit more before deciding on a place to
Manager Response: Thank you for complimenting our lobby and location. We are in the middle of a renovation, which means that our lobby is completely finished but our rooms start their renovation in September of this year. We are sorry to hear that your stay was anything less than spectacular and we will do all we can to improve for your next stay with us. I will talk with my housekeeping and ensure they are throwing away used coffee cups when they are cleaning rooms. In addition, I will make sure our staff understands the importance of correctly informing our guests about our shuttle service. We hope you come back to stay with us next time you are in town, we will do all we can to improve in the meantime.

Summary: Clean comfortable room good maid service,  upgraded coffee in room Keurig  with lots of choices for coffee or tea.  Microwave. very clean comfortable bed.  Beautiful modern lobby.  Friendly staff.    Breakfast selection was better than most hotels,  However poor wait staff could hardly keep up with all tables.  Probably   would suggest to have a self service breakfast or hire more breakfast staff poor staff couldn't keep up even though they were flying.  Had to pay for parking which was annoying.    Pretty far (walking)  from Disney so would have to take taxi, public bus or drive.  But overall good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to compliment us on our clean rooms and newly added Keurig coffee makers. Our breakfast area has only improved since December 2013. Since your stay, we have hired more staff, redesigned the flow of breakfast, added new potatos to our menu and assigned a rotating manager on duty to oversee the breakfast area every morning. Since these new additions, we have seen significant improvement in terms of timing and workload. We urge you to come back and see the improvment for yourself.

Summary Heading: Good location when going to Disneyland
Summary: Everything was great from check in to check out,  Only issue was the extremely slow breakfast service, the food was good, just took forever to receive, so plan ahead. Shuttle service from the hotel to Disney Parks starts early and runs late.  Rooms were very nice and quite comfortable, especially after each open to close day at Disney.  Also, no problems finding a place to park.
Manager Response: We understand that our breakfast area is always improving. We have undergone great changes in staffing and menu in the past couple months. Specifically, we made changes that would streamline the flow of breakfast. In addition, we added a rotating schedule to ensure there is a manager on duty for every morning's breakfast. Since making these changes, our breakfast has only moved faster without sacreficing quality. We hope you come back for another great stay with us!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel on our Multi-Day Road Trip
Summary: Stayed two nights at this hotel with our family of four while we were visiting Disneyland.  The front desk staff were very professional and helpful.  The lobby was beautiful and modern.  Breakfast was okay (standard Continental breakfast fare).  We received a voucher for free breakfast - if we had been required to pay for the meal, we would have been a little disappointed (although the restaurant staff were very friendly).    Liked that the rooms had two queen beds (vs. the double beds we encountered at most other hotels during our trip).  The A/C unit was quieter than most hotel rooms.    The bathroom in our room was a little rough (bent shower curtain rod, peeling paint, stained caulk around the tub, etc.).  But the overall feel of the room was clean and in pretty good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to write us a great review. We appreciate your constructivism and we will do our best to improve for your next stay with us. We are glad that you have enjoyed our spacious and clean 2 queensize bed roomtype. In addition, we are glad that our AC units are up to par. Working AC units are essential, especially during summertime in the Anaheim area. It is my pleasure to inform you of our guest room renovation which is set to start in August of this year (2014). We hope you come back and stay with us soon!

Summary: This hotel is located among the Disneyland hotel area – like the Marriott, Hilton, Sheraton and Hyatt.  It has a good carpark area – in front and on the side.  We did not have any problem finding a carpark space during our stay.  The grounds are neat and tidy.  Reception and lounge area bright. Room was on the 6th floor (top floor), reasonable size, overlooking the front carpark.  There is an empty fridge in the room so we put some cold drinks in it.  When we checked in they did not tell us about the complimentary breakfasts for HH gold members.  I had to call reception to ask for vouchers.  Cooked breakfasts were quite good – normal spread of cereals, fruit and bread.  Internet was OK.  Reasonable water pressures. Would stay here again – but hotel needs to be more switched on
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback and tell us how we can improve. Firstly, we are glad you were able to find parking throughout your stay and thank you for your observation of our neat and tidy grounds. Secondly,I have spoken with my front office manager to ensure that we are extending Hilton Honors benefits to our honors memebers. I made special notion to make sure all of our staff is aware that gold and diamond members have earned their "MyWay Preference," which includes the gold or diamond member's choice of either 750 bonus points or breakfast for themself and a guest. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back.

Summary: This Hotel was great. Great value, close to Disneyland, and the staff was awesome. I would definitely recommend staying here for both business and personal. Front desk staff was super friendly every time!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with some great feedback. I agree with you when you say our staff is awesome. We train them to make lasting connections with our guests. Based on your response, it seems their training is paying off. We hope to see you back soon for your next business or personal venture!

Summary: The customer service provided by this hotel was outstanding.  Each person was very helpful and made you feel welcome.  In addition, it was a perfect location and provided shuttle service to the Disneyland area.  Great place to stay in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We always like hearing success stories and yours seems to touch on just about everything. We train our staff based on our core values in order to maintain hospitable consistancy. Thank you for using our convinient shuttle, I'm glad everything went smoothly. We urge you to return to the area and stay with us again soon!

Summary: I travel to So Cal 4-6 times per year.  I used to stay at a variety of hotels.  Now I only stay at this property.  The hotel is nice, location is good as is the value.  However the main reason I chose this property is because of the exemplary service I have received on a regular basis over the years.  The hotel staff is tremendous and has gone out of their way to ensure I was happy.  Hassan Torres, in particular has ALWAYS taken care of me, and as long as he continues to be at this hotel I will contnue to be a customer.  Kudos Hassan and thank you...
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know how much you value our hotel. We always love hearing guests tell us our staff is doing a great job. I will make sure to pass your feedback on to Hassan's manager, so we may commend him for his efforts. We hope to see you back soon, im sure our staff is anticipating your next trip out to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Needed a quick getaway from the snow, so stayed here dec of 2013 for a 5 day getaway.  Room was not as clean as we wanted to bed, also room was old. Hotel wasn't up to our "hilton" standard. There's also a fee for parking....I believe it was $10 a night.  Can't really comment on the location, as we travelled all over Southern California, 1020km on rental car in 5 days! We just used this hotel to sleep for a few hours a night.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you have taken to provide us with feedback. We want to inform you that we have undergone a full lobby renovation in this past year (2014). In addition, we plan to renovate all of our guest rooms starting in August/September 2014. Since your stay in December, a lot of improvement has occured and we urge you to give us a call next time you are considering traveling to our area. We have had some guests say that they "barely recognize our property anymore," due to all the improvements that have been made in such a short period of time.

Summary: The front desk agent was not very helpful or welcoming. The lobby was very nice. They always had water out for anyone to drink. It was nice having the shuttle to Disneyland so we didn't have to drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your consideration and thank you for complimenting our lobby and flavored water. We are glad you enjoyed our convinient shuttle as well. We understand that parking gets a little crowded at Disneyland, which is why we work so closely with the "PCA" shuttle company. We will talk to our front desk staff and make sure they understand the value of our guests. We will do all we can to improve for your next stay with us.

Summary: We had stayed in a Hilton Garden Inn in San Diego a couple days before we came to this hotel.  We had really high expectations from the one in San Diego.  When we arrived the staff was really nice, but Hotel needs a lot of TLC.  Rundown, old, dingy, the faucet on the tub leaked the entire time.  The water in the shower was always cold. Lets just say when we come back to Disneyland we will be looking at other hotels to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you for your consideration in staying with us. We are about to start a renovation on our rooms within the next couple months. We thank you for complimenting our staff and we agree with you. Our staff does whatever they can to help our guests, please let us know next time you are staying with us and we will take extra precautions to make sure your stay is nothing less than spectacular.

Summary: My brother and I just returned from a trip taking my kids to Disneyland for the first time. I loved the location of the hotel....was close enough to everything but far enough away from the DL craziness.   Positive: The hotel and rooms are extremely clean. Housekeeping does a great job. Returning back to the room each day to find the kid's stuffed animals waiting for them on the beds and in cute positions was adorable ( one night my daughters stuffed dog was wearing her tiara!). We totally used the fridge and microwave. Saved us time in the morning and heating up snacks.  The hotel staff is very friendly and can't say enough about the Manager. Not only did he comp my drink at the bar after a long day....he also assisted me with my overloaded arms taking our laundry to the onsite
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive reflection. It sounds like you and your family had a blast! I'm glad our staff took such good care of you and we encourage you all to come back for your next vacation. Our restaurant just updated their menu and I know exactly what you mean. The veggie quesadillas are awesome! I will follow-up with housekeeping to find out what happened. Like you said, I'm sure it was a minor issue but I want to make sure it is fixed for your next stay.

Summary: Awesome job to the HGI team you guys are wonderful taking good care of my family and I while we where there, I appriciate all you have done for us.   Disney land is sure close to the hotel which you can catch a shuttle bus at a minimal cost.  The rooms were clean and fresh upon check-in outstanding job Housekeeping Team.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our clean rooms and Disneyland shuttle. Considering parking at Disneyland is $16 (without in and out priviledges), our shuttle can help families save money. With tickets starting at $5 per adult and $2 per child, the whole family can get transportation for the whole day and leave the car parked at the hotel.

Summary: The Hotel is one of the best around the area, the service and facilities are excellent.  The Hotel is a couple miles away from Disneyland, but the extra minutes to get to the hotel is well worth.  The service can be considered as close as a family service, the restaurant provides excellent food, and the waiters make sure all what you need is giving to you in a timely manner.  The hotel also provides a complimentary internet service free of charge, in the past I have stayed in bigger hotels and the charge you for every thing including internet service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We like to think we are the best, and we love it when guests think so as well. Our restaurant service is always helpful and accomodating. Many Hilton brand properties charge additional for internet. The Hilton brands that typically have complimentary internet are: Hilton Garden Inn (us), Hampton Inn and Homewood Suites. We are glad you have chosen wisely and hope to see you back in teh future!
