All the while, never making me feel like a complete screw up ( though I definitely was ). Thank you so much for all the extra effort.. I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: I am glad that Ricky and his team were able to go above and beyond in order to help you in your search for a hotel room. Also, thank you for expressing your gratitude, as that is much appreciated and whenever the next time you plan to visit, please make sure to stop by and say hello.

Summary: we spent 5 days for family reunion with  60 people of all ages and loved every minute.  Close to Disney, restaurants and transit.  Super nice staff and very clean facility.  Pool and patios awesome for gatherings and the food was wonderful at breakfast.  Meeting rooms were ideal for our size group.
Manager Response: It most definitely sounds like we provided outstanding service for you and your family. I'm glad that we were able to accomodate you with all of our amazing amenities, and we look forward to your stay with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice and close to a lot!!
Summary: I work for Hilton a Waldorf Astoria resort and I feel this is a nice option for a couple nights.  Did have an issue with the bathroom toilet, they missed cleaning it from the last guest.  Besides that it was a nice place.  Room service is from various restaurants and very expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, it is always a pleasure to have a fellow team member as a guest. However, I do want to apologize for the inconvenience with your bathroom, and although you had a nice stay, I hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can make it right.

Summary Heading: Will not return to this Hotel
Summary: I would not stay at this hotel again. The rooms are dated and smell. When we arrived we notice the AC was not getting cold. Call front desk and they told me they could have someone in the morning take a look at it. Five minutes into my sleep I notice my bed had deflated. That's right deflated, apparently the air adjustment unit was broken. So now I have a room that is hot (80 degrees) and my bed is broken. What a nightmare.  We checked out first thing and asked for a full refund.
Manager Response: I am extremely sorry for your experience with us and would love to have the opportunity to regain your loyalty. Please know that we have credited you with a full refund for that night and we do hope that you will give us another chance in providing you with a fantastic stay, as that is what we strive to do each and every day.

Summary: The Rooms are nice, and the staff is great!!! The food is good, and the service is great as well!!! I would stay at one of the Hilton Garden Inn facilities again... I would also recommend this Hotel company to any of my family and friends where ever they vacation!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for expressing all of the great things that we have to offer, and taking the time to recommend us to your family and friends. It definitely sounds like you had an amazing stay and do make sure to stop by and say hi during your next visit.

Summary: Walking distance to Disney (about 2km) Target near by allowing you to purchase food, drinks and any essentials to keep cost low, fridge and microwave in room very useful.  Comfortable beds, nice hot showers.  Overall Good value for your money.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that your recent stay with us was an enjoyable one. We do take pride in our location and the many businesses that cater to our guests. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: 3 Hilton Properties in one lot! Amazing!
Summary: Stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn on Harbor Boulevard over the 4th of July weekend. Price is average - amenities are great.  Was able to use the Embassy Suites pool which is better and bigger. Love the SLEEP NUMBER BED! Within walking distance to multiple restaurants!
Manager Response: I am happy to hear that your stay with us was amazing and that you were able to use the amenities provided. We are glad you chose to stay with us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is definitely on our list of ones we would return to.  The staff went above and beyond to ensure that our visit was enjoyable.  Our daughter is physically disabled which can be a challenge.  The hotel room was very comfortable and accessible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty with us. We do our very best to accomodate each and every guest in any way possible. Great service is what we aim for and I am glad that we were able to provide outstanding service to you and your family.

Summary Heading: It's only downhill after you ask for directions...
Summary: We had the unfortunate experience of having to encounter "T". One of the most unprofessional, snide, rude employees that I have had to come in contact with lately. From check in to check out, we had to deal with very poor treatment by this person. It is sad to see someone who exhibits such poor customer service and not care!  Luckily we were able to change hotels and only had to stay at this HGI one night. Besides the rudeness we encountered and endured, the hotel is a bit dated. Our room could use some renovations but that could have been overlooked if we did not have to deal with "T". She was obnoxious from the get-go and seemed very proud of herself.  We were not the only guest to change hotels as the couple in front of us at check out was doing the same thing and like us,
Manager Response: I am so sorry for the challenges you had during your stay with us. We pride ourselves in our customer service (as evidenced by the overall service comments on Trip Advisor), however we most definately fell short during your stay. Please know that we have credited you for the one night and hope to at some point have you back again to enable us to regain your loyaty and provide you with a fantastic stay that is to the standards we strive for each and every day.

Summary: I stayed at this Hilton and was very pleased with all of the staff.  Rooms were clean and you never  felt like you were going to have items stolen.  Rooms were nice, and my room overlooked the street to some nice views.
Manager Response: I am extremely pleased to hear that your recent stay with us was a "Home away from home," for you. We do our best in providing outstanding service, as well as a safe environment, for our guests. Thank you for staying with us, and during your next visit, please stop by and say hello.

Summary: I was aware of numerous positive comments about the front desk staff before I booked this hotel and was pleasantly surprised to find out that the comments were well deserved.  As a group, this is the best front desk staff I have encountered in the US.  I wish I could remember the name of the young man who was on duty, usually in the afternoons.  He was ready to tackle any request about where to go, where to park and where to avoid.  Really helpful.  We relocated to this hotel from the Residence Inn next door, primarily because it was almost $80/night cheaper and we had another full week to stay.  There wasn't an included breakfast buffet here at our rate, but the two of us were able to eat for less than $80/day.  The room is standard size for a non-kitchenette.  It was roomy
Manager Response: It most definitely sounds like your stay was great! As a team, we always do our best in accomodating every guests. Whether it be rushing to get a luggage rack or providing useful information, we aim to please and I am glad that the hotel staff was able to do this for you, and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We recently stayed mid June for a family gathering.  The front desk staff is by far the best we have encountered.  The hotel is clean throughout and conveniently located to many eating establishments and to Disney area (for families).   This was our second stay within a year and we'll be here again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the loyalty and the wonderful comments about the staff! Next time to make it in please stop by to say hello!

Summary: My stay at the Hilton Garden in Anaheim/Garden Grove was a pleasant one. I would recommend making sure your Hilton Honors benefits are clear though. I was not given a free breakfast as a gold member when I  usually am offered that benefit.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that your stay was a pleasant one, we hope to be great next time you are in town! I looked up your Hilton Honors profile and it appears that on your preferences you selected the 750 additional points as opposed to the breakfast, as this is part of the My Way preferences offered to the Hhonors Elite members throguh Hilton. Please feel to contact me and I will be happy to modify your preferences. I an be reached at keith.moses@hilton.com or by calling 714.620.2137.

Summary: had to sleep on floor bed uncomfortable.  not told about a handle on side of mattress until next day slept on floor. for 130? b.s. and 12 for parking? come on if you want more for your room charge it not a parking charge. and for a motorcycle? and why was I not given the  weekday rate on a sunday and not given the option for continental breakfast all in all not a good experience. staff let me down on the customer service experience.
Manager Response: I am extremely sorry for your experience with us and would love to have the opportunity to regain your loyalty. The hotel has looked up your reservation and has reached out to try to rectify any issues. If you do not hear from us please feel free to contact me, Keith Moses, at 714.620.2137

Summary: Stayed in this hotel for one night on a business trip, i'm disappointed that this hotel doesn't provide bottled water though it claims itself as a business hotel.... the parking is crowded and expensive. Room is adequately clean but nothing special...
Manager Response: There is nothing we like less then hearing that we are average. We take great pride in our service and accomdations and apologize that your stay was not outstanding. You had mentioned that the hotel does not provide bottled water to the guests, I need a little more clarification on this if possible. We do provide complimentary bottled water to our Hhonors members as is outlined by the Hilton Honors program, or if you happen to look thirsty (we also have fruit infused water availble all afternoon and evening in the lobby)! I understand your concern with the parking, I do want to let you know that  the parking  fee is the norm in the Anaheim/Garden Grove resort area, the pricing we charge is relatively low in comparison.  some of the other area hotels. Please feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss futher or so we may have the opportunity to regain your loyalty. Keith Moses, keith.moses@hilton.com or by phone at 714.620.2137.

Summary: The hotel is clean, updated with a very friendly staff.  The pool was small but adequate.  Lots of great locations to eat if you are not interested in the hotel restaurant.  Location is great near all the major attractions.  Great value for your money.
Manager Response: It sounds like we were able to provide a great stay! We hit it on all levels with a great staff and accomodations! Thank you for choosing us and we look forward to having you back int he future.

Summary Heading: Bud and Bettys visit to Garden Grove
Summary: My wife and I visit this area at least twice a year. We have stays at this hotel 3 times so far usually for 7-10 day at a time. The hotel is clean, comfortable, the breakfast is great. I always stay at Hilton Garden Inns while on business (if there is one close). What stands out about this one is the staff. They are very friendly and go out of the way to help. Make sure you have at least one breakfast downstairs (if not more). If you are a gold or diamond honors member it is free. The servers make you feel right at home. This hotel it right near Disney so there is a high volume of tourist traffic in the area. But you will never feel it here. I would definitely recomment it.
Manager Response: What a fantastic review, and I must say I love the review title! We truly appreciate your loyalty and it means a lot to be acknowledged that our staff is providing the kind of service to make us stand out from the rest! Next time you are in please stop in and say hello!

Summary: This area has plenty of hotels.  Don't let the name fool you.  This place is dated and the Embassy Suites in the same parking lot is a much better option.  Hotel Staff seems to lack training.  The parking is horrible on busy nights and they charge for it.  I had to park across the street/off the property and still had to pay for parking.
Manager Response: I am so sorry about the issues you had with your stay with us! Believe me, we are constantly conducting training and always attempting to provide the best possible service to our guests (as evidenced by the other comments). I cannot apologize enoguh for the parking issues you had with us. I am hoping that the charges for the parking were reversed as not being able to find parking is unacceptable by all means. If they have not already been reversed please contact me at keith.moses@hilton.com or by calling me at 714.620.2137 as our goal is to regain your loyalty.

Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel property.  We were pleased to see both Rigo (breakfast waiter) and Jasmine (front desk) again.  They both appear very happy with serving guests, and both go above and beyond.  Rigo remembered our breakfast order each day, and was so polite and helpful when we were asking about touring the local scene.  We love the breakfast included in the price of the night's stay, and will definitely stay at this hotel again on our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: It is always so awesome when someone leaves the hotel and remembers the associates by name! I will definately pass your kind words along to Rigo and Jazmine!

Summary: Love this Hotel, I would recomend it to anyone and I have. I will be back soon!!!! The staff was great and the Hotel was in great shape.  I really enjoied the staff on the Disney Shuttle. They rock, they were so friendly and they were always on time. They had a Disney movie playing and I thought that was a great touch!!
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you are passing the good word about us to others! Word of mouth is so important and greatly appreciated. I will pass the kind words on to the shuttle drivers as well!

Summary: This HGI is showing signs of its age and high traffic but the people who work there take your mind off any issues.  Great staff, excellent breakfasts and a wonderful location.  And there is a Buca di Beppo across the parking lot.  Who could ask for more?
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about the wonderful service, tasty breakfast, and ideal location our hotel provides! Please note that we are constantly updating the hotel and will continue to do so in the upcoming months to ensure we are not showing the signs of age you mentioned!

Summary: I've stayed at a few hotels in Anaheim when I visit for Disneyland.  I usually only need a room to just sleep and shower in so I'm not very picky.  I am always pleasantly surprised during each of my stays and have pretty much decided this place is my go-to hotel when I am in town.  It is also beside Target so you can stock up on your vacation needs! Book here, You won't regret it!
Manager Response: With all the choices you have in the Anaheim/garden Grove resort area, it is wonderful that you have chosen us as your hotel of choice! Next time you are here please stop by and say hello!

Summary Heading: Excellen stay at Hilton Garden Inn - for family
Summary: We stayed at Hilton Garden Inn for two days while we visited the Disney land and left very happy.   We arrived around 11 am and were promptly greeted. I asked if we can check in early because we were traveling with our 2 years old son and they graciously checked us in without any problem (well the room was ready) and with a smile. Front desk clerks were all very friendly.  We stayed in a room with two queen sized beds and it was a good sized room. while we stayed, we didn't hear any noises from other rooms. The whole place was clean and well maintained. Free internet (wireless and wired).  OK, not so great part = They don't have free breakfast, I think it was $12 - 13 per adult (they give you a discount coupon) and you do have to pay for parking (you get 50% discount - $6 - if
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about your comfortable, friendly stay with us. It is great to hear we got the service and accommodation right for you! I realize there are some additional fees at the hotel, please know that our parking fee is competitively priced as there is a fee for most hotels in the resort district. For breakfast, although there is a fee, I would like to think that the full cook to order breakfast we are able to offer has a great variety and superb taste. Not to mention although the breakfast area gets extremely busy, we are able to offer a little less crowded breakfast for our guests.

Summary: Very comfortable bed!  Felt very welcome upon arrival.  Wished I had more time to enjoy the pool and gym.  Would definitely recommend this hotel and hope to return again with my family.  The shuttle service to Disneyland seems very convenient.  Numerous restaurants and shops within walking distance.  Felt very safe during my stay.
Manager Response: Now you have an excuse to come back, so you are able to try out the pool and gym! We are glad you enjoyed the Garden Sleep System bedding and friendly welcome! Thank you for the great comments!

Summary Heading: Fun and welcoming to all ages
Summary: Our family has stayed here the past 3 vacations and enjoyed every minute of it. Staff is very welcoming and helpful. Rooms are very clean and comfortable after a long day at Disneyland. The hotel is conveniently close to Disneyland and other restaurants such as Joe's Crab Shack which is in walking distance. Shuttles to Disney in the morning are fun and a fast way to get there. Pool was a great way to take a nice break and for the kids to enjoy. Fantastic Hotel and would recommend to anyone!!!
Manager Response: It is so nice to know that we have had the opportunity to be a part of last three vacations! That truly means a lot, and based on your comments, it sounds like we have continued to get it right! Thank you so much for the loyalty!

Summary: Great location to Disneyland. The rooms were clean. The restaurant has good options for breakfast including hot items although I wish the service was a bit better. I also wish the parking situation is better. The spaces were small and would not have been enough if we had come later in the night. The bedding and pillows were the best after daily, all day Disney visit. Anyone here know what brand, model, type of pillows this location use? If so, please share.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay! We are glad that you were able to get a good night sleep in a clean comfortable room after a long day at Disneyland! I would love to gather some more informaiton on the service in breakfast as well as provide you with the contact information to order the pillows from the hotel. Please feel free to email me at keith.moses@hilton.com or by calling me at 714.620.2137. Thanks!

Summary: Great place close by Disneyland!!! The shuttle was extremely easy to use and convenient. The staff was very helpful and met our needs. And the pool was a nice break to refresh after being on our feet all day at Disney.
Manager Response: Based on your review it sounds like we were able to provide all of the necessities to make your stay great! Thank you for letting other know!

Summary Heading: Love Hilton Garden Inn - Garden Grove Anaheim
Summary: This hotel is excellent, we always stay here when we visit Disney at least 4-5 times per year. It is a quiet, safe neighbourhood. The staff are always courteous and go above and beyond. The rooms are updated and clean, there is laundry on the first floor and the B&B option is great value. I would highly recommend staying here. We tried a few others on our first few trips to Disney but once we stayed at the Hilton, we knew we had found the best place to stay.
Manager Response: Now this is a great review! It really means a ton to us to know that with all of the choices you have when in Anaheim/Garden Grove that we are the one for you to creat your memories! Next time you in please stop by and say hello!

Summary Heading: Affordable Alternative with all the comfort~
Summary: Hilton Garden Inn is conveniently located near the parks, sports venues, convention centers and shopping. While a bit dated it is comfortable and affordable and meets or exceeds expectations. Free Parking is a big plus!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim for 3 days. The staff was extremely friendly, and bent over backwards to help us in any way they could. Jasmine always had a bright and friendly smile for us in the morning, and Kevin (the manager) directed us to some great places to visit. Our beds were incredibly comfortable - this from a person with chronic back problems. They have dials on the side of the beds so you can adjust the firmness. The rooms were very clean and also extremely quiet. (We had members of an 8th grade band staying on our floor, and we only heard them as they headed to their rooms.) The breakfast buffet was plentiful with lots of variety, plus with every paying adult, kids eat free, this was quite a bargain. We used the pool, which was warm, and the exercise
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review! It is always so wonderful to hear about the great service and comfortable accomdation we were able to provide during your stay. Most notably your comment about Jazmine! I always love when people remember us by name as it really means that we impacted their stay!

Summary Heading: A great hotel in a good location
Summary: Very good experience. All employee very good and ready to help at any time. Clean and big rooms are very confortable. The breackfast is great. Business center clean, up to date .... It was a very good experience a must come back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your good experience with us. We look forward to having you back next time you are in the area!

Summary: This hotel stay has been super amazing!  The hotel staff was super courteous!  The room must have insulated walls as we heard no noise during my stay!  BTW, the hot breakfast the hotel served was first class!
Manager Response: There are a lot of supers in your repsonse which makes me very pleased! Thank you for the wonderful comments and for letting others know about your stay!

Summary: Although the purpose of our visit here was to go to Disneyland, we selected this hotel based on our previous experiences here.  It is always very quiet and peaceful and you are pretty much guaranteed a great night sleep.  The breakfast is excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty! We realize that sometimes it is difficult to find consistency when staying at hotels (or almost anything else for that matter), so it is great that based on your comments as well as others that we are able to get it right over and over again!

Summary: They really have a nice staff here.Even the towels in the bathroom are design like the one in the cruise!Rooms are big, with fridge, microwave, free internet.Next to Parks and attractions.They need to add pay per view movies... they don't have it :(
Manager Response: Although we would much rather hear the we were great, it sounds like you had a wonderful stay with us! It is always nice when people share their pictures of the hotel so others are able to see as well. In regards to the pay per view, sadly the demand for this has diminished with all of this new-fangled technology!

Summary: HGI Garden Grove is the best value for the money in all of Southern California and the staff is the most courteous and professional I have ever dealt with. Truly one of the jewel's of the Hilton chain.
Manager Response: I cannot tell you how much your review warms my heart and truly means the world to me! I have passed it along to the team as an example of the impact that we have on our guests!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn.  It is very clean, tastefully decorated and roomy.  The staff is very courteous and pleasant.   Parking is convenient.  The shuttle to Disneyland is very convenient, however it is too crowded in the morning when everyone wants to get to the park and when they want to come back at night.  We didn't feel safe with so many people standing in the aisle.
Manager Response: It sounds like we were able to provide a pleasant, comfortable stay, with accommodating service and amenities! Please know that safety is obviously our priority and I will along your comments about the shuttle to our vendor to ensure we are properly taking all safety precautions during our busier shuttle times.

Summary: For a Hilton, the negatives were I was surprised it didn't have a free breakfast (read it on tripadvisor, but it was an extra charge as part of the room), that was disappointing.  I got there around 6 pm and as pretty much expected, I was charged the whole parking fee of $12 for the day of arrival and the next day when I left.  So basically $24 for less than 24 hours.  There was a stain that looked like they had tried to clean up with bleach, so was 3 feet around with lighter carpeting.  The shower curtain was torn, but workable.  For the positives, there was cookies in the evening of arrival, ice water with sliced lemons, The shampoo and soap was neutrogena.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Trip to Disney with the kids!
Summary: Stayed in this Garden Inn  with my wife and 2 kids (5yrs & 1yr) to visit Disneyland for the first time. The hotel is clean and noiseless, but found the rooms small, since we had to put the crib for the youngest in the small leaving room. I would not recommend this hotel if you are travelling with very young kids. But, my 5yrs old loved it! He had a queen size bed only for him (super-comfy) and right at the side of mom&dad.
Manager Response: Isn't that best to be a five year old with own queen bed! Although you found the room a little too small, we are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope that you and your family created some wonderful memories! Thank you for letting us be a part of it.

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim has an amazing staff, great breakfast, just the right size rooms and a wonderful pool area. This is a great family hotel that is very welcoming. We will continue to return and recommend to others!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a pleasant stay. Everything was clean, staff friendly and internet was free! Breakfast was made to order and fresh fruit. The staff made sure our a taxi was called for and allowed us to use the gym to change into flying attire!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: HGI Harbor Blvd. Garden Grove ROCKS!!!
Summary: Just a great facility located only 3-4 blocks form Disney Land.  Walking distance to several hotels.  Easy access from John Wayne Airport.  The staff is fantastic.  I travel for a living and predominantly stay at Hilton properties...I would put this staff up against any hotel...anywhere!!!
Manager Response: It is great to hear from someone who travels all the time what a wonderful staff that we have. It really means a lot! I happen to agree and next time you are here please stop by to say hello!

Summary: My stay was awesome, everyone was friendly, checkin was fast checkout even faster, room was nice bed was comfy.  The wi fi worked great, loved the shuttle they had to take us to Disneyland. I would stay here again and recommend it to anyone going to Anaheim for business or pleasure
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and please know that this hotel loves your review too! Thank you for letting others know about us and we look forward to your return visit.

Summary: We selected the Hilton Garden Inn based off its location and brand reputation. We were not disappointed. We loved having the refrigerator and microwave in our room and having Target a block away so we could stock up on breakfast and lunch items for the kids - making it perfect to run off to Disneyland super early and not pay for the high food prices at the park. Although the weather didn't cooperate enough for us to enjoy the pool, the kids were excited to see there was a clean one at the hotel. We took the bus shuttle each morning which was very convenient and inexpensive. We loved being a block away from great dinner restaurants for the kids such as Red Robin and Buca di Beppo. Staff was courteous and friendly. They even offer free kids breakfast per paying adult. We purchased
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay, friendly and helpful staff
Summary: We stayed here for 7 days for both work and play. The staff was very accomodating and even let us check in early when we arrived. The hotel rooms were clean, beds comfortable. Breakfast at the hotel was alright. They have a made to order breakfast with a breakfast bar. Location is perfect, not right on top of Disney but still very close to all attractions. The overall experience was great.
Manager Response: I never tire of heaing about our very friendly and accomodating staff! It is a wonderful thing to read about and for others to know! Rooms clean and comfortable, with a breakfast and centralized location, what more could you ask for! Thank you!

Summary Heading: Good place to Stay for Disneyland Trip
Summary: Overall we had a good experience with Hilton Garden Inn. Front Desk service was extremely helpful and would definitely stay here again. The only thing I would recommend is to get familiar with the shuttle schedule so your not waiting long, because they are normally on time.
Manager Response: We are so glad you had a good experience with us, but next time we want it to be great! Wonderful tip to remind others about the shuttle, basically it picks up at the hotels on the 15 and 45's, while the pickup at the Parks is at 30 and on the hour.

Summary: Location of this facility was ideal for my Seminar at a Double Tree, which was in walking distance.  It is also conveniently located to Disney.  Their is also an Embassy Suites and a Hampton Inn at the same location.  Their is an Outback Steakhouse and Joe's Crab Shack within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about our centralized location and proximaty to local attractions and restaurants. We appreciate your patronage and hope to have you back as our guest in the future!

Summary Heading: Walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Ctr
Summary: The hotel is located close to the convention center that I was able to park my car at the hotel parking lot and walk to the meeting.  The staff are very friendly, especially at the dining hall during the breakfast. They claim the facility has been renovated, but probably not very recently.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about out centralized location and friendly staff. We are always updating something with a full lobby and restaurant renovation coming up soon!

Summary: The customer service of the staff was outstanding. Everyone was friendly, accommodating and went above and beyond our expectations. The room was clean, spacious and the cooked to order breakfast was a bonus. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It sounds like we really hit it out of the park! We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: Had a great experience, from check-in to check-out, they were sincere, when they asked if there is anything else they could do. Customer service was excellent. Breakfast was great. Cookies were good every night.
Manager Response: I know it always make me happy when someone sincerely asks me about my experience, as you can always tell when it is genuine, we thank you for noticing! It sounds like your stay went great and we really appreciate you letting others know about it!

Summary: The staff was incredible.  My son and I got sick durring our stay and the management and staff went out of thier way to make sure we had everything we needed and were ok while we were sick.  They went way above and beyond.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed here on the second leg of our honeymoon after having had 4 days in Las Vegas. Now the hotel wasn't at Trump standards (where we stayed in LV) but it was ideal for us as a base. Very pleasant reception staff dealt efficiently with our requests and the maids ensured the room and bathroom were spotless. I'd recommend styling here if you're going to Disney as its only minutes away and it's 5 mins from the Honda Center and Angel's Stadium if you're sports fans! Easy to get to the interstate for trips to LA/Hollywood/San Diego too.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you not only took the time to let others know about your comfortable stay with us, but also that we were able to be a part of such a special occassion! Congratulations on your recent nuptuals!

Summary: Very helpful staff at front desk. Great room cleaning. Hotel close to Disneyland, and shuttle available from right outside. Would highly recommend to anyone planning a trip in the area. Would stay here again for sure
Manager Response: When you come back make sure you stop by and say hello as I would like to personally thank you for letting everyone else know about  your great stay with us!

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn is an excellent choice if you plan on visiting Disneyland and California Adventures. There is shuttle service for a fee or you can take your vehicle to Disneyland parking for five dollars more. The real adventurous can walk the mile to the parks. You are about 12 miles away from Huntington Beach. The rooms are nice and meet the needs for resting from a long day at the parks. The breakfast is nice and competitive with what is available around the area. The hotel gives a coupon for the Italian restaurant right next door which is very nice. The staff is friendly and helpful if you have never been in the area before. You can purchase your tickets there as well and I highly recommend the city pass which gives you a three day hopper pass to Disneyland and California
Manager Response: This review will truly help our future guests know about the hotel and what we have to offer! Thank you for touching on our great service, central location, and tasty breakfast (it is a great value, especially since children eat free with a paying adult). I agree that if you are visiting multiple attractions in Southern California , the City Pass we have available for sale, is a fantastic value! With a 3 Day Park Hopper for Disney Parks, 1 day at Universal Studios, and 1 day at Sea World.

Summary: Very good facility - clean, well maintained and good value for money.  Great location.  Staff were lovely staff and very helpful.  Take advantage of purchasing entertainment tickets at the front desk to avoid line-ups at various venues.  They also provide excellent directions to many areas in and around Anaheim.  Only thing we didn't like was that they charge for parking.
Manager Response: We appreciate you letting others know about the great value, helpful staff, great location, and accommodations we provided during your stay.  We  are glad the Front Desk was able to save you time and convenience by helping you with local attraction tickets and reservations. The parking fee you mention is the norm in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area due to our proximity to the Disney Parks and Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: OK hotel. Clean and stocked with nice shampoos and such. Not as nice as other Hilton Garden Inns I've stayed at. The staff are very professional. I wasn't told about a parking fee when I booked with the company credit card. When I told the front desk clerk he waived the fee. It would be a good choice for a family going to do a couple days at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Please know that we take great pride in our service and accommodations, and for us we do not ever like to hear that we were only good enough. We always want to be great, fantastic, stupendous, or some other kind of remarkable adjective! We hope the next time you are in the area that we are able to prove that.

Summary: Our family of 3 stayed 8 nights at this property in late March-early April 2013 and would recommend it. From check in to check out we were thrilled with the personal, attentive service from each and every staff member we dealt with. The property is affordable, VERY clean and close to amenities. Our room was spacious and clean, a little dated in decor for my taste, but comfortable and my husband was happy with the flat screen TV! The beds were cofortable and we enjoyed the adjustable settings - no sore backs on this trip! The breakfast is fresh, delish and a great way to start your day before hitting the parks. During our stay we utilized the pool area, which was attractive & well taken care of as well as the business centre,and fitness facility, both of which were functional &
Manager Response: It is so nice to log onto Trip Advisor and consistently read comments about our wonderful service, centralized location, tasty breakfast, spacious rooms, comfortable beds, and the fantastic news that of all of the choices you have when visiting the area that you will be staying with us again!

Summary Heading: Great location, comfortable and reasonably priced
Summary: Had a great stay at this very conveniently located hotel. It's close to Disneyland, shops (small ones as well as a huge Target), loads of restaurants, and main bus routes. My room was large (2 queen beds), clean and comfortable. The hotel does feel slightly dated, but that did not detract from my overall experience. Hotel staff were friendly and very helpful. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting others know about our great service, centralized location, and large, clean rooms! Looking forward to having you back, we hope in the near future!

Summary: Booked ahead for Easter break and got a good deal.  Awesome cooked to order breakfast available.  Good, courteous service all through stay!  Would stay here again!  Rooms were clean and very quiet.  Pool and fitness facility in good order.  Did not use business center, but it looked serviceable.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about your recent stay with us. Sounds like we managed to make your stay with us a great one! Please stop by and say hello next time you are in town!

Summary: I make many trips a year to the Disneyland resort, and this is one of my go-to hotels... it is reliably up to standards and usually available at a great price. If you arrive late at night, it may be hard to find parking, but there are multiple hotels all in this area and you can find spots just a little ways away. The rooms and furnishings are a little dated, but clean and comfortable. They have the HGI adjustable firmness mattresses. They have a decent breakfast in the morning. It is always convenient to have HGI pantry with bottled water and snacks. Friendly staff, convenient location for Disneyland, definitely recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us one of your go to hotels! We appreciate your great comments about the service, location, and amenities we provide. Next time you stay I want you to try one of our daily specials (the breakfast burrito with freshly made salsa is my personal favorite), as we are determined to change your opinion from a decent breakfast to a great breakfast! Thanks again for your loyalty!

Summary: We had a group of cheer and pom and parents aprox. 18 rooms. From the minute we called reservations and spoke with Ramon we knew everything was going to be great. He went above and beyone to make sure that our group was taken care.The breakfast buffet excellent. Rooms nice and clean.Awsome staff. If you are looking for a place close to Disneyland, think no more stay here.
Manager Response: We love Westwood High School! Your group was fantastic and we are so glad you all had such a great stay. I am lucky to have such a wonderful staff and I took great pride in passing on your great comments about Ramon to the entire team. We hope you guys won!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay if visiting Disneyland
Summary: Was there with a family of four for a week, although the room was a little small, overall the place was very clean and the staff was very polite and helpful. Good location for Disneyland and lots of good restaurants and shopping nearby
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about our friendly staff, clean accommodations, and centralized location. I am sorry that you felt the rooms were a little small, but rest assured they are comparable or larger than most non-suite hotels in the Anaheim/Garden Grove area. Thank you again for your patronage and look forward to seeing you back in the future!!

Summary Heading: Comfortable rooms, friendly staff, could walk to Convention Center
Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for 5 nights in February for a conference.  The room was very comfortable- I esp. liked being able to adjust the firmness of the bed.  All of the staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  A few breakfast items were purchased at the Target store which was within walking distance, and the microwave and refrigerator were put to good use.  There were plenty of cupboards for storing water and food.  I asked for a quiet room, but the room faced the main road (Harbor) and the street noise could be heard even from the top floor, so I kept the fan running to buffer the noise.  (Next time I would try a room that faces west.)  The hotel is a very easy 15-20 minute walk to the Anaheim convention center.  A taxi ride cost about $7.00.  Buca di Beppo
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments about our service, comfortable beds, central location, and handy amenities. Hopefully next time you are in the hotel you are able to try our breakfast, we offer the full buffet, continental, or a la carte items, and I can say from experience they are quite tasty!

Summary: Just came back from spending ten nights at Hilton Garden Inn in January.  Rooms were smaller than other comparative hotels we been to but it has everything we needed – microwave and refrigerator.  The hospitality was exceptional, comparable to 5 star hotels.  I was very happy with how Management was accommodating to our needs.  We went with another family and I have asked for the rooms to be on the same floor but he gave us adjoining rooms instead.  It was the best for the kids; allowing better evening gathering.  Staffs were friendly, responsive to our needs, and informative regarding attractions.  I would definitely bring the family, friends and relative back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments about the 5 Star service you received with us! We take a great deal of pride in the service we offer and follow through on and it seems that we hit it out of the park with you and your family. I look forward to sharing your comments with the entire team!

Summary: We've stayed here from Jan 27 - Feb 6 for a family Disneyland trip.  The location of the hotel was great.  Less than 5 minutes drive to the Disney parking lot ($15) where the shuttles were always ready to bus us right in front of the Disney front entrances and the other way around.  The parking also allowed re-entries (free) which was a bonus.  They had our room and my cousin family room The hotel was very clean and the maid did a great job cleaning our room everyday.. The service desk people were extremely friendly, greeting us with their big smile very time.  We tried the breakfast in the hotel and it was okay.  The only issue I had with the hotel, not sure it was due to the dust or someone has smoked in the room previously or it's me :), but I sneezed like crazy every morning
Manager Response: We are glad that you chose to stay with us for your family vacation! Thank you for letting us know about your stay and the big smiles and clean rooms we were able to provide. I am so sorry about the kind of allergies that occured with us. We are 100% non-smoking, so I hope the probem was not from smoking before you. Please feel free to contact me discuss if you would like as we would love to become your permanant hotel away from home when you visit the Anaheim/Garden Grove area.

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn - Garden Grove is great!
Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn - Garden Grove is great! Helpful staff, clean, easy parking, small store available, sitting area with TV in the lobby and breakfast area. It is close to Disneyland.  There are great family restaurants within walking distances.  A Target store is also within walking distance if you need something.
Manager Response: Thank you for the breaking out all of the wonderful qualities about the hotel, including our great location, clean rooms, wonderful service, and helpful amenitiies. We look forward to seeing you int he future!

Summary Heading: Safety Issues.  Property was 2 stars, service was 4 stars
Summary: I stayed here for two nights on business.  The location is good- close to major highways and within walking distance to Disney (2 miles?) and the convention center (1 mile).   Parking was easy, but there is a charge for it- $12/night.  Unlike most Garden Inns, the restaurant was only available for breakfast.  There are some nearby good choices though.  The fitness room is nice and well appointed.    The check in experience was good.  The guys at the front desk were very pleasant and welcoming.   The hotel's common areas are very dated to the point of feeling unclean.  The elevator landings had an unpleasant odor.  The first room I was assigned reeked of smoke upon opening the door, but the front desk workers were great about getting me reassigned.     The room was rough.  It was
Manager Response: Please know that safety for our guests and associates is our number one priority! The entrance that you discussed is working and the hotel is completely secured through all entrances. I am also pleased to let you know that the hotel will be undergoing a renovation in the near future that will include adding a bar, dinner service, as well as room service. Thank you for the great comments about the staff and please feel free to contact me at keith.moses@hilton.com or 714.703.9100 to discuss the issues you had as we would love to have the opportunity to prove our committment to your satisfaction.

Summary: Stayed at the Garden Inn Anaheim - Garden Grove January 28-30.    The front desk staff was incredibly helpful in pre-blocking two rooms for me that would be close together as well as being genuinely enthusiastic about offering any assistance needed during our stay.  The rooms seem recently updated and everything was in working order.  Although I saw a number of families coming and going to Disneyland there was no perceivable noise in the hallways or other publice areas of the hotel.  The business center is perhaps the nicest I have seen at any Garden Inn property, and of course Internet use and printing are free.  I would not hesitate to recommend this property to noise-sensitive buisiness travelers or to families in town to visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: I take such great pride in knowing that we took great care of you and your family during your stay. Our team really does enjoy taking care of our guests! Also, thank you for noticing and mentioning the quiet accomodations and great amenities we offered to you during your stay. We look forward to having you back as our guest!

Summary Heading: Does not participate in first quarter promotion.
Summary: I had 180 stays at hilton properties last year and have been a diamond member since 2006.  I know what to expect at each brand.  With that being said this was..... Nice hotel. Great staff.  Clean rooms.  Typical stiff Hilton Garden Inn beds with adjustments that do not work.  If you are a frequent traveler this hotel does not participate in the double your points promotion (1st quarter 2013).  I am rating this hotel much lower because of this.  The breakfast is also less than average.  There is no restaurant yet (due for a remodel this year) but other options are within walking distance.
Manager Response: First I want to let you know how much I appreciate your amazing loyaly to Hilton! I appreciate the kind words about our staff and the cleanliness of your room. We will be opening our doors to dinner and bar service in the near future (as well as a nice lobby update). I am sorry about the issues you had with the first quarter promotion. Please feel free to contact me at 714.620.2137 so I may be able to discuss this with you and make it right.

Summary: Stayed here over the long MLK weekend after winning in on Priceline (less than $60). Super clean with friendly staff. At check in, we were assigned a HC King room but didn't know it until we got to the room. We immediately returned to the desk and was reassigned a double queen room with apologies.  Convenient location to dining and a short drive (or bus ride) to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting others know about the super clean rooms and friendly service you encountered during your stay with us! Wow, that was quite a rate you received! We are glad you chose us!

Summary Heading: Business travelers beware, vacationers - good spot.
Summary: For all you business travelers who like the HGI for the on-site dining and lounge area, this is not the place.  This HGI does not offer dinner and does not have a lounge area.  What it really is, is a hotel, grouped with other hotels, serving the local tourist attractions (i.e. Disney land, etc).  If you are arriving late, plan to go out to find your dinner : (  That said, the rooms are what you would expect to find in a tourist area, beat up, worn out and the beds well slept in.  For families traveling for vacation, its a good central location.
Manager Response: I am please to let you know that we will be going conducting an upgrade to our restaurant in the upcoming months and we will be opening up for full bar, dinner, and room service! We are consistently updating our accomodations to ensure that they are in great shape for not only our leisure guests, but our corporate guests as well.

Summary: The front desk always said hello and goodbye when I entered the lobby. They were very helpful with location explanations for dining, attractions and general area information. This made it much easier to allocate my time between business meetings. It is a 40 minute walk to Disneyland or a short cab ride, so location is okay for tourists. Pay the extra and get the breakfast coupon!!
Manager Response: When people read through the comments on Trip Advisor I love the fact that there are so many comments such as your that discuss how great our Front Desk takes care of our guests! It is nice to hear the consistency on this. In regards to getting to and from the Disney Parks, we are just over a mile, which can be a long walk after a day if walking at the attraction, but we also offer a shuttle for a nominal fee at the Front Desk that starts running an hour before and half an hour after the parks close.

Summary Heading: Excellent place for your Disneyland Vacation
Summary: In the past we have stayed closer to Disneyland - Hilton Garden Inn is a bit further - however, having a private shuttle was so much more relaxing and efficient than being on the milk run shuttle.  The hotel is beautiful - we had excellent check in, check out, and valet service. Extremely courteous and helpful staff.  Booked on Priceline - no problems with reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words about the hotel. We hear from a lot of our guests how nice it is to be close to Disneyland, without being in the middle of the congestion!

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for a trade show at the convention center. I was pleased with the stay. I thought the property was nice and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Although you are in an area surrounded by hotels and in front of a busy road, I thought my room was reasonably quiet and I got a good nights sleep each evening. The hotel seemed to be full with an equal balance of families and business people. The bed was very comfortable.  Hats off to maintenance also. My first evening, in the bathroom when I'd turn on the light there was an annoying humming sound. For one evening I'd have let it go, but for 5 evenings wanted it fixed. I told the front desk as I headed out meetings in the morning. When I got back that evening the problem was fixed and there was a
Manager Response: I really appreciate the kind comments about friendly staff and the way that our maintenance department made sure to take good care of you (they must read minds about when a snack is required). We also want to thank you for mentioning that although we do get a lot of pitter and pattering of little feet excited to make their way to Disnelyand, we do maintain a quiet soothing hotel. Thank you again for the comments and please stop by to say hello during your next visit with us!

Summary: I have to commend the staff (front desk - Jim & Jazmine, housekeeping, caf, etc).  Very pleasant service provided by these hardworking and dedicated individuals. The hallways do seem a little worn, but not dirty nor unpleasant.   Was not disappointed. You get to run into nice families with little ones excited about being in Disney!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff treated you well! I will most definately pass on your comments to Jim, Jazmine, and the rest of the gang! Please stop by and say hello during your next stay with us. Happy holidays!

Summary: We go to Anahiem for Disneyland about 5 times a year and have stayed in almost every 3 to 4 star hotel in the area. At the 3 To 4 star level the rooms are generally pretty decent and I never really have many complaints in that category, but very rarely do we have kind, helpful, polite, sincere staff that seem genuine about pointing you in the right direction and making your stay pleasant and enjoyable. We did, however, have wonderful staff at this Hilton Garden Inn. And, it made a huge difference in the stay. I will definey stay there next time!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments about the staff! We always talk here about all of the various choices of hotels in the area and that the one thing that we are truly able to set us apart is our service. We have the buy in of each and every employee and I am blessed to work with such a fantastic team! I look forward to sharing your comments with all of them.

Summary: We stayed here for a week on a recent trip and were satisfied but not blown away. Rooms are clean and well maintained. The bathrooms are clean but haven't been recently updated. The staff have been fantastic, very helpful and happy to answer questions about tours or help with bookings. Internet is decent, tv is good as long as its not raining. As soon as it starts to sprinkle the tv cuts in and out every few seconds, completely unwatchable. The restaurant only serves breakfast but there are plenty of great places to eat lunch or dinner within walking distance.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. It is always a wonderful thing to hear that our service team took good care of you. This was the first time I had received a comment about the issue with the televisions (maybe it's becuase it rarely rains here :), I have apoken to our maintenance department and he is following up with the provider to ensure this does not happen in the future to other guests.

Summary: We were impressed with the Hilton Garden Inn.  They were very accommodating and helpful in providing tips and directions to attractions.  Our Westjet Vacations package included free parking ($12/day normally)and a 15% breakfast discount for adults and kids eat for free. Rooms have microwaves, fridges and free wifi with convenience store items available in lobby. This property is a great choice for families.   A manager greeted us at breakfast each morning to inquire about our stay.  They offer a disney shuttle $5/adults $2/kids round trip as well.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you were impressed with our accomdations and our helpful associates. We always love our friends from Westjet! Thank you for letting others know about all of our services and I hope to see you in the future!

Summary Heading: A wonderful Disneyland trip with the family.
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel with my wife and my brother and his wife and kids. The hotel was nice and clean. I loved the beds; my wife and I were able to individually adjust the firmness of our respective sides which was nice because I prefer my bed a little firmer than she does. The staff was very friendly and helpful. At check-in we saw that they had a breakfast buffet, my brother expressed his desire to have breakfast there for the duration of our stay. The manager overheard this and decided to give all six of us free breakfast for the three days we were there. The breakfast was delicious! The have omlets made to order, pancakes,bacon, sausage, all kinds of pastries,cereals, juices and coffee. It would have been well worth the price, but as I say they, gave it to us for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments about the service and accomodations! I am glad you enjoyed our Garden Sleep System bedding, it was designed specifically to make it for the best of both worlds. I am glad you enjoyed the breakfast and that our manager took good care of you. Most importantly, I am proud that we were able to be a part of your families cherished memories. Please stop by the desk and say hello to me next time you come to town!

Summary Heading: Expected More from A Garden Inn
Summary: Checked into this Garden Inn with the expectation of an updated facility.  Since their hotel site said they had just updated the place, I was expecting a newer feeling place.  Not so.  Since the place is so close to Disney, I can only assume that this place is full much of the time and gets worn out quickly.   Parking is a pain, the stalls are too small for a normal sized car.  Check in went fine.   The elevator smelled like a diaper for both days I was there.  The room was OK, but definately not new or remodeled feeling.  Bathroom has some miles on it...if you know what I mean and the walls were pretty thin.  Breakfast was good, but the hotel has no restaurant other than just for breakfast.    The internet was super slow and wouldnt let me even use it the first night, even
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations during your stay with us. Please know that we are constantly updating the hotel whenever possible and look forward to further renovations in the upcoming months. We have upgraded the bandwidth of our internet to well over the standard provided by most hotels. I have noted the wait time with the provider so they are aware of the service issue and I assure you that generally speaking the consensus on our internet speed has been positive. The odor issue that occured I assure you was an anomoly that I have addressed, but it is the first time I have heard this sort of thing. Thank you for the great comments about the breakfast! Please feel free to contact me directly so i may have the opportunity to address your issues and assure your continued loyalty. I may be reached at keith.moses@hilton.com or by calling 714.620.2137. Thanks!

Summary: This HGI is on the lower end of rankings for all HGI properties, however it is still a decent hotel. There is no bar. The breakfast service was good. The workout room was as small and dated as any I've seen, especially compared to other HGI's. The price was right though and the service was very good.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to let others know about your recent stay. I really appreciate the positive comments about the breakfast, service, and reasonable pricing. I would like to let you and everyone else know that we will be opening a bar in the upcoming months (date is still not firm so I do not want to quote a specified date). Also all of our Precor equipment in our exercise room should be similar to other properties as it is the requred fitness equipment throughout the Hilton Garden Inn brand. I do admit the room is a little small and we are looking at ways to expand our exercise room, so more to in the future on that. Thank you again and please let us know if we are able to anwer any additional questions.

Summary Heading: Hotel has taking a beating over the years
Summary: I have stayed in this hotel 10+ times over the past 8 years.  Used to be a well maintained Garden Inn in excellent shape.  Over the last 2-3 years the "disney crowd" has beat the hotel up a bit.  Hallway and elevator below par....smaller workout room.....in-room fridge questionable.  Employees tried hard and appear to be committed.  Facilities need some sprucing up.  For the business crowd that needs to be near Disney/Harbor Drive and enjoys HGI....expand your search.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for mentioning our committed staff and for the taking the time to let us know about your concerns. I assure you we are consistently updating and renovating our property and that we are strive to be the best choice in the area if you are looking for quiet, clean, comfortable accommodations. With top notch service and everything that business (or leisure) travelers need. Please feel free to contact me at 714.703.9100 or email me at keith.moses@hilton.com so I may be able to personally discuss the issues you had and have the opportunity to regain your loyalty.

Summary: Jasmine at the front desk was most hospitable!  The entire team was super friendly and made us feel so welcome!  Love this hotel, love this staff!  We will absolutely chose this hotel anytime we come back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We agree that Jazmine is most definately quite hospitable and we are truly lucky to have her as well as our entire service oriented staff. We are also lucky to have wonderful guests who give this kind of positive feedback and loyalty. Thank you for the great comments!

Summary: I travel a lot and stay at various Hilton properties. As Hilton Garden Inns go, this one is above average in overall design, location and services but needs some updating.   Let's start with the positives: The location is great for anyone - families going to Disney or business people who want a big choice of restaurants and easy access to freeways. They have a very good breakfast, average or better than other Garden Inns I've stayed at. The lobby is nice and staff is friendly (although a bit incompetent at times). Prices are generally pretty reasonable. Even though it serves families as well as business people, rooms are very quiet.  Negatives: The place is a little rundown, but not any worse than other hotels in the Disney/Convention area I've stayed at. While rooms could use a
Manager Response: We appreciate you letting others know about our great location, friendly service, and tasty breakfast. We take great pride in our service and accomodations and I assure you we are constantly taking steps to update and create the best possible environment for our valued guests. I understand your comment about the parking fee, but like you stated it is common for the Anaheim Resort district in which we are quite reaonably priced.

Summary: I stay at a lot of Hilton hotels around the country and this one frankly was substandard compared to others I have stayed in. There a spots on the wall that need paint, worn carpet, patched holes in the wall that show through the paint and scuffed baseboards.  more importantly, while it is the closes Anaheim hotel to John Wayne/Santa Ana/Orange airport (15 minutes away) it offers no shuttle service to and from the airport.   Finally, charging to park and charging for internet is just a big turn off to me when I am already paying over a $100 a night for a stay.
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for your recent stay with us! Please know that we take great pride in the services and accomodations and would love to have the opportunity to gather additional information on your stay to determine the location of the area that you found in disrepair, as I assure you what you experienced was an anomaly, not the norm. I would also be able to provide an apology and hopefully regain your loyalty. In regards to the additional comments, although we would love to provide shuttle service the Anaheim/Garden Grove community of hotels does not generally provide shuttle service due to an outside company providing the shuttle service in the entire region. Also, the 15 miles, although it can be completed in a 20 minutes or so, with our crazy traffic it is also possible to take up to an hour. I understand your concerns in regards to the parking fee, but it is common in most of the hotels in the area due to our location in the resort community. I would also like to point out that we offer complimentary wireless and Cat 5 connection for high spped internet to all of our guests. We do not have the functionality to bill, so am not sure how there was a charge for your internet connection. If you have a moment please contact me 714.703.9100 or email me at keith.moses@hilton.com so I may offer a more thorough explanation.

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Hilton for our famiuly vacaton in October.  The hotel is close to Disneyland (not quite walking distance though) and there is a shuttle that comes twice per hour. The shuttle drops you off at the gate of Disneyland.  The rooms were clean and organized each day. There is a microwave and mini-fridge in the room, so we went shopping and hot snacks, etc.  The breakfast in the lobby ($12.95/person and kids eat free) is quite good. They will make you an omlette or eggs and there is lots of stuff to eat on the buffet.  There is shopping (Target) and restaurants close by.  Overall we were pleased with our room and the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us and others know about your pleasant stay with us as well as all of the great options that are close by! Next time you stay with us, please stop by and say hello.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Staff and Help for my handicapped husband
Summary: We wanted to say a very special thank you to the staff at The Hilton Garden Inn in Anaheim.  To: Miguel Hernandez for going out of his way and finding a bed rail for my handicapped husband.  He went way out of the way to find and purchase the product.   He and Manuel came and took the time to install the unit on the bed and it took a while but they never complained.  Having this apparatus on the bed made the stay liveable so my husband could get in and out of the bed while staying at the hotel.  It made this trip much more easier and more manageable.  My husband said that he would come back again because he had such good service.   Hats off to Manuel for going very much out of his way for finding a box so that my son could transport his toys he purchased to take back home.  He
Manager Response: Wow, what a great posting! Thank you for letting the world know about the great service you received from us. I am extremely lucky to have people on my staff like Miguel and Manuel who truly care taking care of our guests and ensuring we do anything and everything we are able to make their stay enjoyable! We look forward to seeing you int he future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to DLand
Summary: Friend and I stayed here September 13-15, 2012 and found it to be very comfortable.  This hotel shares the same parking lot with Embassy Suites and Buca di Beppo which we found very convenient for one of our evening dinners.  Shuttle bus for DLand was very reasonable at $4 per day per person.  I wouldn't recommend walking to the park from this location...it seems like it's doable but in reality you will dread it if you don't take the shuttle.  We could walk across the street and get items at Target to stock the little fridge.  The room also had a microwave which allowed us to heat up Buca leftovers.  The bed was extremely comfortable but a little soft but I noticed that there was a lever on the side of the bed that allowed us to make the mattress firmer.  After a long day at
Manager Response: I really love the fact that you not only brought up the things that you used and we were able to provide, like our friendly Front Desk staff, convenient amenities, and proximity to stores and Disneyland (after a day at Disneyland, a ten foot walk can feel like it's a mile!), but the items you didn't. One example is out Garden Sleep System beds, which has dials on both sides to allow either occupant to make the bed as soft or firm as they would like. Also, although you did not have breakfast I really recommend it next time! Let me tell you there is nothing quite as tasty as our freshly made salsas! We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: I am a Hilton Honnors Diamond member and consequently have stayed at many Hilton Hotels around the world.  I took my family on vacation to Disneyland this past week and received some of the best service I have erever received at a Hilton or any other hotel for that matter.  Keith Moses was very friendly and made us feel very welcome.  His staff went out of their way to ensure all of our needs were not only met but in several cases exceeded.  I wanted to mention a few of his staff members specificly; Hassan, Bryan, Rigo, Miguel and Jazmine.  All in all, just an outstanding stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments about our wonderful staff. I am a truly lucky  person to be able to work with so many wonderful, customer service oriented associates! I am excited to pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff!

Summary: I had the pleasure of checking in with tonya she is the reason why my stay was so awesome. Everyone was very nice but tonya went out of her way to make sure me and my family had a great stay.I will tell people about my stay and how awesome it was.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting others know about what a great stay you had with us! Tanya is one of our newer hires, so I am super excited to pass on this wonderful review to the team and to express to Tanya how happy we are to have her on the team!

Summary: The Beds Great, The rooms Clean, The front desk helpful, the food/ breakfast exellent, the Pool nice, The parking lot was full, The staff bent over backwards to make sure we had everything we needed.  Great Stay, will come back again!!!
Manager Response: Sounds like we got is all right! Thank you for touching on all of the cornerstones to what make us successful. Look forward to having you back, just make sure to say hello.

Summary: I am a little late in sending this in but want to share our experience.  My 2 boys and i stayed here from May 1 to May 8th for our Disneyland trip.  This is a very nice hotel and very friendly staff.  They were all very helpful.  The bus to Disneyland shows up on time.  We had no problems at all.  The laundry room was nice to have to use, also their computer room is very handy also.  They have snacks and a restraunt, we didn't eat there but it was always full of people.  Also the hotel was withing walking distance to Target and Del Taco and other places.  One night we got back to our room tired and a little cranky and their on one of the beds the housekeeper placed all the boys stuffed animals from our trip to Disneyland and Legoland! What a treat for my boys to see, it was cool
Manager Response: Better late than never on this wonderful review! It is great how creative our housekeepers are and some of the neat origami and designs they come up with in some of our rooms! I will make sure to pass along your review to them so they are aware of the impact that these small, but important touches have on a guests stay.

Summary: This was just a great stay all the way around. This is the first time I have stayed at a Hilton and we were very happy!!! We were disappointed not to be next to the park but it worked out great. Loved the people working here. Comfy beds, clean.  I agree it might be a little older but the service makes up for the "wrinkles". The pool was great!  I would definitely stay at another Hilton Hotel. Thank you!!
Manager Response: We were happy to have you as our guest! I am pleased that we were able to make your first experience with a Hilton property a good one, with our Garden Sleep System beds and friendly service! We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: We anticipated a certain level of excellence and the Hilton Garden Inn Anaheim/Garden Grove exceeded ours!  The staff was fantastic, friendly, outgoing and provided us with much needed local guides and suggestions on where to eat as well as coupons for local restaurants.  The room was very comfortable and I could have stayed in that bed for days!  The biggest surprise was the breakfast.  We expected a glorified continental breakfast.  The fresh cut fruits and made to order eggs, waffles, etc really put it over the top!  The waitstaff was attentive and pleasantly inquired about our plans, destinations and our enjoyment of our stay.  The general manager also stopped by and expressed his own personal interest in our well being.  They made us wish would could have stayed longer and
Manager Response: Wow, what an awesome review! I take great pride to hear that we exceeded what sounds like were already high expectations. I never tire of hearing about our great service and amenities and look forward to having you back as our guest!

Summary: This Hilton Garden a mile from Disneyland as well as the Convention center half mile. Free parking and amenities like good workout free-weights for business traveler.  Pool area for the kids. I enjoyed the Cancey Sports bar within walking distance. The air-condition as mentioned by others works very well. Breakfast hot and fruit options are available to everyone at reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for touching on all of the areas that make us stand out, most importantly how well we work whether you are staying for a Disneyland vacation or if you are on a business trip.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel, but Showing It's Age
Summary: Great location about a mile from Disneyland. Pay to park, not great. Clean rooms. A/C worked great. Carpeting very worn in rooms and hotel could use an overall sprucing up. The building is showing it's age. Wonderfully attentive staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay, I always enjoy hearing about our attentive staff, comfortable accomodations, and desirable location. We are in the process of changing out the carpeting in the handful of rooms that have had an issue with the pigment from the dye actually coming out. I assure you this in only in a few of the rooms currently and we are in the process of being addressed, In regards to the parking fee, it is in place due to our location being in the resort district and will be found in almost all of the hotels in the area, with our pricing much lower than quite a few. I again thank you for your review and look forward to meeting you int he future!

Summary: I stay at a lot of Garden Inns, and this place has all of the things that are great about the brand, the awesomely comfortable beds, excellent work area, clean, good lighting, controllable room temp etc.  What I really like about this place: -not overrun with Disney families on vacation (even though it's really close) -cookies in the lobby -Great restaurants in walking distance -Nice pool area  For business travel, the best I have found in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for touching on all of the cornerstones that make us great! Our clean, comfortable, and quiet accomodations, as well as our great amenities! We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: My family stayed at this property about 8 years ago and remembered it as being on the newer side and relatively clean with friendly service. Unfortunately, we determined that a lot has changed over the years.   We arrived at 3 p.m. (the posted check-in time) on a Saturday afternoon and learned that our room was still not ready to be occupied. So we killed an hour by going out for a very early dinner and returned around 4 p.m. As Hilton Diamond VIP members, we're used to having Hilton staffers go out of their way to accommodate us. The service was fine certainly not on the level that we're used to.   As Diamond VIPs, we are supposed to receive the hotel's breakfast free each morning of our stay. When my husband inquired about obtaining our breakfast vouchers, the front desk clerk
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay! I assure you the issues that you brought up in your review are by no means the norm and have been addressed with the entire management team. We take great pride in both our service and accomodations and I apologize for the challenges you have had. We value all of our guests and most certainly our loyal Diamond members! In the recent past the HGI brand for our Hilton Hhonors members automatically defaults to 750 points if the member does not change the account to the complimentary breakfast option. I would love to have the opportunity to regain your loyalty, so please feel free to contact me at keith,moses@hilton.com or by calling me at 714.703.9100.

Summary: Have been a Hilton Honors member for a good many years.  In my stay here, I was again disappointed with the quality of the bed.  They are promoting firm to soft settings, but that does not really matter if the bed is sunken from one side to the other.  This has been the case now for several of my recent stays at a HGI.  Why when they are charging the prices they are now (and they have been going up of late) can they not provide mattresses with support?  The service was good at this location.  HGI is always a good clean place to stay.  The coffee shop was OK and up and running at 6:00 AM.  Would strongly recommend Hilton or their owner Blackstone start putting their profits back into maintaining quality sleep accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We generally have great comments about our Garden Sleep System bedding, but it seems that we may have had an issue with this particular bed. I would love to be able to gather more information about your stay including the specific room and to be able to make it up to you for the inconvenience. Please feel free to call me at 714.703.9100 or email me at keith.moses@hilton.com.

Summary: This visit was a big change since our last visit. We had a very pleasant stay our last visit. This visit was almost a 180 degree change. We found the place like a zoo/playground with all of the kids running around as if no parent were present. They played on the elevators making getting one difficult. The parents did nothing to control their children. I gather that when they go on vacation includes they don't parent on vacation..
